Review: yes its crowded but the sunset views are great a lot more commercialized than i thought with all the surrounding vendorsstalls but so many unobstructed views when you head up to the cafes at the top just sit soak it in and enjoy the viewif you have time to have a drink i would sit and do so if not just snap the pic and enjoy
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: tanah lot temple has been a really famous destination in bali tanah lot is located around  km away from ngurah rai airport in denpasar coming from denpasar on the main highway and arriving in the town of kediri you will certainly not miss the large sign at the main intersection announcing the southwest turn to pura tanah lot to reach the temple of tanah lot you will need to cross some dry land then climb a hill to reach the site of the temple many people reported that the old tanah lot was much better than the tanah lot we see but still for us tanah lot is such a breathtaking temple its even better if you visit them on around pm the sunset is really good and pretty and some people said there were tons of big long white snakes underneath the temple in which they believed as their lucky charm
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: wowjust beautiful not to many people even got to go over the water and visit the temple when the tide had gone out far enough
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: bali is full of temples but this one is different from must of them beautiful temple that you can only see by far but also beautiful landscape nearby this is an impressive place to visitif you want to take an online taxi gojek or grab be careful taxis dont accept them and they are very aggressive if they understand that you are not taking their taxi although the price is at least  times higher we only had this problem in tanah lot and nowhere else
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: beautiful place we reached well before the sunset time and spend some time at the beach and then we witness the beautiful sunset it was really beautiful we went to the temple which was a little queue with holy water it has black sand and shoes can get really dirty if you go in water so wear some old ones a must go place if you plan bali
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: nice place quite popular so many people are visiting specially at sunset tends to be crowded overall a nice place relaxing to have a few hours and catch the sunset
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: tuesday th september and we were on an all day tour of the royal lake and temples tour which we booked through the tui representative at our hotelour first destination and stop was at tanah lot where there are  temples beside each other we visited the spectacular pura batu bolong first then we walked along the coastal path to visit this templeit really is a spectacular sight to see the temple standing on the rock in the seawe made our way down on to the beach as it was a low tide we were able to take off our sandals and paddle out to the rock cave and templewe walked to the holy water spring a fresh water spring in the cave it was possible to drink from the holy spring and receive a blessing the temple stands on the rock above the spring it is not permitted to go up to the templeon the the headland across from the temple there is another small temple which tends to be overlooked this is pura jro kandangon the landslide there was another cave which is known as the cave of the holy snake we did stick our heads into the cave but did not venture inthere were sellers and hawkers here mingling with the visitors trying to sell all sorts of touristy tat
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: aim for sunset if you can and wear joggers for rock climb a beautiful spot dont buy from the first tourist seller you see bargain like crazy as there are heaps here be sure to get at least  to  of starting price
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: getting to tanah lot was an experience of itself buffalo tours have a great package although the stop at the monkey temple could have been left out we had time to visit a coffee plantation  see the civet cats but i didnt try the crapachinotanah lot was crowded and i didnt find the hole but then the sunset was overcast but still pretty spectacular
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: what a lovely and peaceful place is tanah lot templethis is a place full of magic and well beingif you go to bali this place is a place to visit for th pleasure of th eyes but also a time for retire of mind
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: the place was nice  beautiful we love indian ocean wave tanah lot is kids friendly we spent  hours around there and take a very nice picture with spectacular view will be back again soon
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: ive to come a nd time to catch the sunset view my st visit  years ago was raining and high tide this time was perfect  we had a very beautiful sunset view and a very low tide where we can get down and walked on the usually covered area by the sea took many nice shots at tanah lot temple and dont forget the batu bolong a little further up north
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: this place is simply beautiful the black sand the temple sitting directly at the threshold of the sand and the indian ocean natures best the priest offering a blessing in the base of the temple as the waves hit the rocks calmingthe outdoor market with a mixture of mainstream and private brands conveniently geniusbut the sunset wowing and simply gorgeous to see all of the colors come together than settle behind the water
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: it is a vast areayou can see the waves from anywhere from the bed of sea to a cliffbefore entering in that place u buy the ticket idr there is a good parking lotno bus service is availablea big local market is in the compounda fire show performs in the evening with ticketmost memorable part is sunsetprobably this is the best area to observe the sunset in balithere is a huge well maintained gardenyou may take a rest

Review: this is a must goto place to watch beautiful sunset we arrived at the right time and our driver helped us take some amazing photos unforgettable experience

Review: the temple complex and the shoreline are very beautiful and atmospheric what spoils it however is us the tourists with the incessant need to take the perfect picture they stand at the perfect spot primping their hair and pouting for the camera please consider others who would like just to take a photo of that spot rant over
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we have visited this temple twice the first time was around  years back at that time we did not get the chance to see the sunset due to raining daythis time we decided to vist again hoping to see the sunset but was disappointed again due to cloudy weatherbut the temple alone is worth visiting this unique temple together with the beautiful landscape form an unforgetable image in our memorywhile we were there the temple is having some kind of religious ceremony although we do not quite understand the meaning behind it we still find it interesting to watch the entire processworth visiting at least once
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: amazing place nice market outside the temple for souveni not allowed to climb up the temples but still amazing view
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: tanah lot bali is a natural tourist attractions is very popular with local and foreign tourists many visitors who come to bali say should come to bali tanah lot tanah lot if you have not yet been to bali so people praise tourist attraction located beraban village district of kediri tabanan regency there are two temples are located in tanah lot beachthe temple is located o top of the boulder and temple located on top of a cliff that juts into the sea tanah lot temple is a place of worship of gods guard the sea this temple located in the middle of the sea when the tide by the time the tide temple is clearly visible in the middle of the sea for hindus who pray to the tanah lot temple should at low tide then people could cross to the tanah lot temple
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: a nice place to visit and watch the sun go down you cant visit the temple but we visited on a special day and it was fantastic to see everyone in traditional dress visiting the temple plenty of shops to visit while you wait for sunset
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: visits to the tanah lot temple are subject to an entrance fee of idr  for adult domestic tourists and idr  for adult foreignersidr  for child domestic tourists and idr  for child foreignersthis ticket also insured you against any accidents at the sitethere are many restaurants here where you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast or lunchexperience the serenity of the tropical sun slowly disappearing beyond the horizon and the wide open ocean and listen to the sound of the soothing waves crashing on the shore it will be an incredible memory to treasure all your lifea temple dedicated to lord brahmaone of the top  temples in balithis is a must visit templealthough its quite oldthe balinese govt has tried to restore it to its original valour by taking out works from time to timewould recommend going to this place at early hours to mind the long tourist crowd and also note the timings of high tideas the visit is then closedthere is a natural spout the source of holy water for all the temples in the area just below the rock where temple is situated
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: since you cant visit the temple i dont know why is so highly praised the surrounding is also very touristy sunset was really nice thoug
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: located on tabanan regency where need  hour from denpansar that place known as a best sunset in bali but unfortunately i couldnt got that experience due to my visit just for bussiness so sad eventhough i enjoyed the sunny days there if you cross the sea go to the offshore temple you would got offered holy water from hindu people but be careful due to high waves there tanah lot temple is simply among balis nottobemissed icons dont miss it guyshighly recommended
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: one of the first sites my fiancee and i visited one of my favourite temples to visit in bali with waterfront landscapes
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: it was so lovely the high tide coupled with nice sunset really made it magical i dont know how they built it but what a sight
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: pura tanah lot is a very beautiful temple it is ideal to see the sunset against the background of temples and indian oceanseverything in bali is beautiful all
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: interesting and must see temple leading up to it are numerous souvenir shopslined narrow streets bargaining is a mustthere are also some eateries
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: due to the timing of kecak dances and the sunset in late august i could only choose to see a beautiful sunset with dinner and drinks overlooking the waters or go see the local kecak dance unfortunately doing both is not really an option since kecak happens at sunset heres a breakdown of the best options for boththere are two kecak dance performance sites in tanah lot though only one of them is heavily advertised at the gate and around the temple pm de jukung resto  bar  hour show k idrwhen you enter tanah lot from the parking gate this is the kecak show they offer a ticket on sale for when you enter you could technically see a tiny bit of the sunset while watching the kecak dance if you sit on the higher levels of the amphitheater and then have a really great dinner at de jukung resto afterward unfortunately this location is not currently listed on apple maps so rely on google maps and asking locals how to get there instead its about a min walk through tourists from the temple pm dewi sinta hotel  min show k idrthis is your best chance to catch most of the sunset views around tanah lot in august and see a kecak dance show in the same evening this location is listed on apple maps and google maps and is actually much closer to the temple since its just up the street about a  min walk through tourists from the templei unfortunately did not get to see either of these kecak dance shows because it was my first visit and i wanted to walk around more but i did get to see quite a few great sunset watching spots and heres a breakdown of those sunset from wahrung sunset bagus  relaxed drinks with cliffside temple viewsthis is the closest sunset temple view for relaxing with drinks and westernlike foods there are fewer umbrellas here which make it easier to see great skies no matter where you sit service is relaxed at best so dont expect people to check on you just call them when you need them they prefer to leave you alone unless you need something this doesnt show up on apple maps but does appear on google maps from the temple you walk through a small market alley to the right until you get to the cliffside cafes people start to claim their sunset cliffside tables around pm sunset from tanah lot beach  trump golf course  natural views with less peoplegoogle maps lists this area as tanah lot beach apple maps listed this area as trump golf course to access the beach and walking paths go to the end of the sunset cafe area mentioned above around a small red gate through a little patch of wood and then onto a paved path that leads to open beach and a great overlook that provides views of the sun setting directly behind tanah lot this is an amazing spot for photographers and instagrammers to get iconic sunset shots with tanah lot in the background but lots of open beach in the foreground a lot of people start to claim sunset watching spots here around pmalternative sunset locations with secondary viewsif you feel like youve seen enough of tanah lots main temple during the day and want a different sunset view check out these options sunset on batu bolong temple  thread the sunset through the holeas i was walking through the park to the north of the main tanah lot temple i wondered why so many people were camping out along the side of the cliff then i realized that it would be pretty spectacular to watch the sunset through the natural bridge under batu bolong temple the view from above wouldnt provide a complete sunset under the bridge but if youre on the ground at the right time of year you might be able to accomplish it from the beach level if you can get down there when the tide is low enough sunset at de jukung resto  bar  relaxing indonesian dinner at sunsetthis option does not give you sunset views of any of the temples but it does give you  sunset views over the open waters with a really great indonesian and seafood meal we could hear a little bit of the kecak dance happening at the nearby arena from our table even though we couldnt see it there was also a private event happening for the major sports teams of indonesia while we were there so there were a lot of people around but the service was still very attentive for dealing with food allergies and the quality was excellentwas this review helpful
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: awesome views of the temple especially when theres low tide definitely worth to pay the entrance fee
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: you can find really nice ocean views from here but keep in your mind that this is a tourist attraction and there will be a lot people this is more like a theme park with an entrance fee of  idr per person
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we first went to tanah lot in the s a lot has changed there would have been less than  people there these days s the temple and surrounds are really beautiful and you really dont regret going there even with the heat and the crowds we were there around midday would definitely recommend either early morning or evening
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: another lovely place to enjoy the balinese sunset because of the low tide we could walk all the way to the temple the sounds of the crashing waves were really something
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: i went in the morning at high tide and people recommend the evening for low tide but it was still stunning nonetheless a bonus about being there in the morning was the cool weather and way fewer people its definitely worth the short drive from ubud
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: yes its busy but there is still room to move around and doesnt ruin the experience we all add to the congestion by being therewe had about  hours before sunset and walked to the nearest temple first its not a long walk but you get he views to the south east and if you carry on towards the restaurant there are steps that lead part way down to the beach but is blocked  again you can get close to waveswe then followed path back up to where the cliff point is snake charmer land and saw tanah lot temple from above it is amazing how it stands on its own i can imagine its better with tide in as the waves break against the templewe walked down yes crowded but lots of space  maybe not for the instagrammers who want it all for themselves the waves are very strong and unpredictable but nice to spend  mins there watching the waves and tanah lot close upwe then waited for sunset and there are many places to do this aside from the spectacular sunset the other great phenomenon was the s of birds that suddenly appeared as the sun hit the horizon i assume this is a daily thinganyway definitely a must see and just go with the expectation that others want to enjoy also and you wont be disappointed
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we were so impressed with the beauty of the temple and the cliffs around the high tide made it look like an island  so pretty
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: classic little industry built up around a tanah lot wonderful temple and buildings and obviously revered a huge attraction with many people coming and visiting for the classic selfie with the waves crashing in and a good day it makes for a picture postcard setting there is the usual selection of small shops outside and stalls inside and some restaurants at the top with great views
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: this is one of the most important landmarks in balithis hindu temple is located atop a huge rockthe waves keep lashing the rocks the sea is beautiful most people go here to see the sunrise or sunset  hence very crowded at that timeon the way u can find many shops selling arifacts clothes n food its lovely to stand or sit on the rocks n enjoy the beauty of the sea with the white frothone can spend long hours watching the sea
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: very nice temple we are lucky to be able to walk to the temple during low tide you can enjoy half day there by sitting in the cafe at the hill top and looking to the nice scenery of the temple surrounding
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: this temple is very unique and you will see rough waves when the tide is coming in it was high tide when we went and the whole temple was surrounded by the sea water still some locals in traditional prayer costume made their way to the temple
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: i enjoyed this place overall and saved it last in my tour day and was thinking the best was last not really it was good once you get past all the souvenir shops the prophotos make it look amazing it is nice but i guess i hyped it up in my mind i would recommend the visit but the roads to get there will take a while so plan accordingly it was nice and interesting overall
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: pura tanah lot one of the temples standing in the middle of the ocean is one of the tourist destinations in bali  with beautiful sunset and also many art shops that sell typical bali craft  you can also enjoy the beautiful panorama of rice fields while enjoying the original balinese coffee
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: i took a very long drive in a hired car to see this temple but that may a given considering the traffic in bali you cant go inside the actual temple but its a huge space and the whole area is beautiful even despite the hundreds of people theres something quite magical about the place even if you may run into some selfie sticks while wondering around be careful of the slippery rocks
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: after visiting a lot of temples with all the main ones in bali included we ended our holiday with the tana lot temple to see the sunset idr per person but is worth itit is one of most beautiful things we saw it is very romantic and mystic if you dont want to get bored skip other temples but do this one
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: the temple is on a rock surrounded by the sea  this is the standout highpoint attaction in a large complex and there are many other temples to see so allow more than hrs for this tour entry fee is rp
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: impressive views of the sea from the viewing areas no access to the temples not much else to do so not worth the two hour trip in searing heat and congested roads
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: as with uluwatu it had been  years since we visited this temple site and we were astounded with the rampant commercialism of the entire area surrounding the temple still stands in splendid isolation atop the outcrop the waves and high tides providing some semblance of barriers to the hordes trying to get access the extensive onshore commercial area also includes a number of shrines intermixed among the restaurants shops and art market stalls easier to see pekendungan temple batu mejan temple batu bolong temple jro kandang temple and enjung galuh temple the map provided when we purchased our tickets is a user friendly plan of the complex we arrived at am approx after a two hour drive from kuta square but the throngs were already present we were lucky to have an excellent driverguide who interacted with officials and stall holders on our behalf and ensured that no ripoffs occurred despite the crowds and commercialism i still reckon that tanah lot is a must see at least once if visiting bali
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: tanah lot itself is very picturesque and it is easy to spend a few hours there as there is a small beach with rocks to climb and a market full of the usual bali trinketsmy problem though is with getting out using any of the online ride share transports there is a cartel running among the taxi drivers so we were advised to walk away from the temple area and call a car from there however when we did this and the car arrived it was blocked by someone and not allowed to leave a london cabbie would have just pulled away but my driver was young and didnt want any trouble after i had a stand up row with the official blocking the way we were still not moving so i instructed the car to drive on without us and we walked a few km out of the villagei was warned but hoped that we could get away with it all the local businesses are in on the racket we we dobbed in by a restaurant owner who saw us waitingbali is fantastic but if they want to move their tourist industry on then they have to sort out the transport situation and accept that online cans are now a fact
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we travelled by hired car to the area despite many tourists in the vicinity i must say we really enjoyed ourselves when we got to walk around along the shoreline to see the tide completely isolate the temple from us was simply magical
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: one of the most important temple in bali we went there for sunset in a cave there is the holy snake you can donate to see it maybe tourist trap the area of temple is very big so you should have  hours to see everything
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: this is a must visit site in bali we arrive approximately pm and got a nice sunset view it was low tide and we got to walk on the mouldy rocks stunning view
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: on my solo day trip in bali this was the first place i chose to visit it was a morning of clear blue skies tanah lot temple looked most beautiful and pristine the naturl beauty of the place has been restored most carefully even with the large number of tourists visiting this place every day there is a feeling of calmness around this placei would love to visit this place again of when i go to bali again
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: one of the most important temple in baliyou need to go their early like  or  am max to avoid peopleyou can get bndiction there but i recommend appropriate sarung even though many people don t dothere is a nice coffee at the end with no people
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: our tour was rushed  had to leave before sunset there was ceremony so was not able to get close to temple recommend tourists to include walk to bridge temple  stay for sunset can get close to crashing waves against rocky shores  view out to ocean
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: great place stores and food are cheap compared to other tourist areas in bali a romantic place during sunset
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we went on a  temple tour but this one was the most spectacular too cloudy to catch the sunset but an amazing temple built by hand and formed by the sea
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: beautiful view great photos more touristy than years ago but very friendly and clean has a few little shops eatery
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we travelled to tanah lot temple from jimbaran bay which took just under  hours because of heavy traffic the way to the temple at tanah lot is through many many market stalls  but there is no badgering to buy we were lucky when we arrived at the beach as the tide was out and it was possible to walk up to the temple receiving a blessing from the people in a cave beforehand tanah lot temple is a very busy spot and a very popular tourist attraction
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: one of the most epic view you ever see so beautiful and nice the holy temple and the holy water something makes you feel the really atlantic and original times like you traveling in time to the best and see a very good story about the ancient gods and history i love it and the local restaurant there was really nice like we had a very great time
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: thats how we felt every time we journey to tanah lot by riding the motorbike from kuta the ride will take you through the craziness and the calmness at the same time but they were all good as we liked it first hand along the way we got to see bali as a whole  picturesque most of the time had a stop at starbucks in the middle of a district called kampoeng before we journey towards the temple tourists everywhere the place was crowded and it was high tide the temple was submerged half way so we decided to take photos nearby it wasnt our first time here so we let others to experience it overall excellent views for photos a bit crowded and you just need to be in the moment we did and enjoyed it
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: we visited during a ceremony so the experience was that much more interesting as we got to see the procession of believers cross the water to enter the temple with their offerings other than this the views are what makes it a unique experience there is also an entry fee and you need to wear a sarong and sash before entering
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: tanah lot is unique its located within the ocean which is awesome we visited around pm whilst the sun was beginning to set before going down to the ocean and temple we wandered around the many market stalls and found ourselves some lovely souvenirsupon arriving at the temple it was very busy and crowded the tide had come right in and the waves were crashing down hard on the rocks it was difficult to manoeuvre around at the bottom of the cliffs due to the amount of people however we managed its important to be slow and steady dont put yourself at risk the temple is beautiful to observe at a distance we found the view better above the cliffs whilst sat in a restaurant with a bintang we sat and watched the sun gradually set whilst the waves crashed against the temple which was beautiful i would strongly recommend visiting
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: highlights  the temple is attractive both in low  high tides the shopping  eating outlets are very good  reasonable bargaining possible
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: temples can get rather tidious after a while however this one is worth the visit what sets it aside from other temples is that its located in the oceans its like something out of a movie very beautifulat the bottom youll see a lot of people attempting to takes pictures at the ocean please be very careful it can be dangerous the waves are powerful and strong it nearly pulled in someone whilst i was there in do not risk your life for the perfect selfie
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: what could be more beautiful and scenic than a temple on a beach in the ocean the place is definitely a must for balivisitors the markets and whole cultural atmosphere is amazing
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: the place is extemely beautiful the view was amazing cliff on one side and the open waters on another the pujaris gave us auspicious water and put a yellow flower above the ear it made for some wonderful picturesalthough the main area for praying is restricted and tourists are not allowed therejust outside the temple i had dark chocolate icecream on a bamboo charcoal cone from the first shop and it was the one of the most delicious icecreams i had ever had
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: its so beautiful to see this temple in the middle of a massive body water try to watch the sunset therethe place also has more than enough food and shopping spotsremember to bargain cos i got a lot of stuff at nearly rd the price quoted
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: was so good to see the temples in person and tick it off the bucket list beautiful part of bali rich in history and tradition
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: enjoyed visiting here today lovely temple situated on the rock and while you cant go up its a beautiful sight to behold
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: one of the best places to visit in bali very wonderful place temple and sea beautiful view keep  to  hours spare for this lovely place
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: this place is beautiful and well worth the entry feethere are coral snakes that can be seen and touched for a small donation which was pretty awesome as i love snakes the holet spring is nice and you can drink from it and get a blessing for another small donation the views are great but there alot of visitorsthe markets there are a great place to shop far cheaper than markets in the main towns lots of fixed price shops that were very cheap the stall holders are far less pushy here toothere was a luwak cat sleeping at a coffee shop to see too his name is john and is a pet of the owner and was really awesome to see one and it wasnt in a cage or tied up but just asleep in a platform at the entrance they are nocturnal so was happily fast asleepthai plave is well worth a visit
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: full with tourist the places is in well maintained got lots of souvenir and food stalls too scooter parking provided pay rpk toilet fee rpk or k  cant remember
Name: Tanah Lot Temple

Review: as the name suggests its best to come here before sunset  you will see the sun setting right behind the temple located on a small island right by the beach beautiful to say the least definitely worth a visit

Review: as should be expected this stunning area is a magnet for visitors although very busy it is certainly a site to put in the memory bank

Review: went to the buffet and free flow alcohol up on the third floor it was low season so still spare tables at about pm food was quite a large spread at least a dozen different things pastas indonesian meals fried chicken noodle dish pork skewers etc salad ingredients free flow alcohol was good no lines  drink per person but you could keep going back drinks were limited types prost beer drum whiskey empire gin and a vodka music was really pretty good the whole night the whiskey was really weird though my wife had half a glass but couldnt finish it it tasted really really weird a cpl hours later we went down to the night club on lvl  which was pretty quite but music was good she started throwing up dont think it was food no stomach upset think it might have been methanol poisoning from the drink the local whiskey in the morning after throwing up another  or  times overnight no problems so overall the whole thing was very good value easily got our rk  taxes actually rk worth dinner and about  or  drinks for me but wife getting sick made it a bad end to the night

Review: if you want have a small standing table its rp  million and of you want sofa sitting table its rp  million they take entry fee rp per person and give you  complimentary drinks comprising of frost beer and cheap vodka and whiskey music is good its good for groups to take the sitting with minimum charge but as couple its too expensive instead go to other club music is good everywhere tbh lxxy is just overrated because it is fairly new and after skygarden has closed its trying to monopolise the worst part of lxxy is you can smoke everywhere there are heaps of people smoking at the dance floor i have seen many people getting burnt on hand or other parts due to other person smoking and they colliding they should have a smoking roomarea after you leave the club you just feel like you clothes hair everything is smelling of smoke

Review: we gave this place two visits on our trip to bali  its cheaper than skygarden and doesnt have the line up for drinkspositives price  you cant go past this for free flow drinks even if you dont eat reasonably quick service at the bar which meant that the queues for drinks were not bad at all great vista  very open which also means you arent overpowered by smokerswhilst my partner loved the food i was a bit disappointed apparently the chef was on holidays so things were not quite up to the standards usually there so i will go back and try it again but for me the food was quite bland and there were not enough options for people with allergies also the set up leaves a lot to be desiredthe food ran out with alarming consistency the whole night so there was a rush each time it was out out not enough serving implements tongs meant people had their hands all over the food  also people are smoking whilst getting their meals  my partner had to point out to a lady that her cigarette ash fell into one of the serving dishes the tom yam soup was way too spicy  we could not eat it and we are used to spice lack of vegetables here also to be used in the soup basedessert  ice cream you serve yourself out of a tub it was nice ice cream but really should be in the small individual servings size more options needed here toooverall a nice alternative to skygarden but lacks on the food side of things
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: awesome  thanks to michael for the greetings me and ma friends its was a good experience in lxxy
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: the price is cheap  banyak pilihan makanannya juga  thankyou for michael you give the best service since we come until the end of party  ill be back to see you and the club at  floor is nice  after we ate we drink and directly to the night club

Review: rupiah for entrance food and drink until am for men and free entrance for ladies  ladies drink is not badthese things were bad in my eyes time spent in lxxy  from pm to amclub section had its highest peak around am at some time they swapped djs it went downhill from there by am people were leaving home or to other clubs annoying staff memberi dont know if all of them are like that this one guy asked us if we wanted to order drinks we agreed he came back with our drink and almost demanded a tip note that you dont have to tip every time we went to order ourselves he asked us why we didnt order from himwant to avoid all that pay with visa heheoverall a nice place with good potential but sky garden is still the king

Review: i love the club i love the music but i got surprisedduring my career in tourism area for more than  years this is the first time i met your staff who introduced her self as gro  write her own comment in trip advisor and using my phone and absolutely my accountshe never asked what i felt before she only act like a very friendly staff came to me and asked me if i want to write a comment or notwhen i say yes she just took my phone and say that she will write her commentit is so weird for methen i absolutely deleted the comment that she made ofcourse she wrote a good comment in the beginning i want to give  stars with my honest comment but unfortunately after this  stars i love the buffeti love your promotionsbut i see the different how some of you treat a local and foreign people we are still your guest it doesnt matter how we looks likehope it will be never happened again in the futurehonest review is the most important so we can growthank you lexxy

Review: i visited the web site  filled in the details for a booking of  people did not receive any acknowledgement of bookingnor were the staff aware when our group arrivedthe bad arriving at opening time surprised to see the staff still setting up the food we tried the precooked potatos rice and pad thai the food was quite tasty but only slightly warm this was  minutes after opening our bbq food orders number  took more than  minutes to arrive the staff apologised but said they had trouble firing up the bbqthe pizza was luke warmbar the first and each subsequent beer was barely cold certainly not a level of cold for what most tourists would expect serving  staff stood around doing little but only one barman weirdthe lack of atmosphere was actually quite strange this place should be packedthe good the staff are very friendly the food is actually quite tasty  but cold the price is excellent the venue has improved significantly since its opening much more user friendlyoverall  despite the ridiculous delays for our bbq despite the lukewarm food and lukewarm beerour group had an enjoyable eveningthe value is questionablethe obvious alternative is skygardenon price lxxy is cheaper the service is poorer the food is much lower standard and far less variery the beer is warmits a different venue so difficult to comparehowever if the management actually put some effort in lxxy could be a viable alternativeas a local resident that has international and local visitors every week at the moment i cant see myself taking or recommending lxxy to my visiting friendsafter one year between visits i can only say how disappointed i am with this venue
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: on sunday i dont have any idea to went somewhere to enjoy the night  but my girlfriend was told me in kuta have new fancy place  so directly we went there  enterence is free but they had special offer k for brunch included alcohol that is greats guys  after brunch we countinue again to club in second floor a lot local people but awesome cocktails here was greatssome of bartender also are excelent  happy hours is my favorites keep it up and for sure we will back  cheers negroni lovers
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: recommended  enjoy the party in bali with your friends nice food  drinks good price lxxy is the best
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: they have buffe will open from  pm the food is fresh the place is clean staff is friendly and always smile and the price for buffe is very cheap for all you can eat and drink and the last thing is their night club music and the light soo is awesome will back to lxxxy again
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: the most cheapest club in bali  you can enjoy buffets from pm to pm just only k the food served is very tasty and you can also get free access to the night club to enjoy the dj music performances
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: amazing place to dance ure night away you can go here just only k for their live bbq buffet from pm to midnight on poolclub there is pool and jacuzzi so friendly staff that will company you well after pm you can continue your freeflow to nightclub which is so awesome with great sound lighting and big led screens will come back soon lxxy rocccckkkkkkkssssssss
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: buffet food was not fresh and was cold it looked like they were serving food from the previous day the food serving area looked dirty and outdated all you can drink is a fallacy they only serve one beer if you are a beer person avoid this place like the plague you have been warned skygarden is  times better
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: one star for staff efforts to clean tables and serve punters with a smile the food is cold and uninspiring the freeflow beer is only limited to one choice avoid for dinner consider for clubbing
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: clean place and a lot of dishes enjoying a day at the pool and getting a very professional service for bisma he is very good the service is very good making my family really like it thank you for this best experience
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: great food all u can eat friendly staff pool access and limited drinksthe best in legian bali nowrecommended the food and drinks u can enjoy it till dropthank you
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: come in at  and had to wait  minutes for a drink free drinking stopped at  and almost had no drinks wont go there anymore
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: was a fantastic experience rooftop was amazing and on the way home we stopped in the club downstairs and had so nice time with all guests and staffhighly recommended
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: we got a lovely service there but the crew didnt take the dirty plates on our table without order is little bit annoying to let the dirty plates and used glasses scattered on the tablebut overall this place is nice and comfortable
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: we arrived for there at about  for there all you can eat and drink is was very busy but not too busy for drinks we had the kebabs which they cook to order for you first lot was good we went back for seconds they was brought to us minutes later started eating them and half way through we realised that the chicken was still raw in the middle my girlfriend is now poorly the day later im okay but wouldnt really recommend sky garden was much nicer and a lot friendlier staff
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: come here with wife because we want to join celebration one year anniversary for lxxy baliplace modern design good lightning and still cleary sound system table to close each other make not easy to movestaff faboulus front desk quick service full of knowledge about product  the important thing is he remember my wife sorry i forget the name but that man wearing sun glasses waitress  security inside doing a very good job always check the guest still in good condition always standby to help clean wet floor than protect us from stupid drunkard and makesure we safety there need more speed for person incharge to cleaning restroom three times use always dirty and slippery and for kitchen staff please dont forget guest orders  minute waiting only for french fries  already cold when coming in our tableprice reasonable with other similar place around maybe for promotion package can included and combine more variantnobody perfect but at least we happy  we definitely comebackcheers and happy one birthday lxxy
Name: LXXY Bali

Review: great place to hang out and party  the are various party zone under one roof one can also choose various package
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went to sky garden but closed downso went to hotel next door vipin  nights  friends had there phone pick pocketed on the street around that areaaround  am they had had a few but the pick pocketing group were prosjust watch out
Name: Sky Garden

Review: its great to be at this place from  pm till  pm all drinks and buffet dinner is complementary if you enter the club before  pm crowd is really good but youll find local crowd as well but be aware of pickpockets food is good and music is awesome must visit if you are in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we went to sky garden following the advice of the lonely planet travel guide and found that it was shut a local said it was due to them not paying taxes disappointed we missed out sounds like it used to be great fun
Name: Sky Garden

Review: food really really good at this place good selection of food from the buffet hope to come here again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we enjoyed a lot most of the nights we were there like almost every night while we were in bali we felt safe because of the presence of the guards however it wasnt that safe after all  of my friends lost their phones on the same night last year when we were on the dance floor one of our friends lost her iphone we thought at that time that it was an isolated case however this year  of my friends lost their phones and theyre not drunk yet so it wasnt that fun for that particular night
Name: Sky Garden

Review: ready to experience the real bali nightlifevisit this famous bali nightclub since day theres a lot of good music and placce to dance
Name: Sky Garden

Review: it became expensive all different stages playing same kind of music with a space like this could have proper djs palying unstead of that edm style that the tracks are all the same from dj to dj definitly there are better options in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the place could have been better if less crowded it was full of people and i felt suffocating at many times lastly i left the place in just  mins
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so if you are in bali and want to party like crazy with good music and crowd this is the place to be  you will surely love it  the place is havoc have different themes of dance floor  the best one is right at st floor the open deck near dj  thats where the best music is playedwe were there till  am in morning dancing like crazy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the best and famous to spend your night is sky garden the place where you and friends can listen the music from top dj from whole over the worldhave your drink and enjoy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we visited the skygarden in the rain and although initially the outside terrace was closed off due to the rain the shear vastness of the gardens set over several levels with bars cafes and drink or photo opportunities is something to be seenyou have to prebook your visit online to be guaranteed entry although there are walk up places but you have to que on first come basiswe enjoyed our visit extremely and plan to go again hopefully next time with better weather to see even further
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my friend and i  came here two nights both night were fantastic the top floor plays the best music and the security team are phenomenal i felt safer their then i do at home excellent vibe with everyone having a dance be prepared to get sweaty as youre dancing up a storm though
Name: Sky Garden

Review: enterence fee here bit expensive  but we never wrong to pay it for best club in bali  enjoy the party  hope see back again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i was on a honeymoon at bali we made our way to sky garden kuta such a classy place we both a blast i had lost my fone i was in such a panic state we were having a good time this had literally put me off we approached the lost  found i got my fone the employee sent it straight to the lost and found and rest was a crazy evening there it was my first experience at bali kuta i had one of the best times evr
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we  girls were here for our th bday bash and we really enjoyed it cocktails were very cheap and shisha was super cheap as well we were quite late for the buffet they were wrapping it up but music was great and food was quite good too
Name: Sky Garden

Review: honestly i didnt even bother going in to this joint they want you to pay  just to go in when everything else around is free all the crew i spoke to that went there said it was just full off hookers and loud music  like everything else around for freenext
Name: Sky Garden

Review: just rip off unfortunately even if you like to speak to supervisor  manager at  no one there and issue cant be sortedit was a good place few years ago now just mess and high pricing without any competence  sad but truejust choose other places around
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i cant explain how crazy good of a deal this place is i dont often get exited about going somewhere but after going here the first time i just could not wait to go back the second night you pay in i think its k tax so about k and thats for unlimited beer spirits alchopops and more but not only that theres a huge buffet and the food is really good like some of the better buffet food ive ever ate they have different specialtys every night but still keep a section for food like burgers chicken ribs ect just amazing you can go up and get  drinks at a time so it really does feel like theres a catch to it when your sitting with a plate full of food and  beers just after being in there  mins but theres not i did take full advantage after food i must of had about  beers between  and even if i was buying cheap beer from the stores outside this is still  cheaper and you get food and a nice place to sit i would say tho that come  the que for the drinks gets ridicules like about a  min wait for anything so id advise get there at  and enjoy the night before its too packed
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the best places yo spend the night they offer good drinks shisha and cocktails its very safe the security guards are everywhere and always asking if youre okay or not
Name: Sky Garden

Review: for a monday it was surprisingly fun however the food has left me and my friend in an unexplainable amount of pain maybe we should have realized eating free steak in a night club was a bad idea but it felt right at the time i warn u do not fall into the trap we are about to board a plane and are scouting out puke bags still fun tho
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my partner and i had so much fun really chilled with what you wear and drinks were decently priced only thing that is a bit weird is females are free but males have to pay other then that it was the funnest night of my life
Name: Sky Garden

Review: huge discotheque mostly crowded with caucasian wearing casual clothings and sandals for parties youll be spoilt with pole dancers in other section rb in another section etc generous and good serving of buffet which come with the entrance fees and  bottle of beers the quality of food and desserts were as good as a  star restaurant the dancers at the stage were great to watch though
Name: Sky Garden

Review: its changed alot at the door for  people i paid mil indr and you get one free drink the prices are much too high
Name: Sky Garden

Review: pay k for ulimited foods till pm and any alcohol drinks till pm young people around  peoples and its just at the beginning of evening very recommend
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i have been to sky garden several times in the last  years i knew all the managers and staff it was a great place excpet the fact that has been always friendly to local prostitutesbut now the ower changed and you dont just have many prostitutes the new chinese ower plays dirty scams like closing the line for unlimited drinks earlier or explicity asking the staff to serve drinks very slowly the unlimbeted buffet and drinks has been the best deal for years but now its just a scam with the new owneravoid skygarden several foreigners has been robbed also as you can read in many reviews just go to canggu much better people atmosphere and staff
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the tracks played by australian djs are pulsating and lively there are different floors for different types of music food spread is also very nicegood place to let your hair down
Name: Sky Garden

Review: after having researched top clubs in bali we chose to head to sky garden in our first night firstly the traffic jam on the street is unbelievable secondly the walk upto the top level is difficult esp for women in heels this was one of the few clubs that insist on a cover charge and all you get for  is a single glass of wine as you enter the first level has some dj playing with a large scree display in background noone is on the floor even though its packed with local youngsters we make our way to the top level where the music is better and so is the crowd somehow for some strange reason the bar serves unlimited buffet to everyone so there is a serpentine queue that unnecessarily crowds the already crowded area the buffet consists of  items that are deep fried after taking the plate you will realise there is no place to sit to eat so all you want to do is get rid of that plate and just try and enjoy the musicthe place looks ordinary with hardly any decor most crowd is local and college going finally you realise you cant take it anymore and walk down three levels and then sit in a can that takes another half an hour to get out of the lane highly avoidable
Name: Sky Garden

Review: been here on feb  celebrate my husband bday entry fee about a  each we can eat all you can mostly western restaurant located at roof top good ambiance if you can be there before sunset bit crowdednext visit about aug  restaurant move bit inside menu less than before not really interesting but still love free drinks light alcoholsif you like clubbing maybe suitable place for you sound well managed not mixed in between floori preference live music with jazz and blue genre unfortunately cant get from this place overall good option for traveler
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is one of those iconic places which is a much visit if i was younger i would be there every day heaps of party people entertainment food is great i love the roof top to chill and people watch
Name: Sky Garden

Review: very large place with  idrs with food and beer for  hours incredibly cheap unfortunately too many people get drunk and become very annoying with  hours to drink beer for free definitely a place for the younger ones
Name: Sky Garden

Review: visited  nights in a row friends were robbed inside seriously if the staff and management are not doing anything about it we all need to avoid and patron other placesvery dissapointed
Name: Sky Garden

Review: nice clubcrazy sound system insideelectronic hip hop musicbarmaids gave a strong strong alcool quantity very generousbe careful  of girls are workingdance and pay  million for more fun
Name: Sky Garden

Review: good music from all genres i was expecting bollywood songs as welldjs choice is really nice do not miss the dance by performers expensive but worth it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden is probably one of my favorite clubs in bali this is the perfect place to have fun with my friendsalthough the staff and security could be annoying sometimes the music is just my style starting off with idr k all you can eat buffet heating off at the rooftop and end the night at the skydome sounds like a perfect way to spend your weekendps ladies do not depend on the ladies free entry pm too much p
Name: Sky Garden

Review: daily for four hours we can eat very good food for a reasonable price unlimited drinks menu changes daily no small bags allowed but we saw some touristslocals with some bags they told me video cameras are not allowed but i saw one guy openly filming using gopro yesterday and all have phones so they can take photosvideos how about that i had to keep my small video camera with them we noticed when people go for the drinks or food others come and sit in their spots as no one knows they are coming or not to that spot need some system
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i have had the pleasure to visit many night clubs and some similar to this one  sky garden pushes it to another level entrance fee is a joke   idr or ab  euros this includes from h until h free food and drinks buffet  eat and drink as much as you want quality food including fillet steak  hamburgers perri perri chicken and much more  bar will serve you vodka  beer  coolers and any soft drink several dance areas with different djs as different music styles we had a great evening and will for sure visit again next time we are in the area
Name: Sky Garden

Review: levels of madness madness of the good party kindhad a blast with my teenagers pretty sure the alcohol drinks are watered down during the hour all you can drink and eat session although not necessarily a bad thing as everybody still seemed drunk including myself lol the food was quite good great family night out we went ended up in the bb bar with bottle service  watching the awesome kiwi band ended up socialising with thefor a bit which was a definite highlight theyre the best also enjoyed being able to relax on the couches and have our own dancing area all the waiters made my daughters flowers made out of straws and proposed al night the dancers were turrrnt and the band super entertainingthe bar area where you get drinks during the  hour all you can drink session wreaks of vomit not sure if thats the normal or just that nightmet the owner too who seemed to be friendly choice as and hands on that night with the goings onheading back this week dec  woohoo
Name: Sky Garden

Review: for us it was a good choice as it is near our hotel so it was a walking distancethe music is not bad and the crowd was really goodyou may step in   and they warm up by midnightyou have to pay  irp as entrance fees and you will get  free drinkswhat i didnt like that they are giving you the  drinks at the same time and you have to hold both simply they can give us  coupons and we use it as we go i found it very stupid and the staff couldnt help at allbe carful when you go the disco in the late night as pick pockets are around the place so make sure to secure your belongings before hangover enjoy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: at   irp including tax per person the buffet is great for the variety and atmsphere must pay a visit in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: wonderful placei just loved itgood musicgood foodamazing crowd we thoroughly enjoyedonly thingyou must go after  pm
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we came on a sunday night for all you can eat roast night which included drinks for  hours we werent expecting much being that it was only  we thought it would take along time to get drinks but it was great plenty of food options and the most time it took to get a drink was maybe min all in all it was a great night great value and even had a desert bar
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great food and free flow drinks from  to  for k then being able to party in multiple different rooms and floors so you will not get bored and could have fun all night long
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i personally didnt like it much they have entry charges and food is on buffet system they have  dance floors playing different music i found the place a bit sledgy can have a look it is top rates in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: terrible service rude staff no hospitality the waitress refused to hold my empty glass when i complained security guys came running and grabbed me i had to apologize for her wrong behaviour other wise they would have beaten the hell out of me
Name: Sky Garden

Review: unbelievable place for people who love food drink and music together great environment with great deal
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my husband had his drink spiked here and was then relieved of his credit card cash and mobile phone the drink was brought over to the table by staff so make of that what you willplease be wary if you choose to go herea frightening experience which really shook him up i wouldnt wish anyone else to go through it which is why i am leaving this review
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if you want good music electrifying ambiance and good croud then this us the place for it must visit
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this restaurant club had various times and prices with menu changes every day to suit a host of different tastesthe roof top dining area was a welcome change with cool breezes the bands started late and went all night we went for the sunday night roast dinner and it was overwelming for the variety  quality and amount all you can eat and drink with prices starting at  atpm
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i had a great time at skygarden in kuta the environment was fun and the music was amazing there was also a band playing in one of the rooms the night i was there be sure to make it between  and  pm for the unlimited buffet and drinks for less than  usd a great deal for the price
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we came back after a very nice upgrade last time we were here have to say that we werent this happy first a blonde guy claiming he was owner asked us many times for shisha witch we already told  times we didnt need one but he kept coming back at us very annoying no is no by the end he was rude and we just left the tablegoing back up to rooftop the party was good good vibe but again one of the managers sounded like a typical usa kid with an attitude he claimed to be the owner as well was kinda rude to us he was busy getting the hookers drunk and asked us to leave the seats its a shame for the club that two managers are drunk as hell at least we got that impression and not showing any professionalism at allthis time we went home with a mixed feeling liked to bridge of glass and off course the show in the main room
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden lives up to its billing as one of the hottest nightspots in balithe entry fee is pretty cheap considering the drinks and all you can eat buffet on offer the place really does come alive post  pm one can party till the wee hours of morning the roof is happening place and so is the club downstairs the security is also on point and we had a great time went there twice and would recommend it for certain
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we had the bbq night and the food was so great you have so many options and unfortunately we couldnt eat so much cause the selection was so big i really wanna go again the free drinks are alright
Name: Sky Garden

Review: im not really into bars and parties but it was so much fun in here i met a lot of people from different countries and all of them were nice and decent aside from the guy from chile who thought im a prostitute but he wasnt rudeour first night there was during ben nickys event and we really enjoyed it a lot the food was good too the price range of the food and drinks were just about right except for the coke in can which was extremely expensivei like how protective the guards were one night i got drunk and i attempted to go out of the bar alonr but the guards stopped me and waited for my friends to come over and helped get sobernothing to complain really its a must visit place in bali bali experience is never complete without sky garden experience
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if you want to meet new people and party all night long this is the place for you from  pm to  pm there is free buffet which varies from day to day and free bar for only  rupiah the building has three floors so there is something for everybody i had a blast
Name: Sky Garden

Review: please be very careful at this clubwe stayed two months in bali the first few times in sky garden were great nights its an all you can eat restaurant with club dont expect too much with the foodafter a few times horrible things happened we got scammed a few times with the drinks they gave us less alcohol like almost nothing when there was a clear sign with double vodka our friends we made at the club different times had to pay way more than they should bemy phone was stolen at the club one time i got upset ofcourse and they threw me out of the club my boyfriend was still inside and they didnt let me in they didnt even help me find my phone or gave me any advice a friend of ours wallet was stolen and nobody but us helped her neitherso the last time we went as an goodbye to bali my boyfriend got attacked horribly by the dj he just suggest a song we did this a couple of times earlier nights at the club this time the dj was really aggresive and almost broke my boyfriends phone so my boyfriend just let it go and walked to me we danced again and were in shock of his aggresive reactionthen the dj came of his booth and strangled my boyfriend out of nowhere he looked on drugs and it looked like he wanted to stab us as a women the dj even punched me hard in the face and we got thrown out of the club the security even said come back tommorow  ehm like no neverplease people be careful we are just a peaceful couple that wanted to suggest a song and got this reaction please read this before you go here
Name: Sky Garden

Review: whent here last night for all you can eat and drinkbeer mixed girly drinks in bottles and wine and basic spirits it was roast night  any kind of roast you can think of they had it and sausage and kebabs salad bar and dessertsif you can eat this the place for youpm free booze eat until amdont know how they can do this but its goodthe roof top garden was good to eat inthank you sky garden staff and managementthe food was very good and service was very goodwill be backkeep up the fantastic work
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the place is amazing ambience was good rooftop as well as indoor party area dj was amazing unlimited food and drinks at very affordable price the place had so much rush queue was very big for alcohol approx  mins waiting crowd was amazing must visit place please avoid any irrelevant arguments were locals here
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this mega club in bali has been listed within the top  clubs in the world huge dance spaces to choose from there is music for every mood with world renowned djs mixing it up in the main arena or live acoustic you will find music to your taste and dance mood
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great club lots of space we went there for  all u can eat and drink deal including selected alcohol between pm and pm we got our moneys worth but by pm the line up for the alcohol was  mins and u can only have  drinks at a time the buffet food was exactly that but when u only get  chicken wing or  rib at a time for the all u can eat is not good true u can go back and get another rib or wing when u want  but the wait for the food quickly got to  mins or so if taking this deal get there early
Name: Sky Garden

Review: its a great place to go they offered us different liquors by our entrance fee the musics and dj were awesome dont miss this place if you are a party lover
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i been there for dinner because i read about the bbq buffet from pm so i tried it its an excellent offer nice buffet with great choice and free flow heiniken vodka juice and soft drinks its located on the roof top  so with a little bit luck you catch a seat with nice city view everytime again for only k very cheap
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the super clubs in bali located at one the most commercial street of bali kuta this is also one of the busiest and happening place to visit when you on that street had gone here on the weekday and it was still decently busy they charge you an entrance fee of k person in which they give you  drinks its a two floor club so we straight headed to the rooftop where we got a spot at the bar and ordered for our drinks and shisha the music was good and the rooftop is surely more happening than the floor below but after some time we headed down to the st floor and it was just ok they had business women all over the place so bachelors would be happy if they are into that lolthey have guests djs come down almost every day and surly worth a visit and also this place is open till am
Name: Sky Garden

Review: good crowd and music good food and cocktail choices must visit place for folks who wants to groove to the music
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if u need to have a fun night u dont need to seek for other places just visit this placeone of a best place i have been in my life just awesome no words to tell made my day
Name: Sky Garden

Review: had a great night out there we are happy all night what a day for usone of a best fun in life must go and see cheers
Name: Sky Garden

Review: sky dome had the best music according to me the drinks were strong as per the price charged for them crowd was awesome i visited during the xmas new yrs time and it was the bomb i have never quite experienced anything like this before as soon as we entered the music and atmosphere just blew me away that i never felt like leaving i wish to vist bali all over again just to go to this club many times more loved it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this place is really amazing great djs and awesome atmosphere its a definite visit for anyone visiting bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: all type of music in  roofs the roof garden is amazing  and the food was delicious security is really strict which makes you feel more safe
Name: Sky Garden

Review: it is ok even nice to party up but you have to be very careful as it is located on legian st kuta a very dabgerous and shady area first day a friend of mine was robbed by several people who were trying to get he in a taxi someone just pickpocketed the phone and cash while he was distracted by the othersyou can have fun over these place just be sure you stick with your mates and never walk along especially if you are drunkagain  the vicinity in the nite is shady
Name: Sky Garden

Review: should visit once for nightlife in bali every theme of music sheesha amazing worth visiting nice location but very hectic going bcoz of crowd on the whole street
Name: Sky Garden

Review: ive been to a few clubs around the world particularly across europe and can say with confidence that skygarden bali is by far a worthwhile destination for anyone looking to enjoy nightlife in bali i went to a few places through bali for night life including spending a few days also in gili trawangan and just nothing else compares the security are all nice guys unlike other places where power seems to go to their heads these guys know how to nicely deal with drunk people and keep the place safe while still fun the atmosphere in skygarden is that of a true super club  there is  x different music  djs across  levels so you can go where you feel like or switch between floors personally i liked the rooftop until i went down to bangbang on level  and discovered the live band  dancers  this quickly became my new favourite way to spend my pmam every night for the past  nights the live band solidaz are amazing and the local dj here really knows what hes doing the dancers are all beatiful in body and spirit and have genuine expressions on their face like theyre having fun laughing and joking witth the crowd and each other unlike many other places where staff seem depressed  seems skygarden looks after their staff the ones who made my visit here truly memorable and even spared some time to chat with me ill never forget you  particularly ifka adilla lol when i proposed to you p malica ajenk and devi i went just for night life fun but i came out with a real sense of attachment with the staff here and return home with many new friends and fond memories thank you skygarden and the positive up beat staff  highly recommendedfew other miscellaneous bits of feedbackthe toilets are regularly cleaned top standards every single visit i could even go so far as to say it was the cleanest toilets i saw across all bali in my  weeks therethe barstaff are extremely generous with alcohol pouring take your time drinking or youll get too drunk too fast haha there is good value for money when you realize how much alcohol you get in some drinksmen must wear tshirts you are not allowed in with a singlet
Name: Sky Garden

Review: good club to spend the night several dance floors with different music happy hour until pm guests in all ages of course average youngish agedanyhow nothing special
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a heaven for the people who loves to eat drink and dance all nightafter entering in the club u will b feel glad its having  diffrent discos inside the cost is apprx lakh indonesian rupiah one more thing for vegeterians u wll not get anything execpt saladso please eat outsidevisit there after pm before that its fully emptyvisit once if u visit bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: there is a cover entry of  idr i think for which you get  drink its an amazing place loved the music this place is has good crowd excellent music and overall its the best place to go clubbing its open all night very safe for girls
Name: Sky Garden

Review: myself and some friends have been over in bali the last couple days and last night went to skygarden while we were there we met a young lady named vanny dewi we thought she was kind and everything and as the night got on things intensified she started asking us for money for sexual favours and we kept telling her no we were not interested then after a while she started to harrass us saying horrible things about we should go and hang or shoot ourselves since we did not want her attention we were upset just for the fact that we came over to celebrate a friends life who had passed away from suicide and to have someone tell us these things were horrible so this morning we wrote to the sky garden instagram page and also showed what she looks like and also told our ordeal and are waiting to see what they say but i just wanted to inform people on here as i feel its not right if nothing is done about this person anyway the rest the time we went to sky garden we enjoyed ourselves and enjoyed our trip in general and will be back in a few months again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: wow amazing place and i enjoyed welli loved live band team of solidiz it was amazing and i really enjoyedif you go there till pm idr  per person with selected beer or liquor and ladies is freeafter  ladies not free and after am both idr  beer and liquor are worth price i will be go there again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the best place for night life at legian in here you can listen your favorite music and dance you can also watch night strip in here and choose your favorite drink and food and all staff very friendly unforgetable night and fun in here on november
Name: Sky Garden

Review: big disco go to place if you like various music styles in one location especially liked the rooftop overlooking the street area can be extreme busy at times
Name: Sky Garden

Review: located in kuta skygarden is a large building with multiple clubs inside they have a great all you can eatdrink that starts around pm and goes until pm for  idr well worth the money they change the menu each day so you could go multiple times in a week and not see the same foodthe clubs get busier later int he evening so you could go for the all you can eat fooddrink and not be around for the loud noise and larger crowds drink prices are reasonable and the staff are very friendly security is there for your protection but not to start problems or escalate problemsskygarden was recently ranked  club in the world its definitely worth checking out if youre in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so sky garden are wanting to up their standards since becoming the  club in the world whoopdedoo nothing special about that from my standardsits still just a large club expensive for drinks crazy noisy and young underage people within the venue all getting way to drunk and skankyyou ban people from coming into the venue that are wearing singlets when the weather is  degrees celcius girls are wearing next to nothing people wear flip flops  things yet a guy cant wear a decent singlet not a bintang singlet and show a little armshoulderpoor choice skygarden i wont be back and neither will the  others that we were on holiday withbali is a place of freedom heat and a place to enjoy yourself not a place where you need to dress up to go out its only skygardenlamebetter bars to drink at in bali with a better vibe cheaper and staff are a lot more friendly
Name: Sky Garden

Review: bargain at this price we arrived just before pm on a thursday they have different menus each night of the week see pic posted buffet style food good enough taste wise drinks were some ciders beers soft drinks juices and water theres enough seating inside outside front or back just dont get there after up cause by then its quite full the dj plays easy house music inside which was great and they allow  drinks per person at a time desserts were chocolate mousse cups a cake thing and fruits totally worth the money and will recommend everyone give it a try no dress code during this time but we left just after pm when the vibe started changing into club mode
Name: Sky Garden

Review: multiple floors choose what sort of music you like great crowd dress casually great fun if you are in bali for nightlife this is a must
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i took my  clients for a after conference party to skygarden and i must say that the experience was truly magnificent the manager darren was a delight and he made sure my guests had a wonderful time at the club my clients who came from the best european cities were amazed to see the club scene in skygarden we partied till am and everyone had a blastit is a completely safe place for singles couples and groups the security is awesome the music is out of this world some of the best djs that nightdarren was magnificent and so helpful thank you darren we shall visit you soon
Name: Sky Garden

Review: it has a plethora of pubs in the buildingthe place is very lively good djs play music it is a must visit they have a reasonable entry fee visit after  pm and then enjoy the night
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great place to dance the night away to some house music i only entered the main room but enjoyed dancing and drinking gin and tonic as you would expect it is a younger crowd there and people of all nationalities enjoying themselvesbeware of the hawkers out the front though
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is one stop shop for all kind of party goersgood music and ambiencegood variety of beveragesdecent crowd and securitymost important part you have various sections for your kind of musicyou will get terrace  rock music lovers can ho to seperate column to chill out andofcourse you can party at their main floor with dj spinning nice tracksoverall one of the best place in kuta to enjoy a musical and fun frilled evening
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so i have been to many clubs and i did not think sky garden was going to really be that different but i was wrong the way everything is so organised is amazing i did not mind paying over and over first club ever where i did not have to queue at the bar everything is so on point large space for dance floors i had so much fun epic memories were made there hands down the best club i have been to so far
Name: Sky Garden

Review: make sure you spend a good  hours out here the ground floor is all about the club music and top level a totally different vibe with more chilled out music and a dance floor for yall to go crazy on after downing those shotsoverall youll love it out here so make sure you visit
Name: Sky Garden

Review: sky garden is amazing place with four levels of party zone but we frequented the disc area the staff is the best i have come across in any clubs the crowd is amazing the venue has super energy they have great music it gets busy by  if you are in kuta this place is a must must go if ur in to partying tip  take a private table its not dat expensive
Name: Sky Garden

Review: after long time of not clubbing i loved the place i went with my girlfriend and we had really good time the pace is safe and nice with variety of music on each floori believe its the best for night at kuta
Name: Sky Garden

Review: came here on a meat night huge selection of salads veggies and meat very cheap  pm all you can eat and drink choice of some beers soft drinks  cruisers for approx aud best to arrive there early because it gets pretty busy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great placeearly evening all you can eat bbq and buffet including drinks for  then night club on  floors
Name: Sky Garden
