Review: this place was off the hook they had a bar with music to suit everyone the atmosphere was awesome the staff were really friendly and helpful and the djs were world class such a good vibe cant wait to come back
Name: Sky Garden

Review: its a well known place in kuta floors we went there after there was a cover charge of  rupiah ppthere were djs playing on  floors lots of people dancinggood vibesmany other discs just next to this on the same road
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the finest nightclubs in bali spanning several stories with their own respective dance floors skygarden is a must try the food the booze and the crowd were great went there for  consecutive nights the terrace bar is wonderfuli was slightly disappointed with the dj on the second night as he played some dampened mixes of songs that were originally awesome
Name: Sky Garden

Review: awful place overpriced poor music and terrible security there are much better clubs in kuta do yourself a favor and dont pay the cover
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we were looking so much forward to this were told girls get free entry if they dress up so we did but came and got rejcted de unless we paid k rupiah same as in europe what a disappointment
Name: Sky Garden

Review: been to many bars before skygarden is okay just like average since its famous in bali expect a huge number of peeps inside so literrally crowded what i like here the price is affordable i was able to get two jager shots for about k if im not mistakenwhat i dont like here i did not feel comfortable during the whole nightunlike the other bars in seminyak
Name: Sky Garden

Review: from monday till thursday you pay k rupiah to get in im from nz so its around  to get in but that includes either  cocktail or  shots chose the shots ofc however from friday to sunday its k to get in we went on a tuesday night and it was super lit its  levels and each level have a room where it has different kind of music i personally like the edm room i think its called ye the down floor and of course the roof top skytek was playing i think they are regulars for that club and they play top s to popular songs from back in early s with a bit of twist of edmtrancetrap if you want to have a good night this is the place to be but be warn if you cant handle smoke from nicotine just be cautious cause in indonesia people can smoke indoors compare to new zealand
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great place for the young went to check out cover charge  with drink which is good but drinks after that expensive for balitaxi for home trip blue bird refused to meter trip as after  am not a good experience if your young you will have a blast
Name: Sky Garden

Review: been around the world and dance on lots of dancefloor and very few had the music selection to keep me busy all night long sky garden rooftop dj is my favorite as you got exactly the perfect crazy mix to make me move my body like a snakewe also enjoy the bbq buffet and food is good and great selectionreally enjoy my night out wish i could put a  star but tripadvisor got also
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i read some mixed reviews on tripadvisor however im glad we decided to visit this place had just amazing time here food drink ambienceeverything was awesomeso they currently have two sessions pmpm wherein you can eat  drink unlimited till  pm at i think about  idr per person at the rooftop and then you can stay for the next session after  pm but if you want more drinks you have to pay environment at the dj floor starts building after around  pm we stayed till about  amladies well dressed  in high heels are allowed free entry
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the most happening club in bali and the biggestyou get feeling of rooftop open club on the roof and also the enclosed dj driven air conditioned club on the ground floori went their with my partner and had lots of fun drinks are expensive but the music and dj is amazingtotally worth to spend an evening at this place
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my trip here was with my friend and we stays for nights only in bali we visited this club for twice because we loved their music and atmosphere there are many young people between  most of them are from europe australia and south america they have some locals as well i didnt see many asian tourist for two day i think  is from europe australia  indonesian local and   asian tourist they have four different levels for different concepts we loved rooftop bar and the dance floor the beer is only k idr and other drinks are average price compare to other places we will visit this place again when we go back to bali but the only worried thing was they did not check our id passport i think they should check he id for the security
Name: Sky Garden

Review: as a night club was fantasticwe didnt have food in restaurantmusic was fantasticdjs were great im just a big criticism  there are a lot of over drunk people and sometimes abnormal behaviors occur i think it should be much much more security forces to have to feel safer conditions for our companions
Name: Sky Garden

Review: there are  different places with different music try all of themladies dress up    free entryits a little not nice because if u put on high heels and formal dress u will get free entryalthough we went there for free but in the entrance every time they asked us to pay when we said we know its free entry for ladies then they said okso if u dont say anything about ladies free entry they ask for entrance feedrink was not good and i think they dont add any alcoholmusic was not that bad if u are not drunk u cant dance with itit was crazysecurity was perfectaircon was perfect they served shisha but there werent any smoke aroundatmospher was dark and i prefer to go to a beach club than somewhere dark
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if you want to party in legian street kuta this is the club undoubtedly stacked up over  storeys this has plenty on offer for all the age groups  enter before  am or there is minor entry fee of k rupaiaah that covers  beers or a cocktail the st floor is the primary dance floor with kickass centre stage for the dj and big dance floor  reminds me of illuzon night club in phuket not as big though  crowd is fantastic and club is bustling with energy till  am in the morning all the gigs are panned for a week in advance with best djs spinning edm numbers next best floor is th floor open to sky where the scene is more relaxed though no drop in energy levels of the crowd must visit place in legian street kuta if one is looking to party hardrahul
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is a buffet style roof top restaurant  eat all you want only bbq style and salads with free drinks including beer limit per person to boot great party atmosphere be aware there are only  sessions  starting at pm and at pm if you go before pm you have to be out pm to make way for the clubbers and night owls good value if you like eating aussiestyle bbq and burgers
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we went to this club for  nights and it was awesome everything is well organized the different stages are nice and the function  soundsystem is perfectfrom pm till pm you can eat good quality bbq and salads and drink all you want for just  including entrance from  till  beer is  and mixes are  after  you pay  for beer and  for a mixdrink so you better be there on time to drink before  and have an epic night
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is a great place to dine out all you can eat and drink for  hrs buffet fantastic selection of food catered for my coeliac diet dine looking out over the roof tops of kuta  min walk from white rose resort price is very cheap  au dollars per person yes it includes alcohol also children can eat here casual dress code
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went here with friends in different ages  for several nights and had the best time everyone enjoyed it the dinner buffet is totally amazing and absolutely worth to go to at least once preferably every nightthe whole club is an attraction itself with a lot of floors and dancefloors i preferred the dancefloor on the rooftopmake sure to go to the bar on top floor since it sells cheaper alcohol until
Name: Sky Garden

Review: our only mistake was that we visited skygarden the very first night of our trip to kuta and thereafter every night we visited other places but none was close to skygarden and we were so disappointed with othersfour of us just  years young with  years experince  in our late fiftees visited this club at about  in the night there is an entry fee of idr  k which covers two beers or a cocktail the club is in four floorsso after buying our entry tickets we decided to take a tour at ground floor is the restaurentthe second floor is were you have to check in with your entry pass where you have to make selection of your free drink and you are let in the hall has seating place on the sides and also in half portion of the hall the dj is playing the music and you have screens all around the music is superb bit loud but ok the third floor is also part of this very hall people overlooking from the top and enjoying the forth floor is open to sky with people sitting standing drinking and enjoying the music which is different from nd floorso we decided to settle down at nd floor we got seates around a round table in the middle without any difficultythus the fun began after galloping our first bear we entered the dance area and merged with the group without caring for anything we were so engrossed in our dancing that some young couples from india  of course honey mooners were pointing towards us as how were we enjoying perhaps they took a cue from us and started to enjoy dancing with their partnersomewhere in between there were four shows at the stage which were very pleasing including a laser show very well performedwe ordered snacks and pitzza which was more than we could eatwe did not know when it was past  am on clock when we decided to move outthe place was still live and we hear it goesc on till am like thiswith little haggling we could get a taxi back to our kuta seeview resort and spa in just idr knext and next to next day we visited hard rock and other clubs near skygarded but sadly no one was near to skygardenso dont thing twice when in kuta just head towards skygarden and enjoy your drinks  music and dance and also foodbest wisheshope you enjoy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: after listening to all the much hyped reviews on tripadvisor we decided to take a trip to this discotheque it was slightly disappointing to see it not up to the standards the floors were not very clean the staff were too rude the food had no options for vegetarians entire place was overcrowded and full of nuisance people the only thing good here was the music they played and the cheap entry fees the drinks were chilledfour floors and all were not very up to the mark the staff were too rude to tourists specially from india even though the few seats were unoccupied it wasnt provided to us stating stupid reasons overall not worth a visit avoid it if you can
Name: Sky Garden

Review: finally a decent club the club had a  week schedule for the djs and eventsmiddle of the evening there was a good performance on stage pretty good dance music and atmospheregreat security to make you fee safegot a welcome drink with my entrance ticket cant remember if it was k or k but worth itthomas gold plays there on rd of march
Name: Sky Garden

Review: id go there if therell be a big gig like afrojackwe went there to patrick oliverit was really greatthe staff is cool as wellthe prices for drinks are so high id recommend to predrink in front of the clubthe rooftop is absolute amazingrecommend
Name: Sky Garden

Review: been to sky garden about  or  times and always love the inclusive food and drink deal  rpi for all you can eat and drink between pm and pm  if that wasnt good enough having gone there yesterday i discovered the sunday food includes roast beef and yorkshire puddings  absolute bargain and youll eat and drink way more than you pay out for a must visit venue for anyone
Name: Sky Garden

Review: best party place in townif you have heard about white dubai well this is white baliso nice music and loudvery good price and the longisland icetea tastes amazingstaff very friendly and security as well
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great buffet and atmosphere really enjoyed the mean and people watching great music in the eating section but shame about the music on the dance floor maybe we were too early the music they play outside to get people to come is should be the same music they play inside so it was disappointing when this wasnt the case id go back there again for the food great value for money
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the best time to enter here is between  pm and  pm the floor starts gradually warming up the music slowly starts taking momentum and the entire crowd starts to build upthe music and ambiance is awesome with dance floors spread over three floors where you can sit and enjoy music or get to the dance floor to move on the tunes there are food and drinks combos and packages available here which should try outif you are a party animal you are at the right place without any doubts party hard and party harder
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went to sky garden had an amazing night great choice of music staff were super helpful this place is insane u wana party hard or just have a chilled night sky garden gives you that choicei had the best night everwelcome to bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the rooftop bar is the place to be if you want to chill and hang out with friends one of the better places we went to
Name: Sky Garden

Review: amazing bottle service even though they were out of a few bottles of champagne that i wanted but hey great djs and multiple rooms to loose your mind in yes they have an entry fee but in the end you get what you pay for i like to go here when some big djs come thru yes i would highly recommend it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: crazy club for those who like to party multiple floors of awesomeness with a variety of music to appeal to different needs great night out with some heavy poured drinks would recommend keeping some of your wits about you if you want to return with all your belongings
Name: Sky Garden

Review: always full of people usually the peak around pm and its awesome cool music drinking beer and dancing to the music
Name: Sky Garden

Review: ive asked them to shisha and delayed employee competent advent to take my order and bring the shisha and paid the amount it but after one hour i went to the toilet and was taken shisha has not been dealing with me respected by all the security men have such mafia and both ive ever says he director does not help me this was my second visit to this place and it will be the last there are night clubs and bars much better
Name: Sky Garden

Review: got here with brother and cousins reserved the table the service was awesome its not a first time to get here but still awesome my brother didnt wanna go back until the close out even though he has gettin drunk lol oh yea and vinai  will go back next time with another awesome djsloveskyler
Name: Sky Garden

Review: different sessions all u can eat or all you can drink for a good pricenice place good djsmany australian people
Name: Sky Garden

Review: nice place to spend your night enjoy the food and the service located at legian street many people in there
Name: Sky Garden

Review: most popular place in kuta but they know it and charge a hefty cover most nights the other nearby barsclubs are generally free entry and just as fun so usually avoid sky garden for the most part
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this the heaven for fun in bali unlimited drinks and fun and i reallyappreciate tyler maddison manager at sky garden to take the front for all tourists from perth
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is where everyone goes huge place in the middle of the party district and a wonderful place to meet people
Name: Sky Garden

Review: was there with a group of friends and it had good music and the perfect ambience to party all night didnt stay too long since we had plans for next day morning ladies get to go free and till pm free drink for ladies
Name: Sky Garden

Review: can recommend everyday session  that is pm  pm rooftop bbq rupiah  unlimited high quality drinks and food great music excellent view over legian streetyou will definitely enjoy your late afternoonnight
Name: Sky Garden

Review: you gotta be there once if you love edmrnbits not too heavy on your pocketsthe entry is fairly priced at  usdthe lights a fantasticthe sound setup is also amazing its clearyou should also try the rooftop area thats also very niceplaying relatively soft music than the main arenaall in all all you edm lovers u just cant miss this
Name: Sky Garden

Review: really good club big crowed maximum fun reasonable too the music and the acts are really grate dont miss if in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i had an amazing time in skygarden you go in and get blown away with the sound and music it was one of the happeneing places in bali and recommend every party goer to visit that
Name: Sky Garden

Review: entrance payed but if you wanna go out you have to pay again even you have the bloody bracelet on your wrist this is rubbish never again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a good night but make sure you go right to the roof for a little less intense music and vibes downstairs is great if you are into heavy dance and upstairs is more club vibes with an open roof bar
Name: Sky Garden

Review: came here many times the ambient the crowded is perfect you ban find many things you need like many foods and drinks with many offering price and packages from afternoon till late of night the best happening club ever in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the club is full packed unlimited drinks till pm is worth the money you paid from the entrance security are around whick makes you feel safe a lot of young crowd and couples different nationalities are coming met new friends indian couple whose enjoying their second honeymoon in bali sounds and dj are good
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went here every night on my visit to balitried out alot of other places but nothing compared to the levelgood locationplenty of facilitiescould be a little cleanercould do with more staff
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the best bar in kuta pup is best  main location we visited twice we checked other bar and pup this one is good
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i actually really enjoyed the roof top bar and i thought that the buffet was amazingly tasty ive already recommended this to several friends and will be going back myself in a monthl
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the skygarden is the biggest club here in kuta and has something to offer for everybody really great placelost my id came back two weeks later  asked for it and they had it in a safe there just waiting for me thank you very much skygarden
Name: Sky Garden

Review: there are many levels to sky garden you can go there for a meal and visit a variety of levels with different music genre i went to the level with dj music as my husband loves this style of music  i thought i would dislike this environment as i am no longer  yrs but as i do not mind dj music i had a good time  the effects are amazing for those youngsters that love loud dj music  a super crowded club bikini clad dancers and aerial  hoop acrobats  hip hop dancers and amazing light shows i have since discovered that even though i am  it is a great venue for all on the dj level if you like loud music and atmosphere there is plenty for everyone at skygarden  you can just go there for a meal and lively atmosphere the staff here are very busy and seem to have limited time for too much pleasantries although still meet your needs if you have paid to go in club and get a wrist band you will not be able to get a pass out and they are strict on this  it was   au to get into the dj section we went into
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a number of levels to choose from depending on your taste of music beer drinker so drinks were good my girlfriends said their drinks however tasted fairly watered down overall a good night definitely a place to check out for those looking for a good night out
Name: Sky Garden

Review: thanks a lots for skygarden such a honest staff to give me back my purse which i lose thumbs for skygarden
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great selection of drinks friendly staff and a fun night we got to see my in opinion the best club inside a huge entertainment complex live music sexy dancers and performances by hip hop dancers a good crowd with a slightly higher standard dress codeno thongs or singletswell worth the experianceoh yeah and if you like vodka they do sell ltr bottles of ciroc
Name: Sky Garden

Review: music was great  fun night get very crowded on the top level for the free drinks we gave up standing on line and just paid for our drinks deffs must go
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i am not a party animal but i still enjoyed this place there are more than one floor of pubs within this pub there is an entry fee but you get free drinks for that price and pretty worth it they have a very good dance floor almost on each level sorry lost count of how many floors there are almost drunk by then with a good group of friends this place is a must visit this place comes alive only late in the night
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the buffet here is amazing for the price if you end up eating here once youll probably want to come back every night good variety quality and conveniently located thumbs up skygarden
Name: Sky Garden

Review: different levels with different music genre playing  rupiah around  au dollar per person it includes one drink that you can choose the crowd is mix between localsasianwestern you can buy shisha there cant remember on what floor level but where they play rnb genre music
Name: Sky Garden

Review: its a fantastic  level night club with worlds amazing djs smashing out great edms the entry is rp pax and it usually includes one or two drinks worth every penny best time to visit is post  or  pm as the place gets crowded after that if going for the music take a seat on level  and have a clear view of the djs console sit back and enjoy the music bathrooms are clean and usually crowded check the schedule before hand on which dj is playing and make the most  if in bali  not visiting skygarden if you are missing out on something
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we went to skygarden for the all you can eat and drink for k  incl tax the food was decent and the drinks always available the bathrooms were luxurious and cleanalthough many people wrote about unfriendly staff here we experienced it very differently if you are friendly to the staff and smile they are really cool and nicecool place absolutely recommendable
Name: Sky Garden

Review: normally i dont write reviews about clubs but skygarden deserves onethe skygarden is the most hospitable and transparent club i have ever visited from the security to the clean up boys they are all kind and nice people for  you get entrance and  free drinks inside one beer is  the process of entering the club but also ordering a drink is easy and fast a lot of clubs could really learn something from this really enjoyed the experience we visited the top bar where they played hip hoppopwe have visited this place on friday saturday and mondaynight it was packed every night will definitly visit again
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this place is filled with energy crazy music and guarantee to have a power packed performances and the best of djs playing to make you groove the entire night if bali is your next destination than all the party peeps this should be in your list
Name: Sky Garden

Review: loved this place so much havent really found anything in bali tht was really good until last night food was great and unlimited drinks was perfect all for aus the staff were all lovely and the security was super good they look after you really well even the bathroom cleaners are fantastic would highly recommend for people wanting a good night out and food prior to a big night i stayed on the roof top bar and that was really good will definitely be back if i was here longer i would go every night big  up to these people
Name: Sky Garden

Review: mutli level night club offers different types of music no singlets or thongs to go in to the rnb rooms  aus entrance fee with a drink on arrival has an all you can eat dinner each night for under  pretty cool club can spend a whole night here
Name: Sky Garden

Review: first time went there with friends just for have some drinks and dance we loved the music yes it was too crowded maybe because its weekend but we enjoyed the time was fun
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we went here for dinner a few times the value for money was hard to beat even in bali all you can eat buffet with free select drinks over dinner time and themed nights such as mexican as well as the constant bbq meant we never went hungry or thirstywe left before pm each night as we arent the clubbing type but go early if you want to nab a table
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went clubbing twice to skygarden world class djs and a young crowd was full of people on both days we visited a must visit in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: horrible staff if you are not able to pay a second time because you just wanted to have some fresh air outside you are not anymore a guest here is no place for humanity inside the club at the bar waitresses are so stressful they talk to you rudely if you are not immediately able to tell them which drink you would like violent security because you are trying to have the contact of the manager music is ok and there are many rooms to enjoy different atmospherearound this club there are plenty of nicer clubs for free and a variety of bars dont waste your time at skygarden
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a friend and i went here twice when we were in kuta and werent disappointed the k entrance fee is so worth it for the pm free flow and  free drinks after so many different bars so people with a myriad of tastes will enjoy this place perfect for teenagers and young people travelling as easy to make friends and cheap to have a good timewe are going back to try the buffet next week
Name: Sky Garden

Review: many people say that skygarden is the best place to party at bali sure if you like place with lot of tourists you dont want to hear your own voice and you also want to pay way too much from entrance there are better places to party too it depends on what you like i prefer bounty try that one too
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is the best nightclub i have ever visitedalthough option for food is very less music and croud is awsomelocation wise this is the most happening place of all kuta
Name: Sky Garden

Review: got bottle service and opened a table liquor was rather reasonably priced much cheaper than back home in sg duh got the mil bottle and it included a table cover charges for  express lane etc etc not a fan of clubs but my friends stayed till past am crowd was a mix of aussies and asians
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i went to skygarden with a group of travelers from the hostel i was staying at in seminyak the price alone was worth the cab ride down to kuta  rupiah for all you can eat buffet and as a girl we got two free drinks each trip up to the bar up until pm it was a ladies night promotion which occurred on a sunday night after pm the dance floors were packed there was dancing on the bars just an absolutely great time all night i recommend going around pm in order to get a table for larger groups and the food line wasnt as long as it was around pm eat drink and be merry
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden is a mutli floor club situated right next to the bali monument the are about  dance floors offering different music genres the best part about this place is between  and  pm there is session  where you pay idr   and eat and drink as much as you like from pm this service closes and you dance through the night i hear this is available daily sundays included so if you want to enjoy western food with unlimited drinks this is the place for you ladies night on sundays comes with free drinks for ladies all night perfect hang out place if you can handle that much alcohol the food is great the music is international  you will enjoy your visit here and middle with the locals
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my friends and i had a wonderful bbq loads of fun and great djs for the price you cant beat itafter we had a shisha to just chill and relax very very cool set up then we danced in the viphighly recommend
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so very famous place pay at entrance and eat and drink btw pmeach day has a different special food we went on a monday that supposed to be pizza and pasta day hahaha what a joke they had square vegetarian pizza already cut and warm beef lasagna penne and spaghetti pasta with  different separate sauces carbonara beef and a green oneit worths just for those who want to get drunk in this case good deal but if you want to go for dinner like i did oww thats a bad idea food is tasteless and below the balis average worst food we got herethe staff service varies the girls that clean the tables were all very nice on the buffet some are rude and smile less the lasagna woman just throw it in your plate kkkk ridiculousbesides that the roof has a nice view to enjoy and the place is huge so the party after pm should be greatas i said good just for drinks and party
Name: Sky Garden

Review: is one of the best places ive ever been to for only  idr you can eat and drink all you want from  until   for  idr more you can have more unlimited drinks until  the music is quite good and the llace is huge always very crowded
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the pub is good with  floors of music each floor has a separate dj the crowd starts moving around pm  the party is on almost till am booz is slightly expensive as compared to a local bar however a good options for party lover
Name: Sky Garden

Review: promised a lot  did not deliver well it is a garden high above the ground my first question is why do you have to place a mediocre garden  meters above the ground will it make it less ordinary the answer is no you can add a fordist bar and no class servingdont waste your time the view is nice but thats about all
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this place is huge  which is  australian for  hours to eat and drink as much as you want great value  just be aware security here are vicious and have been in the papers in bali and australia before for being way over the top so dont mess up in there
Name: Sky Garden

Review: you just cant beat the nightly bbq buffet how they are still supposedly making a profit is beyond me k for  hours if memory serves of quite a good buffet spread and also drinks unrealwe sure had a feast and a few beers to boot cannot beat this for value at allbe prepared to line up for those drinks especially later
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i visited the skygarden twice on my recent visit the buffet dinner is great value it cost rph or  aus it is all you can eat and drink they have a great selection salads hot vegetablesmash potatoes gravy the steak was great the atmosphere is great too didnt stay until the disco started i would recommend getting there early as it fills up fast and they dont take reservations oh and there are quite a few stairs to climb as you are on the top off the roof i dont know if there is a lift
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went at about  and people start filling in after  seems like they invite djs from all around the world to perform every weekend and the one that we had was real dope saw foreign tourists and locals had a blast
Name: Sky Garden

Review: definitely recommend this nightclub for young people and older people if youre into that kind of scene but i recently went to bali and went to sky garden twice and it has the best atmosphere glad i was told to go check it out because its a good time good djs as with any club always keep an eye on your drinks and stay safecheck it out though
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a great club in the center of legian area the most popular one mostly s are going to this place dont be overdressed a flip flop and t shirt is enough not for s above unless you are still such a party cray
Name: Sky Garden

Review: huge place average price nice music and nice crowd simply one of the best place a party goer can go to if you are in bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we came here after a recommendation from a few locals expecting a nice rooftop bar with views great atmosphere and just good chilled experiencedwell we were soooo wrong turned up around pm during their famous aud bbq session you get unlimited drinks and bbq although this is absolutely good value for money be prepared to be mixing with lots of young tourists on a small budget looking to get fed and drunk cheaplyas for the roof top garden and the view non existentin other worlds unless you are under  dont bother much better barsclubs around than this onevery disappointed
Name: Sky Garden

Review: came here for a night out paid  for the  food drink deal such good value food was a bbq buffet and different specialities each night you can then drink unlimited alcohol until  and the go into the club levels for free after its good value even just for dinner lots of families there from  you get your moneys worth just with food let alone the alcohol and free entry into the dance areas was a very good night
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i came here when i was single and during my honeymoon and both times were amazing the djs  people  halls and strippers are awesome you will dance and drink till the max  and the best thing about skygarden is the security  you will feel scared and worry because they keep everything under control so just come here and enjoy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if your young or old this is the place to go but be warned be out by nine as the roof comes off  music lolfor  pp as much as you can eat  drink its well worth the visit even just for a couple of drinkseach night is a theme night food was fantastic to see all the young ones in there enjoying the food  drinkrun very well by the staff organised in all areas
Name: Sky Garden

Review: maybe im too old for this if youre over  and in couple it may not be the place for you we thought that the roof garden would be a relaxing terrace its actually part of the nightclub with music low lights etc even at pm you pay the equivalent of ten dollars each to get buffet food and unlimited drinks from a selection which is a really good deal dont expect great food though it was ok for what you pay if your goal is to have fun in a nightclub go for it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: with loads of international djs banging out great music all night and many different levels and spaces inside to chill a bit before hitting the dance floor again you just have to try it at least once sure the drinks arent cheap but its the place to be and always a great night outdo it do it do it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: what a huge place its  or  floors at the entrance you have to pay  k which they will give you a voucher for a couple of drinks each floor and section offers different kind of music so it will cater everyones taste or you can book a table starting from  m with bottle service depending on the brand the food is good and really tasty the staff are always around to help you with anything you need a lot of international djs perform usually on weekendscheers
Name: Sky Garden

Review: all you can eat and drink for only   rp amazing the food is delicious and you can choose out of a million things to eat perfect place to go with friends
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the pm all you can eatdrink deal is really good value for k idr basically the drinks that are included are limited to a couple of selected beers and spirits and softdrinkswater the food is pretty good too with a selection of meats and vegetables and i probably went a bit overboard on how much i ate if you are a big drinker unlike myself then you can easily get your moneys worth a drink there costs about k without this deal so basically just  drinks and you get the same as you would with this deal
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this has got to be the biggest night club in bali always entertaining with different club djs every night watch out for the pick pockets on entry and exit they hang around the front of the club
Name: Sky Garden

Review: good and secure place to go with your girl they gave  free entry drinks and  hrs free flow of selected drinks for just k person for level of amazing dance floor and lightings good place to hang out and some loud music a must go one when you are in seminyak
Name: Sky Garden

Review: well slowly you are looking for a good place to party here you go skygarden is pretty cool if you dont mind having  australians close to you they are all over the place luckily they cant behave and just drink and drinkk idr is the entrance fee with  drinks for free i think it is fair it has like  different floors some small and some hugegive it a try if you are on bali
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we visited skygarden for several times during our holiday you pay k roepiah for the entrance but its so worth it especially in the weekends its the perfect place to go out and dance different types of music make this club perfect for every mood
Name: Sky Garden

Review: in the most popular road in kutaits open till  in the morningwe had lots of fun and the dj was awesomewe get a cover drink for the cost we paidits about  per pax and you get one drink complimentarygood place to enjoy dj music
Name: Sky Garden

Review: one of the must go places after dark thinks happens after pm as people starts to come in  remember to have free alcohol until pm at the attic bar inside sky garden you see a lot of young bodies dancing like no tomorrow  all kinds of people  there are two dance floors  one at the attic which is the best to me for people watching  the other is at the ground floor with a huge stage  cheers
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we had such a great time its too bad some jealous people have to make bad reports because this place is really great we paid only p for  hours for bbq and free drinks all the clubs on each level are amazing and the wc looks like it should be in a  star luxury hotel well done sky garden i will be back and i will tell all my friends to come
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went to skygarden k all you can eat a few nights ago this is great value it includes all your drinks and as much food and desert you can eat open from pm  children need to leave by pm and thouroughly enjoyed it great atmosphere too a huge selection of food from salads baked potatoes rice chiken kebabs and great mini desserts cant beat it for  a headthe kids danced away on the dance floor and the staff were very happy snd polite
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the club itself was really nice and bigthe staff seemed a bit snobby to be honest in bali most if not all people were happy to talk to you or see you even if they arent selling something this does not extend to the skygarden entrance i guess its cause they deal with more crap understandablyall in all the place was great it was pretty quiet even at am on this particular night although it was a thursdayi went back a few months later the staffing situation from above is the same but holy there were hundreds more peopleit was a good night enjoyed by all
Name: Sky Garden

Review: cheap and delicious buffet and all you can drink from pm the atmosphere on the roof top is great and its full of people eating drinking and having fun the entrance is a bit more expensive between pm but it includes free bar as wellits a  floor club with young tourists visiting bali there were different famous djs playing every night between christmas and new year and the place was full there are a lot of prostitutes on the floor too so be carefulbut its the place to be in kuta and its cheap
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we went tonight at  p mthey had  hours free drinks for k  equal to  australian   they had  levels with different musics you could have as much drink as you want in this  hours after that you should pay for it smoking is free in the club and they do not have a dress code the only crazy thing about the place is that they do not have in and out service which is awkward  even though you have a wrist band if you go out  you can not go back in which is absolutely crazy and nonesense i wanted to go to a restaurant  my wife went outside and then i noticed they have a restaurant inside  went to call her  they did not let us back in  that is a shame  we both had the wrist band mentioning we have already paid for the entrance but they did not want to hear at all  first time i see such an awkward thing for a night club every one which i have visited do offer an in and out service even though it was a good place  will not go there again as there are a lot of other options in bali  so  if they want to loose costumers  let them loose them
Name: Sky Garden

Review: haha my friend from belgium just arrived in this club then  mins later a hker offered him a service with cheap price hes annoyed well this place is popular for the happy entertainment from those chicks
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i was pretty disappointed with this place i went a few times over a one month period and though man bar would have been a more appropriate name i wasnt  about the alcohol either as some of the mixed drinks tasted a little weird im sure that some would like this place but if you are looking for a venue that has any refinement then look elsewhere
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great place if you enjoy clubbing and partying for  you can have drinks  food non stop between pmpm  great food and most alcoholic drinks  bars under one roof   only good security and control
Name: Sky Garden

Review: great cheap place  free drinks till pm had vodka and orange great food aussie buffet bbq steak good so are salads also a dessert bar with cakes and fruit gets crowded finding a table can get tricky get there early great atmosphere although walking up or  flights of stairs can be tired some
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i came for party with my friends good place for weekend we realy enjoyed with this experience ill be back
Name: Sky Garden

Review: my favorite was the rooftop nice music and quite ok atmosphere just dance your night away when youre tired you can go to less crowded section in the club to just drink and relax drinks are standard
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this is probably the most cheapest and most astonishing night club i ever been you only need to pay about rp  for the buffet and free extend till morning and enjoy at the club although you wont get any free flows of drinks and alcoholbeside that the all you can eat buffet is really something but i really dont advise about taking the potato except for the mashed one the other is not so good but eating a whole lot of steaks and patty for  hours now thats something to be taken advantage off especially with a free flow drinkstips  bring your friends or meet with someone in the club dont chase girls just party and enjoy yourself the reason for party is too forget everything for tonight dont try to hook girls and ask a stranger girl for company just act natural and everything will come girls drinks friends etc dont get over drink alone control yourself having fun is important but with limitation
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this nightclub in bali is really the only one you need to attend having  different levels with  different genres of music playing  so theres a room for everyone the alcohol is cheap and the atmosphere is indescribable like nothing iv ever experiencedi really cant say much else apart from you must go if your in bali its an experience you wont regret
Name: Sky Garden

Review: you have to go there early start is at pm food and drinks are for free if you pay entrance rph so you can eat and drink till pm its enough time for it and then the best party in kuta start
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden feels like a bkk clubrooftop shisha banging beats hedonistic foreign crowd slightly hiso locals sexy prostitutes it is what it is the best club in kuta
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so eight levels of night club it gets pretty hot but worth it they have every floor pumping with dancers on stages and competitions with girls twerking can spend a whole night here staff are lovely and has a save vibe
Name: Sky Garden

Review: sky garden have  pubs and clubsvery fantastic and also foodbeverage and entertainment complex available everyday
Name: Sky Garden

Review: first of all bit expensive and little over crowdedbut really very happeningno disc in bali good music but yes price for entry and very crowded crowd will make you upset
Name: Sky Garden

Review: sweaty and over crowded the drinks were warm and flat the place was just a giant crush of smelly people half of them off their faces on drugs and the other half practically having sex on the dance floor impossible to get a table even when paying the extortionate cover charge definitely wont be going back
Name: Sky Garden

Review: have visited with friends we had nice bite good boogiewoogie music choice  quite good lots of people in average in their  too many man who thinks they rule the world with their money there
Name: Sky Garden

Review: good place but slightly over hyped there is entry fee but they give you free coupons disc is good and music is pretty loudoverall good place to visit once
Name: Sky Garden

Review: what to say it was offering  hours buffet and drinks for aud this is simply the best deal anywhere it attracts a certain type of patronage and so long as youre up for a bit of bogan then no problems at allwe met some nice people and stayed way longer than expected i have to say that the stage show in the main dance arena was pretty damned good for a nightclubstaff in the buffet area and particularly the bar need a good dose of customer relation skills i imagine theyre all very jaded now but boy oh boy theres a tip jar on the bar with a sign proclaiming tips make us smile theyve got that completely upsidedown
Name: Sky Garden

Review: we stopped in here for a quick bite to eat and get out of the heat the staff were brilliant but food a little pricey for what you get
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i visited skygarden on my first day in bali inside was a number of venues with a lot of people dancing and socializing overall was a cool club however entrance is about   which is way too high for kuta standard
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden has a very good buff everyday  for k you can eat as much as u want and drink as musch as u want its a very good deal and the buff is delicious so many different dishes to try im happy everytime and its a big favorite for everyone its a must to try if you hungry and thirstythis year i havent been in sky garden for party but recon its still same like before lots of ppl many floors to dance on big party place for sure
Name: Sky Garden

Review: heres a fact  im a vegetarian plus dont drink alcohol yet i found the pm to pm  k deal totally worth iti went here on a tuesday and it was mexican night great options for vegetarians plus unlimited soft drinks  juicesthe only downside is the queue for food and drinks since its an awesome deal its very busy between  to  so you have to be patient while waiting in the line
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i went to bali this september with friends for holiday and went to skygarden one night for clubbing didnt have that much expectation but to our surprise the experience was fabulous the ambiance was splendid dj was mind blowing and the crowd had a fantastic time the place is located in heart of kuta at legian street and you will not have any difficulty to find it as everyone there knows the place the staff of the place are very cooperative and ready to help you out the bar has ample amount of people resulting into very swift service the entry fee or cost of drinks are very affordable all in all if youre in bali and looking for a rocking night then skygarden is the place to be
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden provides best dj music and different themes festival every month the beer and another drinks are affordable for everyone the location is very strategy at legian street kuta support this club more wellknown to everyone
Name: Sky Garden

Review: clubbing placeentrance ticket k rupiah equal to us got  complimentary beerthey hav rooftop n indooropen till am on sat nite
Name: Sky Garden

Review: heres a deal you cant refuse just  rupiah for  hours of unlimited eating and drinking on the beautiful rooftop of the skygarden loungeupon entering you get a wristband that allows you to order from the bar and the buffet as much as you like from  till  pmi counted  staff behind the bar so service is very swift notice that the house beer is now san miguel and no longer the usual bintang i also tried their vodka mixers vodka tonic with a splash of lime being my favorite
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this place has excellent reviews  bars  drinks it provides you entry of  idr roundabout  inr you get a free entrance drink  you need to stay alert and keep your belonging safe  try not to get to much drunk as this places offers good danceshows activity
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if you are tired of nasi goreng go to this places ppr k rupias you can eat all you want of western food the food is very tasty and also you have open bar of beersfrom  to  if you are not tired of eat or not too drunk you can stay to party all the night at the night after  the prices are quite expensive definitely a place you have to go if you are in kuta
Name: Sky Garden

Review: paid sgd for free flow from  pm everytime you go to the counter you get  cups the place cater more you whites bur we still enjoy the place is so big there are different dance floors with difference concept
Name: Sky Garden

Review: unfortunately i didnt get experience skygarden to its full potential but i did have the allyoucaneat buffet and it didnt disappoint for aud you cant go past the delicious array of food and free flow alcohol you have to go up a few floors but once you are upstairs you wouldnt have to leave i will definitely be back
Name: Sky Garden

Review: whole building is a clubbing place think in total of  different themes of club rooms went to celebrate a friends birthday when we are there traveled as a group last year may
Name: Sky Garden

Review: very large club with various floors and areas entrance fee is  rupiah about  euro which includes a free drink eg two small beer the music is good playing both wellknown songs as well as new stuff the dancing area is huge there are usually many many people inside making it sometimes a bit difficult to get through the view from the top floor the skygarden is good while not extraordinarily however the feeling is great there are many tourists as well as locals partying  obviously mostly australians staff is very quick to help you out put away your trash or intervene when some drunkards do not get along all in all very recommended if you like mainstream clubs
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the skygarden is the biggest discotheque in kuta from  pm you can get all you can eat barbecue for  rp the normal entrance fee is  rp but there is one drink included for example one mojito costs rp so the fee is not really much after then the party will start there are  areas with different music but my favorite was the terrace on the top of the buildinglot of chances to meet peopleenjoy it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went to the club a couple of times for sure we had great night out theres entry fee but youll receive free drinks with it theres  different roomsfloors with some awesome tunes but my favorite is the skydome
Name: Sky Garden

Review: this establishment has  floors its fairly cheap to enter they have different packages depending on the time you enter you can get bombed and have food for under  for four hours different rooms have different styles and djs playing pretty nice place to go to if in kuta
Name: Sky Garden

Review: love it here cheap drinks good atmosphere and music to suit all tastessaw the stafford brothers here was a great night and look forward to returning
Name: Sky Garden

Review: if you want a great night to dance the night away with friends or are looking to make new friends skygarden has it allit costs about  to get in but you get some drinks with that so pretty good value as an entry feeim not sure how many different bars and music styles there are as i lost count but there is music for everyones taste there are dancers on bars laser shows pole dancing and some awesome djsfrom  to my age at  a fabulous night out to party
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i came here for food hahha they have all you can eat and the price was cheap only k idr good food
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i believe this is the best club in kutabali multi floors with an open roof there are around  different clubs inside there the first floor and second floor have a huge dance area and seating with dance music type the upper floors are more rnb hiphop and dancedrink prices are average not expensive and not cheapi really loved it and recommend you to visit it
Name: Sky Garden

Review: fantastic atmosphere great performances including dancers fire twirling and laser show dj lineup was really good crowd was huge midweek  levels to chill on i would recommend a visit
Name: Sky Garden

Review: what can i say this club has it allgood food a rooftop multiple levels awesome djsthe club gets packed when its peak season although there is a fee to enter there still is a lot of locals who attendim not a huge fan of the locals being there as they are definitely not shy to grope you on the main dance floori try to only go to sky garden when i am with a large group or when international djs play the bar staff on the main floor also can get cheeky and wont give you a drink unless you kiss their hands or cheeks hahaif youre in for a crazy or just chilled night this club supplies the rooftop has a great atmosphere and the bar service is wicked
Name: Sky Garden

Review: the place is huge and the crowds crazy but it has an entrance fee and there are actually other bars around that are free and much better
Name: Sky Garden

Review: a must place to visit if you are in kuta area  must go to the restaurant and club situated on top open floor area called hypnotise amazing view
Name: Sky Garden

Review: went there because we were told they have a killer buffet for dinner some house beverages and a lavish buffet with live carving for just idr k sounded too good to be true so we had to go experience it for ourselves excellent buffet check house beverages with some selected cocktails check k oh check that too on the rooftopminus points its only for  hours so you better get in early and load up your table with food and drinks they close the food and drinks bar exactly on the dot oh and its very crowded so get in early if you dont want to dance drink and eat standingthe music and band on the rooftop was my favorite because they played mostly the s and s mixed with the best of s so that was awesomeother floors had house hip hop rb edm and the dome had a mix of the chart toppers with pole dancers and all above music combined usual club night with good musicseveral ongoing offers for drinks and food in different floors so do get in early and move around to see what you like its quiet till about pm and after  you will struggle to breathe it gets very crowded on the dome dancefloor as i can imagine it is the most popular onewe left early because it was quite exhausting trying to make breathing spacepeople are overly friendly when they have been having a good time for a few hours if you know what i meanthings to notedo not try to take a cab from outside sky garden walk to the end of the street and cab it outside sky garden they will try to pitch you crazy pricesnever go to sky garden alone always move in a group people outside look like theyre waiting for you to look away so they can snatch your bag and run ladiesdo not stop to chat to anyone on the street they all know where you been and what you been upto look after yourselfentrance fee is idr k but this includes the buffet for  hoursenjoy
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i loved this place you get drinks with entry my long island iced tea was too strong to drinkwe only went once unfortunately but it was one massive nightmusic was good as far as i can remember if im ever in bali again i will be going back
Name: Sky Garden

Review: tried the k all you can eat bbq and free flow beervodka etc deal a couple of nights ago the food was plentiful varied and really quite good beers were cold and there was no line up left after a couple of beers and dinner as all of the other patrons were well under half our age highly recommended for anyone on a budget but acceptable and cheap for anyone really
Name: Sky Garden

Review: me and friends went on a thursday night it was packed and music was good they played rb trance house and a bit of mesh ups entry fee is rp you get one spirit or two beers strongly recommend shots k you can buy  shots pretty decent
Name: Sky Garden

Review: sky garden is one of the best nightclub in bali have been there for  nights in a row with my sister cousin and friend and still want more hahaha
Name: Sky Garden

Review: so huge different  so many floors with different kind of music and style the rooftop bar i love it good food with the all you can eat hummmmm good price
Name: Sky Garden

Review: skygarden is insane it has multiple dance floors all playing different music and mostly all very crowded lots of australian surfers like to come here and its sort of a free for all guys are not shy about hitting on girls and theres lots of drinking and dancing its fun
Name: Sky Garden

Review: i have explored the wonderful bali zoo a number of times over the years and i always enjoy my visit you have the option to use transport provided as part of your entry ticket and or just go walkabout through the many displays and enclosures the animals looked comfortable tourists including yours truly were smiling and the service it was friendly throughout on another satisfying trip see my youtube to the bali zoo i will be back
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i was very happy to talk with ayu and bangun at the elephant expedition while my friend enjoyed the elephant ride they are great people we had so much fun
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: visited back in  with family while all of us still single  great family getaway sister rode elephant animal encounters easy location
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had breakfast with the orangutans and it was amazing the keepers were very good at making sure the orangutans had the space they needed they didnt push them into photo opportunities and were very vigilant in people trying to touch them however the animals were naturally very curious and approached everyone themselves on top of the orangutans we got to feed elephants and stroke a pangolin the breakfast itself was also amazing with a lot of variety on offer
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: mud bath with the elephants amazing experience to meet such beautiful creatureshery was our mahout a wonderful man so gentle and patient and born entertainer
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: what can i say i travel a lot and make sure that i always go to a zoo where ever i am bali zoo is expensive to get in it hasnt finished being built so a lot is still going on the animals that are still in thier old enclosures are well cared for and looked after every animal had beautiful shiny coats they were well fed and their enclosures were spotless well done bali you can see that the money is well spent
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans an experience in itself but then did mud bath with the elephants our guide madde made sure we had a knowledgable hands on experience to remember photos are expensive but they are a must have a great day and a highlight of our trip
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my family and i really enjoyed our morning here the buffet style breakfast was surprisingly good with bacon and eggs cooked to your liking the orangutans were cheeky and the elephants were also accessible for patting as others have mentioned the zoo is currently building some more exhibits but this did not detract from what they have there it only takes a couple of hours to walk the zoo and see all the animals if you bundle up the breakfast with admission the cost is approx au for a family of four i thought it was reasonable value the kids had a great time
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: bali zoo was nice experience even though the rain was pouring down the zoo itself is not so big and huge chunk is closed because of construction we liked that there are few enclosures that are almost open and you can experience animals from very close distance overall animals seemed happy we didnt like that they are allowing elephant rides also it is pretty expensive go if you have totally nothing to do
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: as we have visited bali safari so many times we decided to give this one a go it is smaller in comparison and yes the african section is still under constructionthis zoo is pram friendly but getting in and out the shuttle bus to get to the sumatran section will require you to fold and unfold the pramsome steep ramps but they are manageableanimals are quite close and you can take good photos some nice restaurants with decent choice of foods we had lunch at the restaurant near the elephant ride they had some cultural performance and photo opp with snakes and gibbons at lunch timenice  degree view from the rooftop above the ice cream place perfect for selfiesthis zoo is missing some big animals like giraffe hippo and rhino but the rest of them are there and very visible you can also feed the lions which looks quite interestingthe animal shows are not as fun as the bali safari but they suit younger kids moreoverall we spent around  hours in the zoo and we managed to see all the animals it was a good day out for us
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i went to bali zoo last month with my son and we love the place its so natural and really clean my son was very happy with pony ride near the gibbon islandafter explore the zoo we went down to jungle splash waterpark to chilled out wed try black gibbon burger at jungle splash and its so yummythanks to all for a memorable experiencewe will comeback
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had such a good experience we were picked up from hotel by juwis who was super welcoming and careful food was amazing agus our table host was super polite and prompt all the zookeepers seemed to love what they do and seeing an orangutan up close was such a good experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my friends and i took part in the elephant mud fun what an amazing experience we met anna the elephant and got to introduce ourselves by feeding and petting her then we actually got in the mud pool with her and gave her a mud bath it was definitely a hands on experience our guide was ismail and he was brilliant very knowledgeable and super friendly encouraging everyone to get up close with anna a once in a lifetime must do experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i had such ana amazing time at the bali zoo it was peaceful and gorgeous to be surrounded by the animals it was a definite bali experience the mud bath with the elephants was just gorgeous and worth every cent the breakfast with the orangutans and elephants was cute  the food was delicious and the view was amazing  i got to watch the elephants have a morning bath they also bought out other different animals to show you which you could go up and touch you arent allowed to hold the orangutans for safety reasons as they are very cheeky  its the most animal interaction you will ever recieve at any zoo in australia they dont allow these interactions definitely a once in a life time experience i will never forget  hery did the mud bath and everything from the knowledge to how he handled the elephant was beautiful they do not hurt the animals yet train them with food treats very sweet and not harmful at all
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great experience of interacting with various animals here in bali zoo not to mention what a great lunch we had at gayo restaurant and such a warm and nice service from mr gus de and his team keep up the good work
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: zoo experience was wonderful staffs were so friendly and helping especially mr gus de overall awesome experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we are staying with the zoo at the sanctoo villa and my partner madly loves orangutans so we sought out this activity immediately the experience met all of our expectations and the breakfast the orangutans were very cheeky and loved posing for a photo we also got to spend some time with some elephants the food was catered for all diets our serve gusde made sure we never had an empty glass or plate would definitely recommend and would visit again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: second time visiting and loved every minute of it breakfast with the orangutan is so worth it and been so close to the elephants orangutans and other animals and seeing them so well cared for is amazing
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: hello everyone so we just finished this activity with ismail at this zoo it was incredibly fun who else gets to enjoy playing in mud with an elephant where else can you do that only here call the bali zoo they were amazing in all aspects from customer service to the actual event plus free food with ticket
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was such an amazing experience the breakfast choices were great and such a wide variety seeing the monkeys and elephants up close was such a good opportunity and loved every single moment
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: today we set off to the bali zoo and had breakfast with the orangutans what a great experience where we eat our full breakfast there are  elephants very well treated you can feed them for a small donation then they bring out  female orangutans females they are very cheeky and fun you can take photos or they have professionals you can purchase at the end the zoo is very clean and have professional staff the breakfast was fantastic after an hour you then set off to explore all the other animals this adventure is for any age
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a great time at breakfast with the orangutansfood was good very well organised and thank you to all the staff especially gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great experience and agus was a great table hostfood was amazing and all the staff were so lovey would recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing breakfast with the orangutans loved it big thank you to all the staff and animals they where amazing you really got up close to them all amazing pricing couldnt be happier thank you to aguswas a massive help
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: such an amazing experience service and staff are very friendly  elephant feeding great photo opportunities beautiful food and great host gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the guide gus de was very helpful when it came to explaining the animals and any other questions we had the program here was very fun and exhilarating due to the ability to get so up and close with the animals would recommend to anyone travelling to bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great food and so many different types of animals and friendly staff who halved take photosgus de was a great host
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: bali zoo was absolutely amazing had breakfast with the orangatangs and then some mud fun with the elephants the zoo is just pure beauty staff are so lovely and our driver teja was the best thanks again team can not wait to come back
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: absolutely wonderful experience the elephant mud fun experience was incredible the only reason it doesnt get  stars is because of the price of photos crazy otherwise would rate it as my best bali experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: what a great idea start the day with an all you ca eat buffet photos with the orangutans and various other animals including elephants and porcupine then stroll around the lush tropical zoo at your leisure we had a great day at bali zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: well where do i startfrom the moment we were picked up to the moment we were returned to our hotel it was a fabulous day to remember for the rest of our lives best place we have ever been to and best thing we have ever done and we have done lots hence we are going back for a second trip in our two weeks holiday from the breakfast with the orangutans to the mud fun with the elephants i can not fault this experiencethe elephants are not chained or behind bars they are free to wonder with their very loving keepers who obviously love their jobs if you can call it a job omg wat i would give to do it the have very fresh fruit and vegetable throughout the day the mud is also changed for fresh mud lol but to be up close and personal with these gentle giants was a privilege we got to get messy muddy and covered in elephant poo but they loved the message as much as we enjoyed giving it to themwe even showered with them the keepers were informative and our main guide madde was just the best every single one of the staff played their part in this wonder place all the animals we happy and healthy with lots of room to roam about it was immaculate and cannot recommend this place enoughkaren wiggins
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: des animaux attachs et drogu pour faire des photos des comportements de strotypie pour la plus part des animaux crois ca fait peine a voir a fuiranimal was attached and drugged only for tourist like this they can take some pictures without troubles go away these animal need help
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: if you want up close and personal with animals this is a day to remember when did you last have a shower with a female asian elephantit was a joy to spend real time with these gentle giants you get to soak in a pool with them cover them in mud and enjoy spending time with them in a relaxed environment and not a fence in sight madde the guide is very informative and makes it fun the staff are friendly and cannot help enough but this event is all about the elephants a day to remember and well worth the visit if you want an animal fix on your trip to bali then this is the place for you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: molly  tina gentle giants harry and maddeguides were unbelievable this was amazing even rodmy partner and harry guidebehaving like little boysready to throw mud or  at each other we loved it we r back in nov thanks for the best time ever colleen  rod
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing day at the zoo did the elephant mud fun experience so glad i did it learnt so much about the beautiful creatures and had a great lunch aftersome animal yards are a little small but can see they are upgrading most of the zooall animals look happy and healthy
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my friends and i spent most of a day here starting with breakfast with the orangutans great breakfast with an abundance of food offering all types of yummy things whilst i loved getting my photo taken with the orangutans i really wanted to touch them we had some other photo opportunities with the elephants and some birds too staff were friendly there best part was the elephant mud fun where you get to bathe the elephants plenty opportunities for photos where you can cuddle these magnificent creatures we feed them cleaned them and learnt about them from the very knowledgeable staff shout out to hery who made the day very enjoyable we had a brilliant day and look forward to returning
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans was fun food choices were excellent even for a vegetarian if you cant get a good brekky youre not trying the orangutans elephants tigerslions all were active the lady feeding oscar the lion was really funnygive her a pay rise
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the elephant mud fun activity is a mustdo such an amazing experience my partner and i will never forgetthe staff were very friendly and very educated on the topic of elephants by far our favourite activity we took part in whilst in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: a wonderful zoo and very kids friendly where you can spend the day easily kids love to see some animals run around freely they keep upgrading their facilities which is good for us who visit this zoo at least once a year
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the old part is dump with crap wheel chair accessthe old part of the zoo has incredibly poor wheel chair access there is a mixture of surfaces the concrete is uneven or broken up theres pebbled areas and incredibly steep rampsmy poor dad who is a big man has issues with his breathing and walking because of the poor conditions he had no choice but to get out of the chair and walk multiple times breathless and in extreme paink
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: everyone was lovely and very welcoming a wonderful day to enjoy with beautiful animals and nature my guide and the elephant keeper were truly great
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we booked online with the zoo direct was cheaper than the various outlets in ubudwell worth the money had about  people per elephant got to feed them mud bath them and go in the pond with them keepers were lovley and we had a great time breakfast included was good lunch included was fantastic showers towel etc all available after would advise mosquito repellent and going in the mornjng before its too hot the zoo itself was really lovley and animals were well cared forthe staff here were very attentive and really friendly would definitely go again if in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: first off it is over priced which would be ok if that translated in to care for the animals which i cant directly speak to i did not see any animals being mistreated and they all looked healthy enough for animals not in their natural habitatmy main beef is that much of it was under construction and there werent as many animals as i expected but that still wasnt the worst partafter looking for a smoothie for my toddler we figured the babykid pool looked like fun it appeared clean i got him ready to go in the stepped in to the pool the bottom of the pool was like butter and my foot went flying out from under me i fortunately caught the edge of the pool with my back and elbow and did not hit my head or pull the baby in with me my breath was taken away and i had a giant hole in my elbow no one came running as blood filled the pool and my husband helped me over to the staff at the gift shop i was given a chair and had to ask for water as my body started to go in to shock someone got a first aid kit and more and more people were called to come and look at it eventually they said i needed to go to the hospital staff did follow along and translated and paid for the hospital visit as well as the antibiotics and pain medication i needed stitches the experience at the hospital was great  minutes from the time of arrival to leaving and the zoo staff that came with me were very very kindthe zoo staff said they would follow up and have not no effort or offer was made to reimburse the zoo admission cost either this fall basically ruined the rest of my trip because my arm hurt and still hurts  days later our tour day with our paid driver now included a trip to the hospital and had to exclude any water activities had planned to go to the water temple and i could not do yoga because i could not use my right arm it was my dream to do yoga in baliso my experience with the bali zoo kind of ruined the rest of my trip and the things i wanted to see and experience while i was there save your money and if you do go to the zoo dont go in the kiddie pool ps the staff said they were aware of a moss situation in the kiddie pool and would put up signs to watch your step entering the pool
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was amazing  the orangutans come in via hanging ropes and seat themselves on ledges they are not tethered but each has a keeper  they just sit and watch the going ins humans they look completely bored with the photos and antics  they are wonderful  there are also elephants which you can feed and again they are untethered just there with their mahouts and then along came the gibbon who was very naughty and kept teasing the elephants who roared at him the gibbon was marched off home oh and breakfast was good too  facilities clean and staff approachable knowledgeable and friendly  do not miss if you are in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we did the elephant mud fun package and it was an amazing experience hery gave us a lot of unique information about the elephants and great service i recomend people to do this package it was worth every penny
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had the best morning eating breakfast with the orangutans and elephants the breakfast was spectacular merrywiwin and their staff were so friendly and nice i highly recommend doing this when you come to bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast was early in the morning with the orangutans and also the elephants breakfast choice was excellent the interaction with the orangutans and elephants was awesome
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i was pleasantly surprised with the bali zoo it was great to see some of the animals up close and to see that the zoo was very clean and well kept i really went to see the orangutans and was not disappointed would recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing breakfast with the orangutans and elephants accompany you while you eat  good place for close encounters amazing staff very helpful with anything very good for the price nice walk around the zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my family and i booked to have breakfast with the orangutans it was the best experience we all had the food was amazing meeting the orangutans and getting to feed elephants their breakfast was magnificent highly recommend doing this will not be disappointed
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great experience staff was very friendly helpful and informative kuz definitely enjoys taking care of the guests here and its very friendly
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a great day here celebrating our th wedding anniversary staff were fantastic breakfast good but the animal encounters were fantastic everything was about welfare of animals whilst letting the public have a great time highly recommended this place a lot of work being done at moment to build african savanna section but does not impact too much on your trip we hired a wheelchair for my wife who cannot walk to far and found it easy enough to get round once again big thank you to the staff for making this a very special day
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we did breakfast with the orangutans and then mud fun with the elephants the staff were amazing helping me with my elderly mother didnt request help but got it everywhere we went very much appreciated thank you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we did the night at the zoo experience free hotel pick up and drop off from kuta it was amazing the deer elephant and lion feeding was fantastic and so was the buffet dinner very experienced guides a thoroughly enjoyable night
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had an amazing time at the zoo the tour was great and very fun learnt alot about the balinese animals also the food was delicious staff were very helpful and friendly i definitely recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great day my kids    all thoroughly enjoyed the zoo very well maintained and animals seem very well cared for i was actually surprised how great the enclosures were we had breakfast with the orangutans rode the elephants seemed very happy and the rider genuinely loved them highly recommend a visit here zoo driver picked us up from our hotel at grand hyatt nusa dua took us to our best adventure atv and coffee tea on the way back to hotel at no extra charge thank you bali zoo
