Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great place breakfast was amazing so much variety staff very friendly and helpfulzoo very clean and animals looked happy
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great and friendly service very knowledgeable thank you for the great time next time will do the elephant mud fun thats for sure looked awesome beautiful zoo as well will return soon
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing experience buffet breakfast was delicious and so amazing to get up close and personal with all the animals great service by gusde
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: super good great quality food and amazing animals and an overall top notch experience would certainly recommend for anyone looking for a fun time in bali gusde
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my family and i did the elephant mud fun amazing experience i have been to bali many time and have done the elephant ridding and feeding this is my new favourite the elephant trainers where amazing full of information everything was very hands on couldnt thank purnata and dana enough can tell all the anaimals are very looked after in the zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had the breakfast with orangutan it was fun the breakfast have a lot of choices however the zoo doesnt have a lot of animals and quite small its absolutely overpriced
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great zoo with lots of interactiins with the animals all the animals looked well taken care of and the grounds were lovely to walk around
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: a beautiful conservation zoo the animals are in clean spacious enclosures and extremely well looked after there are lots of facilities for children and many zoo experiences on offer highly recommend the breakfast with the orangutans
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we absolutely loved the breakfast with the orangutans and elephants the food was great the staff were excellent but the highlight was definitely getting to interact with the animals we got to meet and greet the orangutans and feed the elephants it was a lovely start to the day watch out for your hats and sunglasses when going up to the orangutans they wont hesitate to steal them highly recommend for a unique experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a lovely breakfast with theorangutans the animals are very tame and relaxed the breakfast included a wide range of food and drinks on offer the zoo is very clean and well looked after
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the breakfast with orangutans was a wonderful experience and included patting and feeding elephants birds and other small animals well worth it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: loved this place so inviting beautiful calm interactive zoo staff are so lovely seen animals we had never seen before thank you a must see whilst in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had a great time very friendly staff especially gus de cant wait to see the rest next stop riding with the elephants
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: attending the bali zoo was a wonderful experience it was a very hands on experience that allowed us to be up close and personal with the elephants there were opportunities to take photos using your personal phone and also opportunities for professionals to take your photos we were able to feed bathe shower and cover the elephants in mud this was top  experiences of my life it was amazing the staff was kind and welcoming
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this is very good place if your family love animalsparticularly a elephant ride was valuable experience for us this is a bit pricey but i recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: at the end of the day its a zoo like any other a gorgeous location and pricey yet i saw animal cruelty in every corner fat people riding elephants tigers caged up covered in flies our main attraction was bathing with the elephants in the mud and the handlers would pinch the elephant to do tricks for the perfect photoop highly disappointed do not recommend this is not a sanctuary
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: loved the breakfast and interaction withthe elephants and the orangutans the staff were friendly and helpful and the conservation message was appreciated
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans was awesome food was excellent the staff were great especially dedex but the highlight was the orangutans awesome
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this is a must do friendly staff and the experience was incredible gus de was a great host thank you highly recommended
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: did the breakfast with the oraguntans and mud bath with the elephants would highly recommend amazing experienceserver this morning was gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing experience we had today at the bali zoo breakfast with the orangutans elephants selection of buffet breakfast is top standard and the staff are so helpful especially gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very nice experience great start to the day very friendly staff especially kuz who was very attentive the breakfast was very nice with a good selection highly recommend if visiting the zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: gus de is a very humble and exzellent service given by himthe good was bis and nice organisated everyone can find sth specials like gluteen free are given for request they sry to make gut possible tue optional are many so some food is standard but pritty ob for a zoo breakfast with animal view the otions to make picture s are given if u want to get advertised its perfect even for families and children
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: beautiful way to start the dayup close with the orangutans and elephants wonderful service by teddy and the staff
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: absolutely amazing gusde was amazing too first time in bali and will definitely be backloved everything and always was amazed
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had breakfast with the orangutans fantastic spread of food and friendly staff the elephants arrived for a preshow before the cheeky orangutans showed up for photos staff take photos for you and you can take as many as you want as well great experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing service by the staff especially from gus de for assisting us with breakfastorangutang even took our donut
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great breakfast with many choices and very high quality food was lots of fun to have the elephants to pat and see the orangutans too gus de was our server and he was very friendly and helpful
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i visited bali zoo with friends we enjoyed so much the zoo food and the attractions we learn a lot also there since we love animalsi will be back with my family mext time thank you bali zoo i think it is the best zoo in bali a must visit
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: dana was very informative regarding the elephants and our experience with the elephant mud bath molly was absolutely amazing its definitely an experience that is worth doing a memory that you will be able to look back down the track it was amazing and fun
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very good breakfast and more than just orangutans come and visit gus de is very accommodating very fun and worth the early wake up
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: best experience very worth it gus dee working there was very helpful the breakfast was amazing make sure you do breakfast with orangutans
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: awesome experience within extremely beautiful settingsorangutans and elephants really lovely and adorablemany thanks to gus de and merry for their help
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: first day in bali and  the best day of them all loved every minute of it the elephants where amazing we got a lovely one called molly who was such a treat the zoo keepers were very nice especially dana absolutely amazing and would  recommend for anyone with a love for animals or just something different and unique
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: for for an year old and a year old and myself nz dollars to do the orangutan bfast and mud bath with the elephants absolute waste of money the bfast with the orangutans some lady just walked in grabbed a plate and got the same experience we paid extra money for the elephants were different that was a good experience but then on top of the overly expensive experience i had to pay another nz for my photos with the elephants that was the cheapest option with the digital copies eveything here beverages wise is expensive advertise coke for  then chuck on tax and all the other stuff on top of it making it an extra  extra worst day ive had in bali so far which is a shame because its been the most expensive day not at all impressed with the zoo and the poor animals either
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: lovely breakfast and an amazing experience the orangutangs and elephants are within touching distance and you can take as many photos as you like gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: mud bath with elephants  breakfast with orangutans what an amazing experience a must dogus de is very helpful and polite lovely man
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: gusde had amazing service and food was very nice it was great to see the elephants and orangutans up close
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great breakiewell looked after by staffgood help for photo opportunities just ask puri gusde merry tedy
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had a beautiful time the breakfast was very good service was excellent by gus de would come back again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: well worth it elephants rides and breakfast with the orangutans and other animals good sevice from wiwin and the other staff
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: made this trip as part of our special hol experience great breakfast with gus and his team and then got up close and personal with elephants orangutans and parrots great experience great food and lovely staff highly recommended
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had a wonderful breakfast with my mum and the orangutangs elephants and parrots gus de was very helpful at breakfast
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very nice place with an awesome experience all the staffs were friendly i want to give a special shout out to dayu diatmini for giving me an awesome experience with the lion feeding absolutely loved it thank you dayu
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the breakfast with the orangutans was amazing they had two orangutans and two elephants on show for the whole two hours they brought in other animals and birds for you to enjoy the gave talks on each of the animals which was educational you were able to touch all the animals and get up close to them the location was beautiful lots of room to sit and enjoy breakfast watch the animals and watch the three other elephants have their morning bath the food was amazing with a great selection the staff were so attentive and lovely
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a great time with the elephants we were able to feed them take a mud bath and then wash them the team is really nice and hery our guide was able to share a lot of informations about the elephants we did our researches before because we wanted an ethical place for the animal et we were not disappointed
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this is a good zoo with a smaller range and more focus on the maintenance and cages it is great to see that the zoo is moving to more open type cages and not the old style cage and bars there is also a nd development which includes a hotel and spa and once again better living conditions for the animalsi would recommend a visit
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had the most lovely time at the zoo we also highly recommend our driver leo his service was incredible and he made us feel so comfortable and safe right from our hotel to the zoo he was super friendly and gave us lots of helpful info on the drive we really appreciated his serviced how professional and kind he was this really made our day a whole let better and easier thanks leo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: sublimewe bathed showered and gave the elephants a mud bath the trainers were brilliant  funny informative caring and respectful of the animals if you dont treat an elephant with respect why would it listen to you if they dont want to do something they dont have to they have personalities and we need to respect their differences lunch and morning tea provided as are showers and towels magical  an experience i will never forget expensive but well worth it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: absolutely incredible they took care of us in every way possible we were pickedup and dropped off we were served an amazing lunch after an absolutely awesome experience with a special elephant called molly a big shoutout to dana and mollys keeper of the day they were so informative so funny and just fantastic people the best experience i have evee had in a zoo thank you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: hery was amazing in explaining and answering questions about terry and all the other elephants highly recommend doing the mud fun was an experience of a life time and one ill never forget from the moment we got there to the moment we left we was welcomed by friendly staff the free lunch included was also delicious youll get the option to buy professional photos which are amazing we actually purchased all them  in total i believe which you also get  prints in a nice little folder if we come back to bali we will be looking at the villas in the zoo itself thanks for an amazing day hery
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: book a tour to bali zoo and had a amazing time our driver juwis pick us up on time told us what to expect help once at the zoo and once we were done drove us back to the hotel
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: spent the morning with the orangutans terry and marley elephants experiences was out of this world to enjoy breakfast with two of these beautiful creatures maya our breakfast hosts was just as incredible with her care dedication and commitment to guest services the zoo and all the staff we encountered are top notch and diffidently a place we would without a doubt highly recommend and will clearly visit again and again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: our experience with breakfast with orangutans was simply incredible the animals come and go as they please teddy the worker was so kind and nice i absolutely will come again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we went on a family trip to the night encounter the zoo has a great selection of animals with large enclosures and they all seem very happy and well looked after all staff were friendly and helpful and our guide and the mc widi was his name were entertaining and overall lovelyit was the highlight of our trip as you get to have close personal encounters with the animals and are treated to an incredible dinner and fire dancing performance afterwardshighly recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had the amazing opportunity to bathe the elephants today at bali zoo definitely recommend this experience ask for henry he was very informative and funny the elephants are well cared for and there so so much interaction and lots of professional photographs highly recommend this experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the breakfast with orangtans breakfast could not falt but with orangtans very disappointing mud bath with elephants  must do tour guild great overall very exspecive zoo it self poor to visit photos ripp off done onces never again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we read mixed reviews online but so glad we came arriving early in the morning we got a great seat in the restaurant it started off with elephants coming out followed by the orangutans swinging in to join the experience was great and the animals seemed to be treated great and allowed to do what they wanted the breakfast buffet was also amazing with our wonderful server gus de overall a great experience would highly recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the night safari was fantastic we got to feed deer elephants lions and tiger the buffet diner was delicious highly recommend going
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: was really awesome purnata our tour guide was incredibly informative and made the experience fun we got to give the elephant adeles her name a bath and then showered her aswell as fed her
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: firstly the  rupiah entry is a bit steep for whats on show particularly when you find half the place is under construction this means no lions giraffes rhinos zebras etc being indonesia i really wanted to see a komodo dragon these magnificent creatures grow to around m in the wild the zoo has  babies m each that donr really cut it indonesia means orang utans too but again only a couple of babies playing outside i was told the rest are inside to limit their contact with humans pretty daft when you consider they are forced to have breakfast with the humans every day elephants too lining up like taxis to give rides to whoever will pay for them im sure the zoo will be better in future but while all the construction is going on i can only rate it poor value for money
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: firstly pretty expensive entrance  rupiah per adult half the zoo is still under construction so will probably be better in a coupe of years however reviewing now  jan   there is only a poor selection of animals on show being indonesia i wanted to see a komodo dragon these magnificent creatures grow up to m in length the ones in the zoo are about m babies and hardly what i was hoping for also indonesian means orang utans but again they were in hiding after being forced to have breakfast with the humans i was told the reason not on view was to limit their time with human contact not good also elephants lining up like taxis offering rides to anyone who wants to pay the extra all in all cmopared to other zoos poor value for money at the moment
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: what an awesome experience we all loved it got to feed the elephants deers  my  yr old also fed a tiger our tour guide serni was fantastic dinner afterwards was beautiful the show was great great night highly recommend it for any age
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had the best breakfast accompanied by gusde amazing food and noodles with rice  excellent fruit and english breakfast
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: gusde was a wonderful host the zoo is beautiful breakfast with the orangutan and the elephant was amazing will never forget thank you so much
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: such a beautiful experience this morning having breakfast this the orangutans  elephants thankyou gusde all the staff for all your great help and letting us experience the beautiful animals
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we deliberated on whether to do bali zoo or bali safari all the drivers were recommending bali safari we wanted to experience mud fun with the elephants and this can only be done at bali zoo being a veterinary nurse i was really concerned over animal welfare but other reviews of the zoo were very positive we suspect you can see more animals at safari but we can do that in melbourne we wanted a unique encounter that can apparently only be done at bali zoo and in thailand for the cost it was definately value for money and was an absolute highlight the zoo itself is undergoing renovations but the facilties are very good quality our personal transport was on time and definately worth going early am pckup as no traffic and a bit cooler we had some morning tea before our mahoot kris had us prepare our elephant hatis food we were introduced and spent  minutes feeding her and patting her we then went into the shallow pool and got ourselves mudded up before spending half an hour coating her body with mud as mahout alex kept her happy and lying down once her beauty treatment was finished we showered with her and brushed her down we then went into the deeper pool and got to play in the water we were provided showers and towels afterwards the photographer took over  photos and as we ate our included brunch they let us view the photos the photo package we chose was around  but we got  printed and rather large photos and the rest on digital what a magical experience we then went on our own around the zoo the food options are good but on the expensive side for bali but who cares when you see where the money goes lots of animals about for interaction including a python and siamang for photos and the kids got a kick out of swinging some chicken out to the lions to snack on the savannah is under construction which will be amazing and its nice to see that bali is finally taking on board animal welfare issues
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had an amazing time in bali zoo had drinks at the restaurant by the lions with amazing views had great waitress wiwinn who gave us great drinks recommend stopping by
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: pervertswifes daughters partners do not gostaff were taking pictures and recording videos of my partner she was wearing some short jean shorts and they were like vultures disgusting rude and very disrespectfulthis was also confirmed when another tourist informed my partner than many of the staff where taking photos of her bumi agree she has a beautiful bum and theres nothing wrong with lookingbut taking photos is way to farthere is a blackmarket in bali for this thing and unfortunately we fell victims to thisalso the breakfast with orangutans and elephants is a waste time and money another massive scam they mis sell youdo not visit bali zoo  the elephant sanctuary is so much better
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we did the breakfast with the orang utan and we loved it i came before with  years old kid and he loves it and now with the  teens they also loved it best activity to do with family member food was great and services is great the leader restaurant named gung tra is amazing very friendly and was so good with kids too definitely coming back
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the zoo is fantastic with all allowable freedom for the animals and fantastic breeding programs and recovery from injury or illnessdayu mini or mommy lion is loads of fun as she lets you feed the lions and genuinely loves the animalshighly recommended
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i love this place so muchthe attraction was so interesting i really enjoy my breakfast with orang utan
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the breakfast was lovely with a wide variety of fresh foods and great service interactions with the animals was fantastic plenty of time to take photos and feed them
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was a wonderful experience we were picked early morning in a personal car gede our drive was fantastic from the moment we arrived the staff were helpful and accommodating we had a wonderful breakfast before the orangutans joined us they were amongst us and we able to have pictures taken we were also able to have close contact with the elephants and we were able to get some amazing pictures hugging them no hesitation in recommending this experience dont miss it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: hustled at every turn no transparency with prices prices not visibly listed  young staff free to make them up  seem to make them up on the spot and adjust to gain your interest photos photo sales desk very pushy felt robbed afterwards fooddrink was crazily overpriced even after applying their vouchers that they hand out for food  prices clearly upped to allow for the vouchers visit would be unaffordable if vouchers werent used  rubbish tactic to make you feel like youre getting a great deal whole place under construction dust and noise everywhere little to see because of the construction a lot of advertised animals not even there those animals that we saw looked in terrible condition and living conditions terrible worst zoo seen in our world wide travels felt emotionally sick and anxious after this visit
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very much enjoyed spending christmas morning herestaff were very helpful and breakfast was lovely thank you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: excellent experience we come on christmas night and it capped off a great da highly recommended we all loved it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: exceptional experience far exceeded my expectation happy elephants well taken care of and it showed the elephant team was super the included lunch was fantastic i even grabbed a  min massage onsite yes the elephants live at the spa also the hour long drive from my hotel and back again after the event was terrific the driver was outstanding thank you to all the staff who made my day a once in a lifetime experience thanks mr juwis
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: it was a pleasure to see the way balinese people have embraced the environment and future in their care and future plans for bali zoo  first priority is the animal needs and balancing this with tourism to make it work for all
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: a lovely day out a good variety of well cared for animals to see good food through several outlets too cant wait to see the new safari exhibit when it is opened
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing cant recommend highly enough our host gus de is a must to see truly enjoyed the buffet and time spent with orangutans and elephants setting couldnt be better beautiful and shady area you wont be disappointed
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: overpriced cruel to the poor long suffering elephants being exploited shameful tiny enclosures advice dont go dont support this exploitation of creatures
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: have a nice day in bali zoo and mery made a perfect service for us thank you so much the food in bali zoo is also very delicious
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the place is in a beautiful setting but bring your cash everything inside costs a fortune an ice cream was  which is about aud and we are talking basic when you pay for the entrance fee thats just pennies with the price of everything inside drinks are double the price that you pay in restaurants let s alone at a supermarket pony rides another  elephant ride another small sum gone lunch enjoy spent more money on this day at the zoo than anything else we did in baliim all for paying and providing to support the welfare of animals etc and to the local economy but its never nice when you get the feeling you are being ripped off its not how you want to feel going somewhereas far as a zoo its nice but it is not the bestlike everywhere in bali service is greati was also really disappointed to see that the zoo has not eliminated the use of plastics plastic containers and straws are still common place in s the stores which is really upsetting considering this place is supposed to be helping conservation this should be changed straight awayone good thing i have seen in bali a lot is an effort to reduce single use plastic in the majority of restaurants you only get paper straws the right step forward but a shame that this effort was not evident at the zoothey currently have a major construction project with a new enclosure so have of the entry side is closedhaving said all that nice visit but felt ripped off once inside not likely to ever come again on future bali visits i would rather donate a few hundred dollars to real conservation efforts
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a great time feeding mudding scrubbing and showering the elephants we attended the second morning session there is a welcome drink and information session to start the programthere were  elephants and  people split into  groupswe were introduced to the mahouts and the elephants and feed thembananas carrots and pumpkin plenty of opportunities to take photos both professional and on your own device mobiles are then collected by a staff member and returned after the program finishes then we processed to the mud pit where we rubbed mud onto the elephant professional photos taken then we rinsed them under the shower with broomsbuffet lunch was included with vegetarian optionsyou are able to view and purchase the professional shots which are quite expensive au for  photos you are also given a code to download the restoverall a great day was had by all
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very good buffet breakfast  elephants at the side which you can take a photo with and  orangutans good service from gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans was fantastic we had breakfast surrounded by orangutans elephants and birds got to interact with the animals and see them close up then afterwards got to explore the zoo saw a couple of shows including the bird show highly recommend this activity we had a fantastic day and im sure you will too
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: night at zoo program was very fun we explored the zoo at the night and sees the wild animals we have change to feed themand took a lot of pics the program are include with delicious dinner and live fire dance our keeper guide is so friendly we will come back again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had a wonderful time at the breakfast with orangutans we would recommend this to anyone the staff are amazing which we had gus de he is a lovely worker and is a credit to bali zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we have really enjoyed this experience our host captain gusde was very helpful and the breakfast was great
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: why let people ride on animals and touch them its so bad i dont get why tripadvisor shares this zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: seriously this was greatgot to bathe anna in the mud wash her off and then swim again in another deeper pool madde was a fabulous guide and her keeper had such an obvious connection with her it was beautiful to seehighly recommend this experiencethe rest of the zoo however was quite disappointing by chance we happened to see a keeper brushing the teeth of an orangutan but other than that we were out  hrs earlier than we needed to bedefinitely worth doing the mud fun experience even without walking the rest of the zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: did the breakfast with the orangutans for my wifes birthday we were given super service which included a front row table plus a birthday cake the breakfast had an incredible selection of hot and cold selections local and international the orangutans were pretty good and you also got to feed elephants
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the elephant mud fun experience was amazing it was the highlight of my bali trip and absolutely worth the money first we were split up into  groups and each group got their own elephant we started off with feeding the elephant during which we could take pictures with your own camera then the mud bath followed by a shower for us and the elephants and another bath to wash off the rest of the mud there is a professional photographer around who was taking pictures while we were in the water finally we got another chance to takeour own pictures with the elephantsafter the experience you can buy all your pictures for around  rupia  euro for me around  pictures unfortunately you cant buy single images its quite expensive but the pictures really are uniqueit was absolutely amazing to get so close to the elephants they are very well looked after and i would absolutely recommend this experiencelockers towels plastic bags for your wet cloths and showers are provided
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: did the breakfast with the orangutans tour it was very nice food was better than expected staff member teddy very helpful elephants ant eater porcupine as well
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: went to have breakfast with all the animals staff was very lovely and asked us if everything was okay with food thanks to a man named teddy for making us all feel welcome in this place
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: from start to finish this was a fabulous experience for the whole family mum dad    year olds our guide dana and his assistant were very knowledgeable and ensured not only our safety and anna the elephants needs were met throughout the whole experience if you would like to get up close and personal with an elephant this is a must do
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: wow what a great morning wonderful time with both the elephants  orangutans superb food choice amazing staff especially gusde
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: best noodles that we have eaten while in bali very friendly staff gusde was our host and was very friendly and knew what he was doing
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast was very well organised and lots of options for food gluten free bread could have been an option  staff were very friendly and the animals were well kept host gus de was very friendly and helped us with an inquiries very well worth it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: my host this morning was gusde he was very helpful and polite he made sure that he explained everything the food was amazing with a huge variety definitely would recommend the breakfast with the orangutans and the elephant rides all animals look like they are very well cared for
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: good food great to be up close to the animals photos are waaaaay to expensive to purchase off them though they will take a photo on your own device which is nice of them
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: bali zoo was a great day out the sumatran rigers  elephants were incredible the new african area which is under construction is going to be a huge wow factor the zoo was clean  everyone was friendly  welcoming
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had the most wonderful time at the zoo and the elephant mud fun was worth every penny this is not like your average zoo and the animals are treated so well highly recommend and thanks to dana for a wonderful day highly recommended
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the breakfast was amazing and gusde was very helpful loved it yobbo my husband loved the omlett would do it again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very good experience with good food really enjoyed the close encounters with elephants birds orangutan and other animals host gus de was very friendly a helpful and the food service was quick we enjoyed the omelettes and fresh fruit and whole experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: really fun time up close with the animals and good range of food gus de was very helpful highly recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we came early at  to avoid crowds the staffs are full of smile greetings all visitors they let some animals out for visitors to have close encounter the place is still under progress looks like the animals not completehowever the place is so clean and well managedlike most theme parkfoods and drinks are being charge nearly double from normal souvenier like photos is also quite expensive somehow its kinda normal thing in majors tourist attractions
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: fantastic experience that should be on anyones agenda whilst visiting bali the breakfast was great and plentiful and you can get up close with the orangutans and elephants the zoo has lots of species of animals and is a great day out have plenty of water with you as it is quite hot and humid amongst the surroundings
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had a fabulous day with the elephants at bali zoo clearly well looked after and loved our elephant handler dana was really informative and couldnt do enough to ensure our experience was amazing our driver justin was prompt and friendly an amazing day one that we wont forget
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: an unforgettable experience the foods are really delicious and there are a lot of choices i really recommend you to try this
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was our third breakfast with the orangutans the food was amazing great variety from western to asian the menu has expanded with each visit you can eat as much as you want  indeed the staff actively encourage you to return to the buffet  great on this trip with teenage boys in tow the staff are keen to serve no sooner was my coffee cup empty and they are asking if id like another cup the orangutans and other animals that they bring up for breakfast are simply amazing to watch zoo staff are happy to take photos with your camera the other awesome thing about doing the breakfast is that you are in the zoo before it opens to the public that means by the time you finish breakfast and begin wandering the zoo is still quiet and cooler since it is earlier in the day each time we have been the zoo has some things closed for maintenanceredevelopment but equally there are new displays and habitats the zoo is really working on its animal conservation and does a lot of breeding and releasing into the wild
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we visited bali zoo yesterday and i feel it is one of the best zoos in the world australian zoos can learn from there enclosures cleanliness and customer service breakfast with the orangutans was beautiful  to see them up and close was an experience the mud bath with the elephants was beyond words madde the guide had personality plus full of information and engaged the whole time he had a great sense of humour and kept us laughing the whole time he told us lots of facts and information about the elephants but most importantly he was genuine and you could tell he loved his job he made the experience what it was thanks for the day
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: two excellent experiences you will remember long after your holiday ends the breakfast was amazing with the variety of food on offer and the staff so helpful and welcoming the orangutangs were close if you wished to have a near experience this is an early morning experience allowing you entry into the zoo before normal opening time the elephant mud fun was a very informative and a very hands on experience prepare to get very muddy but thats the fun the elephants definitely seemed happy and content with all the attention they were receiving change rooms towels and showers provided after your experience enjoy the included lunch both experiences took the day into the afternoon we left with a wonderful photo package and memories to last a lifetime
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: awesome experience and feel rejuvenatedthe maintenance of the zoo is really appropriate mr teddy is great person at gayo restaurant
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we have been to a few nights at the zoos in other countries and had a rough idea of what to expect first impression when arriving at the zoo was great the lively colourful mural on the way was wonderful and a great photo opportunity we were given information on what to expect and even plastic ponchos as it look like there might be a rain shower fortunately this did not occur on entering the zoo you walk amongst deer which are roaming freely for children and adults alike this was a fun way to start our encounters plenty of hand sanitation points were to be found and the guide had extra also feeding was arranged and everybody had a chance to do this as the groups were small  groups of around roughly  people walking through the zoo it is apparent it is undergoing some redevelopment but it did not detract from the night time visit not sure how it affects day visitors the two group were separated by around  mins so you do not get distracted by foreseeing what the group in front had seen or was doing there are wallabies in the same area as the deer and all seemed relaxed with people surrounding them as we wandered through to see the lions we walked through an area where you could be photographed with a snake an owl and a pangolin the lions den was next and one pride was out and being fed by the keeper they were so close and active obviously it was amazing dinner was next  oh no but i dont need to eat im here to see the animals as we went in i noticed it was buffet and thought ill find something to be honest the food was so good i would consider going back just for that there was something for everyone vegetarians vegans fish and meat eater with lions parading in front of your window amongst some of the food i tried i had salt and pepper squid some of the best i have had the lions are separated from the restaurant by thick plate glass and walk back and front along it no doubt enticed by the smell of us and the food after dinner it was on to a small double decker bus top deck please and a short drive to feed the elephants there was more than enough for adults and children alike to feel they all had fed the elephants again plenty of sanitation available short stop later out to have a photo opportunity of feeding different elephants out of the bus great fun to do and watch others antics also we say the porcupine and were given a brief bit of information about him and the zoos conservation efforts the final stop was the tiger house where after a short information brief we were shown and watched the keeper feed the tiger it did feel slightly like a circus act and i appreciate why he made him stand for the food but it did not sit comfortably the evening finished with a short exhibition of the fire dancers which was a wonderful spectacle but not sure why it was included other than for cultural aspects thanks you to dedex who looked after us for dinner and compliments to the chef loved your food ayumi who guided us through and answered our questions was lovelyon the whole it was a very well organized evening and a fun night for two adults the only thing i would say is we found out about the great conservation work and success the zoo is having by asking questions i felt as though it was a little secret that was being kept and would be released at a later date you are a young zoo and should share this information with your visitors as some people are happy and willing to sponsor animals etc
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: early morning trip to the zoo cut out the worst of the traffic entry is smooth and modern the elephants come on first and there are plenty of opportunities for a good picture and feeding of elephants there were two orangutans who were happy to pose for the cameras and ample opportunities for a personal picture breakfast was plentifultiger enclosure was very well done saw plenty of animals good for kids as there is a water playground for them and numerous food outlets
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: perfect environment sooo much fun great for all ages and safe are so helpful free wifi and great food would definitely come back very interactive and the animals are very close
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: december  was my th birthday we had so much fun feeding the elephants we had so many great experienced the lion python in my neck first time that we saw sunbear touch the elephants trunkour night safari guide serni was so nice friendly funny and so kind  and dinner was yummy the fire show was awesome and the male dancers are so funny thank you so much bali zoo you guys made my th birthday unforgettable
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: first of all i would like to thank the driver agung who picked me up hes a credit to the company very polite friendly and attentive was picked up on time and took us to the zoo explaining how the day would pan out i got there and was straight onto the shuttle bus to the area where you have food staff were all very polite and the food was delicious good variety and it was buffet style so you can help your self to as much as you like the orangutans were beautiful such friendly intelligent creatures a little hard to get a picture when they first arrive but if your patient theres more then enough time to get a few in lovely day would definantly reccomend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: it was an one life experience thanks to purnata for his great guidance it so nice to see the keepers take care of the elephants its like karma if youre good for the elephants they give it all backbalizoo purnata adele
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: something nice something no so nice extremely expensive the elephant experience with to little interaction with them very nice to be able to play with some animalsgood experience for small children not so good food adults
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: beautiful program guide of elephant ismail is so great information about d elephantsstaff of villa or restaurant very exellent very nice food
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing service provided by agus and puspa large choice of breakfast great pictures with orangutanthanks so much guys
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we decided to try something else for christmas breakfast and decided to take a chance and visit the bali zoo with the breakfast with orangutangs and boy was it the right decision it was an unique and amazing experience with kuz being very helpful during breakfast the orangutangs and elephants were amazing to take photos with and overall the zoo is very interactive and without doubt the best zoo i have been to so far i can definitely say the balu zoo is worth the visit
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: absolutely fantastic way to start the day and make sure to ask for kuz best service and amazing food and views
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: early  pickup as we were staying in nuda dua  which along with the return journey was organised by the zoo arrived in plenty of time checked in at zoo entrance a small walk and then transported to the area by shuttle bus shown to our designated table with around another  people then helped ourself to a fantastic buffet breakfast as a couple of elephants arrived closely followed by a couple of orangutan which came swinging in along a line of connected ropes to a couple of platforms amongst the breakfast area to enjoy there vegetarian breakfast whilst we eat ours then there was plenary of opportunity and time to have plenty of photos with the orangutan  dont have your sunglasses or any hats on or they are fair game  there is also photo opportunities with the elephants and some parakeets  do take your own camera as the keepers will take photos for you you also had chance to watch a couple of elephants take a early morning dip with there keepers in the large water hole well worth the money and well organised all the animals seemed to be happy probably cause they was also being feed lolwe also added the elephant mud bath to our day
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was an amazing experience breakfast was lovely shared with  orangutans and  elephants the mud bath experience was fantastic a highlight of our trip the rest of the zoo was under a lot of renovation so was a bit of a disappointment but the experience was amazing
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the zoo was very trusting of the guests to interact with the animals and the elephant mud experience was exhilarating we first walked into the zoo and animals were roaming free right in front of us talk about a great first impression the animals were loved and well taken care of the caretakers laugh and play with the animals
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: extremely overpriced for what you get half of the zoo is under construction and there are very few animals to see as expected food and drinks inside the zoo are also overpriced and the quality is nothing special perhaps once they finish all the renovations it might be a more interesting place to visit but until then its not worth the  entrance fee
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the zoo was organize properly the have few animal show make sure to check the show time upfront from their websiteticket price bit expensive not much activity can be done here beside sightseeing and see the animals you may ride with the elephant if you like it it come with seperate packagethere are few restaurants  gift shop inside the zoo they have splash water pool also good for childrenyou may spend    hours inside the zoo depending on activities you do since our kids not really enjoy the trip we just spend around  hours inside here
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: id say its good for kids definitely worth doing the elephant side first then the remaining zoo as the excitement does die down still nicely maintained when we went a lot of it was closed for maintenance but we got to see a lot of different animals too
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: when we booked this experience we were a little apprehensive about what we would see having heard and read horror stories about animal care and exploitation in tourism we were very pleasantly surprised by bali zoo the animals look healthy happy well cared for and loved the moment that drove home this point was when one of the orangutans a cheeky  year old female clearly behaved like she was not in the mood to sit on her platform and have her photo taken instead of chaining her or otherwise forcing her to stay the staff apologized and said they would not make any of their animals do anything that they dont want to do this for us was a huge plus rather than a negative while we wanted to see them it was more important to us that they were treated humanelythe breakfast itself was fantastically delicious with an immense variety of food and the staff was attentive friendly and efficient our server kuz did not skip a beat making sure we had everything we wanted and more the manager of the program gung tra also came over to personally inquire how we were enjoying the experience i would recommend this zoo to anyone visiting bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had good time here feeding deers and wallabies plus the one we waiting for is washinh elephants feeding elephants and playing with them we had so much fun plus its include with coffee break before start the activity and had lovely nice lunch which is include all the staff was so lovely and helpful special thanks to mr dana we recommend this thing to all famliy and all of youhappy christmas
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: value for money is amazing the animals are beautiful and staff are amazing would recommend to do while in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very good service from wiwin great food and view of the lions the zoo was good fun with the safari bus
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had an amazing day at the zoo an unforgettable experience having a mud bath with an elephant the staff were all so friendly especially our cab driver called made we would definitely recommend this trip it is great valuethank you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: our night safari of bali zoo to quote my son was a once in a lifetime experiencethe staff were friendly and professional the experience was well thought out and carried out and most importantly the animals themselves all appeared relaxed and content in their beautifully designed exhibits which had been constructed to emulate their natural environmentsi would love to return to see the african savanna section once its complete and see the remainder of the animals not available for viewing at nightwe would highly recommend this for a memorable adventure
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this was fantastic puri looked after our family for comfort drinks special requests good seating at activities and wonderful friendliness i highly recommend visiting puri gusde and team at the best zoo in the world service is phenomenal fun fun fun and the animals are sooooo cute and loving thanks again puri you made the experience for us
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: unbelievable experience exactly what its says breakfast with orangutans and the elephants aswell gusde was really accommodating  xxx
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we had night at the zoo program and it was amazing we could pet deers kangaroos boa snake my daughter she fed lion then we had dinner included food was amazing sea food meat sushi the choice of the meal was various strongly advice this trip people working in the zoo very polite everything well organized we were in the group of around  ppl and we had guide who was taking us around mr dedex was very helpful in the restaurant and my family really appreciated his help thank you for this wonderful place and we definitely coming back
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: wonderful experience amazing food very helpful staff especially gus de  he was very helpful and very friendly
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great night in bali would definitely reccommend did not disappoint gus de was our host during the dinner and was very friendly and helpful food was great too
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: well worth the money nzd  able to take your own photos with animals without have to pay or purchase them cheap animal experiences and heaps of cafes all over the zoo massive with heaps to look at and shuttles to get you there we had some good food and loved our waiter kuz would go again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we went to bali zoo near ubud to swim with elephants where else in the world could you do this ok theres one other zoo in malaysia i think but this is really a once in a lifetime experience the cost of the experience is au but for this kind of unique experience that is pretty cheap we thought you enter the zoo and walk past some deer wallabies and quakkers to a shuttle bus this takes you past the orangutans enclosure with clear views of the these cute apes you then catch another ride on a golf buggy which is a bit of a hairy roller coaster of a ride a short walk takes you to the elephant area this is a small clearing with some tables scattered about and a small spread of food included in the price the guide tells you some rules such as do not punch the elephant then they bring out some bananas carrots and pumpkins and a clever and get guests to chop them up we then went over to the majestic beasts in three groups we were allocated an elephant called adelle we fed her the veges and then she was lead into a mud pool and she lay down we were then able to go in and cover her and ourselves in mud which was messy but fun she was then lead out to a shower where we scrubbed her with brushes finally we went into a pool where adelle crouched down and we washed off the last of the mud and patplayed with her they took photos of us with our elephant and then we said goodbye and went and showered ourselves this was followed by a complimentary buffet lunch afterwards we were able to purchase our photos but were horrified by the price  aud for one photo and this was the cheapest option they allow you to take photos when feeding the elephants but then a mobiles go in a plastic tub and are taken away this is an external company too  none if the money goes back to the zoo so youre kind of railroaded into forking out another large sum to have a photo of this unforgettable experience this was the only down side to what was otherwise a fabulous experience highly recommended
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i highly recommend breakfast with the orangutans mr suri our driver was punctual at our accommodation and very helpful and friendly zoo staff were efficient and very obliging the breakfast buffet had enormous choices and was very tasty but most importantly the orangutans were gorgeous and the elephants were magnificent plus the parrots and porcupine you could feed the elephants for  idr the keepers answered any questions and the photographers were happy to take pics with your camera as well as professional ones it was wonderful to be close to these amazing animals i loved it
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: had breakfast with the orangutans then on to share a mud bath with the elephants fantastic experience would highly recommend it also had a  course lunch which was very enjoyable walked round the rest of the zoo long tiring but well worth it kind of day
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: having breakfast being surrounded by animals was a once in a lifetime experience and riding the elephant was indescribable the staff is very nice and excel in customer service definitely coming back when i visit again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: they provide some detailed explanation on the animals which you might not get on the day trip also dining with the lions is quite cool
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: dana made our experience mud bathing the elephants an experience to remember it was an amazing highly recommend this the time with the elephants was much longer than we expected great value for money
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans was an amazing experience which appeared to be enjoyed by the animals and keepers just as much as the guests all staff were very courteous and always smiling but puspa was exceptionally attentive my visit was just before christmas and it was a thoughtful touch that most staff were wearing santa hats other animals came to the breakfast cafe so there were plenty of photo opportunities
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: visited here today with two toddlers as we did come when they were little and wanted to try it again when they were more able to appreciate it  we werent disappointed hi light for us was the bird show cockatoohornbilleagle etc flee over our heads and the kids loved that bela also doing a fab job during the show will definitely recommend this zoo for you
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: really amazing experience with elephants birds and orangutans and the staff gung tra was really friendly with me apreciate all his help and attention
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: an excellent experience would highly recommend our tour guide widi kept us all on track giving interesting information and a few jokes  the dinner included was lovely the range of animals we got to interact with was spot on the elephants were a highlight but so many others my personal favorite the ant eater
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: what a wonderful experience up close to well cared for animals excellent staff with a good buffet style breakfast
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: incredible breakfast very interactive with animals  both orangutans and elephants great service from gus de
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this has been a wonderful experience puri has looked after us and made sure we havent gone without definitely would recommend this to my friends or family members such a real experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we came her for the breakfast with the orangutans and we loved it  you get to spend time with the elephants and beautiful birds as well the breakfast is good and plentifulthe reminder of the zoo is under a lot of new construction so we didnt stay to visit other animals
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i gave  stars because when we came the place was being renovated so a lot of animals we cannot seewe came here because the driver has mistakenly took us here when what we wanted to go was actually the bali safari this is smaller than bs and at first i was a bit sceptical but apparently we really enjoyed this placemaybe because of its smaller size we can actually saw a lot of animals in a short trip i think they also have more animals who walk here and ther around us like the deer wallaby some chicken etc so my daughter was really happylook forward to come again when they finished with the renovation
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we visited the zoo and did the mud fun experience our guide dana was amazing he was so fun and really helped us bond with the elephantsthe experience was so humbling and the elephants are treated so well
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the reception was excellent  and you get a lot of time with the animals since its not crowded  dinner with the lions was amazing mery was good in hosting the dinner too
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: absolutely amazing amazing food amazing service agus and mary were amazing couldnt of been better thank you again bali zoo and agus  mary see you next time
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: exellent experience and friendly staff make sure to go get a cold drink and say hi to wiwin and the rest of the staff
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: dedexvery good guide and very good experience with him and the activityvery good and different experience which u will never experience in other zoos worth visiting
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: one of the most memorable experiences ive ever done hubby was super impressed as well the breakfast and lunch were wonderful and catered for everybody i would have given  stars until it was time to purchase images i was horrified to find you are not able to select a few images the album was  aud and a single image was  aud i understand the zoo needs tourism but the photo packages are ridiculous so much in fact not one person in  couples purchased any
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: awesome food right by the lions staff very friendly especially wiwiin at the cafe great experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i recommend taking the family to bali zoo to have breakfast with the orangutans our host gusde was fantastic
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great service great people and the most beautiful animals food is amazing and delicious maya and gus de were so friendly and kind highly recommend bali zoo for the whole family
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: day we visited balizoo to play with the elephant in mud and water i can heartly recomend this tour it was amazing experience we played with ena the elephant she enjoyed it a lot shes so adorable i loved it a lot also our guide ismail he was very kind and he treated ena with much love thank you for this nice day balizoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: good hospitality service and good food had a good experience with puspa enjoyable night at the zoo
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great experience very well organised had breakfast with  elephants and other animals as well great food and our guides gung tra and hendra were fantastic even getting our coffees for us at breakfast
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: wonderful experience from start to finish breakfast with the orangutans is a must a huge thanks to our amazing driver justin who was both extremely helpful  professional
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i cant tell you how much fun my wife and i experienced at the zoo the food was amazing and the hands on experience with the animals was great komang arrived early yeti pick us up and ensured we got what we needed he was waiting for us when it was over this is a must do was very surprised on how great it was
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: agus is really kind to serve us
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: very good service from teddy with drinks  wifi is fast and the people have great personalities and they are caring
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: must visitamazing food and servicewith the view of african lionsgusde and agus at the floor of restaurant friendly waiters
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we purchased tickets for fun in the mud with the elephants it was a fantastic morning  up close and personal with the elephants the buffet lunch was very goodthe zoo itself will be good in about  months or so as they are building lots of new enclosures
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: great buffet food great service from the staff and zoo handlers great laughs with hostess puri
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast with the orangutans was so much fun staff very friendly and happy gusde was fantastic and helped us a lot highly recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: a must do while in baligusde was the perfect host with great advicethe food was lovely alsodefinitely be doing it again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: we went for breakfast with orangutans it was so much fun we even got to feed elephants and birds breakfast was great very organized all animals are well fed and lots of them are walking free there i didnt expect i would love it that much
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i came to bali as a single woman from the us looking for culturally enlightening and unique things to do by myself this experience was highly rated on trip advisor and while im usually wary of zoos i took a chance boy it did not disappoint this was one of the most amazing experience of my lifei did the dual elephant experience and the orangutang breakfast and highly recommend the package the breakfast itself wasnt anything special but you got to meet some of their elephants and it was an intimate start to the day where i also met a few friends then they walked me over to the elphant experience which was incredible they were so happy and friendly and majestic truly made my whole trip to bali and would do it all again
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: thr food is nice gust de is a good man of here  my husband very like here and beautiful restaurant very enjoy here
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: maya was super kind and food was pretty good so far in bali  ambience was so good  lion feeding was nice experience
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: amazing food with amazing stuff like dedex friendly and courteous for example a fly flew into my girlfriends drink and with out us knowing he told us about it and even offered a replacement
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: no one including our driver informed us that there would be hardly any animals to see as the zoo is undergoing a large renovation there was no shop open for a drink and we had to find a staff member to ask for some waterthe lemurs were the highlight for me as you could interact with them
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: kuz and his team was great food was great and fresh i have been so impressed by the team and service displayed at the zoo its been a great experience and definitely recommend as something you should experience it wont disappoint
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: above and beyond any expectations we had of the evening staff so helpful and happy dinner with the lions is a once in a life time experience amazing evening and extremely good value for money anyone coming to bali must do this mery the supervisor was extremely amazing
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: was awesome and teddy and puspa was great the food was zoo good and the animals were amazing would definitely recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: the food was delicious eating with lions in view was a unique experiencethank you for the hospitality teddy  rima
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: excellent excellent program everyone was wonderful helpful and caring would definitely recommend
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: breakfast buffet starts at am so be early the food was very good our waiter darma took excellent care of us checking we had enough of everything the two apes provided plenty of photo opportunities for everyone even the elephants in attendance had a great breakfast and also stared in our photos and videosdarma was always close by and kept an eye on belongings as we enjoyed the animals being shown excellent opportunity to have children interacting with such lovely endangered animals
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: i highly recommend visiting the bali zoo and doing the breakfast with the orangutans and the shepherd mud bath such an amazing experience our driver juwis picked us up promptly from our hotel he was very pleasant and fun the food was delicious you get breakfast and lunch mayn was excellent at lunch she was very pleasant and helped us out of course being able to be up close with the orangutans and elephants was an amazing experience and one of the best tours ever so much funi highly recommend doing this in bali
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: what an experience the staff were amazing so helpful and kind  maya was especially kind  best buffet on the island
Name: Bali Zoo

Review: this is square is walking distance from the resort there are few shops inside the mall and it is very clean there are plenty of restaurants are bars are near the square it is very lively during the evening and nights if you are driving around you can get stuck in traffic for long time
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: shops outside designer wear all expensive had markets opposite but starting prices stupid understand barter system but standing in the heat just too much did buy sunnies but only because we knew bottom price from other stalls she quickly matched what we wanted to paybought fresh wraps  aud rolls from the bakery but watch plus plus price not advertised
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: first time ive stayed in the vicinity of seminyak square and would highly recommend positioning yourself here close to shopping and great restaurants
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is a shopping place which is handy if you are staying in the areaa lot of the shops are aimed at tourists handy for buying sovenirsalso there are several places to eat
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i loved this mall type shopping square a wide variety of things to buy ranging from from souvenirs to food
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this busy place is definitely the focal point of the town and there is always something happening it gets really busy in the evening but seems to be pretty much a hour the day placeit offers high class shops fleamarket type stalls and plenty of parkingthere are also a couple of pretty decent bars and restaurants around and of course a big shopping mall
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square has a market in the centre of the square which is ok the shopping centre had a nice selection of shops thank goodness for the air conditioning it was so humid outside there was a gelati stall and i will say the gelato was absolutely amazing so fresh and tasty this is quite a busy area and there is lots of shops and bars in surrounding streets dont forget to get a picture with the ibali sign
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it is a very tidy and clean shopping mall you should come here walk around there have many restaurants bars and local brand clothing stores surrounding it it is a good place to kill some time
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: is a good sport to shoping and a a walk away to enjoy a lot of interntional restaurants with manu farient of menu
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we only had a quick browse around the shops at the square as it was very hot and most of them dont have adequate aircon the new mall is much cooler so you enjoy your shopping more we did however enjoy our lunch at the bakery the other restaurants at the square were to warm to enjoy a meal there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the food is good and the service is excellent the restaurant is easily locatable and near shopping centre
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went to do a little bit of shopping and find some gifts to take back from the family lots of touristy shops with the usual fridge magnets and the resthad a some nice drinks lunch and picked up some gifts to take back home they also have rip curl billabong and rvca shops as well
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nothing to see here except silver at huge prices not silver my friends and the other hawkers selling the same stuff on any other strip or what you can get at home cheaperstick to the shopping strips that lead to the beaches of seminyak and you will do wellsorry seminyak square but that whole precinct should be demolished
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a small mall with an outdoor market selling clothes outside i bought three dresses from the locals and they were open to bargaining overall it is not a mustgo
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good combo of markets and store fronts but very basic if your looking to shop this isnt the spot
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is just located beside seminyak village nothing much here there are some barsrestaurants and shops here its considered a bit quiet at night we came here only for the periplus bookshop
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a mix if dept store and traditional bali market with the department store upstairs with all the modern amenities and brand shops all fixed price and then just down the stairs and under the shopping centre is the market where you can look for a bargain and barter till your hearts content your usual knock off rolexs and copy brand names but also a couple if lovely little eating places and bars very close by
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: busy little place which grew on us extremely friendly locals but chasing business a little dirty in places and having a busy bar street off the square we felt safe with no pestering for sales nice beach and bars but watch out for the unusually high waves overall would recommend for anyone wanting a mix of quiet relaxation mixed with a bit of night life
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is written to raise awareness of dodgy money changers in seminyak please be very careful and vigilant when changing money down a side alley even off a busy strip on the way to seminyak squareeven though the exchange rate offered looks better than other places be extra carefulwe are the most cautious people what they do is count out the local money i checked it my husband checked it but what happened after that is like a magic act somehow after both of us counting the correct amount he took it back and some howlike a magic trick he managed to take a vast amount of our exchanged and recounted local moneymy advice is accept a lower exchange rate perhaps at your hotel but know you are not being dupedwe dont want this to happen to othersand always get a receipt for your transactionwe got our money back by speaking to security at our hotel they helped us find him and get the money back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great location for touristy shopping in bali lots to see prices were very reasonable and lots of bartering quite busy at times
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we called into seminyak square a couple of timesthere are the normal designer stores legitimate brands as well as many litte market stalls that sell  rolex maybe non legitimate they are all fun to walk arounddont get caught up in battering if you dont want it turn around and walk away if you get hassled say no loudly and security come over and put them back in their placeplenty of eateries and coffee shopsmake sure you get your photo at the famous bali sign as always in these major tourist areas watch your valubles its not the balinese but other tourists
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: simply another square and of only average qualitywe went out of our way to go to the square but need not have botheredjust a group of shops and a few uninteresting stalls
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: various shops for the traveller no bartering here  ralph polo etcmega art sells large sarongs in various colours and styles to suit male and femalein the middle of the square there are stalls selling items of clothing shoes bags etc here you can barter the stalls close at  pm but the shops remain open till late
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i think seminyak square has a bit of everything for everyonethere is market style vendors out in the courtyard area  name brand outlet shops as well there is also restaurants and cafes  it is over  levels too with a very good sports bar upstairs along with a fish and chip shopdownstairs at ground level there is good cafes like bali bakery where you can get good coffee and cake toothere is fashion outlets as well  probably the only hassle is the timeshare sellers that hassle tourists for businesseasy to get taxis here being right in the heart of seminyakworth a look
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: loved this place had a wonderful open market and great shops surrounding the area plenty of restaurants  cafes to choose from offering different choices for brunch  lunch
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: overpriced esp the large souvenir shopfew outlets or brand name outletsnice to eat outside but useless when rainingtry the beachwalk shopping mall for a more upmarket experience
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: best thing about this place is everyone knows where it is so is a good central meeting point nothing else good about italso down the back near the supermarket is a shortcut through to the beach google maps shows it as a tiny walk way you can get through and saves  min from walking via the roads
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: for me it was boring and shopping is expensive more of an upmarket place to shop nice coffee shop on the outside
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went in with my kids wanting souvenirs very overpriced wasted out with nothing worth the pricegot sucked in to candilicous which i cost  for two things
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: dont expect a shopping mall at seminyak square theres only a row of shops plus a big souvenir store that sells overpriced gifts in the day there is a mini bazaar with shops selling clothes accessories but really nothing much in this place
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: its good if you want a break from the bartering some of the stores have good bargains at fixed prices central location just down from the main street of restaurants in seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very plush air conditioned shopping centre with gorgeous shops but make sure you take out a loan before you head in ad its uber expensive more  than in australia perfect quality leather goods nice jewellery too
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: our hotel shuttle drops us off and picks us up here great location not many shops but youll find a trustworthy moneychanger here convenience store drug store beach shops book shop batik shop souvenir stalls cafes and restaurants pretty much answers for your basic needs at night its a cool happy hour hangout from here you can walk towards the many shops spas bars and restaurants around seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good place to shop around but expensive shopping since its a it hype marketbut its good to spent time eat in some restuarants and get moving with the crowd
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great find awesome shopping loved the markets and the shops all round barter barter bali money all the way
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is the place to be when staying seminyak its buzzing day and night and has a something for everyone some excellent restaurants and some good shops to snap up some quality bargains
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is a small shopping centre not much to look at as there isnt much of a variety there but if you walk bit further down there is a small group of shops worth the look
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good starting point for a walk down the streets to see more market type stalls and fixed price shops
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the traffic is terrible we were stuck in a taxi for  minutes a crying baby get me out of this ridiculous town how many shops the locals get nothing but work long hours so we can have what we can get at home this is paradise lost canggu will go the same and the next coastal village along will go the same the chinese tourists are now more evident think ill go to byron bay and enjoy clean beaches sorry bali i wont be back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a supermarket is on site quite a few beachware shopsfor the cheaper and local stuff you have the street stalls also a sports bar on st floor for your australian live watch telecast
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: mix of bricks and mortar and market stalls all with the express purpose of fleecing the tourists heaps of tat and pointless trinkets at inflated prices why bother
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this place has a variety of markets bars food outlets and shops such as billabong also has a chemist and a fixed price market that sells souvenirs and food items
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is not so big but you get a cluster of street bargain shops for garments souvenirs and eateries
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: had a look around the centre while visiting man fridays restaurant pretty much the norm for this smaller style shopping complex with good verity of shops department store and a hotel on second floor pretty well same same for bali worth a visit if you staying in the area
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this restaurant walking distance from seminayak square is a good place to eat local cuisine including balinese  indonesian food  rustic surroundings and courteous service menu has ample choices and price    food is tasty  presentation is cafeteria style  but clean we tried their seafood soup which was good the duck was also very good  the red snapper bbq was excellent  would recommend the place for lunch  beer is cheap
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this used to be a favourite spot now it is sleazy like legian got offered viagara and cialis on every corner i think im over seminyak now
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i visited this shopping center along with a friend as we stayed for a day at the seminyak square hotel which is located on the first floor of this mall the hotel was nice and had a beautiful swimming poolthis is a nice little shopping center with a department store souvenir shopping center watsons outlet restaurants bars bakery ice cream shop sports stores atm currency exchange counter and a spa it also has a parking area for both cars and bikesthe huge i love bali signage is also located here inside the mall and you can also find small shops selling the famous bali bags just near the signage for a decent price
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great little markets beside the shopping centre if you are looking for dresses this is the place to go so much cheaper than the little boutique shops and same dresses and you can barter
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square was a typical market area with many cafes restaurants spas and shops lined up on both sides of the narrow roads leading to long traffic jams here the place is way too commercialised with all this
Name: Seminyak Square
