Review: guy at the excellent marzano pizza house in legian put me on to this  the gojek app saved megabucks so far if yr willing to wait  min for your car you wont believe how cheap you car or bike will be i kid you not
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we always come to this market place to purchase fresh water pearls when we are in the market for them we have been able to buy some in other location but these seem to last the longest my wife bought a pair of earrings several years ago and they are still going strong she doesnt wear them with fresh perfume on and they have not discoloured they are in great shape and we recently went to get my daughter a string of peals that where slightly pink and my wife bought her a pair of ear rings that were pink as well we paid aus  dollars for the necklace and we paid aus  dollars for the earrings
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: small shopping area at this square with other eateries closed by preferred the other side of seminyak which joins on to legian and then kuta you can do a leisurely stroll from seminyak to kuta with lots of shops and restaurants throughout enroute if you dont mind walking and browsing around area is safe and we had a driver who took us anywhere and everywhere whenever we needed him around the island he is reliable also a guide and charges very reasonable prices some of the journeys we took were from seminyak to ubud  we stayed there for  days for the return journey he came to ubud and picked us up and dropped us off in sanur  indonesian rupees each way we also used him for airport pickup and drop off if interested contact is komangputragmailcom
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nice food and had a very good expercience  good staff and a very good foodyou should visit also the small bars in that area
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a shopping square with a few shops and restaurants by the main seminyak area nothing special about this area there is a ibali sign here
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i love shopping and a trip isnt complete without browsing the local shops our family stayed at nusa dua which is about  minutes from seminyak we rented a car and driver at the hotel and spent a few hours browsing the shops at seminyak square i was expecting a typical air conditioned mall but seminyak square turned out to be endless rows of shops dotting the streets be prepared to shop under the scorching sun if the weather is hot i did some research on the shops prior to my visit to have an idea on what to buy true enough i snagged a few clothes at buddha wear and indigo and rose both well known fashion brands in bali seminyak square sells mostly resort and casual wear there is a small air conditioned mall beside it called seminyak village but there isnt as much shopping choices the price range of the clothes vary with the well known brands being more expensive as expected
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a great shopping areamall with a wide range of shops art market groceries several eateries day spa coffee shop wine shop very expensive bookstore best part is that it is centrally located
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great place to relax after walking from the beach before retiring to your hotelvilla qiet place a few eating choices and air conditioned area
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the mega art mega mart was a great one stop shop we had a fish spa here as it was one of the cleanest tanks we found we also got our hair braided and bought some last minute gifts and souvenirs the was a place to exchange currency and a few market stalls there are some boutiques and specialty stores really just a another shopping complex
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the option for shopping or food isnt anything exciting either but the toilets are generally clean good news for us ladies
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i was surprised by how small the mall is  but we were able to do a bit of souvenir shopping  and the bonus was that we could do it in air conditioning  not much time needed here
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i visited this mall out of curiosity and to kill time as there was no specific program on the day it was a typical shopping mall with a wide varieties of local handcrafts as well as branded attires
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nothing much to shop herewill be good only for the few eateries but their food were average nothing fascinating good
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: busy place nothing much to shop  mins is all you need go somewhere else everything is overpriced if you like hanging out at bars this might be for you
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: blue bird taxis are generally very honest in bali they dont haggle and their meters are turned on and they are pretty good  accurateavoid blue biro groupbeware of what may look like a blue bird taxi on the windscreen at a glance you think it says blue bird if you look carefully it says blue biroif you ask are you on a meter they will say yes but their meters are rigged to turn over almost  times as fast as a blue bird taxi a fare from seminyak to kuta in a blue bird metered taxi should cost approximately k rupiahthe blue biro taxi scammed meters will cost anywhere from   k rupiah and then they expect a tipuse only genuine blue bird taxis make sure they have turned on their meter i prefer to reward blue bird drivers with a generous tip for their honesty remember the drivers dont get paid a great deal by the owners of the taxi so tips mean a lot to them think about it a  thousand rupiah tip is only about  australian that would comfortably provide dinner for an indonesian family a k rupiah tip  aus would feed their family for a weekso  when getting around in bali look carefully at the name of the taxi company on the windscreenavoid the blue biro taxis use only genuine blue bird taxis while in bali have a scamfree holiday
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: if youre unfamiliar with the area this may help this mall is located right next to seminyak village you can visit both quite easily it is also located in a very touristy area it is bonkers on the roads in and around this there are lots of boutiques on the streets around here that all week the same shirts of things leather goods ratan stuff surf shops batiked fabrics and souvenirswe enjoyed taking out photo with the giant i  bali sign we liked that there was a watsons pharmacy as we were on the hunt for asian beauty products lastly we stopped in market at the end of the mall it is half souvenirs and half convenience store we loaded up on snacks and drinks
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this a nice place to hang out and do some shopping there is a bit of a street market in morning that sells souvenirs and knock off handbags and there is a nice i love bali sign in addition to the clothing stores and a supermarket that sells food items and souvenirs seminyak square is lively yet not over crowded and i really enjoyed my time there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is basically the heart of seminyak it consists of numerous shops  a small flea market outside on the street there is an atm machine  book shop  mega mart  branded shops  toilets
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is more popular as the shopping place in the seminyak area most hotels have free shuttles to  from seminyak square few vendors have set up shacks to sell clothes  other souvenirs this is where you can display your bargaining skills there are other bigger shops too selling more expensive stuffsthe money exchange centres at the square do not give the best rate we went around checking in many places kept walking farther away  found better rates
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this place in bali is one of the most happening for shoppersnot only shopping also you can find good indian food
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very expensive shops nice building but did seem out of place in the hub of seminyak cheap shopping eateries and spas
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went into one small money exchanger near seminyak square who was offering a higher rate than others with no commission who tried to give us a lot less than what was offered on the board saying that their was a  fee our teenagers said later that they were watching him drop notes behind the counter as he counted we walked out luckily with all of our moneywe walked around the corner to another small money changer who was not offering as much but a bit more than others we had seen after the recent experience we were more cautious and counted the local currency very carefully in lots of r placing them on the counter in front of me as i went with my yr old daughters watching along with me there was a friend next to the booth trying to talk to the girls obviously distracting us we thought we had all out money but realised later when we recounted that we were about a shortwe would recommend staying away from anyone offering higher rates and stick to the more authorised money changers like kuta central as an example they offer lower rates but a lot saferwe have travelled extensively throughout asia and have never had this trouble before ubud felt a lot safer and i dont think our family will ever return to seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we were a little disappointed with the hotel pool area was not how it appeared in the pictures but to be honest the beaches were lovely so we didnt need it the rooms were ok and clean and the staff were very helpfulthe location was the best part of it literally  minute walk from the beach and close to all parts of seminyak with the best restaurants
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the place is loaded with people in the evenings lots of cuisine shopping bars and sometimes even live music it can become very congested during the tourist season traffic would be a snarl ive no idea why the roads arent one way there are a couple of average malls for window shopping too in the area
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very disappointing as the rest of the bali has some nice shops and foodsmarket is boring and shops inside of the square are not really worth the visit except next to the market are a couple of surf shops where you may pick up some bargains but only if on sale
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not much variety all the markets are selling the same goods leadup to the square is a better walk with more shops and things to see
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: ive got to say i am so unimpressed with seminyak square if you are looking to go away as a couple or with a family do not stay near this areathere were drunken tourist everywhere stalls are expensive and there is not a variety of food placestaxi drivers will rip you off and do not go to any side money exchangerswe almost got mugged twice only go to authorised money exchangers in glass boxes and that have no commissionif you are thinking of traveling to bali as a couple or as a family think again its a party island and i would not recommendin saying that people in general are lovely especially the locals
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there isnt really a lot to see at the shopping mall other than a few higher end shops there a few restaurants and cafes for meals or just chill and have drink what we thought more interesting to look at were the stalls just next to the mall selling a good range of beach and batik clothes
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: fabulous food an cocktails we loved this place  pound for a  course meal like fine dining staff amazing very attentive  out of  loved it
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: several market stalls and a few shops one large touristsouvenir shop also from the moment you arrive youre harrassed by stall holders and hawkers from escape holidays who will not leave you alone one guy chased us down the road  if you want a relaxing or even a fun local shopping experience this isnt it
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: pretty boring a few market stalls selling clothes at very high prices not much worth buying better markets else were
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak itself has become the trendy classy area of this booming tourist island and there was a time when the square was the must go place here times have changed seminyak square hasnt so is it a must any more not reallya pleasant part but no must visit
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square stands at the end of eat street and has some great specialty shops as well as a huge souvenir shop always worth a visit when in seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: in a place with so many shopping and dining opportunities like bali  a place like seminyak square jjust seems of no interest at all youmll find nothing there that you couldnt anywhere in bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good souvenir and market shopping in a hassle free space really nice cafes nice food and you feel like its out of the hussel and bussel of the streetsnot expensive but nice variety
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great spot to grab some heat relief in the aircon not much that you cant find back home and for cheaper in and out visit in less than  minutes
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak by night  we got sick and tired of reviews of people whinging and complaining about how congested and busy kuta was about the kuta traffic jams  well seminyak my friends is the new kuta at night not only is it one nightmare to get in and out of via taxi its actually quicker to get out of the taxi and walk  but your sort of stuck because seminyak is a rabbit warren of long roads and no sense its full of pretentious people pretending their in monti carlo daaaaaaarilngs the traffic jam was still bad at pm so if your planning to head to a appointment give yourself over and hour to get there been coming to bali for over  years and this place is overrated overpriced if its crushed in a crowd you like then this place is for you but dont listen to the old stigma of bali  seminyak is the new kuta tried the beach during the day and it was dirty  not the greatest beachwalk  and one street back off the beach is dirty  heaps of graffiti and iron fencing no thanks
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a fantastic recent easter break in seminyaki noticed an easter event happening last sunday and heard and read various stories regarding seminyak square but luckily to my surprise it proved to be a real winnertraditional balinese market with all the fun of haggling and sifting seminyak squares environment made it more relaxed and convenient compared to a busy narrow pathway elsewherequiksilver had great discounted prices on swimwearhad a handy chemist nearby too of which one of my friends required a vitamin boost or somethinggreat food  beverage outlets offering variety and cuisine from around the world that included two of my new faves man frydays  the spicery delispicery had an easter special menu cheap drinks promos all night and a wonderful open mic night where the band invited people to play instruments and sing tho i think they invited themselves but hey  its an open mic night so it made it more interesting particularly as the lady from indonesia could really sing and the aussie bloke could really twang and plang his guitar and sing tooall in all i see this as an open aired mall that has great leisurely facilities and easy to relax inthe prices are competitive for seminyak and can eye a bargain here and there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not worth going very small area with few boutique shops the shops sell the same beach dresses or shirts that can be found everywhere in bali its just beside the seminyak village which is a two storey mall with international brands massive traffic jam to get there takes hours to walk there from seminyak beach
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went to seminyak square to get a drink we went to dove tail its a cool bar sitting in the parking lot playing great tuneswe met day day and mirtha they were so cool we got a special made shot on the house and dayday asked us for special request the setting is cool and the people are really friendly and last but not least the drinks were in point
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak is lively vibrant and based north of dempasar airport it is a goto destination for australians to party be loud and scream wowo when a song they like is playedbefore arrival i would recommend downloading this offline mapmeit will allow you to find locations suggest routes and direct you to locations without the need for international roaming or access to mobile dataseven maximum days is probably all you need in seminyakwhen booking your accommodation check that there are no building works or renovations planned for your residence or the adjoining properties if so ensure that they price the accommodation accordingly or compensate you in other waysyou should never go anywhere without local currency however i would suggest that you only get a small amount before you arrive there are a number of reputable money changers in seminyak and the exchange rates are considerably better locally and without commissionhowever check the rate that is advertised is the rate that you are getting ensure that the teller counts the money out and then steps away from the money allowing you to pick it up yourself to count it watch for the slight of hand as they count out your money watch for slight of hand as they replace your money with damaged or torn money and watch out for different rates for different denominations of currencywhen you exit the airport you will be confronted with taxi drivers wanting to take you to your destination if you choose to use one of these drivers it is important to arrange the price before beginning your journey with themthe journey from the airport should cost no more than  rupees as an upper limit normally charged by hotels return journeys should be considerably less and should be negotiated in the hours before your departure for the airportthe journey to and from the airport under normal circumstances should take about  minutes however the government is building an underpass at a critical junction near the airport and it now takes from fortyfive minutes up to an hour and a half these roadworks are likely to take up to one year to complete at the time of this articlebluebird taxis are the official metered taxis and if you wish to avoid bartering you should take one of these however be aware of other taxis that also paint their cars blue that do not have a meter if you use an unmetered taxi be sure to negotiate a price prior to setting outthere is a public bus service that runs every half an hour from seminyak square that will take you to a number of locations prices for each one way ticket on various lines that go to and from a main hub vary from  to  rupeesnone of the prices advertised in shops bars massage parlours and restaurants include the  government tax and  service charge you should always consider these additional amounts when gauging the price of your purchaseseminyak is not cheap cocktails ate around  rupees and bingtang beer is between  and  fanta is  crisps are between  and  breakfast menus are around   grams of pork ribs is  and a whole roasted pig is million massages are very reasonably priced and can cost  rupees for one houralways check that the amount that you are being charged for drinks meals and goods are the same amount that are being advertised on the menuyou should budget for about  per day between food drinks activities and taxisif you wish to hire a van to take you to jimbaran wait for  hours while you enjoy the beach and get some seafood and bring you back this will cost between  and  rupeeswork under the assumption that all prices are suggestions and that negotiations are a part of everyday businessa lot of plastic rubbish washes up on the beaches of seminyak so you will see groups of volunteers clearing the beaches as you go for your morning walkthe beach has no shade and the sun and humidity become oppressive after am so get your morning exercise in early or wait until the sun goes down in the eveningthere are a lot of stray dogs on the beach and roads generally they are harmless however they can turn aggressive very quickly so either walk with a stick on the beach or back away very slowly maintaining eye contact if you are confrontedif you are unfortunate enough to get sick and require medical or hospital attention there are a few things of which you should be awarealways have the details of your travel medical insurance provider about your person either in your phone purse or walletno hospital or medical facility will admit you without knowing how the bill will be paid often you will be required to provide a credit card until you can identify your travel medical insurance provider and the coverage it providesknow your excess liability on your policy and ensure that is the only amount that you pay when you are being dischargedhospitals have been known to say that your medical insurance only covers so much of the treatment and that you have to pay as much as an additional  this is where having your medical insurance provider on speed dial is useful to clarify any misunderstandingseven once the correct excess has been identified look out for the further slight of hand as your excess may be increased by  or more due to exchange rate differences or administration costs stand your ground the only out of pocket expense that you should pay is the exact amount of the excess on your policywhen you are returning back at the airport you must have access to your boarding pass in order to get into the checkin area this can be electronic or paper but the guards to the checkin area will require sight of the flight number date and time of the flights along with your name this seems to be an increasing protocol across a lot of asian countriesit is best to download these before you get to the airport as wifi access at the airport dose not appear to cater for downloading boarding passes or emailsthese are ml liquid checks at the gates before boarding the plane throughout asian airports so drink your water or throw it away and ask about your duty free allocation coming in and leavingif you watch out for these pitfalls you will have a great time in seminyak the people are friendly and everyone is looking out for an opportunityenjoy
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this square has some shops and a car park not very interesting not many people come here to shop we would normally stop here as our driver would park his van here and then we would walk out to the other shops along the street
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: has a wider range of shops here but depending on what you are looking for this place could be a waste of time for you there is a row of stalls opposite which sells clothes etc i suppose this is a good place for a rainy day activity
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i guess this is where you come when you dont want to mix with the localswe were disappointed and prefer the small shops away from the main streets however if you want a western mall this this will likely meet your needs
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: ok for a look clean western type mall with up market expensive shops it has a nice deli and small market at the back worth going there for some supplies
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: have some stores as well as market outside selling swimwear and souvenirs very central location in seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: to be honest my experience of this mall is that it is the sort of run of the mill shopping mall one can find in almost any resort town in the world selling the most generic and touristy things one can ask for  especially beach wear i guess clean the toilets were the only reason i hung around nearby
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i highly recommend skipping this one theres really nothing here to see a couple of restaurants since boutiques nothing worth making a special trip here unless youre in the area kind of disappointed
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we spent a little bit of time in seminyak square when we couldnt be bothered to travel to the bigger shopping malls in kutait was i dont know quite nice the stores themselves are mostly air conditioned there are a few places to stop for a drink or a bowl of chipsplenty of places i could see selling thongsflipflops and swimwear so if youre looking for this and dont want to venture into kuta then this would be the place to comereally as the review title says it is what it iswill return if we need to
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: you have two options near each other if you are looking for shopping malls in seminyak off jl kayu cendana one is seminyak square the other seminyak village seminyak village is more of a traditional mall with multifloors air con and various boutiques and speciality shops seminyak square is more in the style of an open market but has well known chain stores as well as shops selling locally crafted balinese clothes and souvenirs as well as food seminyak square has a quicksilver store which has some good items check out the discount rack and a good store selling traditional indonesian batik the square is a good option for shopping in seminyak  it wont knock your socks off but the selections are good the prices reasonable and is centrally located making it easy to get to there are plenty of good shops adjacent to seminyak square as well including a gelato place and a starbucks open late in case you need a coffee hit the place buzzes until quite late in the evening as well
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it is a small shop center where you can find branded product some nice accessories and clothes are available with good price
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: if you are looking for swimwear then this is the one place to go as there are a couple of brand shops like billabong roxy quicksilver amongst others there always look for the rack where there are discounted items as you never know what may take your fancy and they are usually  off or morei managed to pick up a couple of swimsuits and bikinis surf tops at very good prices if you cannot find anything from the discounted rack do check out the new items as well more importantly the swimwear are sold not as a set but you can pick and choose the various sizes that suit youother than swimwear shops there are many restaurants serving both food and beer  alcoholic beverages and cocktails around seminyak square are little shops and boutiques and more restaurants there is also a guardian pharmacy just across from the main signage of seminyak square go to the square on a scooter or motorbike its faster than taking a taxi if you go by the main entrance  you will have to pay for parking your bike however there is a side entrance leading to the back of seminyak square from the main road off jalan kayu aya just after kim soo the restaurant  furnishing store its free if you go by the side road into the parking area
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great service and foodthe chef come to chat with us which was nice highly recommend thank you chef dede
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there are many stores to go to the prices are equal to european prices but if you walk around youll find cheaper things to buy its a good place to bargain
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went here to buy some postcards at first they said they can help us send it we just need to buy two stamps so we took it to the cashier but then the lady there told us they cant send it what she told us maybe hotel can do it for us so i ask them if i could use their phone to call hotel since my phone cant make outgoing calls the lady just smirk and talk in indonesian language in front of us wtf thats when it hit me so rude after all the happycourteous service we had for  days here in bali im astounded to be treated this way we just walk out say this place is rude and im not happy
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there is nothing extraordinary about it you can visit shops and buy the usual stuff or eat out there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good alternative to the hotel and the beach  mix of shops and good place to cool down  well worth a visit when in seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there is nothing special in seminyak square we visited here in a hot afternoon to enjoy the air conditioning it is located strategically in the crowded street there are some restaurant and souvenier shopping available
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it is a shopping center with nothing special but you can take a nice picture with the letters i love bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it has most of the shops that you can find in many places in bali many of the shops are repetive so you would rather be walking along the street where there are many nice shops around good place to gather have a coffee and recharge though
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this wasnt anything special just a group of shops if you are in the area check it out but dont make a special trip just to see itthere is an older section with markets and a few shops and then there is the newer section in aircon with more pricier shopsif you are after souvenirs or knickknacks then this might be the place for you
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: small shopping centre nice to cool down in and use their atms the shops however are expensive and if you dont look like an expensive shopper and you touch something like my  year old did they will frown at you and watch you like a hawk snd basically run you out of their shop
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very civet and cool area to visit every shop you can imagine and theres always sales  discounts goingwill admit i did a lot of shopping around the square for clothingyou can however find better deals on most of the street vendor products on less busy and trending streets walking distance so always shop aroundgood fun all in though
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak village and square does not have much for anyone theres hardly any restaurants worth eating at and probably  at most with very little choice tend to be a mix of surf shops supermarket and boutique shopsstay on the eat street and check that out and eat therejalan pettinget is much better and plenty of good restaurants to pick from
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this street in seminyak has some good upscale shopping outlets artistic and quirky designs the street looks beautiful and we walked down this street on all three nights the shops shut by pm and restaurants close by pm the lanes get a bit dark after that but the walk back to the hotel is safe enjoy the great vibe here
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the layout was nice but shops all cost more than australia their operating costs are so much lower than our country they lowering prices to get more ppl through the door
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: wow  a lovely shopping centre but the retail shops are ridiculously expensive for eg i adore camilla kaftans and seminyak is the perfect place to wear these free flowing light garments and they retail for  aud on the website or in australian camilla stores full price one that i had bought  years ago was actually located in one of the st retail stores on the left as you enter the ss and i was delighted until i saw the price    nearly  million rup which is  aud  nearly double what you pay for back home in australia i callled the sales lady over just to confirm my calculations and say yes thats right wowee  i hot tailed it out of there there was a money exchange on the top level which we actually ended up going to twice   hrs in between times as we had a massage in between and both times it was unattended  yikes there were absolutely gorgeous leather handbags for sale which i would have bought  but there was noone around to help you  there were no prices on there i approached another sales lady behind another counter but as theyre all renting their own spaces there was no help offered hmmm  beautiful things beautiful shopping centre disgraceful service  not going back to this one  sorry
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nice square the usual hawkers and transport drivers the square has a range of western style stores cafes and outlets to cater for most tastes the booze store has a fair selection but is very pricey there are a few atms and money changers here too
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: no bargaining here set price very up market shops close to lots of shops and eateries loved the deli on the outside of the square
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak is probably the best place to go in bali if you want nightlife and a busy atmosphere if you want chilled out scenic luxury seminyak isnt the place for you seminyak square is lined with quite good bars all with live entertainment which is very good and all with friendly staff and has a good choice of restaurants if there is a restaurant you would require to dine in i would advise booking in advance as everywhere can get quite busy on an evening there are road patrols to help you cross the road as the traffic of cars and scooters get quite crazy and could be potentially dangerous my tips would be always check with your taxi before getting in how much the fare will be and agree on price the best taxis to use are the bluebird ones also watch your bags and pockets and dont walk along quiet roads alone after dark
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: had the chance to have a look down here not to bad a variety of souvenir type shops with a range of bars and restaurants upstairs great indonesian food upstairs a good selection of souvenirs however krishna is a lot less expensive then these marketsworth a look when your down here but i wouldnt rush to it
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: cool vibrant place pack with aussies mopeds enough to drive you mad there is some really nice shops and restaurants try not to let the hustle and bustle get to you and youll be ok definitely worth experiencing
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this shopping centre is not huge in size but while in bali i think we didnt need huge shopping centre the icon of this place is  i love bali  sign on the left side others nothing interisting
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is located adjacent to seminyak village the square has many boutique store in amongst the array of market vendors there is a true mix between the old and the new i have heard other travellers say that is is becoming a bit like kuta one of the main differences is that many of the stalls and shops are run by women this made is very attractive to my wife who found some of the stall vendors a little confronting we spend  hours discovering local merchants who had different items to offer it was relaxed until dusk when the motorbike population began to grow the street side stores have narrow footpaths which only present any real issue after dark as the impatient scooters begin to mount to the footpath highly recommended in the afternoon as seminyak village stores have refrigerated air conditioning
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nice clean area we used the money exchanger here all the time and there are  drivers and cars if you need to grab a cab
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: enjoyed a walk around the shops browsing a good selector shops nothing amazing but a good afternoon browse
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: lovely little selection of market shops selling mostly womens clothes dresses mainly it is set up in the car park there are some other shops selling bags glasses jewellery etc these markets are set up in the car park of seminyak square there are a few boutique shops and restaurants as well a great place to browse
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: stopped by with my mum to take a break from the heat there are a few interesting shops inside which are interesting to look through we didnt buy anything and neat sculptures which make this a nice place to see if you are passing by
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: as it was an overcast day we decided to go to the fashion shopping starting at the square enjoyed a good coffee and pastries shops ok quite expensive and clothes of average quality if you looking for childrens clothing quite a few shops in this location
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: has some nice shops but full australian prices the small market is ok too but more for women plenty of better things to do in seminyak  there are a couple of places to eat and drink but nothing to rave about hit the streets before you head here
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a nice place to spend the afternoon wandering shops are a little more expensive you wont get the same bargans as in legian and kuta but have a go some will happily negotiate others will not the quality of items on offer especially in the flea market is better nice a range of shops
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very underwhelmed with the shopping square we visited for a certain beauty salon which was good i wondered around the square whilst my girlfriend was getting her treatment there really isnt a great variety of shops or even to eat and drink there is a small market downstairs a supermarket at the back and a small range of shops on the bottom floor i would visit other shopping centres if you actually want to shop or even the nearby seminyak village
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: what a lovely place to just walk enter all the shops to buy amazing clothes take massages and eat and of course party perfect place to chill by the beach in the morning laze in the afternoon and spend time at seminyak square in the evening
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i guess seminyak would be great if you are single and wanting to party shoppings and restaurants are good and everywherewe were there with our  months daughter so it wasnt much fun as there are no pathways or pedestrian lanes we had to carry her or the pram everywhere we went
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: located in between kuta and seminyak it is a mall with various kind of shops sorrounded by restaurant and cafes the place was clean and organized
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: nice compact shopping cum eating place  bit congested and traffic is too much but a must visit place
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: well surrounded by restaurants and shops this is a heaven for shoppers and food lovers pubs with live music and night clubs can be found all along the main road from the square only thing is shops close at  and he restaurants at  which is little disappointing
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great place for a visit and to have lunch would recommend for family also  western standards though out so no falling down holes like on the streets
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: small stalls selling local wares outdoor and connected to seminyak village indoor with aircon did not visit we were there for a quick look around but did not find anything particularly interesting parking rates were very reasonable
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: one of the malls i like in bali infect i like seminyak area best in bali i will consider staying around here in my next visit seminyak offers many nice places to shop and eateries
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: its new and clean but its just a shopping centre the shops arent very busy but there are some little stalls that sell some nice jewellery
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not a bad place for some shopping especially for clothes and souvenirs there are some dining options too not too appealing though just regular place nothing out of ordinary
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the square has a good variety of shops and restaurants and gets you away from the sometimes hectic traffic filled streets of seminyak there is a car park at the centre so no traffic runs through the areathe parking is  rp per hour i believethe shops range from an english fish and chop shop a speciality wine and spirits store trendy bars brand name clothing labels a restaurant or too and finally a large gift shop which has some pharmacy bits in in tooi wouldnt go hear for anything specific you certainly wont find the best priced things here  but its a nice little area to have a mooch around in case something takes your fancythere is also a i love bali sign which is worth a photo or two
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: would not bother going back here lots of trendy over priced shops stick to the main street and dont let your husband tell you there are no more shops just restaurant there are a truck load of them just keep walking
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the stuff there were pricy and it is very small with only few retail stores maybe  mins can finish nothing much to see too boring attraction
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a market place where you have both temporary type sheds and permanent buildings housing shops selling all kinds of fancy stuff the shops in the permanent buildings dont give in to haggling but the outer shops do the prices are high compared to what you get near some of the temples like tirta empul goa gajah etc car park is available but generally crowded
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: wow lots of shopping and lots of restaurants this was a great place to pass the time before heading to the airport
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we visited seminyak square a few times on our journey it was about a  minute walk from our villathere are a lot of little stands that have their own little bargains if youre willing to barter with the locals though they are quite friendly and good to chat with at the same timethe worst part about the square is the karma group people who will try and give you annoying handouts and say that youve won awards but the only way to get it is visit their hotel and sit through a time share brief which we never wasted our time on but read up through many travel places about themthey have good toilet facilities and many established shops to buy from theres a bar upstairs and a couple of barsrestaurants downstairs we had a few drinks at dovetail which is in the parking area that was great for its staff and general vibe of the placeoverall the square was good for little bargains and even some of the established shops the only let down is the annoying karma people but thats not the squares fault but definitely worth a lookout if you visit bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: walked all the way here from our hotel expecting a supermarket of some sort nice things but there and the shopping centre again nothing there this place is filled with just more surf shops
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: yawn fest why is seminyak so popular againboring aussie brands meh fake goods meh asianstyle markets like a mini chatuchak meh
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: intended to be a shopping mall this square has very few shops and can be visited in less than an hour strip of stalls a souvenir shop some clothessurf shops and some food joints upstairs
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is an average sort of shopping experience it seems they had ambitions of attracting top name tenants but theres not much here black canyon coffee is here but in general nothing to persuade you to return
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: please note this does not apply to the retail outlets or to all of the stall holders but our experience with the two males selling  mimco knockoffs really spoilt our outing they were rude intimidatinggot into our personal space when we looking through their products for the best made items aggressively said if you want real mimco go down the road and once holding my friends cash tried to negotiate a higher price they even appeared to be peering into her wallets we felt quite threatened pity cause their products were generally quite good and we would have gone back for more if they had behaved appropriately at the other end of the sales spectrum the lovely lady selling pearls was accommodating and patient as we struggled over our choices the ladies selling clothes in the most amazing array of colours were helpful and open to negotiation we odered some canvas prints from photos whilst we were there from a very helpful young man but as we walked away from seminyak square it was the negative experience with the bag sellers that will keep us from rushing back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good place to shop between local or international brand crowded amd lots of cafe or place to eat close to many things and it is heaven for everyone who loves shopping a lot
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great place to park a car in heart of seminyak many places to explore here like bali bakery uma seminyak or kayu aya beach
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: really not much in here was expecting a lot more nothing really cheap and not a lot of shops anyway some ok food places wouldnt waste my time again
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this shopping center is in the heart of everything they have a lot of local vendors there were you can purchase your souvenirs at a good price they also have some stores where you can shop around there is also an atm and money changer i side the square be sure to walk around in seminyak to see who give you a better rate when youre changing money but if you ask your hotel or driver they can take you to other vendors outside of seminyak to shop at a cheaper price
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very simple with few shops price is very expensive regardless quality good for time pass but not for shopping
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: a few cool shops along the stretch but thats about it maybe worth going once for the experience but not twice or morethat said some really nice restaurants are located there so you might want to include that in your trip there some examples  cornerhouse and mamasan
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i went here with my boyfriend and we both found this place to be nothing special and rather expensive for shopping even with bartering we had lunch upstairs near the pub the price there was pretty cheap but the meal was again nothing special it was nice to have gone there just to say ive been but thats it i wouldnt go again
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square has a number of stores but there is nothing special about this shopping mall the prices at stores such as billabong and quicksilver are not any cheaper than in australiawe do however like going to black canyon for great smoothies and juices and the sports bar upstairs is a good place for a drink whilst watching a range of international and australian sports
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the shops were okay and people were friendly though i found it a bit overpriced few good shops but a lot of stuff was dated
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it is side by side with seminyak village if you love shopping this is a must place to visit for local shopping and souvenirs make sure that you flex your negotiation skill to get the best deal it is still very cheap and reasonable even if you dont know how to negotiate
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: lots to see and easy to get around also walking distance to the oberoi market theres a new stylish centre opened up last year lovely and cool like a mini westfieldthe street also his its little market stalls in front of the cafes
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: very busy area traffic is congested shopping not the cheapest seminyak flea market much cheaper and its just down the road
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: small shopping area to buy souvenirs or to enjoy coffee or a quick bite very secure place for enjoy
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not much to show for the hype given by the hotel very expensive not much different to home nearby flea market better
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: save your time cross this one off your list if you have to get a taxi to visit traffic gridlocked took an hour from our hotel in legian maybe ok if you stayed locally but same stuff different locations not in a hurry to go back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i love this square as there are great coffee shops and restaurants and it has a small market there as well also there is a great massage and pedicure and manicure shop there called carlas prices are good and its a great experience i always go back there when visiting bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the rating for seminyak square sits between average and very goodthere is a good selection of local produce and goods it has a chemist and a few outlet shops there are also a few cafes to choose from
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: been here many times to meet customer at one of the cafe or just to park my car its limited car park during the day as they use half area for market i found lots of dresses and accessories at this market corner there are also branded shop sport bar hotel and cafeits good place to park car at night and walk through the road to find good restaurant
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: at some point of time during your visit here you will encounter the chaos that is seminyak square although not that big it is a draw for many different kinds of people and not all of their intentions honourable it can get quite aggressive with people selling timeshare offering taxis and also other interesting thingswe walk through it to get to the beach but would never consider going for any other reasons there are far more friendly and interesting places in town
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: its a bit odd really to have the genuine items for sale only a stones throw from theahemknock offs across the road in the flea market one thing to be wary of are the annoying time share sellers who do a really heavy sell plus they have a sneaky good cop bad cop thing going on so no sooner have you extracated yourself from one persistent seller trying to get you to visit some property deal than someone else comes along and says they are not selling only doing a survey bang they have your name and hotel and next you have people phoning you up or arriving to take you on unorganised free tours
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is just a small shopping arcade with expensive shops if you want to eat here there is a black canyon coffee and bali bakery on the ground floor both cafes offers decent foods there is a supermarket but nothing special in there the place also has its own hotel on the second floor finding a parking can be difficult in here as during daytime some of the slots are used by bazzars try seminyak village next door if parking is full in here
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this place is good to go to if your after designer brands and are willing to pay top dollar for it as expensive as australia
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great place to visit with the family nice garden area which are nice and safe for the kids to run around great shops and two restaurants that are included in the top  restaurants in seminyak
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the mall was small with a few shops and in the middle a small market the market was overpriced we picked up a average sized bag asked how much and was told its  dollars aud we said too exp he said you can bargain i just could not be bothered bargaining when the opening price is so high there wasnt much to buy at the shops or markets nothing special there were a few restaurants which were very quiet
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminak square air conditioning insidegreat with the hot weathervery expensive shopsfew people insideprices very high in storeadvertising at square discounts on til january st very limited specials
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: walked to seminyak square shops more upmarket and this is reflected in the prices no room for bartering at most stores people every few yards stop you for time share promotion which becomes annoying after the th request of do you speak english can i ask you one question overall glad we went for the experience if you have limited time visiting listen to the reviews and visit somewhere else unless you are looking for high end shopping
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: over priced stores some of the prices were the equivalent of australia if not more expensive shops are great to cool off in
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: consists of shops selling tacky tourist stuff counterfeit bags watches etc and not much elsealso unsolicited offers of massage and from another dubious looking individual viagra when politely told no thank you was then offered valium instead  not a very nice place very down market and wont be going back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: went to the square and had a great time great restaurants great shops we especially liked man frydays fish and chip shop upstairs beautiful breeze coming in off the sea and nice views from the balcony
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: you can see few boutiques and restaurants in this square restaurants have indoor and outdoor seats where you can spend time with friends or families
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not much things to shop in this place except flea market and i would strongly not encourage u to buy things from the flea they will try their best to rip you off i bought a top see photo for k rupiah the initial price she offered was k rupiah i tried to bargain with her till k rupiah after going off i drove off and saw a place selling such clothing at  pieces for k rupiah overall just dont come here its a waste of time and the surrounding shops sells quite expensive items
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square has been our go to shopping location in bali the square itself is limited but it is very central to bali oriented shopping if you are looking for wine and spirits there is a great store with a wide variety of choices and brands it is right by the i love bali sign within the squaresadjacent to the square is the seminyak village mall where you can get some aircon shopping in three streets intersect in front of the square down each street is a range of shopping from high end boutiques to local markets as well as cafes
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: took a taxi from seminyak to the square firstly waste of money and time there is nothing there just a few shops and the shopping centre again nothing there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: my review is brief as was the visit i wondered why we bothered to stop in passing little to excite what is available is also available in most other shops worth a look if a first time visit but other visitors to the square may be enthused where i was not
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we would normally past by seminyak square as we like to shop around the jalan kayu aya area there are shops at this square but i dont find them particularly exciting
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: walked all the way here from our hotel expecting a supermarket of some sortonly to find a strip of stalls a souvenir shop some clothessurf shops and some food joints upstairs we ended up walking down eat street to cocos supermarket instead wouldnt really recommend making the trip here as its quite small so youll only be here for a top of  mins p
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the collection of stores here are rather eccletic if you drove in be sure to ask the stores to give you a free parking coupon the pace here is more relaxed and definitely does not require the haggling for prices on trinkets
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: as i read in other reviews it was small and a waste of time i wanted to find out for myself and i agreethere are only a few expensive surfer shops and a few other shops the streets surrounding the area are much nicergo to the market close by and have something to eat in the various restaurants in the area thats a better way to spend your time and money
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: intended to be a shopping mall this square has very few shops and can be visited in less than an hour a small dress fair located across the square may be more interesting for tourists
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: my husband and i visited discovery mall and mal galeria but seminyak square was by far superior the interior design is beautiful and the food is delicious we grabbed some great bargains too they even have a dj who plays from pm a great place
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is full of shops and food places we walked around for a while and found all the shops were quite expensive same as nz prices but i guess that was expected as they are mainly surf shops like billabong few different little stores but high prices food options were great will definitely be returning to a few of the places to try the gelato factory was amazing
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this place is filled with just more surf shops which you can go at jln sunset or near kuta dont bother spending so much time in here unless youre hungry theres a good cafe at level  of this mallwalk down the road there are better shops there for you to get your staffs
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: tris concrete area consists of overpriced shops cafes and an expensive market with no local atmosphere if you want to experience bali rather than a tourist centre head to the backstreets of seminyak towards the beach where you can find little temples and local life
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there are two sides to seminyak square  the market side but go round the corner and there is the fancy side with an amazing rooftop spa but more importantly  the best ice cream in seminyak nitrogenie  its expensive for bali prices but worth every cent
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: ordered breakfast there this morning the food was just ok the service was slow and the coffee average
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: except you are shopping die harder otherwise better walk around this area much to see and avoid car or other vehicles the traffic jam unbelievable
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a good drop off point and that is about it the shops are fairly average but the streets all around have excellent options the markets out the front have good cheap shirts and trinkets and the vendors arent pushy
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a good place to use as a central known point for drop off we got dropped off here via our hotel or taxis and walked and wandered our way around shopping at stallsthere are decent market stalls here too
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the square offers a mini mart which is a plus especially when it beats paying hotel and restaurant prices for iced cold colas  beer it offers decent souvenir shop for those who cant resist having to get something for that someone back home offers a little fish spa experience and hair braiding coupled with a coffee shop  bistro  the mini mart stocks the renowned bali coffee coupled with the world renowned leuwak coffee perfect for take home gifts a bottle store along with a few other outlets are available with a not so exhausting market for those who find bargaining in kuta to exhausting given its magnitude and level of patience required to put it mildly this square is no day drip trip so dont expect to be blown away by the abundance of shopping opportunity if thats what you are aiming for
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: must say for a supposed up market part of town this leave a lot to be desired would suggest you look elsewhere
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good shopping restaurants and bars in this area try avoid coming by car as the traffic is manic if your local then walk haggle in all market stalls
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: good place for shopping but very expensive to get something even gifts are so expensive  many places to eat good indonesian foods but also expensive
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: lots of bars and a variety of shops something for everyone zappas is very good for live music every night but sunday is best night
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: stay ed in the hotel there which was excellent however the market shops were very overpriced compared to other places in bali did not buy anything good coffee shophuge gift shop which was very expensive also but did canvas photo reproductions at a great price other retail shops in the square also pricey
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: checked out seminyak square while staying locally a few weeks agowe found the vendors in the square to be the most expensive wed come across in bali  this was my th visit the square is lacking in both atmosphere  varietythere is a liquor shop there with some reasonable prices for bali  a couple of places to eat as well as some high priced western surf clothing type shopsit backs onto eat street though where you can find a large variety of great food at good prices we had steak pizza pasta japanese mexican  seafood on this trip  the food here was of the highest quality ive had the pleasure to eat in balii certainly wont bother going to seminyak square again but your mileage may vary
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i was very disappointed with seminyak square shopping was very limited in variety with quite ridiculous prices for bali especially for goods neither handmade or from the local area i would not waste my time returning
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we came to bali for a resort holiday and seminyak shopping was not for us if you want a true bali experience it may be for you we found it hot no surprise there smelly and dirty with a lot of rubbish numerous hawkers in your face all the time narrow streets and cheap items that didnt interest us could be what others are looking for but not us
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak certainly has taken off  in my opinion this area is busier with traffic than kuta many more people hassling you on the street and traffic is bumper to bumper not the best shopping experience in bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we were there in the morning perhaps there is more vendors as the day goes on the bakery is really good
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: went here to look for a health shop that was advertised on google and in the mall nobody heard of it and nowhere to find tho
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak square is a great area where a taxi can drop you of in order to go to one of the many famous restaurants ultimo cafe bali chandi etcc etcc square has some interesting and upmarket shops
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we went in thinking we would see some real clothing deals sadly anything of quality was nz prices some slightly moremy suggestion check out all the restaurants and nicknack stores they are interestingmassages are good value and a nice way to unwind
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: like any other malls this one only caters the high ends nothing much to see besides expensive stuff not what a tourist would want to go to good for cooling down with aircond
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: i liked seminyak square not as pushy as legian or kuta and everything was in walking distance would definitely go back
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: quite small but a nice selection of shops and outside stalls much better than the over priced mall next door grabbed some great bargains from the sale at quicksilver and had a super breakfast at the tiger palm restaurant if you are near go and visit but its not worth travelling for
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: hardly any stalls was expecting to spend a few hours looking around ended up lasting about  minutes then ventured outside the square to the rest of the shopping
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there are several little boutiques a little pricey i would not recommend purchasing souvenirs here there are many more souvenir shops near legian beach and tanah lot temple that have better souvenirs its a nice area to visit eat and hang out the roads are narrow and it can be crowded
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great location with a few restaurants and shops to wander throughit has a hotel in the end and a small market with mainly womens dresses for sale
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: having spent most of annual holidays in thailand we are used to the craziness of bangkok but seminyak square is bangkok on steroidsi read up as much as i could before arriving on the island but nothing can compare to the reality once you arrive seminyak square is bonkers hundreds of taxis scooters and motorcycles adorn the roads with small pavements on the streets so you are constantly walking among the traffic as a couple we found it to be too busy and didnt envy young families fighting with a pushchairwe live in cardiff wales which is also a bustling city but seminyak square is certainly not for the faint hearted
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a super duper saver souvenir square lots of touristy stuff to buy street venders as well as market shopping i found lots of great bargains jewelry for my nieces and kids dresses for myself bargains to be hadthe market shopping is also value priced so i was able to find quite a few things for my other family members as wellthee was a wine store restaurants and a flea market type setup there are tons of open air market shopping areas as well as stores boutiques bars etcthis was the central area for this resort spot hotels surrounded the beach is on one side and it is easily accessibleif you are into shopping this is a musthit stop
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: they have decent options for souvenirs visit if staying in nearby area visited on a weekday afternoon when it was not crowded
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is a shopping shopping shopping orientated activity and although from walking around there seems to be some more unique type stores it was far too overcrowded for me after walking around for a while my only intention was to leave if your good with crowds and want a shopping experience youll love it i personally didnt like it
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: dont waste your time there unless if you happen to be around and need to cool down for few minutesi changed money there at the highest possible ratekept my dollars in my hands until i laid hands on the idrs and counted themthe man tried many tricks with me but failed all the wayi grabbed the money and then gave him the dollarsi asked him to change another but he refused to do it then i faced him with his failure to cheat me and gave him the big finger i ruined his daybeen to bali bakery in raya kuta in january so i thought i try the one in seminyakthey did not have my favourite drink  caramelized ice tea and their menu was very poor and the place was empty i walked offwe had dinner at the fancy restaurant in the front of the mallit was ok but nothing specialavoid that area if you can
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: why is this a tourist attraction this is literally only shopping there is nothing historic nothing interesting and nothing to do here but shop as you may have guessed i do not like or respect shopping
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this was such a nice place to shop and explore the people in the market were not pushy and didnt feel pressured into buying things lots of places to eat and drink also
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: this is the centre of all activities in seminyak it has restaurants malls  outlets  local cuisine shops and some brand outlets  its quite a tourist attraction which you can make out by seeing the number of westernersa good spot for a bite or just browsing if in no mood to shop however you do get some nice bargains if you look at the right spots should not be missed
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: not very much to say only limited quantity of shops available normally the hotel you stay will organise the transfer to this location or you can get a taxi that are very affordable there but make sure that you will negotiate with the driver the fare before the travel
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: well if you are foreigners seminyak square its best place for shoping becouse is very close from central in kuta also many good restaurant close by the shoping center all the stuff there is very good quality but also expensive
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: wide range of places to eat that are affordable and tasty big convenient store for all your small goods needs nice little market great place to sit back and relax before heading off to shop againalways go to seminyak square when in bali
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the shopping centre is busy with good collection of shops quality souvenirs at a price could get cheaper elsewhere within the square is a flea market sellling cheaper clothes sunglasses etc the toilets were clean  the place well maintained behind the square is seminyak village which is a newer complex more upmarket  air conditioned
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: found kuta a better place to shop quality shops with regular set prices good souvenir shopping hassled by traders outside one guy wanted  aus for a simple bottle opener then yelled at me for not buying glad to get back to the pool on a very hot day
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: probably one of the more useful shopping places better quality stuff theres even a place near there that sells australian wine more importantly it has an amazing salon called jazb definitely go check it out devy the lady who did my nails was amazing and the owner penny was lovely too worth spending a tiny bit extra for the quality
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the selection around the square is ok we ended up going to kuta instead as they have better selection for a day of shopping
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: my last visit here was in july  and i particularly enjoyed shopping at lilla lane for jewelry and at mega batik for souvenirs i got a lot of kopi luwak gifts fans soaps and jewelry boxes at mega batik the prices were not bad at all
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: quite new mal in the busy seminyak centre with very nice poshy shops but very expensiveat night the roof of this mall changed in different colours
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the center of seminyak village seminyak square is a great place to shop the businesses here are excellent i even found a great place to have my hair cut cool and sexy the food stores and staff are outstanding
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: in hot and muggy seminyak a cool respite like seminyak square and its adjacent seminyak village is a chance to browse and take a break in comfort incidentally its also perfect for shelter when it rains the shops are upmarket with goods and prices to match outside the square are a choice of restaurants cafes and small stores worth discovering for budget travellers even the carpark has popup vendors hawking wares under canopy to shield the suns rays touts approach tourists to propose local island tours good place to hire a vehicle witth a driver who speaks english
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: new mall at seminyak square with a fabulous roof top spa called the spa great treatments in a very zen environment be sure to be careful when you leave in a relaxed state of mind so that you dont fall into the water surrounding the path leading up to the entrance as i did visited here many times during my stay and loved it
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: its probably a place where everyone goes to its centrally located theres starbucks sisterfield cafe surfs shop restaurant everything in  spot near the seminyak village shopping ctr but at night super will be super jam
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: we were staying in seminyak area so the square was a good walk around it with lots of shops local and internationalthere is also a big pharmacy at the square itself offering everything from cosmetics to medicine
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the chic shopping arcade comprised with expensive boutique shops and its not the place for bargain fashion when me and my wife arrived there at around pm there were little or no people around and seems extremely quiet place however the arcade located in a nice location where only mins walk from my hotel the ulin villa  spa and there were number of nice restaurants nearby so no problem to fill up your empty stomachthere was a chinese restaurant for peking style duck but seems expensive and worth to try other local restaurant instead
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: it has good location to encounter from any direction the arcade building itself is not too big there is a hotel upside this building it looks huge the outlets themselves are not complete according to me
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the good thing about seminyak square is they have parking lots and it is really helpful for those that visiting seminyak area by driving the shops and the food outlets are soso but the toilets are cleans plus you can find an authorize money changer the atm machines and a book store
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: just one level of shops a few restaurants and a place to buy souvenirs and local food stuff i didnt mind the shop too much cos there was much to see just have to pay a little bit more some of the handicrafts are really pretty not a bad way to spend some time there
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: the square itself is pretty ordinary  a few brand boutiques that are really expensive  a few restaurants in the square that are just ok the little markets are sweet but way more expensive the the strip markets of kuta and legian and the stall owners little tolerance for negotiation the only really nice thing about the square is the super cool little bar called dovetail at the entrance cool music nice and reasonably priced menu  limited choices as its predominantly offering really good authentic fresh cocktails and i mean really goodso if you wander to the square make sure you stop at dovetail which is its only redeeming feature
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: seminyak is a great place to find balinese accessories for you they will offer different price for local tourist and international tourist kinda overrated
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: there is not very much to experience in seminyak it is almost the same as legian kuta and canggu kuta is actually the worst and in seminyak are a bit less tourist wich is nice apart from that dont go there if u dont really want to
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: place for shopping in bali when you are stay at seminyak areaalso a lot of restaurants to take dinner or lunchnot so crowded place
Name: Seminyak Square

Review: great shopping area and is a lot cleaner than the shops in the street nice restaurants and cafes and well worth a visit if you are in nusa dua
Name: Bali Collection

Review: very quiet but that has to be expected due to coronavirus i will say the one of the best stores is the corner store but if you are over a size  there is absolutely no shopping for you at bali collection
Name: Bali Collection

Review: shops not as diverse and expensive supermarket was twice more expensive than any other place i went to to top it off shuttle bus didnt come according to the schedule on the website and taxi mafia who didnt allow grab or gojek wanted to charge twice the amount
Name: Bali Collection

Review: always visit when in bali good to stock up on supplies to take back to your hotel some great trinkets jewelry and clothes not as cheap as the markets but worth the extra to shop in comfort
Name: Bali Collection

Review: nice place good atmospheremany retail and nice restaurantreasonable pricefree shuttle bus from hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is an open air plaza style shopping forum with only the actual shops having ac and being protected from the elements all items sold are via fixed prices you can buy all the standard bali tourist souvenirs available anywhere between kuta to ubudall be it at slightly inflated and fixed prices this is not the place to buy copyfake brand name items it is also not a factory outlet centre with the associated discounts everything sold here is the genuine article and current seasonal styles the prices are the same as any retail store in australia eg billabong board shorts aud there are definitely sales to be had however once again the sale prices are the same discountprice as in australia visit bali collection if you are over your resort first world problem or you need some decent clothes to wear whilst in bali
Name: Bali Collection

Review: so yes u can find everything u need here since staying in nusa dua means its far away from everything and since your resort provides shuttle svc here y not otherwise save ur wants to other parts in bali cos its pricey hereeverything here are more expensive than the other areas in balithis place is huge explore since ure there otherwise i recommend bebek tepi sawah for food the servings are huge
Name: Bali Collection

Review: over priced shopping centre i thought it was outlet shopping but defiantly not also a very unreliable hotel transfer bus go to the beach instead
Name: Bali Collection

Review: almost everything you bred or not plenty of restaurants and shops of all kindssome with entertainment
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i enjoyed going here in between getting massages and sitting on the beachthe spas were not very good though very expensive compared to the local spas outside of the main nusa dua gate and their quality was not good
Name: Bali Collection

Review: worth a visit if you are in surrounding areas has a great array of restaurants and supermarkets as well
Name: Bali Collection

Review: do not go to bali collectionits a rip offthe restaurants like prada  tropical etc pull you in  if you dare to go back  you will get lesser food  lesser service please don t complain as they don t care
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i went to shopping in bali collection for few times they have full service and good staff and nice brand
Name: Bali Collection

Review: awesome time at bali collection large variety of shops carrying everything from candles to clothes to eatables visited twice during our  day visit as we found the gift shops there were well worth the trip
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great variety of stores not all trinket shops extensive clothing beach wear and souvenirs short walk from club med on a cement or tiled pathway along the beach foreshore open till pm which was ideallots of restaurants had a great meal  drinks and coffee at bemos friendly staff and very reasonable prices fantasy coffee
Name: Bali Collection

Review: why one would want to visit the mall whilst in bali as opposed to the local shopping astounds me  they provide free pick up from surrounding hotels assume this is the only way to get the crowd in it is fine if you like mall shopping we visited on the way the the bali theater to watch devdan
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the complex mainly conveys restaurants and art markets there are a pharmacy and a convenience store but they have limited itemsthe complex looks old and quiet
Name: Bali Collection

Review: nice choice of shops friendly people therenice restaurants and some live music is greatyou will spend a nice time there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: free shuttle was provided by bali collection we took the pickup from our hotel sofitel with  hour interval in the afternoon shopped at polo mostly are those made locallywe then took a taxi that costed usd  to amarterra villas for dinner only to realize the hotel was just next door within walking distance i did enquire a lady and a gentlemen working there at the reception but both never mentioned the walking distance so it was very disappointed that the staff there were not helpful even the taxi driver took advantage and drove so slowly next time better do our own research before going there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: just literally across the road from our hotel grand hyatt plenty of restaurants to choose from catering for all tastes and budgets not undercover so be prepared to get extremely wet when it rains which it does oftenrange of shops from gift shops to the likes of polo quiksilver billabong supermarket pharmacy optician and a baskin robbins ice cream shoppolo shop have up to  off so you can grab a bargain hererecommend visiting you could probably spend up to a couple of hours herecomes alive at night
Name: Bali Collection

Review: easy place to do some basic shopping while breaking from beach lot of local stuff and sports goods did not try yet food corners but theres a lot of them with many tastes
Name: Bali Collection

Review: cool area with many different shops and restaurant much bigger area then we first thought we spent hours here worth a visit
Name: Bali Collection
