Review: bali collection is in the nusa dua area its a open area shopping complex with a lot of restaurants some restaurants offer pick up and drop off services to hotels in the nusa dua areatheres an art market with competitive prices best to check a few of the local shops that offer the same items to compare the pricesthere are several spas offering massages and reflexology toothe only unpleasant experience is taxi vendors consistently pushing people to use their taxis at inflated prices upon exiting the complex through the west gate
Name: Bali Collection

Review: good spot for mainstream and boutique shopping you can enjoy a tasty lunch or some pampering to break up the day
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we were staying across from the bali collection at the grand hyatt visited here most days had everything we needed great resteraunts massages hair braiding supermarket chemist and market style shopping for any of the bali souvenirs some things were pricey but i really didnt mind the convenience was great super clean highly recommended
Name: Bali Collection

Review: perfect service the staff have made the vacation a perfecexperience with friendly nature and great conversationthe food is delicious at every restaurant even in the dining room  the onsite dishes have lots of delicous dishes and very delicious afternoon tea can be done with more salty foods at afternoon teathe villa is perfect maintain perfect with both cleaning services that occur at breakfast or dinner the pool is fantastic and the jacuzzi is fantastic the shower was at a great pressure and of course the automatic restroom was a nice touch excellent use of all the spaces through the villas extremely comfortable beds and pillows
Name: Bali Collection

Review: enjoying the afternoon at bali collection also shopping at some place they have sogo inside the placeprice a bit higher than other location or market
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is a good little collection of shops bars and restaurants in anotherwise pretty sterile area of bali apart fron the beach resorts nusa dua has little to offer tourists so bali collection is a great addition to the area great selection of restaurants and good little boutique stores as well as major luxury brands there is also a small department store well wort a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we regularly visited the bali collection during our stay at the novotel it has some really nice restaurants where we dined on several occasions there are some really large souvenir shops with a good range of local arts and crafts we were there at a quiet time and so there was a fare amount of pressure to come and try different restaurants you can try the sucking fish massage  but i found it too ticklish to sustain
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a good collection of shops and restaurants a good place to come if you arent keen on the bartering style of bali shopping in the markets
Name: Bali Collection

Review: strangely quiet good variety of shops in this rambling open air mall but you need a taxi car or bus to get there hot humid weather on the day did not help the experience
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great mallmap given by security guard gave us easy directions where to find everything needed from clothing to supermarket to restaurants to art and souvenirs at reasonable prices no being hassled for a sale at allmall supposedley doesnt allow go jek similar to uber taxi service to pick you up from mall but can order down the roadthat was only downsideotherwise great place to visit and lots of shade during the heat
Name: Bali Collection

Review: ate at an italian place at the west gate awful food marked up at ridiculous prices would have been better off having dinner at my hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: nice place to shoping in nusa dua area in this places you can enjoy you shop and eat because thera alot of restaurant with many varient of menu
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the eateries are all very good and due to the large number of them the prices are very competitive the local supermarket for supplies is a little expensive thoughcheck your exchange rates to make sure you are not paying through the nose for things
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we visited the bali collection several times while staying at nusa dua as theres a free shuttle bus there from some of the resorts there are many restaurants and shops spanning over a long open air mall theres security at the entrances and clean amenities theres a pharmacy and convenience store water drinks and snacks are expensive catch a taxi to hardys nusa dua super cheap and a bigger variety
Name: Bali Collection

Review: love the shops  wished the restaurants were equally exciting love the staff at cold stone creamery they make our visits always so fun
Name: Bali Collection

Review: overpriced  not really worth it good as a place to grab some limited groceries if you are desperate but you can get cheaper elsewhere little shuttles run from the hotels
Name: Bali Collection

Review: weve been every time on our half dozen visits to bali always seem to end up hereits got a great relaxed and secure feel and there are plenty of shops and restaurants and it looks really good at night theres really no alternatives to this placemy only comment would be that the shops are a little expensive but as i said theres not much competition apart from haggling out on the street and we are past doing thatas other reviewers have said you can get a free shuttle to and from and there are a number of resorts that are located within short walking distance ie shuttle then walk back and jump in your poolthe only thing i think is missing really are some roadside stall type operations which gave a real bali experience that you dont find here nowback in  this was a very special place with lots of stalls and hair braiding being done outside under the shade of a tree and it was a great experienceas i said earlier if youre visiting this area you really need to visit and you wont be disappointed except perhaps on some of the prices but the convenience and relaxed atmosphere always make it worthwhile for us
Name: Bali Collection

Review: good shops all international brands but expensive even bottled water is expensive here as compared to other areas but offers going on at least as of now lot of restaurants all good
Name: Bali Collection

Review: shopping mainly and dinning outlets the resort provides free shuttle in an hourly base till late at night it is not a cheap shopping by bali standards but organized onesome of the restaurants are very goodnice evening outlet
Name: Bali Collection

Review: good restaurants but the hygiene is not optimal there are good indian restaurant was very good and friendly staff
Name: Bali Collection

Review: food is good some of the branded shops are available but too expensive to buy souvenirs there better price available outside
Name: Bali Collection

Review: regularly visited bali collection for shopping dinner massages and decadent salon experiences a cheaper alternative than the resorts and good quality
Name: Bali Collection

Review: too many hard surfaces too little shade and the products for sale were repetitive the handicrafts were overpriced and there was very little choice the restaurants were bland and could have been anywhere in the world not our style at allfor those looking for supermarket items the coco was more expensive than any other supermarket  including coco supermarkets in nusa dua
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this shopping and eating precinct is in the resort complex at nusa dua we visited to go to the cocos supermarket and restock on essentials there is a myriad of upmarket shops and restaurants presented in a very nice walk through mall of course expect to pay a bit more in a resort precinct such as this
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we visited this several time while we stayed in the nusa dua area it is a good alternative to hotel restaurants and shops however expect it to be overrated as well due to its main focus being turistsyou may find some imported articles in their shops too if looking for something in particular from abroad
Name: Bali Collection

Review: it was lovely and cheap but there were statues of genitals in one of the stores absolutely inappropriate for an area with children
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we stayed at nearby awarta resort and spa nusa dua so  minutes walk was close it was new year period so lots of tourists shopping and eating the place is fairly clean safe and easy to get around and most of the restaurants quite reasonable but prices are comparable to our resort where the food was outstanding its aimed at tourists is overpricedsimilar to buying clothesshoes and dining etc in australia for convenience and close access to food shopping and supermarket needs its good but loses any real bali influence and could be a shopping centrefood location almost anywhere but for tourists for whom its clearly designed it delivers all they likely want the guys they have at each main access point can get you a taxi quickly and most resorts like awarta will drop you there and pick you up even when you are dining there in lieu of at the resort where we predominantly did have dinner given the superior quality of food and not as manic with tourists as the bali collection and prices were very similar
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the place offers everything from restaurants bars and cafes good alternative to the hotel kitchenbar sometimes appears a bit pricy compared to other touristy parts of china
Name: Bali Collection

Review: overpriced crowded of russians place st last it will be approximately  symbols there is enough now
Name: Bali Collection

Review: accessible by shared shuttle visiting the resorts in nusa dua or even within walking distance from some this is orientated towards tourists and has the coco supermarket sogo as well as many restaurants and boutique shopswe only had a light dinner at coco cafe and got a few supplies from the supermarket i expected more and we only went once preferring to have our dinners at our hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: certainly a tourist trap compared with the main bali mall near the galleriaeverything was over priced including the food which was average at best at the japanese restaurant we went best to skip this place and ask the locals to go where the balinese go
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is balis version of chapel st its a walk through open air shopping mall with shops like a pharmacy a few clothing homewares and restaurants ate at a restaurant and was rather expensive nothing really outstanding and cant recall the name of the joint but was good for the photo opportunity and just to sit down and relax a bit the hotel had a free on the hour shuttle which was exciting because its an open air transporter and got to see some of nusa dua via that method for no cost
Name: Bali Collection

Review: ok if you want to go to shops like you have back in nz then probably you will love this placerestaurants all a bit the same but cheaper than the hotel we were at blah
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great shops at reasonable prices variety of restaurants and branded as well as local stuff shops shuttle great convenients
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is a high end shopping mall with a mix of branded stores and lots of restaurantsmany nusa dua hotels will have a free shuttle service although i walked it there and back a few timeswe visited here during out first evening to stock up in the small supermarket and browse for any halal restaurants they have a few here but their website is of no help in this regardi found many of the shops to be expensive it must be aimed at tourists than the localsthe sogo store had more staff than customers in fact it was overstaffed each table would have an assistant greeting you so if you walked from one end to the store to the other you have  people spaced a few meters apart saying hello to you and you have to greet them backi also noticed that if any shopper picked an item up they would get pounced on as if they were a suspected shoplifter it might explain why there were so few people in the store
Name: Bali Collection

Review: plenty of shopping and lots of restaurants the shops are mainly high end surf clothing and beach style stores billabong surfer girl that sort of stuff we enjoyed walking around for a couple of hours but there wasnt anything worth going there for if youre not staying in a nusa dua resort its just a nice place to shop around if you want to escape a hotel youre staying at nearby
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the main shop is sogo the department store selling mainly western brands and local artefacts at expensive prices but great airconditioning there are quite a few tourist shops selling the same stuff  unfortunately not many of the shops were airconditioned which made it uncomfortable to shop in the heatwave there is a reasonably priced watson  pharmacy the toilets are very clean the free shuttle bus is worth using but runs only every hour from  to late in the evening
Name: Bali Collection

Review: many places to eat with different cousines as well as marketsdidnt visit all the restaurant as there are a lot of them but from what i found out its more of the same as most nusa dua restaurantsquality to price not so worthystill a good place to eat if you dont want to go far from the hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place to visit but massages too expensive and shops sell at full retail souvenirs much cheaper in kuta bad experience in restaurant with menu pricing incorrect and what was advertised not on the menu disappointing
Name: Bali Collection

Review: if you stay in nida dua area this is must visit place in evening there is not much for vegetarians but great place to hangout
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this area is good for every tourist in bali for eating and drinking with many kind of cafe and restaurantsthere are many shops but ready to cheat every tourist with very high pricesthe rates compared with other places minimum doubled
Name: Bali Collection

Review: lots of restaurants shops and souvenirs also you can walk through to the beach most hotels in nusa dua offer transfers here at no chargebring your swimmers and walk out to agendaz beach club
Name: Bali Collection

Review: went there with some friends and their families did the hair knitting for my twins and had lovely conversation with an australian tourist whom visiting bali quite frequentlythe place was better than before and it is more lively now a lot of entertainment  different food choices and also good shopping options
Name: Bali Collection

Review: had many restaurants optionshopping venuesreasonable price compare to nusa dua areawe have lunch here
Name: Bali Collection

Review: they sell whiteningbleaching content so be careful of what you pick up also some places i feel they treated us like a criminal due to whatever stereotypes they are accustomed to buying into they clearly dont encourage minorities that are darker or mixed to shop in the area they also dont carry sizes for people like my boyfriend who have larger feet for example there is clearly a target audience and it was uncomfortable to say the least plus they practice cultural appropriation with the braiding despite the hairstyle is black and more for those of african decent yes if you have this in your hair and youre not black you are wrong they are again appealing to a target audience that isnt us there also isnt very many places to shop in my opinion especially for jewelry the restaurants are worth it though so we mainly went for lunch they are also very pushy to sell you everything and anything if you want something to get for souvenirs id say go to the museums or cultural park in the area instead to get more ideal things the supermarket there is good for if you left a few things or need something like pads or soap for example just be wary if youre black and get in and get out
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection has restaurants spas art gifts clothing supermarket department store sogo  a one stop shopping complex an open air mall that is a pleasure to visit i go most times i visit bali and the aircon in starbucks is a joy very hot mid day the evening lights are attractive and live music at some restaurants create a good atmosphere
Name: Bali Collection

Review: tons of restaurants for the number of tourists there tried a couple mediocre food at the bestlots of massage places to get ok massage compared to crazy prices at hotels in the area
Name: Bali Collection

Review: came bcos of free transportnice place if you would like to have a meal hereshopping is better done elsewhere as everything here is seriously over pricedthis is not bali
Name: Bali Collection

Review: pretty nice spot in nusa dua for hanging out shopping or simply have a bite with plenty of shops groceries and restaurants stretched in quite a big securitied area even though much more expensive than this kind of places in kuta i found it elegant and stylish worth spending a bit more to be there keep in mind if using grab that some of the drivers refusing getting in there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: lovely clean shopping centre with great access and lots of toilets great choice of restaurants shops used a few times to exchange cash and a good rate and stocked up on snacks and drinks cheaper than our hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we had quite a few meals here without repeating the restuarant and all experiences were great apart from nice restaurants there are few nice shipping places you can spend whole of your evening if you are with family and have a lots of fun
Name: Bali Collection

Review: it is what it says a modern mall to shop with chain brands and restaurants and cafes not really bali but if you like shopping
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i personally dont enjoy shopping much but this place has more than that there are heaps of restaurants here and fantastic clothes and souvenir shops  it is a little pricey youre definitely paying western prices for things here
Name: Bali Collection

Review: good place for shopping and eatery tourist plc expensive restaurant is delicious but higher price they have taxi service but with their own price and they will try to match with grab price nice place to visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a big area built mainly for tourists restaurants are costly however staffs are polite and friendly only went there for breakfast and daily groceries apart from that nothing much really special
Name: Bali Collection

Review: as wouldve expected prices were not worth the good staff were arrogant and unapproachable ok for a look around but not worth purchasing froma better shopping option would be the local markets where locals are happy to bargain and keen to engage with tourists
Name: Bali Collection

Review: taxi drivers are not friendly and online taxi booking is not allowed we were forced to use their taxi service and they are rude while talking to us stores there are boring for us we didnt buy anything but just walking over had very bad experience at this place i dont recommend this place for visit but somewhere nearby these is a nice dirty duck restaurant with very good view and reasonable price you should visit it
Name: Bali Collection

Review: its a good area to walk around and do some shopping with a bunch of good restaurants dotted arounddefinitely the touristy area of bali with all the nearby top notch hotelscant find a place that showed sport sadly the rugby world cup was on
Name: Bali Collection

Review: for a change of atmosphere from the hotel restaurants the bali collection was a nice place to hang out and have dinner they provide shuttle service from most hotels which is niceshopping is good too for souvenirs other brands are regular priced as your home country probably
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we visited this complex and to tell you the truth we were not expecting a great deal we were mainly looking for a restaurant for dinner there were so many nice places to eat it was very hard to choose onethe shops were up market with some of the biggest names in attendance such as quicksiver nike polo to name a fewwell be back tomorrow
Name: Bali Collection

Review: very expensive can buy cheaper at the markets down the road  its lovely and clean and if course the people are wonderful  helpful and friendly
Name: Bali Collection

Review: worth spending an hour for a quiet shopping stroll all prices are pretty standard western so dont expect bargains lots of restaurants for meals essentially established to service all the  star resorts in the area a couple of supermarkets for last minute grocery items if required
Name: Bali Collection

Review: easy access to souvenirs had a higher price some other shops selling clothing and sweets bought coffee to but again at a higher price than seen elsewhereshuttle buses make this a convenient option as i was on business and had little time to shop aroundsome nice bars and restaurants too with live music later at night
Name: Bali Collection

Review: everything you might needshopspharmacyjewellery handcrafted souvenirs restaurants spa friendly staffgreat food
Name: Bali Collection

Review: plenty choice of food common balineese atmosphere and also there were entnique and modern products arround on the shops within the area
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is very nice great for shopping great price for some souvenir better than the market sometimes i just made the shop i do not know about bar and restaurant
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we found bali collection to be expensive and very commercialized you can buy the same item for  of the prize elsewhere in bali if you are nicely dressed or you are white anglo looking people the shop attendance will go out of their way to suck up to you and bow to you
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place to shop in bali as you are not constantly pestered by vendors pushing their waresthe price you see is pretty much the price you pay be aware a lot of the prices are quoted in us dollars
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we enjoyed strolling around airconditioned shops but the prices were expensive compared to the markets down the street there was more up market items to purchase though very clean and a good choice ofllaces to eat
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is a great shopping outlet with loads of different shops for people of all ages and so many amazing restaurants it is worth shopping around in the different shops if you see something you want because different shops have different offers onthere are so many different restaurants to choose from from italian and asian to australian and american i would highly recommend try gourmet cafe which is on the left hand side as you go through the main gate the food is amazingthe opening hours for the shops are am to pm but most of the restaurants are open lateri would definitely recommend visiting this complex whether it be for food or shopping
Name: Bali Collection

Review: you can find anything you may need here including tampons other posts say you cant them but you can find them here
Name: Bali Collection

Review: appalling tourist trap without a figment of authenticity of real bali created to serve those who like buying rubbish and in a shopping centre in a hotel enclave keep well awayyou have just so many better options
Name: Bali Collection

Review: horrible racist security guard and employees followed my wife around the entire store while looking around they were uncomfortably way too close to our personal space finally had to yell at them and left the store dont shop here
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is basically a spinoff of mainstream bali shopping streets its technically a mall but nothing compared to lippo or beachwalkhowever if you are staying at nusa dua and do not want to travel to the main districts like kuta legian etc for shopping then this is your best option they organise a free shuttle service to all major hotels ans resort in the vicinity they have a mix of branded and local merchandise at a reasonable price good selection of restaurants cafes and spas good for kids too as they have a play area and a lot of open spaceif the purpose of your visit is to just relax by the beach and stay cocooned in the resort then this may be a good choice for a stroll and shop just to break the monotony
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a small shopping area with eateries spa and convenience stalls prices are higher than elsewhere but i went there due to free transport
Name: Bali Collection

Review: good if you are not on an all inclusive package at your hotel but still quite expensive to eat and shop there nice for a wander if you fancy a change from the beach
Name: Bali Collection

Review: not a bargain destination but worth the time restaurants were varied and reasonable price shopping was good but lots of the shops sell the same products at the same price
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is an outdoor collection of shops fixed price in nusa dua with mostly restaurants shopping is a secondary reason to come herei guess its an alternative to the hotel restaurants in the areagets pretty hot unless you are in an air conditioned shop restaurants and bars are open air with good fans for cooling
Name: Bali Collection

Review: excellent collection of shops restaurants cafes and bars in nusa dua very reasonably priced and really relaxing place to spend time
Name: Bali Collection

Review: slice of the modern world in nusa dua security to get in so you are quite safe and its not intrucive iv been here twice now and dont even realise the security its large with lots of modern shops such as billabong  roxy aling with little boutique stores bali department stores supermarkets restuarants  little speciality stores and starbucks the art  cultural east end is pretty especially at night at the other end you walk out to the pastika museum and beach district
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is usually a daily visit for usso many restaurants to choose from a short walk from our hotel and has all the necessities such as pharmacy snacks alcohol souvenirs and pamperingit has expanded since our last visit but the workers are always friendly and warm
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great shopping complex full of shops and restaurants less than  minutes walk away from the hotel we stayed in
Name: Bali Collection

Review: wow this place is nice air conditioned and comfort shopping but the prices are so expensive i dont know how anyone can afford to too much shopping here outside these shops though were some really nice restaurants to eat at so many had happy hour and many pick you up and drop you back to your hotel which is really handy in nusa dua
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collections is okay nice and clean good variety of shops and restaurants staying at nusa dua is limiting as there are only beachfront resorts so no mingling with the locals at the local shops and markets so you are pretty much confined to bali collections unless you want to get a taxi to go elsewhere i did walk one day but it took about  minutes it was hot and confusing as to where the local market was once i got there there was not a lot of variety and it wasnt big bali collections is fairly expensive as far as the shops go same prices as back home in melbourne restaurants haggle you to come in and try their food with the promise of a taxi ride back to your resort well double check that before you go in as we got conned a couple of times once told it was the drivers day off funny getting told that after our meal and another occasion had to wait ages then we were crammed into a mini bus with heaps of others nusa dua is fine if you want to get away from everything and completely relax but if you want to mix with the locals stay elsewhere bali collections offers other meals apart from eating at your resort which if like me get sick of that after a couple of days
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we chose the laguna restaurant as they promised a hamburger when we were seated they said a hamburger was not available so i chose fish and chips which was inedible i wrote a scathing review which they either did not read or ignored then went to the supermarket and were surprised at how expensive everything was a can of coke cost  equivalent at the nearby co co supermarket it normally cost  cents equivalent but was on special for  cents in bali for three weeks but one visit to the collection was enough
Name: Bali Collection

Review: has everything you could be looking since being upgradeddefinelty worth checking out and having a look aroundnot as big as kuta shopping mall but is a very nice touch as the hotel stores can be pricey which is expected being a  star locationif you are looking for top quality visit resort storesfor everything else bali collection is there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: its a tourist village with souvenior shops and some restaurants the restaurants are cheaper than hotels but they have all the international menus not so specialized into one type cuisine
Name: Bali Collection

Review: plenty of good restaurants to choose from and lots of shops for clothes groceries and souvenirs also have a chemist hairdressers and massage parlours definitely worth a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: once you recover from the traffic chaos and lack of pavements in nusa dua the area around bali collections is very nice and clean lots of shops and various restaurants dearest meal was an indian which cost us  which is dear for bali so impressed with all staff in our hotel restaurants and shops as the balinese people were so friendly and welcoming
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this shoppng mall located in centre of nusa dua area there is balinese souveniers and choise of restaurant to lunch or dinner they have shuttle bus for arround there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we have been many times to bali and the bali collectionthe bali collection is getting very run downit used to be a hive of activity and people everywherea walk through the centre will shoe ponds and fountains not working and a general lack of maintainencethey have also stopped the shuttle bus from bali collection to hotels with a subsquent increase in taxi fare costall in all i will not be rushing back to the bali collection
Name: Bali Collection

Review: what a find  a short walk from hotel shops department store eateries massagebeauty services and free shuttle bus to most local hotels
Name: Bali Collection

Review: everything in one place with no haggling great eating places can be more expensive than the markets but you dont have to barter the price
Name: Bali Collection

Review: while the commercial center has more stores to offer prices are ridiculously highready to spend go for itotherwise shop elsewhere
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this place has it all  massages dining pharmacy supermarkets department store and more from our experience the prices in the shops werent that much more than buying at the markets or beachside if youre not too worried about prices this is a comfortable and clean shopping experience
Name: Bali Collection

Review: took a look around but pretty much same as you get everywhere and money changers giving a terrible exchange rate
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great range of boutiques souvenirs and housewares shops are quite up market and fixed price so no bargaining needed not too busy and very relaxing to browse with no pressure to buy
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a great local place to if you want to leave the resort grand hyatt walking distance plenty of restaurants to choose from despite being asked by every vendor to look at the menu i found them to be very polite when saying no thankyou or weve already eaten language barrier can be tuff there is a minimart style shop with everything from fresh food to souvenirs  clothing some of the food was hit and miss with the restaurants all in all a great place to explore close to grand hyatt
Name: Bali Collection

Review: loved the bali collection a mix of restaurants shopping little supermarkets and massages found the shopping very pricey but all the restaurants are great we ate in a different one each day and had plenty of massages there as well it was only a short walk from our resort so great for us
Name: Bali Collection

Review: stumbled across the collection by accident and really loved the quaintness of it needed afew grocery items and a pedicure and managed to get both there isnt a doubt in my mind that my shellac pedicure was perfection of the highest degree it was honestly the most perfect shellac pedicure ive ever had and ive had enough to knowtwo places in the collection do nails and only the one does shellac its also a hair salon and the male who did it is definetly a perfectionist  also got some takeaway pizza from a little italian restaurant there for my mum and the pizza was delicious
Name: Bali Collection

Review: ok to walk around especially at night many restaurants offer free transportshops more expensive than elsewhere
Name: Bali Collection

Review: verry nice aria stile european four shopping good restaurant and nice people food is is olso good an a loot of stile european and asia and usa
Name: Bali Collection

Review: our hotel provides a free shuttle bus too bali collection where there are dozens of shops restaurants and a coco supermarket which enables visitors to stock u on various items such as soft drinks beers coffees and food itemscoco provides a good range of basic shopping items which will ensure visitors dont have to pay the highly inflated hotel prices for such items as soft drinks beers and small food itemscoco also offers a good range of gift wares and bali souvenirsyou can get a taxi back from coco collection to most hotels in the area for irthe restaurants are also reasonably priced and most offer special deals to entice you to each and drink in their restaurantwell worth visiting
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place to have lunch and buy some souvenir if you just want in nusa dua area just walking distance
Name: Bali Collection

Review: found while wandering a very large shopping plaza mainly outdoor with dozens of places to eat probably  cheaper than the hotel restaurants on the peninsulatheres a couple of grocery stores but beware the brand shops are expensive
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection has many shops and restaurants to keep you busy for a whole day we ate at a few of the restaurants and the staff were friendly the service was great and the food was wonderful my wife found plenty of shops to spend the rest of our money so we had a great time
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a must see when visiting bali especially if you want to shop in a relaxed hassle free environment a good variety of shops eateries spas  bars the complex is big and we easily spent half a day wandering around
Name: Bali Collection

Review: prices to suit all budgets all conditioned close to resort cheap food a lovely walk each day if going after am take water with you the sun is so very hot
Name: Bali Collection

Review: large shopping centre but very touristy and most of the shops were very similar and not particularly interesting some market style souvenir shops some fashion shops a department store and some restaurantsit is an outdoor shopping centre so was very hot found it stifling hot in the morning but returned another day in the afternoon and there was a cooler sea breeze so was more pleasant to walk around then
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection was only a few minutes away from our villa kayumanis so we visited a few times great place for souvenirs and also for eating lunch we ate at a japanese restaurant here which was lovely and did a little bit of shopping too some of the stores are quite expensive but there are also some that are reasonable worth a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a good range of stores from home decor to souvenirs surf shops supermarket  massage  lots of restaurants there are free shuttle buses from hotels in the nusa dua area  most of the restaurants offer free transport also overall an enjoyable time  very clean  there is no hassling which is great
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we spent a couple of hours here its outdoors and hot so bring water and sunscreen shops are good value and plenty of places to eat or drink
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is a large complex with expensive shopping located inside well aieconditioned area outside there is a number for restaurants and small shops all quite expensive great to visit on the free shuttle bus to see the balaneese dance show
Name: Bali Collection

Review: clean shopping centre made fortourists but prices were the same or more as home they offer a free shuttle bus to and from your hotel lots of restaurants but very expensive for bali they have a good supermarket there where you can buy some aussie and european products its an easy walk to the beach to see the blow hole or have some drinks on the beach worth a visit but save your money for other parts of bali
Name: Bali Collection

Review: went here many times for either lunch or dinner and shoping and always had good experience very strategic location and nice eccess to go around the  stars hotels in nusa dua especially they have many restaurants with great selection from local to international very safe and relax here highly recommended
Name: Bali Collection

Review: worth the look around we got some good discounted sports clothing and shoes which were a bargain some of the food and drinks are more expensive than at your hotel usually a free bus to take you from the hotel to the mall but not sure how you get back the first time we just walked along the beach path which was good but very hot
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place for dinner if you want a break from your resort most placed are priced well for food wait for them to offer a  discount card before entering they all do it if you think you will walk away and that pays for the tax on the meal most places also offer free transport back to your hotel if you askplenty of restaurants to choose from atms supermarket for snacks drinks and alcohol well priced as for the shops its just a tourist trap with nothing of interest good time waster for a few hours out of the heat in the aircon spa treatments here are not bad quality and well priced the resorts have top quality treatments but  times the price
Name: Bali Collection

Review: its an relatively expensive shopping option but has a good range and verity so if youre into mass produced gift items this is a good place or if your stuck in nusa dua its specially aimed at tourists and tourist dollars better go shopping elsewherehowever the food options are good and varied better than the resort restaurants and slightly cheaper
Name: Bali Collection

Review: retail hair spas supermarket restaurants myerdavid jonestype shop souvenirs art markets  its really got it all not the cheap version of bali thats talked about  but quality is there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: nice place to walk around and look at the shops prices are expensive  we ate at  different restaurants which were ok  but i wouldnt eat there again all up stay in your hotel for food and shop somewhere else
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we stayed at one of the hotels within walking distance to bali collection and this was very convenient for us to spend an evening in it has several souvenir shops supermarket as well as lots of restaurants
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i love this shopping centre it as everything you need hairdresser spa for nails department store starbucks fashion shops like nautica  polo  so many great places to eat its a quiet  relaxing place to shop with family at night it lights up like a xmas tree with entertainment such a great place to bring the family
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we have just returned from baliwe stayed in seminyak but on  occasions visited nusa dua we also had dinner at bali collection its a great place during the day but at night it has a great atmosphere with a lot of the restaurants having music and singersit made me wish we had chosen to stay in nusa dua but hopefully next visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: enjoyed visiting this open air mall it was clean and safe and contained a variety of shops unfortunately the staff follow you around the shops about a foot away from you which is quite annoying very close to our hotel so just a stroll away if you are staying in nusa dua
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the best thing here is fact that its walking distance from the resorts to pick up snacks or more sunscreen from the grocery store but the restaurants are all the same and each one has a person with a menu begging you to come try their food unless you need something walking distance id avoid this all together
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we took the free shuttle bus from our nusa dual hotel to the shopping centre as a gentle break away from our resort the bali collection is a good place to spend a couple of hours with a wide range of bars coffee shops and restaurants when you need a break from shopping the shops werent cheap  if you want rock bottom prices you need to go away from this kind of tourist trap  but in comparison with uk prices there were some bargains with a range of souvenirs to choose from
Name: Bali Collection

Review: centre consists of one large department store and then a range of cafesrestaurants and fairly ordinary souvenir type stores outside department store has a wide variety of stock but its not cheap only went because our hotel had a free shuttle service  glad we didnt pay to get there by taxi
Name: Bali Collection

Review: yes its very clean and well presented if you dont want a market style vibe but is the expense really worth it high class shops such as quiksilver  levis but then the price tag is that much higher it could be a one stop shop for food clothing and souvenirs if you dont mind paying that much more for it
Name: Bali Collection

Review: probably not the most entertaining for kids but provides an alternative to eating somewhere else other that the hotel restaurant or eating locally
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the store is perefectly loaded with different products  starting from cosmetics and anding up with souvenirs one can make a very good shopping over there there is shuttle that stops in fron of the store the products have a very good quality though the rpices are not cheap however it is a very good value for money highly recommned the store
Name: Bali Collection

Review: pleasant place for spending a few hours shopping and eating you have plenty of choices international cuisine and local gourmet selections shops for all tastes and budgets
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great day outopen from am till pmlots of interesting shops clothes jewellery bags paintings hairdressers leatheryetca wide choice of cuisines from many restaurants and cafes at excellent prices and wonderful bali service
Name: Bali Collection

Review: it was ok to walk around and have a look at the shops very quiet and restaurants all pay trying to get you in we decided on lesung bali as recommended on multiple sites food was ok but lacked flavour stay was supposed to be the best in town bitterly disappointed good thing is they have free driver back to your hotel and free pick up for return visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i was pleasantly surprised by the number of great little shops and restaurants at the bali collection i went two times during my one week vacation and was so excited there was a starbucks there they had a huge store that carried everything you could think of everything from polo ralph lauren jewelry lots of clothing selections and local crafts its definitely a place to visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: youll find lots of clothing and other items at bali collection no bartering the prices are fixed the bargains are not like street vendors but can still be cheaper then if purchased in a retail shopdid the fish tank feet cleaning experience and it wasnt too freaky to have hundreds of little fish nibbling on your dead skin
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a great shopping centre in nusa dua a good range of restaurants traditional artcraft options and lots of clothing stores offers hotel transfers too good prices for those who want air conditioned shops with set prices
Name: Bali Collection

Review: my husband and i stayed in nusa dua and we often went to bali collection in the evening they have many good and cheap restaurants and the atmosphere in the evening is very beautiful with the lights and live music performances
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great shopping complex if youre after genuine name brands some things are a little cheaper than australia but not a lot cheaper good variety of food and outlets and shopping centre for food and medicine if required
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this place is a bit of a tourist trap nothing authentic about itit is a good place to do some shopping and have a bite but everything is overpriced and very commercial i do not see how you could spend more than  hours there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we went there from the hotel in bali collection shuttle service they arrived  mins late and went to couple of other hotels on the way to bali collection the shuttle stopped at sogo a high end shop with all branded stuff you dont come to bali to buy branded stuff do you we were looking to buy some bali souvenirs the fact that shuttle stops there makes you think thats the only shop at bali collection luckily we found our way to the rest of shops and to restaurants prices overall on the high side did some shopping and had dinner at lesong bali restaurant dinner was nice all restaurants trying to get customers in their restaurant was kind of annoying after dinner we went back to sogo shuttle bus place at  but bus has already left it was supposed to leave at pm so we had to pay for taxi to come back to hotel not impressed
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is a shopping centre with a sogo department store and boutique shops it has some large souvenir shops and some restaurants if you do not want to eat at a resort it has a free shuttle but just got taxis around
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is a place for shopping and eating at caferestaurants if you want something besides your hotel resort theres shuttle buses to and between the resorts clean and quiet place
Name: Bali Collection

Review: there is a large amount of eating places surrounded by lovely gardens it is not a shopping mall apart from a few shops that sell the usual tourist bits and pieces
Name: Bali Collection

Review: have been twice this week and realized that costs are x on average above kuta prices and including at the two cocos supermarkets but the r is cheaper to shop here than to pay to travel to kuta to get the bargains once you add the cost of taxis you will probably pay more just expect the cost which is on par with aus prices and enjoy the clean and very safe shopping experience
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a lot of nice restaurants inside and many giftshops from locals too sorry to say but they are quite expensive but it was wortg it to visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we found this shopping area interesting lots of food options a supermarket plus shops there were market type shops then higher end shopping options there were also places for hair braiding massages ice cream a book shop nice to wander around the open area well signposted where things were clean bathrooms very close to the grand hyatt easy walk there
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is the heart of nusa dua itdc area its a great place to eat there are numerous mid and high price range restaurants with all possible type of cousins we used spend have our dinner in bali collection and then walk to our resortalthough shopping is quite pricey better to avoid
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great restaurants and plenty of supermarkets or tourist shops have a meal or massage you can do it all here good value safe and relatively clean
Name: Bali Collection

Review: once upon a time bali collection was simply a collection of misfit stores hoping to make a dime i know i was theretoday it will astonish you to see how many new franchises call this place home it is simply amazing it is no longer not necessary to take a walk there to find nothing because it has many new stores and you just might find that special something you are looking for bali collection is now a desirable for people on the beach wonderful and glad you made the jump to being something special
Name: Bali Collection

Review: decent choice of shops and food outletsalways found the security guards very pleasant and helpful
Name: Bali Collection

Review: dont spend a day here unless you want some groceries or a cheap meal instead of hotel restaurants
Name: Bali Collection

Review: after reading all the negative reviews we were pleasantly surprised by this shopping centresogo have amazing clothesmy husband bought  linen shirts and casual shortschildrens clothing gorgeous and well pricedwe are from sunshine coast and staying at meliai bought  frieda cushion covers frompink eleventhey are gorgeous
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a nice open mall with good variety of restaurants and shopsrecommended if you are staying in nusa dua
Name: Bali Collection

Review: nothing cultural at all about this place the gardens are nice but its pretty much concrete  had no feeling at all to it was like walking into a shopping centre in australia i agree with an earlier review soulless
Name: Bali Collection

Review: set up to cater for the tourists that frequent the large resorts on the nusa dua strip one visit was enough wouldnt bother unless you needed an excuse to get out of your resort for a couple of hours
Name: Bali Collection

Review: there are so many shops here that no one would be disappointed with the variety availablethe cafes and restaurants cater for a vast range of tastes so no one could complainthere are also specialty shops with a great varietyanyone could spend a whole day there and not be able to visit all of the establishmentsthe standards are high and the value is great because there is so much competitionwell worth visiting for a day or two highly recommended
Name: Bali Collection

Review: it has a big collection of shops and restaurantsits a good place to spend the afternoonand if youre out of ideas where to eat bali collection has them all
Name: Bali Collection

Review: really nice shopping area with great places to eat the italian and indian restaurants are pretty awesome
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collections is a five minute walk from melia they have a great range of restaurants to choose from at reasonable prices fantastic supermarket for snacks alcohol and souvenirs great massage places that are so cheap and heaps of clothing shops you could easily spend a few hours there without realising it
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a good place to visit for souvenirs also general products chocolate etc plenty of restaurants and places to have a drink reasonable prices short walk from the resort melia bali or very quick taxi ride
Name: Bali Collection

Review: went here with a couple of friends to spend a free afternoon it is an open air mall with popular brands a supermarket art  craft shops as well as massage  beauty salon since we arrive in mid afternoon  it was hot to walk around w decided to have massage  hair treatment while waiting for the weather to be less hot in the late afternoon the weather is nice  breezy we bought some milk pie to bring back home  end the trip by having ice cream at a restaurant i consider a nice place to spend free time
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection was a short min walk from our hotel the laguna there is a courtesy bus available the shopping is ok although theres a supermarket and loads of restaurants and places to get a massage at a much more reasonable price than the hotels if staying in the resort id definitely recommend going
Name: Bali Collection

Review: there is a playground for the kids there are plenty of stores and a supermarket it is a very nice place to stroll you can get american ice cream and starbucks
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is a lovely shopping area which includes a lot of very nice restaurants well worth a visit and very easy to spend lots of money the area includes supermarkets local shops selling local gifts high end clothing and some really good restaurants and eateries that cover every food option available
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we stayed at sofitel nusa dua and walked to bali collection everyday it was about a min walk along the beachbali collection is so clean the security guards were very friendly and helpfulwe loved having a look at the souvenir shops and boutique style ones too there is a big department store there and also a pharmacy and convenience storesplenty of coffee shops restaurants that also do pick up and drop off if you dine theregreat place to look around
Name: Bali Collection

Review: its a good mall with excellent dining options one can pick up local stuff at this place had lunch at one of the local restaurants and the food was very good
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i am sorry that i am having to review the whole of bali collection just to comment on one restaurant but white orchid nusa dua has been removed from trip advisor which speaks volumes i believemy vegetarian partner ordered vegetarian spring rolls  from the separate vegetarian menu and received chicken ones she is not super precious and we informed the waitress who promptly took them away and brought back some morefour times they brought back spring rolls with chicken in now i understand there are some language barriers but this is ridiculous a manager came over at one point and apologised profusely but still came back with more chickenthey also made us pay for the drinks and the one correct starter we had before we leftavoid at all costs if you are vegetarian or have any allergies language barriers are a given when you are travelling but for people with very respectable levels of english to repeat orders back to you and get it wrong  times in a chain restaurant is completely unacceptablebali collection itself is a lovely albeit very expensive complex however if you are paying nusa dua hotelvilla prices this is to be expected its a very clean nice looking place with lots of shopping and food options
Name: Bali Collection

Review: if you need a supermarketa pharmacy your feet nibbled in a fish spa as well as a range of eating and other shopping options then this is for yousome upmarket shops provide some quality goods and there is the usual holiday souvenir stuff which you wonder why you bought it when you get homestaff throughout are warm including the security at each gate
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this place is huge yes its modern and more expensive that the local shops but its within the gated area of nusa dua its safe clean loads is restuarants boutique clothing shops as well as market style shops well worth a trip
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i am not sure what has happened at bali collection but the place has gone down it used to be a lot busier and food choices were a whole lot better it seems every restaurant is trying to get you into their establishment for a rather average meal it was still holiday season but the place was pretty quiet i think we will give it a miss next time
Name: Bali Collection

Review: open air high end market plenty of sea food restaurants spa and international branded shops few souvenir shops supermarkets and money changers too
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place for shopping food and massage very convenient near hyatt bali grand if youre in a bind for starbucks this is here as well balinese massage k idr foot massage k idr
Name: Bali Collection

Review: found what i was looking for good jewellery bali lace and huge range of restaurantsas is the bali way always excellent service very clean and well maintained including the toiletsshort stroll to museum bali art in centre and stroll along the main road for luscious gardens bali statues and fountains for photo opportunities
Name: Bali Collection

Review: compared to other parts of bali the things you get here is twice to three times the price i dont think this is a must visit place but rather a place of convenience
Name: Bali Collection

Review: every year we visit nusa dua and decide to look around bali collection its always very stressful as restaurants wait outside trying to hassle you to go eat in their restaurants and after trying to dodge a few it starts to get very annoying they are very persistent and wont accept a no thank you you just cannot stroll around to look at anything without being approachedwe did find a real gem though next door to co co supermarket tropical resturant great place and easy to avoid hassle just enter bali collection through co cos supermarket and its just next door the food service music were all great unlike other restaurants who played loud or annoying music bonus happy hour on drinks  for
Name: Bali Collection

Review: there are so many other areas of bali such as seminyak or canggu which have much better shopping was ok to fill in some time but not great be aware when you are trying to catch a taxi back to your hotel that the security guards will try and over charge you we paid k from our hotel to bali connection and they tired to charge us k they seem to have some sort of arrangement with the taxi drivers make sure you barter them down
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the mall is good have many restruant to eat  uno restaurant is convenient in prices and tasty all other restaurant normal  have one brand of pharmacy there they lie to me about cream the price was  and they sell me   i went to there other beach ask about same cream price next day they give much cheaper i come back to them i make scandal and they return me money again never buy from any shop there without rcpt this was my mistake that i didnt ask rcpt  over all its sure worth to see and surly you will enjoy it as its open air and have good atmosphere
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we were delighted to find that this gem was only a five minute walk or a complimentary shuttle ride away from the laguna resort  spa the shops are great and there are restaurants to cater for everyones taste
Name: Bali Collection

Review: aroma cafe great food always freshhappy hour at pm entertainment every night well worth a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we went to bali collection during our stay in bali as it is right across our hotel grand hyatt it has a supermarket where you can stock up any snacksbottled water we went there mainly to eat as food price is half the price of our hotel even though it is still more expensive compared to food outside the place is cleanwe love grand hyatt so for sure we will go to bali collection again next time we go to bali
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we stayed at the grand hyatt hotel for a well with our little ones and we went here every evening for food and drinks it was a few mins walk from our resort theres a big collection of shops and everything here but its very expensive so it does depend on what your buying all the designer shops can be found here but with the exchange rate most of it more expensive to buy here than the ukthey have a wide range of restaurants here too and they are again quite highly priced compared to food and restaurants outside the resort area however they do have a wide range of cuisines available and was priced maybe a bit less than what we paid at the hotel they also have a supermarket and lots of souvenirs shops again we found the local markets and shops more cheaper for souvenirs that here but its nice place to go for a walk around and can get quite busy in the evenings with everyone coming there for dinner from their hotels
Name: Bali Collection

Review: loved this collection of shops and restaurants like the way its all set together most shops are similar but a few bargains to be had
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is a nice place to check out higher priced boutiques well known stores like nike and nice places to get a good meal items are priced higher than you would pay at local vendors but some items seem to be better quality if you feel the street vendors items are too cheap also if you dont feel like bargaining for prices we found a few gifts for friendshonestly we found better deals right down the street at jalan pantai mengiat street shopping area to get to the street market from bali collection will be about  idrgood quality itemsno bargaining skills necessaryvery cleanvery safe to walk around security with metal detectors before you enter
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great selection of bars restaurants and shops i would recommend this area busy both at night and throughout the day time
Name: Bali Collection

Review: please guys dont buy anything from it its very expensivecoco market and all groceries and souvenirs shops are tripled the priceask to go krishna shop  in jambaran
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is where all tourists end up pricy restaurants and expensive shops security guards that works with dodgy taxi drivers to try to rip you off nothing to see or do really we went once never again
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this small shopping mall is always good to walk around there are many restaurants and quite a variety of foods plus some interesting boutique shopping there are a large supermarket and a major department store there as well sogo
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is not paris but some stores think it is but hey  go with it there are a few average price places to shop and average price places to eat no its not kuta but that can also be a good thing just enjoy strolling around with an open mind you might find something fun
Name: Bali Collection

Review: every store here is overpricedall the massage parlours charge far more than the spas in your hotel that have far better facilitiesi gave  stars as the bathrooms are nice and modern and clean and the restaurants are reasonably priced and food was goodwaste of time as a shopping destination
Name: Bali Collection

Review: too expensive too fancy too touristic if you want to spend nonsense money then visit bali collection this has nothing to do with the charm of bali even water costs  times more than usual
Name: Bali Collection

Review: get ready for fun with the many optical illusion paintings that create fun photos foot placement is painred on ground to provide best photos extremely clean allow up to a couple of hours we thoroughly enjoyed this outing good for little and big kids and adults of all ages
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we couldnt believe we were in bali this is very much a shopping experience for westerners with many highend stores worth paying a visit youll get some free wifi in many stores free restrooms as well as some local restaurants you can easily spend here whole day
Name: Bali Collection

Review: its a fairly large place with many good restaurants shopping wise nothing special and no real bargain if youre looking for casual dining then give this place a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: well we went to look for bali art we didnt get to see art just lots of shops and touristy shopping
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the best dinner i have had so far on the tripsugix was the friendliest waiter evercant wait to go back
Name: Bali Collection

Review: very nice shopping centre with a variety of shops and restaurants it a very good place to go after a day on the beach or the poolthere are good store for souvenir and local products prices are goodthere was a free shuttle from our hotel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i am not big at shopping and i had to stop at bali collection for it was my center of the days touristic plani got lost in between the shops and realized that i had been there for  hours shopping there is inviting as the staff you meet and the prices compared to the megcc regions is evident the expensive products were the balinese stuff that you can find outside in other areas such as ubud way cheaperif you got some cash to spend on nonindonesian clothes head there and you will find some good dealsrestaurants are available for different cuisines shisha too baskin robbins starbucks and coldstone are there toobali collection is in the center of the major nusa dua touristic area
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is definitely a place to go if you need some groceries or are struggling for a place to eat atthere is this wonderful and very affordable coco supermarket with everything you would ever needthere are many amazing restaurants to eat at that cater for everyones likingplaces to buy souvenirs at spas to visit and much moredefinitely worth a visit
Name: Bali Collection

Review: been to bali collection three times over the last few years great collections of shops and restaurants however same old same old now restaurant food quality has declined in my opinionauthenticity not quality of product most shops are the same so revisits are not rewarded with a fresh vibelove the original idea and does help to have this place while staying at nusa dua hope the place gets a remake to keep things fresh for repeat visitors
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bit soulless but handy if youre staying locally and want clothes or something has a bit of an odd feel
Name: Bali Collection

Review: there is not much shopping around nusa duda which helps make bali collection worth a visit but it is expensive so keep that in mindhowever it has now got some really good restaurants and food options we had a great lunch there we will come back
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a very nice place to chill out if you are staying in nusa dua and you have a free day it is a great chance to buy some souvenirs too
Name: Bali Collection

Review: the bali collection exceeded all expectationsthere is a great collection of restaurants and shops the department store sogo was great there were a lot of specials and the prices were reasonable i found the prices similar to seminyak
Name: Bali Collection

Review: many food choices and walking distance from our hotel inaya putri theres a supermart too very convenient if you stay around nusa dua do swing by and chill out
Name: Bali Collection

Review: visited here as part of our stay in nusa dua nice place to spend an afternoon make sure you plan either dinner or lunch here as there are some great restaurants
Name: Bali Collection

Review: a huge and beautiful shopping mall with a lot off stores and restaurants from well known brands unfortunately there is really nothing authentic balinese in here for the real balinese experience you need to leave this area also the price level is sky high compared to local stores
Name: Bali Collection

Review: loved the bali collection lots of wonderful shops and restaurants everywhere there is someone smiling to me and that makes me comfortable and happy one of my best places for shopping in bali
Name: Bali Collection

Review: very nice location if you stay at nusa duaa variety of restaurants and shops where you can pass your time  hours with dinning
Name: Bali Collection

Review: if you live at a resort in nusa dua and you dont have allinclusive this is a good place for lunch and dinner price at the restaurant are sheeper than in hotel area but offcourse more expensive than on other parts of the island restaurants are very like to each other with good quality so you can choose any of the restaurants i like that the area has a starbucks and cold stone creamery
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this place is a must visit in evening time for a memorable stroll followed by some good food and brnaded shopping  sogo is highly recommended money changer however was more expensive than the hotel and main cities
Name: Bali Collection

Review: since we were staying minutes away at the inaya putri we went to bali collection a number of times we enjoyed the vibes in this open air shopping centre it has plenty of eateries a miniso a baskin robbins and a couple of places for foot massage so what else would a family want when out for a quick stroll
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i aldy knew that there are not much to explore because i asked my friend before i headed to bali collection people are friendly but my food was vdisappointing i bought salong here and its quality was quite nice only visited one no plans for further visits
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we were staying in nusa dua so this was like our local pleasant to walk around clean had a nice lunch in mooncheer obviously more expensive than kuta or any of the small surrounding places everything nice and easy with the kids
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this place is really nice because you can combine shopping with restaurant we have visited this place a few times during our stay to nusa dua for eating at night good place to have a look of it
Name: Bali Collection

Review: lots of special stores although they are very pricey food though is very cheap and good quality we have not had one bad meal at any of the restaurantsso many places to eat and much cheaper than the resorts
Name: Bali Collection

Review: great place to have meals lots of restaurants wonderful food boutique shops and also small supermarkets to buy snacks and alcohol fromthere is a free shuttle bus that takes you from your resort to bali collection and back
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we visited multiple times during our stay in nusa dua and we enjoyed bali collectionwe could walk easily from grand hyatt where we stayed and it was a nice break from the beach and pools restaurants chasing customers are a bit too aggressive for our taste and we typically went to eat at the least aggressive ones
Name: Bali Collection

Review: bali collection is the exact opposite of kuta slow paced shopping with lots of good restaurants with no pressure if your after the hustle and bustle this is not the place for you there is the typical balinese craft shopping massages local boutiques and higher end outlets i found it safe with taxi stands at all exits there is shuttle bus to nusa dua resorts free of charge or k for a taxi to local area or driver k to local area which is a standard flat rate
Name: Bali Collection

Review: standard open air shopping mall with live music playing in certain sections if staying in nusa dua it is worth a visit otherwise it is not worth a visit has convenience store pharmacy and souvenir shops with a nice mix of restaurants
Name: Bali Collection

Review: what is the most important thing for us is safety so we always try to travel in bali by the state taxi so when you travel back to the hotel try to use blue taxis blue bird or find out maybe there is a shuttle service from your hotel when you are at the territory dont buy something in a rush go and look at the prices as we had quite an unpleasant experience at the padi art market stall there the goods there are often in dust quite dirty as it is not in the building we bought some things there and one of them was a wicker basket ten minutes later we found exactly the same in a good store sogo the price was two times less than in padi plus it was a clean one so we went to the padi art market and asked them to return our money as it is technically possible if you have a receipt and  days have not passed since the moment of purchase i want readers to understand that we just dont like being cheated on a cashier i believe her name was like jenny or something said that the goods bought in their store cant be returnable ok but there was not a sign about it in the shop usually in legal shops and in bali collection too they write  please look carefully at the purchase as it is not returnable but in this shop there was nothing about it i can recommend only sogo department store as it is a clean one and the choice of goods is really great the staff are very helpful there are often discounts on many items
Name: Bali Collection

Review: disappointing shoppingrestaurants are ok but not much traditional bali on offer very western mai mai was our favourite also had some very ordinary food
Name: Bali Collection

Review: visited here often during our  days in the area a safe haven outdoor mall for tourists away from haggling of the markets but obviously more expensive we went however for the restaurants of which there were many offering cuisine to suit all tastes at reasonable prices and all wanting your business there is one book shop a lot of souvenir shops and restaurants and a lot of beautymassage places which we used several times also god for the tourists a few small convenience stores selling fresh fruit drinks snacks etc and a few chemists the mall has a free scheduled shuttle bus tofrom resorts and hotels
Name: Bali Collection

Review: on our last day to bali and some cash left we visited bali collection nusa dua definitely worth a visit one or two shops note worthy had lunch at the italian restaurant which had great and reasonably priced pizzadefinitely managed to spend all our cash
Name: Bali Collection

Review: in my opinion the bali collection is a collection of overpriced stores for tourists it doesnt genuinely feel like you are in bali when you visit i wouldnt go back
Name: Bali Collection

Review: i wasnt expecting much after reading other reviews of this place but it was actually quite nice had some nice places to eat much cheaper than our hotel and was very clean and quite relaxing some nice places to have a coffee and get more healthy food than the hotel offered too our daughter got her hair braided while we had a massage at the same place and when we were riding the bikes we hired she asked if we could go back here so she could get another icecreammost of the shops were aussie surf shops charging aussie prices it seemed but that said if you needed something good to be able to get it and there is also a pharmacy etc and small grocery shopthe sogo department store actually had some interesting stuff and different brandsproducts and some things werent badly priced either so we bought a few things also bought a few things at one of the souvenir shops and even though we no doubt paid much more than some could have bought the same things elsewhere the lack of hassle and a fixed price actually suited usi wouldnt go out of my way to come here from other places but if youre staying in the area its a nice option to try some different food and have a relaxed browse of some shops
Name: Bali Collection

Review: overpriced and boring shops better off traveling to local marketsyou will pay inflated prices and find anything you can get for a better price at home the supermarket is extremely expensive too so it better to get outside and visit a local supermarket for necessities
Name: Bali Collection

Review: we spent around three hours in this place eating and shopping you may get annoyed from the restuarant staff asking you to dine in overall experience is good
Name: Bali Collection

Review: this is an open air shopping centre in nusa dua it is not an outlet the prices in some of the shops are western prices so no great bargains to be had however it is a nice place and it is very easy to spend a few hours in the place which has some nice restaurants to eat in
Name: Bali Collection

Review: dont go in the rainy season some operators will still sell you the tour on the streets and say its possible that this is a lie but please dont trust them the weather is far too unpredictable and there are frequent landslides when theres a lot of rainfall those operators just want to make money and unfortunately dont care about your safetyecological impact while the park is officially closed must be beautiful and amazing to visit in the dry season though
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: so you are thinking about climbing this mountain and deciding if this is a good way to spend your time in lombok well you should definitely do this trekthere are so many reasons for it i will give you what you need to hear onlyfirst of all this mountain is gorgeous and majestic it offers something you wont see everyday or even yearly if you want to go here to spend with your family or partner or even friends this is a perfect place to do that of course you have to be fitthe most important part to get the most out of this experience is a great trekking organizer there are so many out there and you are wondering which to choose let me save you time from headache rinjni fundtin from countless hours of researching and battled with my perfectionist personality i can proudly recommend that to you all i will comeback to tackle the summit this june with them and they offers summit trek start from april i was lucky to have seats with them on june as they almost fully booked
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: mount rinjani is a beast but worth itthe views from the campsites and the summit are awesome this is what makes the hike worth it the lake looks stunning in the crater below but be preparedwe read many reviews saying it was extremely hard however none of them prepared us for the summit now we are relatively fit  year olds so thought we could tackle anything which we did but with difficulty what makes it so hard is the sand like ground you are walking up at a very steep gradient so every two steps you take forward is the equivalent to just one its also freezingwe went with cakrawala due to its great reviews and they didnt disappoint mr sultan was great at organising everything and his guides and porters were fantasticthe only grumble is the amount of rubbish up here the mountain authorities try to employe a pack it out pack it in policy but it is not enforced they must try harder
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: actually been here in  i just thought that i have to write about this beautiful woman we hike through sembalun and went down to senaru the hike was really really exhausting and tired we took nd our expectation was nd one of our friend got cramp so we have to extend  night you have to exercise at least  month run  other exercise train your stamina because i got my back really hurt after the hike even we prepared for  month please prepare the physic i think that s the key for all logistic and etc normal prepare for how long you will hike keep in mind you wont regret this hike so prepare yourself give your best give your maximum power its true some people say this mountain is the most beautiful summit in indonesia
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: such an incredible breathtaking experience to watch the sunset and sunrise in such a beautiful truly magical place we had amazing weather and the best tour guide ever it is very very challenging up and down it is a loooong and steep hike but absolutely worth it if youre in decent shape definitely top ten experiences of my lifedont forget to tip your guide and especially the porters what theyre doing is beyond anything most of us travelers ever could
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: avoid at all costs unless you want to camp on a rubbish tip  any ambience destroyed  beware shoddy companies to inedible food and substandard camping gear
Name: Mount Rinjani

Review: the trekking its really good however the mountain its full of dirt and rubbish despite the  euros you pay for it the dont care about it and they dont clean it either very sadyou should know that you can do the trekking by your own besides the mafia agency tries to convince you otherwise
Name: Mount Rinjani
