Review: if your looking for beautiful powdery soft sand beach than this is the place for you it didnt have much of a crowd on the day we went which is also why i think it was so clean these are my main points for beaches and this one ticked off both they have a few of those swings which people post on instagram the sand is white and so soft the water is clear and turquoise color making it just like a postcard there are some beveragesnack huts which lounger chairs only thing is there are dogs running around on the beachit is a bit of a drive from kuta but absolutely well worth itwhile i have not been to all the beaches in kuta i have been to gili t and this is way way better if your staying in kuta this is a must visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beware of agressive individual that threatens aggression if you dont pay him we had a very unpleasant and scary incident where he wanted to be paid x the going rate for an umbrella and he threatened us by picking up a chair to swing at us and kicking us totally irate and out of control not worth it go to peaceful mawun lansing or selong balanak beaches all beautiful and safe
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: to begin with this beach has loads of potential sand is nice and the beach is long with many small restaurants plenty of sun beds available but also areas without these for those who prefer a more towel on the beach setuphowever we visited st of january and this was a huge mistake it felt like whole lombok and all kids on the island where at the beach i estimated maybe  locals on the beach since the amount of tourists are low here you were not left alone for barely a second even though we walked to the very end of the beach several kilometers away we still had plenty of kids playing around literally by our feetbeach was dirty with lots of sea weed water also a bit murky with sea weed and some plastics to several motorbikes drove on the beach with very annoying music to sell ice cream and toys for kids no where to relaxthere are for sure better options when it comes to nice beaches in lombok if you still plan a visit here make sure its not while all locals are on holiday to
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: after witnessing a very ugly and aggressive iteration of the broken board scam in selong belanak it was really nice to go to this chilled out beach renting a surf board was k and a boat trip out to the waves was k it was only about  minutes from kuta and it had really cute warungs and beautiful sand and water i wish we had found it sooner
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: excellent beach view you have to pay if you want to occupy the beach side umbrellas there are few good options for food as well
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i had holiday in lombok last week it was amazing to see friendly people there i meet my driver at lombok internasional airport and he was friendly he reach us to our hotel my first destination was tanjung aan beach i enjoyed my day there while chill i eat young coconut and grilled fish it was happiest day there while waiting the sunset coming down
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: indeed immediately when you arrive you are urged to pay a parking fee when questioning where is says that you have to pay a parking fee or if i could park somewhere else the guy became very aggressive immediately yelling at me kicking my motorcycle hitting me on the head etc intolerable behavior please let you local embassy know of this criminal hot spot such that they can urge the indonesian government to lock these violent people up
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: absolutely beautiful beach food and drinks are available on the beach purchase them with locals to get a spot of beach chair for sunbathing
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: disgusting there is no other way to describe this beachonce a secluded paradise with hardly any turist tanjung ann breaks my heart todayi used to visit this beach  years ago and it was by far the beast beach ive ever seenit is no morewhats left of the sand is crowded with umbrellas and sunbends warungs like in kuta bali and the sickeining instagram picture swings one or two for every warung icecream selling motor bikes run freely on the sandthe land behing the beach has been walled up devided between the many big hotel groups that will soon transform this former beautiful heaven into another poolclub fancy resort beachhuge pay offs were offered to lombok authorities to allow this crime since corruption its in indonesian blood without any respect for the beauty and naturethe garbage is everywherein the sand on the water under the water it is impossoble to enter the water without touching some sort of plastic even seringesit is very very very sad to see what mass uncontrolled unregulated turism and ignorance have done to this place and others like kuta lombok that now has become a new canggu
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful white sand and a beautiful bay warungs all along the beach with cheap satays etc delivered to your chair i loved the fact that they have shelters to park your car under the shade saw a review that complained of seaweed and trash we saw no rubbish on the beach or the water there is seaweed naturally but there were a lot of people raking it up and burying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we hired a motor bike to get there about  minutes from kuta beach and the town road ran out near the beach then it was gravel and stony road got a flat tyre thats another story for the price of a drink you can get a sun bed from one of the local cafes the beach is white sand and the water torquise however lots of weed beds offshore which leave loads of weeds on the beach each day good cafe owners rake these up so you can have a clean beach in front of where you are sitting a fair amount of plastic is washed up as well as discarded fishing lines a few eco warriors from overseas go down each day and clean up a lot of the debris you can hire a boat to take you out to the surf break or to go snorkelling vendors are a bit of a pest trying to sell you sarongs bracelets tee shirts etc there is guy on a bicycle who sells icecreams and goes up and down the beach all day you get sick of the noise with ice cream ice cream blaring out all day many surfies and back packers here drinks and food are good and cheap at each at the cafes watch out for the touts who demand  cents to park your bike under the shade mafia on steroids we parked our bike under the awning near the cafe and didnt pay be prepared to barter hard for goods sarongs are  rupiah for the smaller ones  rupiah for the longer ones we went each day to the same cafe two swings in front of the cafe half way along because they were friendly and gave great service
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this was one of my favourite beaches in lombok it wasnt full of dogs just a few tourists at the time i went so i absolutely loved it skip the beach in kuta and just head here instead
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: went to this beach almost daily during our lombok stay beach has beautiful white sand but on the days we visited there was piles of seaweed which no one seems to remove there is a fair amount of plastic in the water that washes up to the beach on windy days on our last day the beach looked like a sewer with seaweed and trash everywhere what a shamenearby selong belanak is clean so why is this beach so dirtyvisitors from vancouver canada
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: one of lombok tropical paradise is here tanjung aan beach is one of our best destination as well it has white paper sandy beach with beautiful turquoise water interested make your trip only with us
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we had a lovely visit to tanjun aan on a windy afternoon the bay is beautiful and seemed very clean when we were there a very long stretch of fine white sand with beautiful aqua waters plenty of warungs with sun loungers you can use a few bracelet and sarong sellers but most moved on with a firm no thank you
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan beach is a few kilometers along the coast from kuta it is an isolated scenic stretch of coast with small islands reefs and a combination of rocky coastline and beaches local warungs offer a wide range of meals and ice cold drinks at budget prices and give the area atmosphere the beach is well looked after by locals highly recommended visit and enjoy
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: as i did not have much time left so i just came to see the beach in the afternoon before going up to the hill nearby to see the sunset walking along this beach is very relaxing it is quiet so i love it more
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: picture perfect long soft sandy white beach with turquoise waters and plenty of restaurants along the coast somehow doesnt feel that busy even though the entire coast was lined with restaurants or warungs plenty of local touts but they are harmless just trying to earn a livingsadly on the other side of the road behind the warungs thrash and rubbish lined the entire path
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is beautiful and very friendly you can eat there a tasty lunch and relax but when we went for a walk to the end of the beach all of the space was covered with plastic waste the waves were bringing even more plastic with every inflow on the hill next to the beach there was tons of plastic waste if the local people will not start recycling the plastic there will be no space for anything else but plastic waste
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful beach theres a parking for scooter and cars sunbeds and a warung where you can eat a delicious vegetarian curry warung makan no payment for the sunbeds you just go there and eat at the warungs strongly advised
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this is the type of beach i love cabin shacks with snacks and local food learn to surf or hire a paddle board but good clean beach with beautiful sand still love gili air and meno are better but this is it busy like the other more tourist beaches the tt bike races are coming to this part of lombok in  it will then get really busy
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: probably one of the busiest beaches we visited in lombok a very long beach with soft sand with small waves in the middle section of the bay there were plenty of warungs to eat at and bean bag or sun lounge to sit on under an umbrella our  year old son really enjoyed looking for sea creatures in the intertidal rock pools near the large rock we visited a few times and the beach was very windy each time we visited on a sunday and there were dirt bikes doing laps on the beach near the rock which was very noisy this also happened when we were at selong belanak beach the following sunday
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: awesome white sandy beaches the water so beautiful no wave good for swimmingthis beach still have to be managed especially the bumpy roadnot many visitors here but lot of local people selling souvenirs
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: soft sand beach that stretches and stretches at low tide which started in the early afternoon when we were there you get a wide landing strip of beautiful beach and pools left behind by the departing sea the beach is quite windy which has a cooling effect but at times youd like it dialled down a notch on the right side you have a hill with im assuming a good look out spot although we never made it on the left side lava flows which look like a moon surface at low tide beyond the left curve of tanjung aan is another beach  this time the sand is more gritty but still nice the main beach is very clean the edges do catch rubbish though plenty of beach front warungs to chose from  they all have sun loungers  just walk along the beach and choose the one that you like the look of the further up left you go the quieter it is we stopped by pink swing its pink and has a swing  they were chilled friendly and just let everyone do there thing there are hawkers selling tshirts sarongs etc they do need business as thats how they survive so do buy and a chat reveals some interesting backstories and once shopping is done for any new wholesalers a no with a smile is all thats needed
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: what a great beach beautiful white sand blue water and great view reached by scooter  minutes from kuta lombok places where u can eat and lay down on a sunbed just great not bussy realy one of the most beautiful beach i ever saw its a wauw factor
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it was a some kind of holiday for muslims when we were there and i guess the amount of people that day the barking dogs and the sellers were annoying at the right hand side there are monkeys who grab your things so be careful
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: for us it was the most beautiful beach we visited around kutaits long with white sand turquoise water almost no waves the water however isnt very appropriate for swimming as it is quite shallow but you still can have a lot of fun therealong the beach there are many eatingdrinking facilities as well as many sunbeds to rent ca idr for free if you spend some money for foodwe were lucky to get really tasty food and delicious coconutshowever as a minus there are many local people selling things they can be really annoying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: eastern part of this beautiful bay has different sand to the western part  darker and rougher head to the main western and central part for gorgeous white sand and a gentle slope into the water a range of warungs with sun loungers serving cheap local food take a boat out to the surf break as there is no surf on the shorea truly beautiful beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful waters and sand this is an awesome beach and one i visited several times i had no issues with parking and did leave my key in my scooter once for which the parking guys found and held on for me no scam there they were honest and ensured i was on my way safely behind the scenes is as expected  sadly some rubbish etc  and the road a bit bumpy but its all part of the experience definitely great for a cold beer and some delicious lunch too from one of the beach vendors
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: visited here based on pictures and reviews on a trip down south via moped from senggigihad spent the morning at the far superior selong bekanak beach and cant see why this is higher ratedit was a sunday so dont know if this affected things but it was rammed full of people noisey mopeds selling toys etc rubbish absolutely everywhere and absolutely no serenity peace or quiet despite the very tricky drive to find itgranted the nearby hill is worth the trip however for the spectacular views
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we visited the beach during the ramadan so the beach was crowded and local vendors were selling food food foodwe moved to the far left side of the beach and after driving on the narrow path reached the sea the beach was empty only one small warung we walked through the  meters of broken corrals and broken glass sand and then have reached the normal sand stripe near the seano waves no people the long commute and challenging arrival paid offwould we return not it was too difficult to reach the quiet area on the far left side of the beach and the center and the right part of the beach is too busy and too crowded
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: enjoying time with kids and friends  hour from ekas breakrequest ilham as a driver enjoy all day chilling and playing on the beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i can only say  you need come here to see by your own eyes this beautiful beach it is one of the most beautiful beach in lombok
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i was afraid about some reviews and ready to be disappointed but on the opposite the beach was not so dirty and the water was pure turquoise and perfect to refresh after sunbathe the contrast between the white sand the water and the brown hills all around is stunning recommend to go have a drink at warung surfer
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beach seems to be cleaned up since the last reviews views from the hills around are stunning definitely worth the little climb roads towards here are very bumpy we had a flat tire afterwards which cost us a lot of money as its too far to walk to kuta with a motorbike also the annoying parking fee scam is  its not much but it adds up if you drive around for a day
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: do not go there after reading many blogs and trip advisor reviews we thought that the beach will be amazing it is not plastic garbage everywhere and locals relentlessly try to sell more plastic to you you have to pay the parking fee it is only k but nonetheless but nothing has been done with that money to improve the beach and water is even worse  its impossible to swim because of all the garbage
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: were here for a business trip and struct by awesomeness of this virgin untouched beaches the sunset were amazing and not as crowded as other beaches in lombok
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: yes it is a place to explore while you are in lombok island beautiful view from the top of the hill and if you can walk to the end of the edge you may find rather a hidden beach below the hill but as the other said this place needs to manage better particularly to manage the seller that was quite annoying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: best beach weve visited between bali gilis and lombok  days were great as far as swimming goes today was lots of weeds and seaweed maybe with the tide there are lots of dogs a lot are super skinny and depending on the day they can get fiesty to get your food today i fed  of them and they did well the people attempting to sell stuff is the major downfall of this beach they are everywhere constantly asking if you want something not taking no for an answer and one even called us greedy if you are okay with constant haggling then you will be fine but this beach was the only one i felt comfortable swimming in
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach sand was white and surprisingly clean we didnt see much litter a local told us that the area has clean up days and maybe we were lucky to be there on the right day the sea was so nice to swim in we did some snorkeling just off the beach and saw some pretty fish but the visibility was not great there were so many stray dogs that bothered us while we ate and some even became aggressive and barked at us if we tried to get them away from us while we ate one dog stole a piece of chicken off my boyfriends plate when he looked away for  secondsalso the locals selling things were so annoying my father actually shouted at some of them to leave us alone because they were crowding us and shoving things at us they also became very cheeky when we said rp was too expensive for a bag i had bought one for  rp on gili tthe scenery was good but i feel like i got hassled so much and nervous about the dogs that i actually didnt relax
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nice beach with clear water but expect plastic in water too dogs are there but friendly  watch for some clean place in the middle of the beach where the people do not throw waste direct behind their kitchen  beach restaurant warung rizki has the best fresh food
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we went looking for a protected bay that might handle the swell better this place would be reason i would come back to lombokstaying in kuta lombok and its just a  minute drivegreat surf out in the middle of the bay that is accessible by boat or paddle out from the white sandy beachfor me it was paradisewent back for an early surf this morning and had the line up to our selves
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it was very quiet when i visited this beachastonished by its beautythe sands are very unique like birds treatits not suitable for any kind of water activity cause its rocky however the scenery worth to visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we enjoyed a day here much nicer beach than in kuta and was mostly clean had a good place to eat  warung turtle which included sunbed hire if you bought something
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful west of lombokbeach so clear and natural rocky beach and white sandstheres no words to say this beautiful island
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: our scooter key and valuables have been stolen by people trying to sell things twice we gave it a second chance and we were proved wrong again dont trust anyone here
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: its a beautiful beach with a lot of swings around it wasnt very crowded but there where so many sarong bluetooth coconut seller who where really annoying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a very charming white sand beach but unfortunately the beach is a little dirty lots of twigs wood and sea plants that are washed away by the waves run aground on the beach inadequate road access directions to the beach are unclear
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we find this beach as one of the cleanest one in kuta area there are lot of warungs where you can park for free and use their umbrella if you just order sth to drinkeatdont take first road to beach as they will charge you for parking all others were for free this beach is great just for relax or also surfing
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan is a beautiful large crescent shape beach where there is always a lot to watch boats fishermen etc with many nice places to rest under the shade and have a drink or lunch with a view
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it is as beautiful as it looks and there was not really any rubbish as people have described just a bit of plant debris i think the rubbish issue others mentioned which we didnt really experience in kuta depends on current and wind the water was warm and otherwise clear we sat ourselves outside warung turtle which was fun herman is a great host and the food was good and reasonably priced and i liked that you got the beach lounger for free if you ate at the restaurant downsidesit got quite busy by the afternoon and the children and other vendors although for the most part polite did get a bit annoying id be more likely to head for tampah beach again which is west of kuta not as picturesque but still beautiful and is cleared daily of rubbish it also has better snorkelling cheap but good food and no vendors allowed on this beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we did a tour of the beaches in the area and were looking forward to this one as it is supposed to be so beautiful sadly there was so much plastic rubbish in the water at the western end of the beach that we didnt go any further considering you pay parking and there are lots of stalls selling goods there it is a shame that they couldnt put some time into cleaning up the beach i am sure most tourists would be happy to pay a bit more for a clean beach i know i certainly would plastic rubbish is a global problem and we all need to address what we dispose of i am sad for the locals at this beach that this is where a lot of the rubbish ends up this was the only beach of  that we visited in the kuta area that was bad
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: very nice and nice view on the beach on the sunny day near kies villa restaurant warung turtle must go driving  mins journey
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: ill just say it  all the beaches in kuta are pretty nice this one is no different we entered at the area before you get to the paid entrance for tanjung it was peaceful  no merchants walking around  a little restaurant with good food  cold beer and free chairsthe water while there at all the beaches were really rough but it was a nice scene
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: lovely and enormous beach with shallow waters good for swimming the sand is fine and white and the waters are turquoise and clear swings on the beach a few warungs and places to get umbrellas and chairs from many kids wanting to sell their bracelets parking k per bike
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nothing to do here just for taking photos enjoy the viewclear waterbeside the beach is bukit merese
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: plastic polluition is a global issue and unfortunately this piece of heaven that tanjung aan beach is is no exception to this the same applies to lombok in general the land is covered with trash that automatically goes into the sea during heavy rain events if you dont mind being surrounded by garbage dumps then you will enjoy the beautiful landscape
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: one of kutas landmarks nice beach but could be crowded during the day dont miss the sunset from the hills nearby
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach has long line i like the location of the beach as its between merese hills and batu bolong unfortunately on the way to this beach from kuta takes approx  mnutes since the road isnt that good you have to ride slowly dusty and rocky from tanjung aan beach you can walk to merese hills takes less than  minutes better to bring your own foods and water then go to the small hills to the left of the beach watching the waves cold wind and enjoy fyi around this area you can go pass tanjung aan hike a bit then you ll find cows nice view and hidden quiet beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the island lombok is full of beautiful beach one of this beach is also tanjung aan very nice and clean you must to visit this beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: overrated beachrubbish on beach and in waterover price beach chairnothing much to do as wellgo other places better
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: looks greatclear waterinvitingthere are quite a few lokal warungs and long chairs but otherwise undevelopedabout  minutes outside kuta villageworth a visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we scootered to the beach you have to pay a small entry fee to access the beach but it is well worth it  one of the prettiest beaches in indonesia
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: pristine and empty beach very vast and extended white sand blue waters some people surf from this spot
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a short and easy scooter ride from kuta on the new road  idr entry and free sun beds with food and drink purchased beautiful beach with fine sand beautiful water and good swimming conditions there is some rubbish around but much much cleaner than the kuta foreshore there are sellers on the beach but a polite no and a quick chat will move them on you cant blame them for trying to earn a living overall a must do if around kuta with a clean up of the rubbish it would be perfect
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this was one of my favourite beaches i spent the day on a beach chair under an umbrella and taking constant dips in the crystal blue and beautiful water the beach is so gorgeous and the setting is stunning there are also great places to eat food at the beach  i highly reccommend warung turtle just a perfect setting for a great beach day
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is nice as not many people here you can ride a boat to see sightseeing around the area the entrance fee is k per car the place is quite and tranquil and the wave is smooth the downside of this place is trash there are lots of trashplastic in the ocean and the beach i hope we can maintain this beautiful beach by keeping the trash awaywe tried to clean the beach for  mins and you can see in the pic how much trash we collected hopefully the local and tourist can work together to maintain this beautiful beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we loved the beach and scenery from the hills but unfortunately two members of our family got food poisoning from the food we ate at one of the small warungs on the beach other than that and pushy hawkers we really enjoyed our time on this lovely beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a beach that is away from crowd with pristine white powdery sandy beaches worthwhile to visit even it is far we spent a couple of hours sat at the gazebo few warungs sold local food at a reasonable price had a swim in the crystal clear water and strolling at a beach great place to take photo with the swing as well the kids who are selling souvenirs is annoying though and the best way is to ignore them if you are visiting to south lombok it is recommended to visit this beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: something out of the movies its a white sand beach about km long with beautiful clear water and very few people the lack of tourists is probably because the road to get there is so bad with potholes every meter once the road is fixed i think that will be the end of the tranquillity of the area there is a price to pay for parking k which very cheap there are a few warungs spread out along the beach with sun loungers for hire as well we sat at the snapper surf corners warung this is owned by a fisherman called jenhe has the restaurantof the same name in gerupuk if you buy a beer or have a meal he lets you use his bean bags and umbrellas free of charge we were there for  hours but would have loved to spend a day and only saw a few people walking along the beachthere is no surf on the shore so its nice to sit and mellow in the waterif you go to southern lombok you have to visit this beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we went there before we went home and its was a really nice experience since a very little number of ppl were there there are  swings also to enjoy the wind and to take beautiful photos
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach was definitely beautiful the view is stunning we stayed a couple of hours at the beds at warung turtle these are free when you order drinks or food the day we visited was very windy so we didnt swim but enjoyed the view anyway it was sunday so very crowded with local people we didnt mind but when you want a deserted beach you should go on another daythere are a lot of selling kids which becomes a bit anoying after a while but they are everywhere in kuta so probably best to just ignore them
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: very beautiful beach with stunning scenary it is like a private beach for you because still new and only a few traveler come here you can go to merese hill next to tanjung aanwhat makes uncomfortable is there are many local illegal souvenir seller who insist to sell their product and for me it is rude the way they react when we politely refuse to buy
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: lombok island nest to bali being less known by the traveler it still hold the serenity unlike many beaches in bali very less crowd and large white sand beach will give you the feel that its all yours very romantic place
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: if directing a tourist destination to the beach kuta lombok no one you forward to this beach is guaranteed you will not regret beach with white sand and waves that strengthen the beach is more beautiful to visit only takes less than  minutes from kuta beach to tanjung aan beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: gorgeous beach for photos and to swim our lovely friend gemma from mimpi manis took us there for an afternoon swim and bintangs nice chilled place with lots of little warungs
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: did not visit beach but in this area of lombok the scenery is stunning the view of the bay and nearby islands absolutely beautiful drive off the main road and drive up the nearby hills for breathtaking views in this area make sure to bring camera
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: looks nice from a distance with white sand and a beautiful backdrop however the sea is full of plastic bags making it impossible to swim or enjoy a little paddle sad
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: another beach in south lombok that i love the tide was not that high when i visited it and the scenery is just amazing if you ask me there is a hill maresemaresek when you can catch a sunset the admissionparking for a bike is idr
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan beach is one of the most meautifull place in lombok come and visite get the greatest picture on top of marese hill
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i really enjoyed the stay here without crowds beautiful place to relax and enjoy the ocean also you can find here cozy restaurants warungs with local food
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it was weekend and public holiday when visited this beach considering previous reviews mentioned this is a quiet beachit was more crowded than usual but the view is amazingsurrounded by hills you can walk at those hills for good photos local people also offers short boat trip to batu payung just few minutes awayfood and drink are cheap and you get free seating spot under shadesgood spot for swimming tooplease note that there are many sellers here a bit pushy but they will not get offended if you refuse politely few times if necessary
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: really beautiful beach with just a few huts and sun loungers which are free if you buy fooddrink from the respective restaurantboats available for little tripssmall restaurants for drinks and lunchvery bumpy road to get here by bikeuntouched and very beautifulthe water and sand were perfectb
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung ann is just around  minute ride from our accommodation using our rental bike its a peaceful beautiful beach with blue waters very suitable for swimming we enjoyed our mango shake here i have seen other beaches but so far this is the best beach for me to go while in gerupuk and kuta
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: scenery in tanjung aan wonderful tajung aan also have a small hill that provided excellent photography view this place a best place for photographer
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: just down the road from merese hillits got one of those wooden swings that you can take photos at the sand is soft and cleannot much else to do these except to enjoy the beach didnt try swimming in the water
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful beach white sands and blue water however it was hard to get to that beach the road was so bad and bumpy right all the way to the beach the sad part only couple warung that was organized by local and the sanitary of the food and the toilets were very poor maintained hopefully it will be developed by the  stars hotel then i will back to visit again shame that the government didnt look at this paradise and made it for tourist attractions now the only comes there was backpackers which was tourists that didnt have money to spend
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: its a short ride in terms of miles  however it felt really long due to the dirt path and road filled with potholes id suggest that the rider of the bike be an experienced one
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: its a public beach but the sand is so white the water is so blue the wave is so calm the beach is next to merese hills
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: its really beautiful but sad to see the trash piled up near the beach a small warung that sells food is available but there will be people selling stuff nonstop to you just be patient for a while
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nice place to taking picture better become end or last nd to visit at the day please contact us by wa  if you wanna visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we specifically went to the kuta area of lombok because i had heard that the beaches were much cleaner than the beaches in baliour hotel recommended we head out to tanjung aan beach it is a  minute scooter ride from kuta on good blacktop until you get to the turnoff where it becomes a dirt road which is a bit rougher once you get to the beach there are a number of places to park which cost kthe beach is beautiful the shores are lined with white powder soft sand the surf break is quite a ways out so it is a great beach for swimming the water and beach were very clean it is also quite a long beach and is great for walkingthere are a number of warungs you can go to which in exchange for purchasing food or drinks they have loungers availablethere is also a great lookout point at the east end of the beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the view was very nice and peaceful and the annoying part is when the promoter for island hopping services will never stop approaching u even when u said no its ok i am in a hurry i have a plan they will still bother you how can we enjoy the view hello all the mood for pictures gone and make u feel like u have to say goodbye asap and its frustrated
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach was stunning for realyou just see these beaches at postcardswe loved spending a day here just relax
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we stayed in kuta for  days one day exploring the east and one day exploring the west we visited  beaches in total and this by far was the best the beach was super clean stretched so far and was so relaxing with a few small restaurants offering free sun beds they take care in keeping the place clean the sea was beautiful and blue clear and clean too paradise
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this must have been a beautiful beach once upon a time it is not just the rubbish in the ocean washing up here there is rubbish all over the beach and background there is a spectacular headland that looks wild and free with buffaloes and shepherds and cows and an amazing view but the ground is literally covered in trashthere is a big wall running along the beach line  perhaps for a future development it certainly takes away from the beauty also and some of the sarong sellers at the beach are aggressive and unfriendlyits a shame
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: you can go to tanjung aan by motor bike its about  min from kuta lombok but carefull the road little bit bumpy and if rain the road is muddyin tanjung aan you can go to a hills make some photo you also can enjoy sunrise or sunset from this place the local guard will charge you with k ticket for car and k rupiah for motorbike but still even you already pay you must keep your stuff safetywill be a lot kids and local girls will try to selling you some sarung or bracelet or whatever it is you can buy and considered as charity or you can share little bit of your food if you have but i remained you they not selling an items they are selling a feeling
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: after going to senggigi beach this was a welcome changeclean beaches and water all though behind the beach was littered with rubbishit was refreshing to be able to have a swim without having to push rubbish out the waygood beach suited to smaller childrenwe visited on a sunday and were welcomed by numerous local villagers that visit on the weekendmust do beach when visiting lombok
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan beach is a long curvy stretch of sunset beach surrounded by green hills and bordered by the enchanting sea that reflects a thousand shades of blue  magnificent white sands beachi stayd here some days my favorite coffe on the beach smile cafe  secret paradise with very good food nasi goreng
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i have visited yesterday u can see view islands and sea u can touch white sands it so natural but beaware of doggy and feses of buffalow u can sail to batu payung with pay k each person
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: with the volcano going off in bali things are deathly quiet in lombok our beaches are empty of tourists during the week locals will mainly get out on weekends tanjung aan is still pristine in beauty come soak it up
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tj aan is just a minute scooter ride from kuta the beach has great soft white sand and gentle waters that are great for swimmingthere are plenty of warungs at the beach and it could tend to get a bit crowded and noisywhile the beach itself is great it was a bit too crowded for our liking with a lot of trash on the sandshowever do not miss the walk up to the hills on the right to see the most striking sunset ever
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i really love the blue skies and water but dont forget about the sands and you can get the whole package hereyeah i love this place but too many peddler and they wont stop offer you his wares
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: looked good when we first got there had to pay to park our bike then got asked to pay for a daybed no thanks went and had a feed at one of the warungs that was fine sand not that fine either then decided to go into the water yuck swimming amongst tonnes of toilet papergot out real quick now i live  mins from pristine beaches in australia so yes i know i am spoilt and less crowds at home
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is beautiful but little bit dirtydont trust the kindly locals when they offer you snorkeling dont say yes they will take you to the bay which has no fish or underwater view they have no proper snorkeling equipments only googlewe got injury during our snorkeling time they took us to the bay that has corals only we made complain and give them idr k but they insist that we had to pay full that is idr k thats ridiculous reminded that we only spent  mins in the water and struggled to go back to the boat they didnt even appologize
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we went there after reading may blogs online thinking we had finally found the prefect beach to spend the day at we were very disappointed the beach looks amazing when you first get there as soon as we got into the water we realised it was just literally filled with garbage we had hundreds of plastic bags swirling around us which we could not get away from it was truly disgusting
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we visited tanjung aan on a very cloudy dark day no sunset on the hill to watch but a lovely beach to walk on with many warrungs to eat delicious local food at very different to any photos i had seen nice but not anywhere near the best beach in south lombok
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: my partner and i decided to visit this beach as highly recommended to be visited about  hours from lombok with motorbike paid with great beach with white sand and super amazing viewwe played on the swing then going by boat paid k to visit bukit bresek and batu payung made our trip completeyou have to visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan n wearing turtlepossible the most beautiful beach ive seen the colour of the water is spectacular the sand white and relatively clean the water warm the first beach in lombok ive seen with bins which is fantastic and clearly having a good affect
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: if you only have time to visit one beach on lombok make it this one it has it all power white sand turquoise sea beach swings cows roaming coconut sellers a couple of local restaurants calm waters few crowds a nice viewpoint you cant go wrong
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this is truly a paradise beach white sands and warm blue water worth a trip before it gets taken over by resorts
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the roads to this picturesque white sandy beach were in terrible condition but it was a most relaxing spot to spend an afternoon one end of the beach was quieter and cleaner and it was a perfect length for walking there were plenty of beach lounges and local warungs to eat at but id recommend eating in house rather than in beach cabanas as we were forgotten about a great spot for elevated viewing of stunning sunsets
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: went here on a sunday pack with locals and oddly wanting a picture with you and alot of school kids trying to communicate with you if you want a quiet time i suggest go on weekday it was kind noisy when we were there but overall a very very nice beach clean and there are a few restaurants there that also rents out lounge chairs they were about rpk for the whole day after i bargained food was about rpk for friend rice we didnt see any beers but there was an ice cream man with his bike going around and asking if you want beer hahahajust make sure to go in the morning till about pm thats when the tides are high at around sunset the tides are low and you get a really wide white beach make sure to climb up a small hill on the left side you can see it once you get there great to catch some stronger breeze and picture of the whole beach and sea
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: when i come to lombok island few weeks ago i found out beautiful place for vacancy we had hiking to the upside of the hills to found a beautiful beach and we can saw sunset here
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a beach with extra fine white sand water is bluish clear during sunny days boat to batu payung can be hired here great location for viewing sunset
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the view really amazing many spot to do selfie here so many child want to help us to take a picture but you need to paid them my suggestion do selfie or asked your friends to take your picture
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: min distance from kuta with a motor bike along the way you can enjoy the greenery view and the breathtaking nature in fact tanjung ann beach and turtle beach just connected to each other as well as the sunset point it was a good idea to have a day trip here picnic too entrance fee is k rp if you go in with a bike
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: lovely place i can imagine myself spending a whole day here unfortunately some locals were trying to sell a trip to a spot nearby that could affect the mood be assertive the place felt tranquil which is nice but i can understand the previous reviewer that said you have to be careful when visiting this spot especially after the dark the place is quite isolated go with local guide in a group is always better
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: in between kuta and gerupuk is this lovely stretch of relatively unbusy beach great for sun swimming and surfing hire a boat past the breaks or to other islands we spent  days relaxing for the very affordable  scooter parking feehawkers a minor nuisance i personally dont buy from children as i dont want it to seem to whomever puts them out there that it is a worthwhile and viable future for them it can be exploitive and other places in se asia seemed to have more awareness around this issue than i found herewarung turtle is a good spot for lunch beers and lawn chairs
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nothing else to do  but the beach is amazing  you can even climb a small hill on the left to have a great  degres view of the bay
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: to get to tanjung aan you need around  minutes drive by scooter from kuta lombok but it is a nice route where you can meet a lot of locals and see their village lifethe beach is long the water is amazingyou have a nice view except from  warungs there are no hotels no restaurantsbut if ist windy which is often the case it is not very relaxing dbut definitely much better than kuta beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach is wide and has white sand and clear blue water its amazing to walk and enjoy it from side to side but the most amazing part is the view point in the right hand side of the beach you can easily walk through the little peak and enjoy the views from both sides its highly recommend to be there during sunset while the tide is lowhighly recommended
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: my favourite place to go few kilometres from kuta lombok but  times better quiet cheap coconut drink available in warring for k beer yes but big hotel start to build the wall in few years tanjung aaan will be hard to have an access to see the sunrise on sunset from the hillbig powerful investor killing backpacker
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this place is of course a paradise you have some swings just on the beach to enjoy the viewbut be aware that this place is very isolated not much tourists not much people and could become be dangerous after sunset some group of people on motobike could go with machete to steal from you if you leave to late after i recommand to go in group of motobikes be extremely careful if someone follow you behind for few minutes and overall come back maximum at pm to avoid darknessit happen to me last summer  and i would have been extremely grateful to see a comment like that to avoid this terrible experience and unfortunatly it is not an isolated act  it is really common on the island
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: what a beach its a shame they put fences around it takes away the charm quiet beach but enormous bay nearby merese hill offers amazing views of several bays
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a must visit if youre in south lombok easily accessible by motorbike and the beaches are empty and peaceful the water is amazing for a dip and a few warungs here and there offer great authentic indonesian cuisine perfect beach to spend an entire day lounging in peace
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a gorgeous beach about  km long to a large rocky outcrop used by all as the viewing point then continuing in another km curve of beach the other side dazzling white sand leading to sea of stunning shades of green and blue as yet no hotels or accommodation which is good try keeping it that way though there are some buildings just warungs local restaurants made of wood bamboo and palm leaf roofs and just half a dozen over the entire length so not intrusive and they do provide sunbeds and umbrellas to enjoy the beach in a little more comfort again not too many as to be unsightly free to use if you are buying a few drinks and lunch there and you should as they are trying to make a living who are these cheapskates who think it clever on their western wages to use the facilities all day for a coke and a bottle of water a stunning spot yes there is some plastic and rubbish washed up but no where near an amount to make you feel uncomfortablethe last  metres of beach as you look at the sea has been walled off presumably for big future development hopefully some time yet before that happens
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this place is really beautiful i went there alone so im a little bit confused how to take my own picture there i got lucky find a boy name erland who gives a free service for taking a picture everywhere on the beach if i buy his coconut so i bought it and end up with beautiful picture all over the beach very recomendedhowever the parking price is too high its about rp  the toilet fee is rp  everything is rp  i just feels like i got ripped off
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful view specially climb to the hill nerby to see sunrise but not sure we have to pay or not
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i went here about  year ago it was magnificent  beach with  types of sandbut when i came again july area had been closed for construction projectfrom the local i knew tanjung aan will be private beach for hotelthis area will be be integrated tourism areawhat a losswe will have to pay expensive to enjoy this paradise
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nice bay  cool waves  would like to see it with more swell next time maybe not a good spot for total beginners you need some surf experience
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: there are better beaches in south lombok than this one but its ok to visitif youre travelling there by moped the roads arent that brilliant to get therelots of seaweed washed up on shore the day we visited and quite a lot of persistent hawkersfee to park up and enter beach  irp which equates roughly to  so fair enoughjust wish these guys would actually used the money raised to take care of the environmentbasics like picking up rubbish or keeping an eye on your moped while youre parked upthey dont do anything except take your money and sit there with their mates yakking
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: good for couple very sweetest moment i had ever if all of you want to visit better in sunset time around  pm but never mind if you want to go in the morning but better avoid in midday time die to sunshine very strong but kept away windy in the hill from tj aan you can also rent boat to batu payung for going up to hill only need  minutes walk high hill with easy access unfortunately i found many big white gate surround the beach probably any developer who build hotel with private beach similiar like novotel lombok another side hill you will be found pohon galau the only one tree left in the hill so far unforgettablr moment in my life for visited a part of pearl of the world
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we come on our family trip we reach tanjung aan around  pmexcellent beach view in lombok blue sky clean water  quiet beachtheres a wooden swing on the the beach you may try it its very nice
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: personally i preferred tanjung aan instead of gili trawangan the view is superb and breathtaking will come back here again
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: drive to tanjung aan beach along kuta street some small restaurants that served decent local and western menus great place to chill out with sand sun and clear beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we come here after the business trip its already pm the weather isnt hot anymore so its good for a walk on the beach we swam and snorkeled there the water is clear and there are some coral reefs in the bayafter that we hiked the hill on the western side of the bay called meresse hill the scenery is so majestic you can see the view of the bay on the eastern side and you can enjoy the sunset view on the western side its really great place to enjoy the sunset
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: glimpses of the edge life by the ocean tanjung aan beach one of hidden beaches in lombok that the locals will never tell youtanjung aan beach is a long curvy stretch of sunset beach surrounded by green hills and bordered by the enchanting sea that reflects a thousand shades of blue  magnificent white sands beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the amount of rubbish on the west side of the beach is shocking as others have commented i have never seen a dirtier beach in my whole life including five months travel in se asiawe parked our scooter at the end of the west side and were appalled at the mounds of rubbish piled up by the car park can the parking attendants not do their bit rather than just sit around all day then saw the thousands and thousands of plastic items littering the beach it appears to be household rubbish rather than tourist litter we saw toothpaste tubes food packaging etc which suggests locals are dumping their rubbish in the sea or by the shore it is a truly horrible sightwe walked the full length of the beach and the east side was considerably cleaner and the sand is a lovely powdery white we enjoyed the viewpoint too and there are a number of beach bars with inexpensive drinks and sun loungersthe whole of kuta is on the cusp of development which will bring a lot of change to the area but if it means the beaches and surrounding areas are kept clean then the sooner it happens the better
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this is a very beautiful beach must must must visit place when in lombok this beach has  kind of sand peppercorn and powder like sand amazing view from its hill though it may lack of facilities you must at least visit it for photo stop
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nice long white sand beach good for swimming we sat at one of the little huts and were harassed by locals to buy things after saying no for about  minutes we ended up having to buy something because they wouldnt leave us alone the beach is lovely though worth a visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: love the sand and the color of the sea waterthe background view of the sea is also lovelya perfect place to chill and enjoy the sea and the viewalso you can play and swim happily
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan located in mandalika the beach is still virgin no reastaurant nearby you can sit on the bench by the beach and having young coconut from local people no shower in the beach only toilet the beach is so beautiful the water so blue no water sport in the beach absolutely will come back again
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: nothing to review sorry its nice but its just a typical beach with white sand beach that you can find it almost everywhere in lombok
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we were arrived around  pm thus we only saw the beach for awhile beautiful nice in picture great sand blue crystal water but the beach itself albeit dirty trash and including baby diapers were seen in the seashore bumpy road to get there and we did not see the sunset from the beach possibly it was visible from the hills
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: great place to watch the sunset or a timelapse sunset go up to the hill you can actually explore around the hills theres some buffalo too
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we just went there to have a look if you look at the waters and sand they were chrystal clear with nice white sand nice to relax but be quick all the surrounding leading to the beaches are reading to get build on all kind of investements arw done here so to enjoy some quiet location you have to be fast bare in mind that the road is bad
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach was a disappointment i believe you can walk to the stone structures in all the pictures but most people were opting to hire a large canoelike boat with canopy to take them quickly across the bay to these structureswe were appalled by the amount of trash on the beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: lombok surrounded with white sandy beachestanjung aan located at east lombok and have a lagoon and you can see from up of the hill near the beach so bet you to see from up there
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this was the most dirty beach in my life the dirt was swimming in the water in huge piles and the sand on the shore was also thickly covered with it i also saw some tourists trying to clean it but they ran out of dirt bags pretty soon you would need a machine and a team of  people to clean that not to mention the annoying locals that dont let you rest on the beach because every  minutes one of them comes and tries to sell you something we told one guy  times that we do not want his stuff but he came back and ask again every  min oh and if you want to rent a bike to get there make sure it is a proper dirt bike because it will get bumpy in a big way
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i have never seen so much litter and rubbish on a beach in all of my travels i didnt even swim as you would be swimming through rubbish it would be great if they could place more bins or signs around on the beach so they can try and keep it clean but unfortunately this is standard for most of indonesia nowhere is as bad as this beach though tanjung aan would be so much more beautiful without the rubbish blue sea white sand but littered with rubbish i even saw tourists try to clean it up and they filled  bags of rubbish trying  bags good on them though if you want tourists to come here the government needs to do something fast about lomboks rubbish issues very sad
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach is for me the best beach you can find if you are staying in kuta it is big you are usually completely alone on the beach not sure how is it during high season it has amazing views and sea is very calm in one part of the beach you will find for me unusual sand that has a structure of small balls which i really love
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i visited tanjung aan when the weather is cloudy but it is still really beautiful the water is clean and they provided little berugak
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: one of the best beach in lombok especially in central lombok thats have a very beautiful sands keep it clean
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is clean and good place for surfing there is a small warung there to drinks relax and enjoying the view
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we parked the car at the first sign we saw tanjung aan beach but if you keep going you found some little pavilions close to the beach area it is a better parking spacethe beach is beautiful long with white sandsplease bring your trash with you and try to minimise the impact of your visit it is important to keep the nature as it istheres one restaurant serving basic indonesian food the food is ok considered the price and limited resource
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it is a very nice beach clean and with white sand it is not full of tourist yet i went in august  you have to pay the parking fee to the guys that watch the bikes while you are at the beach otherwise it can be stolen and it is a big risk there are locals selling coconut water and some food but there is not a restaurant or place to eat so bring something with you
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: good place to relax and dont forget to hike the nearby bukit marese for sunset the view left me speechless
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: loved this beach theres a look out that you can drive to the base where you an ascend a mountain and explore the mountain top this will provide amazing sweeping views of the beaches below gorgeous  degree views you can hike as far as you would like but you will be rewarded with amazing views i couldnt stop taking photos if youre lucky youll catch a few water buffalo herders and his herd walking the mountain topwe easily spent  hours walking herevery scenic views on the motorbike drive out herethe beach was practically empty when we visited waters were clear blue and relatively calm so that you can swim beautiful views from the beach theres even a big rock that juts out of the water that you can walk to on the far left from the turtle cafe
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the location is a bit far from mataram city around  hour and a half however when you arive there you will be amazed by the view not as crwoded as gili trawangan makes tanjung aan beach as a perfect place to relax and enjoy the different contour and color view of lombok island as you will see white sands blue water and green hills at the same time
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i always amaze how beautiful this beach is and also this beach still under commercialized since there was no resorthotel only small stalls selling coconuts and snacksso if you have time go now since i believe it will be like kutaseminyak in  years timebeware of dogs there are so many dogs here so please bewaretry to go the small hill you will see breathtaking view from up of the hillavoid going on weekends since the place will be crowded with locals
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: wonderful beach now still not really touristy nice to chill swim lots of warung on the beach with very ok price
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the most beautiful view ever when you walk up the hill the bay is big and it is easy to find a quiet spot there are also some bars with seats close to the middle of the beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is of quite long whitish beach and bright blue water however of course not a place to swim without swim shoes due to stones and gras at the ocean floor the street to get there is very bumpy what is surprising because the street around the attractions are all in good shape there is a parking fee of locals try to sell you stuff quite aggressivelyplastic waste everywhere behind the beach currently some constructions are going on there maybe on a sunny day good to hang out not worth a visit on a cloudy day
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan beach is located  kms from kuta  its surrounded by hills  the views are lovely especially at sunset the beach is pretty with nice white sand  clear blue water the beach is perfect for snorkelling a few facilities are available including toilets
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach is amazing at sunset well worth a visit you walk up a hill and you have the most amazing panoramic viewthere are sellers here but reasonable prices there is also a small warung and an icecream man
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i love this beach love the view white sand tan skin im not regret itjust enjoy your coconut and sit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we went to see the sunrise at  am the beach was empty and we were there alone sand was nice water was clean and the views were amazing
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i love this beach tanjung aan is very clean and beautiful beach the location is near to merese hill tanjung aan has a great combination blue sea white sand green hill and quiet situation
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: if you want to swim and get tanned this is the beach for you the view is amazing and natural the sea is calm there are good eat places nearby
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: at this places we can see a beautiful whites sand from top of merese hills at tanjung aan u can do swimming on the sea or only killing time with couples to see sunset for entrance you need pay rp for parking dont forget to bring a waters because hills no more trees life
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is clean and natural with very beautiful view perfect to visit this place to enjoy holiday with family the parking space is also quite large there ware so many people included children who sell souvenirs but that is fine
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this is by far the most beautiful postcard beach in all of kuta and maybe all of south lombok including ekas i was so happy to be here after driving all over looking for surfing beaches for my husband it was so nice to finally lounge around on a white sand beach with calm clear turquoise waters and its clean hardly any trash on the beach which is unfortunately all too common in most lombok beaches
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: white sandy clear water from merese hill you can see wide sea that look beautiful and you can see sunset but unfortunately when we go it cloudyi think the beach doesnt suite for children playthe inconvenience is several kid and manwoman pushy sell bracelet tshirt etcthe location  min from novotel resort
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: dont forget to climb bukit mereseits a hill next to tanjung an beach the view from the top hill is amazing
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: you can climb an easy cliff to see such a pretty landscape below blue sea boats gently rocked by the waves white sand and green hills as the background but you cant enjoy the luxury more than  seconds the agrressive street hawkers will come and persistently ask you to buy bracelets and clothes dont even mind to buy one because once you do that more sellers some of them are kids will surround you buzzing all around you until you dont realize that you are standing on a beautiful beach and the whole area is underdeveloped with lack of quality public facilities such as toilets or trash bins
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjuang ann is a huge beach if you go right you can go up to the green hill and enjoy with beautiful stunning views if you go left you can get to batu payung to see the big headrock theres also a boat that takes you there but it was expensive maybe you can get a good deal if you dont its not a long walk
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: once we get there meresse hill of tanjung aan green hill at the peninsula outside kuta with the panorama of ridge and coastal beach as eyes far under the blue sky at suny day is really meet our satisfaction what a place of unspoil nature this place is just great come and see
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach a few kilometers after kuta beach has nice white sands which has rather unique form it is a place to rent a boat to go to the batu payung a very popular spot it also has a nice wave so many surfers like it here as wellbut this beach is not a good place to relax as it is not comfortable at all with so many sellers that trying to sell their goods which is very annoying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: it was my first time vacation to lombok and headed straight to the beach the beach is very beautiful you have to come here to enjoy the views across the beach you have to climb a hill approximately  minutes from the main beach when u arrived at the top u will see heaven on earth
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we parked our scooter   rupiah and headed down to the main beach although it has covered shaded umbrella like structures to escape the sun the beach itselfand the waterwas littered with garbage that the locals claim comes from australia  although the packaging is all in bahama indonesia we spotted a path on a hillside to the west and meandered over it leads up over the hills bordering the bay to the most impressive vistas and pristine white sand beaches and coves definitely with venturing away from the main beach area would come here again with a swimsuit a good book and a pack lunch to enjoy the serenity amazing
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: going east from kuta you will reach tanjung aan in about  minutes by scooterpay the parking around k and rest on this huuuge beachyou will find one of the most colorful sea in indonesiakids asking for buying bracelets could be annoying you but if you take them in the right way it will be oksome stray dogs around the place as in all kuta area
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: well worth the effort to go to great walking beach lots of locals kids school project kids wanting to say hello and have you in their picsall funvery pretty sceneryok resto up one endwonderful way to spend a day
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: my last visit was with guests beautiful beaches some children will help you taking picture as if holding the hill behind go up to the little hill to get beautiful pic from above toilet and mushalla are available and clean many berugags to sit in drink the real fresh young coconut a perfect beach holidaysome boatmen offer a ride for k to batu paying beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan is breathtaking at first sight the azure blueness of the sea hits you then you notice the darker patches of blue below the crystal blue watersand you stand there mesmerized the darker patches turned out to be coralsso do be careful if you decide to go swimming quiet unassuming yet the allure of the absolute blue sea keeps coming back to my mind to me its the most beautiful beach in the world however do be careful of vendors swarming you with scarfs shawls or table mats to sell they can be very persistent however the beauty of the azure waters is worth a visit
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we arrived to this beach by bike from kuta center  min of a ridewe couldnt believe how beautiful it is turquoise sea and unlike mawoon beach that was full of trash this one was clean and its really calling you for a long swimwe will definitely go here againit is not the beach for surfing thoughthere is a place to grab something to eat and drink umbrella with chairs
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i stayed literally  minute drive and thats why we came the water looks great but it was choppy so it wasnt the clear crystal clear blue water that i was expecting the sand is quite coarse and garbage is everywhere therere also no decent restaurants around so were kinda starving but ended up eating some less than average food at turtle warung i couldnt come out here if i wasnt close to kuta already
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: one of the best place for sunset many spot that is instagram worthy not a crowded beach try spend an afternoon here and you will like it
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: its a natural paradise with few people so peaceful with white sand and clear blue water tanjung ann is definitely perfect for people who look for a nice escape in nature
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: a must go and visit in the earlier part of the day before the wind hits there is vegetation making swimming a bit tough but can find clear spotsa great place to relax with an awesome view
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i definitely recommend this beach for a nice escape in nature its a natural paradise with few people light sand and vulcanic rocks few services but a lot of pleasure watching the nature snorkeling is also a plus here
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is great but you can devide in two the right side more dirty and the water is less clean the right side is more calm and tidy less waves and shallowthe beach is  mins on scooter from kuta the road is not the best but okyou have to pay  rupies for parking but the bamboo beds are free and there is plenty if shadeyou can buy food and drink and there is a local warung small restaurant on the far right cornerthe beach is not busy at all local people sell stuff but not too pushythe beach is ok for kidsrecomended
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the panorama in tanjung aan is very beautiful it is like a painting you can see bluey water in the beach with very clear atmosphere around right place to take a group photo because they have very huge area what a wonderful view glad to be here just sit down see surrounding all you can see crystal clear water dont forget to get young coconut very suitable during noon and hot sun shine see my picture you will wonder whether it is a painting or photo
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i think i never saw more beautiful scenery than the beaches in lombok and here is one of the spectacular beaches it huge quiet empty and very clean beach complete with the voice of the wind anyone please wake me up from this paradise im in love with lombokwonderful indonesia
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: we came here because of tripadvisor and the blog homeiswhereyourbagis  the beach itself would be very nice but the problem is there is sooo much trash and not only on the beach but also in the water
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: beautiful beach excellent cove and swimming not as many hawkers here very picturesque well worth a visit with rodi transport
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach is beautiful and not too crowdedthe entrance fee per car is idr you can also climb up to bukit merese nearby this beach for its breath taking view
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: tanjung aan well known because of the sand that look like pepperdont forget to climb the hill and you can see all around tanjung aanalso dont forget to visit batu payungwhere not too far from kuta beachthings to do sun bathing swimming walk along coastline
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach in itself is nice  fine sand turquoise water not many people however you are likely to be pestered by kids and women selling bracelets and sarongs  which can become very annoying after a while better than kuta beach though be careful with your belongings
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i went there at  am i climbed the hill there i dont remember its name from the hill i saw the sea it looked like a huge swimming pool what a scenery i love the combination of the hues the blue of the water and the skyit was a cozy place there was only one local person there selling coconut ice there werent many people there especially local tourists i was the only onemy driver told me that some months ago some bad guys often visited there to ask for money to the tourists but dont worry the police officer controlled it routinely
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: min drive east of kuta bumpy road have to pay  idr for scooter parking until  pm they probably wanna make some extra money for sunset beach has soft yellowish sand and turquoise water theres a little bit of seawead in the water and also some plastic but further to the right are some beautiful little bays which are clean theres also some viewpoint hills with awesome views across the bay area wenn saw monkeys as well as water buffalos food and service in the turtle warung were goodwas cool to see the beach but i prefer mawun and selong belanak
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: white sand amazing water not that busynice sunsetviewpoint upon the hillnot for surfing but for swimming
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: on of the better beaches in lombok good for relaxing and taking photos the water is very clean and not too crowded there will be some people offering to take you to go to batu payung beach my advice is take it its a unique spot and worth a visit i got k for  person to go there and  other place which i forgot its name but also beautiful
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: this beach is just awesome and quiet paradise  advice go on the left of the bay to find the best relaxing spot the water is so blue and the beach so white that you will feel like on a postcard
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: i regret to visit this area on my last day in lombok i should visit this area on the first day and spend longer time herea virgin beach with unique sand sand with shape like white pepper barren area with barren hills surrounded the beach exotic no resorts and no hotels around the beach very quiet and i didnt see many tourists around
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: visited this beautiful white sand beach just after ramadan muslim families had gathered here to enjoy itu vitary the beach was full of families swimming and picnickingi paddled out into some small uncrowded waves and noticed how clean and blue the water here is the sand is coarse like small coralsuch magnificent scenery with no dwellings in sightthere is some warungs here for food and drinks
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: kind of beach which is used to film the adventurebased tv commercial the sands here is quite unique bigger than usual rocky beach if you such a adrenaline junkie you can try to rent the boat to take you around the beach the wave is kinda scary i rent the boat for idr  around  people
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: loved it its really quite and peaceful breathtaking views and crustal clear waterthe road to get there is also not as bad as ive read in the other recommendations when you park at the first stop it will be totally fine when you go further it might get a bit bumpy
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: soft sand clean beach you can hike the hill next to the beach fascinating view recommend you can rent a boat and take a short tour to the hill near tanjung ann beach
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: fantastic maybe its the only word can describe the scenery here the wave is calm the water is very clean you can relax and forget anything problem you face in this place make sure you using sun cream because its very hot and can burn your skin hehehe
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: near from kuta beach but the location need for the several minutes to get there have white sand with the blue sea n sky make u feel in the paradise
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the beach is quite pretty but with more rubbish than for example selong blanak at least when we were there there are little restaurants and your getting pestered a lot by bracelet and sarong sellers annoying but still better than kuta beach parking is  nobody is really watching your bike though but you should keep the receipt why while we were in kuta a tourists rented scooter was stolen at mawung beach after some discussion the security there agreed on paying half of the damage some millions to pay a new one before hearing that we just felt ripped off by the parking lot gangs but now decide for yourselfif you climb up the hills you can enjoy the best sunset view of kuta really really nicenow for the problem i stepped in a sea urchin in the shallow water no rocks nothing unfortunately the water was completely cloudy and i couldnt see anything be aware it is really painful and can ruin a fair bit of your holidays
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: really nice beach you can reach it easily with scooter or other transport the sand is really really white its just lovelythe locals are a bit annoying and you have to pay for parking around and they keep trying to sell you stuff you really dont need annoying
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach

Review: the view here is great and there is a lot of wind here making it a great place to relax and enjoy the view
Name: Tanjung Aan Beach
