Review: i like this place very beautiful me and my friend fell happy come to this place and than we can get swimming on the second water fall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: very beautiful places clean surrounding light hiking for me the track was easy peassy  its just take you around  min walking i suggest you went they early in the morning not much people more privacy
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: not necessarily to get a guide or we called pemandu over there it is very easy to have a soft trek there to reach these  waterfalls first of all pay k entrance fee and walk the stairs all the way down to reach the first waterfall and it takes about mins after that for the tiu kelep youll have to walk up again using the stairs therell be an intersection on your left for another stairs just continue walking and youll find the bridge cross it and found yellow dam and a small food stall there and just keep it up after that therell be  rivers to cross which are short distance only here you go an extra mins walk to get to the god of nature and it takes about mins depends on your pace
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: spent long journey on the road and also the hiking made me think if all this worth the effort it was definitely worth it when you get to swim in tiu kelep waterfall and the waterfall is so beautiful

Review: tours are offered for kwe were at senggigiso we rent a bike to drive it to bangsala harbour this track has scenic views its fantastic the we took a blue bird taxi to the waterfalls the driver wait for us and come back for only k plus the bike ktotal ksave kplus the tour with the bike was awesome
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we did the tour without a guide and it was perfect if youre quick you need definitely less than  min to the nd waterfall be aware that you will have to walk through water amazing trip
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we did this the day before the dn rinjani trek and loved it theres a bit of scrambling across rivers and treesroutes etc so would recommend water shoes but we managed it fine in flip flops we did it right at the end of the day with a guide which was great because there was no one else there at tui kelep but i can imagine it gets pretty busy the rest of the day based on the number of people we passed going in the opposite direction tui kelep is great for a refreshing swim and is only about  mins further down a fairly well marked path so would  recommend pushing past the busy first waterfall to get there
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: for those of you who love challenging tracks you can come on a trip to tiu kelep waterfall you will also cross a fairly shallow river in this river you will feel the coolness of the water flow is very clear
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: these waterfalls are absolutely beautiful through a quiet ride we take full eyes hire a local guide to accompanying you during the journey would be nice
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: nice waterfall second one is a little bit further you have to know where to enter the parh to the second waterfall once you know this it is easy to get there not really a guide needed it is easier to go with  or  people than only  also for the bags when tou go swimming etcet
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: fun to do if you happen to be in senaru for the rinjani climb you can stand underneath one of the waterfalls for a local massage
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: two very fantastic waterfalls close to senaru it is not a very long walk to the first one mostly downhill but a very big waterfall you can stand under it but not swim there it is a little bit harder to get to the other one mostly uphill and through water and rocks but it is worth it when you are there it is smaller but beautiful and you can swim there i can really recommend this trip
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we arrived at senaru  hours before sun going down minutes rest at accommodation we diceted to visit waterfall boththe first one is really close from our accommodation its about half hour by walkreally nice waterfall with a pres waterthanks dhyns for provide our guide
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: really stunning waterfalls a short walk down to the first falls and a moderate walk to the second watch out for slippery ricks as you get close to the second fallsyou dont really need a guide but in my view unless you are a struggling backpacker and can afford to throw a measly  into the local community you probably shouldthe one downfall of this place is the amount of rubbish laying around mostly it seemed from the locals despite being several rubbish bins and anti litter signs rubbish was everywhere sadly often floating downstreamdo nature a favour and pick up one of the many plastic bags laying around and fill it up with trash on your walk back to the entrance minimal effort maximum reward
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: lovely day trip to this beautiful area of lombok lush and picturesque but next time i will allow more time so i can climb rinjani
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we really recomand to go to the waterfalls do it by yourself it is a nice walk pretty straight forward also qt the first waterfall it is nice to walk abid downstream it gives you a bid of a jurassic park feeling the second waterfall tiu kelepe is amazing really nice to see
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you are in the area or planning a trip to the area you should go the waterfalls are beautiful and the short hike to the waterfall is beautiful as well
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: both waterfalls are worth a visit sendang gile being more accessible therefore more busy it has a few tables and a couple of small stalls for snacks as well as quite a few dogs whove realised they can live well down here tui kelep is more of a walk including getting across through a river best not wear your best shoes  water shoes or sandals are best the waterfall there is absolutely stunning with a pool deep and large enough to swim in take care not to get under the waterfall itself its far too powerful
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: those waterfall are wonderfully the first one is very nice to take pictures it just a stone throw away with  mins walk to the first and perhaps another  to the second
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: its a very simple trek to the st waterfall sendang gile about idr for the entrance fee went there at the early morning to escape from the crowd the distance from the entrance to sendang gile waterfall is around min only its very easy to access with following the path as for the nd waterfall tiu kelep its a bit tricky to reach there dont have any signage or direction to the waterfall and a few different junction make sure you know which junction to go or you can follow the crown to go there however we reach there early so we hire a tour guide to lead us its not really far from the sendang gile waterfall to tiu kelep waterfall less than  min you will reach it but you need to cross the water a few times and not really have any stair case or clear path however its really worth to visit the tiu kelep waterfall both have a very unique nature waterfall where you cannt find in other southeast asia country
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: relatively easy walk can do with out a guide however remember to support the community and guides will assist at the site
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: unless you have lots of money to throw skip the guides you dont need guides for this very well paved route which takes a max of  hr to the nd waterfall guides charge  to  idr for a tour when the park entry price is just  idr and you really dont need a guidethere is a little stream crossing in the middle so bring slippersflipflops or maybe a towel to dry off your feets before putting your shoes back onits a very easy and enjoyable walk to the  huge waterfallsagain guides are not required
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: when we in senaru before descent out trek the day beforewe going to visit the waterfallsendang gile is nice waterfall and tiu kelep also nicer than sendang gile
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: these  waterfalls are situated just at the senaru foothill where most of the operators are based at it just a stone throw away with  mins walk to the first and perhaps another  to the seconda very good place to chill before your hike to cool your body and freeze your bones both waterfalls are majestic and stand a good feet each you could get a back massage just by standing under the fall pretty painful for those who can bear the sheer strength of the water gushing down on your headback
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: my partner and i read all the reviews here before apprehensively deciding to go ahead i wish we hadnt gotten so worried about all the comments saying how longdifficult it was we found it to be a very easy and beautiful walk  mins to st waterfall another  mins to nd one where you get to see monkeys insects and birds minor challenges at the large rocky steps and river crossings  however there were local kids helping everyone across the river with no issues i crossed wearing thongs and it was fine hiring a guide is unnecessary  just follow the crowds both waterfalls are worth a look and the second one has amazing cool clear water to swim in
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if u make a round trip on lombok i suggest u to do two trips one with de villages and temples and this one waterfalls separated its a long drive from senggigi to the waterfalls do the waterfalls and the sunset another tip visit a local market on the way and buy some fruits on the market people will love it u had to cross few rivers to get to the waterfallsso take good shoes with you u had to clime over some rocks but its doable u can swim near the waterfall but slippery if u dont want to take the steps back up u can take a scooter for some money only this part is the hardest one u also can use the tunnel last end at the way back some children will help you its just fun so do it i really like the trip eat something there in a restaurant with a good view its near the entrance
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: visit the falls based on recommendation we use guide and he helps us carry our stuff and inform us which path we should take i do not exercise and it took me  min to the first falls sendang gile and another  minutes to the second falls tiu kelepsendang gile is an easy walk but lots of stairs going down there are a few rest area in betweentiu kelep is not as hard as i thought but not easy at all i am glad i have a guide who make sure i know where to step and hold my hand when i needed as i need to cross a few currents be very careful as it gets very slippery as it get closer to the falls i always make sure i do not step on the wobbly stones on the way back we use tunnel it is easier for us to go through tunnel young kids guide us through tunnel totally recommended
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: located on senaru another alternatives to hike the mt rinjani the waterfalls sits sidebyside without guide services we went to sendang gile first both terrain is average where flipflops can handle come here early after the sunrise around  air and the water is still chilled but not freezing so fresh for a natural morning bath after the walks and less crowd sendang gile offers less extreme and more serenity sits there in silent and listen to the waterfalls is the best way to enjoy sendang giletiu kelep located on the same route you just need to turn left after the post during the descend from sendang gile waterfall relaxing walk in the beginning before it gets more interesting elderly visitors to be advised as we are hopping from stone to stone slippery surfaces and across currents but still controllable dont worry to get lost the path is clear and you may follow the others as this waterfall is quite famousget yourself fast to swim or youll froze of the wind tiu kelep is far more interesting and allows more swims as long as you can hold the cold the fresh air and water here is second to none get younger on every swim lol
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: four of us booked a private driver who we met as we were coming out from pool villa club and paid idrk for the round tripit took  and half hours to reach the rinjani view cafe at the start of the trail to the waterfallwe paid k each for a guide and understood some of this payment contributes to the upkeep of the paths it took around an hour to reach tiu kelep with panoramic views from some of the flat pathsthe walk is not excessively difficult but does involve walking on uneven surfaces slippery rocks rough steps up and down walking through a stream  feet deep and through even deeper water when you reach tiu kelepit would be wise to take a waterproof bag to hold your valuables phone etc do not carry food as you will come across monkeys along the way do remember to take and use mosquito repellentat the end of the walk you can take a dip in very cold water and may even see a rainbow created by the mist at the bottom of the waterfallworth doing if you have reasonable mobility and
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i booked this trip through sasak soul theyre amazing i definitely recommend they sorted transportation entry and guided us to the stunning waterfalls make sure you take water with you its a trek but its definitely worth it
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: dont take a guide the path is easy to follow skip the first waterfall as the place is very dirty waste everywhere dirty napkins food plastic all over the place the second fall is very impressive
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you want to see something many dont its well worth the walk two waterfalls for one effort is worthwhile hopefully soon the will clean up the plastic that appears everywhere but for sheer natural beauty its pretty darned impressive and i highly suggest the trek not for the to old so if your getting on in years be quick you will not be disappointed however having a swim up there is really cold water so be prepared
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: went using a driver that was recommended we paid for the transport pit stop another attractions and to this waterfall which included the guide  entrance feesits a wonderful walk up to the waterfall first waterfall is short walk followed by the nd waterfall is magnificent but need to go thru a mini challenging walk if ur not a walker
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: after bargaining with the local guides we managed to get rpk per person for the guiding fee the first waterfall took about  minutes walk and the second took around minutes after the first one both the waterfalls are soo huge and amazing the routes are consist of rocky steps and crossing rivers make sure you get a comfy shoe and they can be wet you could try their water slide under a short bridge and also their tunnel when you are on your way back from the second waterfall incredible experience
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it was amazing trip to north lombok and we visit the stunning waterfalls there the nature so amazing and the water from waterfall so cold two waterfalls down there just thirty minutes walk to get the biggest one
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it is a short trek to the waterfall about  hour from the main road it is a relatively easy walk and you can get a guide to bring you around we visited  waterfalls the first one was supposed to be a small one but it was quite big to us the nd one was definitely bigger and you can even swim therethere were lots of tourist after am so make sure to go there early if you want to beat the crowd
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: there are  levels of this rout you can walk by yourself for the st level for other level the officer said you needed to paid for a local guide the entrance fee is not free
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: a few tips you do not need a guide its an easy walk on a clear trail except for a few slippery rocks wear sandalsshoes that can go in water for the few rivercrossings go early to avoid the crowd do take a dip in the pool under the waterfall icebucket challenge x
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we had time to visit only lower part of waterfall at the entrance guys asked to pay an entrance fee but our tour guide let us go for free which was weird
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: this waterfall has really beautiful scenery and the walk to the site is nice as well this place mostly crowded on weekend but it still worth it to have a visit only few street food stall on the site it will be better to use local guide as there is no sign for direction
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: went with rinjani hero as part of the mt rinjani trekking tour see rinjani hero review for details stunning place well worth a visit
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: ive been to a few indonesian waterfalls and these have been kept relatively clean no piles of rubbish near the bottom the walk is a little precarious especially to the second waterfall as it involves a few rapid river crossings and climbing over slippery rocks we paid  each for a local guide who carried our stuff helped us with the river crossings and watched our things while we swam under the waterfall but to be honest you probably dont need a guide the place is busy enough that you can just follow others to figure out how to get to the falls
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: quite nice walk no need to take guide to take this walk of course they recommend going with extra paid guide be very very careful while going in water on rocks  very slippery you can fall badly in a second  i did  very painful and you can easily broke something but views are amazing
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: tiu kelep and sendang gile is in the same area there will be hundreds of steps to go to sendang gile and more rocky easy path to go to tiu kelep rubber flip flop and or hiking sandals are preferable sneakers is ok but you will have to take it off while you go to tiu kelep coz the path to tiu kelep have to cross  shallow rivers however sneakers are ok if you want only to go to sendang gile  time admission fee in one gate to both waterfalls please aware you may be and get wet especially in tiu kelep waterfall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: make sure to visit early in the morning to avoid the crowd this place is magnificent the water is aa clear as crystal we cpuld not ask for more
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the scenery is great tiu kelep is much better will never forget our day here  the most pristine clean water encountered anywhere in asia  no rubbish the most refreshing swim ive ever had underneath tiu kelepbut be warned  you need to be confident in the water to even consider getting in to the pool by the waterfall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: take a local guide we used one from the hotel because even though its well marked its helpful for knowing the nature and better routestake or wear water shoes as theres a good part of a stream to cross with a rocky bed many wore flip flops which dont give much securityand look for the lombok  about  the way back to tiu kelepa local women set up selling fresh fried banana fritters and veggie cakeswe bought on the way out and idr fed us and our guidewe were about  hours and total kmfor a soft trek i was pretty tired though you could hire a scooter to go in along the irrigation canalhighly recommended
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: lombok got numerous waterfalls mostly in nothern partof the island you can reach sendang gile and tiu kelep waterfalls after  hours driving from senggigi when you arrive you have to bought the entry ticket sendang gile waterfall is easy to find but tiu kelep was a bit hard to reach so when you decided to go to tiu kelep in the next level you have to take guide to accompany you
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we went here and after reading the horror stories we came prepared we arrived on our scooter from senggigi in about  hours we parked it secured for  rupiah bought the entry tickets for  rupiah each and thats all we spent no annoying people offering to be our guidesendang gile was very easy and crowded but the waterfall itself was beautiful tiu kelep was a bit hard to reach with some wading through water but nothing you cant figure out without a guide theres only one clear path toward it its worth the  minutes extra as its less crowded and more impressiveby the way the path to tiu kelep is the first left when you go back up from sendang gile we missed it and walked all the way back up i stead of towards tiu kelep
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: one of the things to see in lombok are these waterfalls  different levels  the second level is amazing  a walk through the river  beautiful forest  animals  children helping you to get trough the river go until you have the water  super cold water  massage from the waterfall  great experience we took a guide at the start  he explains you and helps you best when it doesnt rain  slippery  put on waterresistent shoes  hendrik
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the first waterfall is  mins walk descending steps beautiful but not too good to be regretted later if not visited the second waterfall is  mins hike along a tunnel one has to cross some streams fun the second waterfall is beautiful but the water is too cold to have a shower the walk through the tunnel while descending is funthis is a nice break from the beach time in lombok and gilithe guide fee and entrance fee though is not worth the experience try to avoid getting a guide the waterfalls are easy to locate just pay the entrance fee once again a guide is just a waste of money
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: watch out for the scammers at the entrance we didnt go unfortunatly after being to it was  each for entry then they changed the price to  for both we road a scooter and left not trusting it would be safe around thieves
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: before descent our trek a day before trek we have bit time to visit waterfall bothwe are really enjoyed this even short time only
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: when we arrived at senaru before trekwe took to waterfallwe go both its really nice waterfall and still naturethe waterfall very cold and clean
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: you must walk to the second waterfall and go in for the dip do not try to swim close to the point of water fall drop it will suck you in just swim around the edge and feel the breeze and splashes
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we hiked to these falls on a tuesday and still encountered crowds of locals but only a few tourists however the falls are beautiful and the hike just challenging enough to add some excitement sendang gile is reached first by walking down  rocky uneven steps which only takes about  minutes the lush jungle is beautiful and the mist when caught in the sunlight reflected as a rainbow there were many folks here standing sitting and playing near the  meter high falls which are very impressive tiu kelep waterfall is above sendang gile with a gentle but rocky climb with many large tree roots the rocky trail is slippery but many were hiking in flip flopsthere are three river crossings for which a guide would be helpful unfortunately the trail is best hiked in sturdy soled shoes but the river crossings require sandals i brought both and just changed and it worked great the water flows fast but is not deep if you know where youre going the cool water felt great in the very hot and muggy conditions the  meter falls are beautiful and there were a multitude of folks enjoying the water and the scenery the crowds were a detraction but the falls were still stunning on our return several young boys on the opposite side of the river held out their hands to assist our crossing very cute we also saw young locals swinging on vines and calling out in their best tarzan imitation it was a fun time and wed do it again
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: a guide is a good idea if you are planning to walk to the falls as the river crossings can be quite tricky also if you go anywhere near the falls be prepared to get wet as the force of the water creates a very fine mistrainit is a good idea to wear sandals or shoes that have a good grip and can be immersed in water not flip flops as you can lose them easily when crossing swift water
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i never thought previously if senaru has such beautiful waterfallswhat in my bucket list was only hiking the sleeping beast mt rinjaniit was me and two friends as we reached the village of senaru quite early an hour before mid day offered a free additional sightseeing trip for booking rinjani hike package arranged by rinjani backpacker senaru to explore the stunning sendang gile and tiu kelep waterfallswalking through thousands of down stairs and tracing the path by the river turned off by the amazing scenery of the sighttips for you who plan to hike mount rinjani make sure to book a flight that enables you touch down in lombok in the morning or at least around so that you can visit two waterfalls that will make you stop breathing
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we paid rp per person for the tickets which is a good price the waterfalls are beautiful and definitely worth visit we were a little disappointed though because we read that it is quiet place instead there were hordes of locals taking pictures in the waterfalls taking showers and just sitting there on the rocks we didnt have a chance to take a picture without other people also by the first waterfall there are people selling snacks and it spoils the atmosphere
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: weve been there a few times taking different guests each time we took an ojek motorbike taxi to the furthest one sendang gile  then returned to the entrance to walk to the closer one tiu kelep  which was an easy walk downhill and then back up tiu kelep was pretty but very crowded with school groups when we went so there wasnt even anywhere to sit and relax in contrast tiu kelep was less crowded and after a swim we found somewhere quiet to sit and relax and have a picnic and enjoy the scenery very beautiful location and highly recommended for a halfday trip from mataram or senggigi but no you need to waste money on for a guide
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we paid  ruppiah per person be careful with the guides in front the sign with the entrance fees is not immediately visible when standing in front of the entrance and after telling him we did not want a guide he first made us an offer for  fortunately my husband saw the sign with the official priceswe did not take a guide as we just wanted some peace and solitude for once and not the constant small talk that comes with local guidesif youre not sure where to go just follow the groups it was well worth the time and we spent a couple of hours at the two waterfalls
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: to get to this waterfall you must either walk a downhill trek over a rough rocky  metre path or take the offer of a mopedmotorcycle pillion ride offered by the local youths at a fee i took the motorcycle option without realising the risks involved on the precarious hillside journey it was narrow rough and slippery in places and the moped i was on was not in full control in places my weight was such that every bump we went over resulted in me pushing forward the driver until his navel was pressing on the handlebars he was losing control while riding downhill to the waterfall we were frequently met on the blind bends by returning motorcycles and our handlebars clipped each other a recipe for disaster in the makingthis is an attraction the benefits of which are really not worth the risks involved i am sure it would not be covered by any sensible travel insurance
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: my trip was arranged and guided by rinjani lighthouse our journey started at am from our resort not getting there too early because the water is even colder too early in the morningthe waterfall scene is nice swimming in the water is cold but yeah was really greatgo go go
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i went into the sendang gile waterfall very tall waterfall hit my back and feeling kind of pricking pain icy cold water and clean
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we when to tiu kelep waterfallthere is really nice pool to get swimwe just need to be carefulcos the waterfall is strong
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: this is a waterfall where its not just about the scene but where you have to take a nice dip in the water it is voluminous enough that you just can not not get in unless you have a total fear of water come prepared with wet clothes and waterproof camera at least have em protected in a plastic bag etc  not sure which is which but the waterfall which took the longer walk is much better than the first so go there its worth the walk
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the first waterfall was easy to get to and was nice but there was loads of rubbish everywhere and there were locals burning plasticrubbish you cant swim at this one the second one was much harder to get to most people take a guide but we didnt and we got there fine youve got to cross the river so be prepared to get wet this waterfall was awesome and was nice for a quick dip it was pretty cold
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: its nice but quite cold on that rainy day to soak in the water at the fall a best place to combine with a rinj trek as most guesthouses are at senaru and ours was a  min walk to the fall entrance
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: beautiful gorgeous waterfalls i recommend to visit during the morning less crowds that makes the cold yes cold worth it
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i had a private driver and a guide was organised by the tour co access to the first falls is by steps and takes about  mins to get there the falls view was pleasant and taking photos was fine provided you take from the right hand side as the air current will spray moistureaccess to the second falls required a bit more effort and as previous reviews have stated to wear flip flops or plastic based sandals once your flipflops are wet you stand the risk of slipping out of themthere are basic ablution facilities a few meters short of the falls and were fairly clean the view of the falls is excellent and you can swim in the water if you dont mind the cool temperature taking photos close by is not going to happen as the spray is fairly intense you can get reasonable shots about  meters away if you choose the best spot but be aware the rocks are extremely slipperywater from the falls is directed into channels for irrigation
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: to get the waterfall is very easyfrom starting point to first one its about  minutesstill about  to second one the trek is more easy tha from starting point to first one
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: beautiful walk through the trees to the waterfall most of the path is easy but you do have to cross the river in a couple of places and it gets rather slippery there so do take care great to go in the pool at the foot of the waterfall you couldnt really swim there as the waterfall was so powerful cold too great experience though
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i did to waterfall middle of aprilwaterfall is really close from the accommodations  minutes walk only from my hotel to first onethe water its was so press and cleani took shower on the first one is quite pressing but i am enjoyed it
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i did to waterfall before we discent our trekwaterfall its so really nature and press waterdo it before trek
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: some interesting jungle replete with monkeys the path is a bit slippery when wet so choose appropriate footwear
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we went to the first  waterfalls which are within easy walking distance half hour or so to the first one from most apartments in senaru you can swim at the season waterfall and youll see monkeys lizards and other wildlife along the way
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: sendang gile waterfall is very nice and easy access it just  minutes walking down the stepsfor tiu kelep it took another  minutes the access is not difficult just a bit challenging but when you are arrive you will find the paradise you can shower theredont forget to try the access following the water flow when you are going back the parking areaits safe and funenjoy it buddies
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it took us about  to visit both waterfalls the guide was fun and you will cross rocky rivers and step on slippery stones our guide advised us to wear sandals or flip flops because we would be getting our feet wet up until the quads so empty your pockets but this made it very dangerous dont listen to him and just wear hikingold shoes that can get wet at the big waterfall you can swim for a bit on the way there is a monkey forest and the monkeys are not shy at all and just come eat right out of your hand it is worth the visit if you stay nearby not so much if its hours away
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we booked a private tour here which included the monkey forest k for our private driver when we parked up he sorted a guide nice young lad for k but we gave him k as previous reviews have said you dont really need a guide but sometimes it helps to give the local people something back the waterfalls are nice but just too busy especially when we went on a sunday with locals the trek was okay but it was an easy path all the way  like a conveyer belt waiting for people to cross the river worth a visit but the jungle hike to munduk waterfalls in bali is a better walk
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: on day  before the trek we arrived quite late at senaruso when we want go to waterfall our time is not muchour time is possible going to the first onenot to tiu kelep waterfall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it took an half hour to reach tiu kelep waterfall through the foot of mountain rinjani cold water but so gorgeous
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the local name the water fall as tiu kelep because the mist formed from the water you can feel it from around  meters all your cloth will be wet the water is fresh and the water fall is beautifuli amaze when the first time i saw it you have to cross small river walk around  mins up and down i have problem with my knee but it is worth to visit the tiu kelep enjoying cool and fresh air fresh water and beautiful sceneryon the way back we go to sendang gile water fall it is  step water fall high but you can not swim as on tiu kelep
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the walk down from the restaurant at senaru not the main approach but a much quieter one was a beautiful walk downhill through the jungle the first waterfall sendang gile was huge and the boys went for a much needed swim quite crowded when we went especially with local tourists another  minute trek through the jungle to the next waterfall tiu kelep was much nicer and the setting absolutely beautiful much less crowded there too highly recommended to take a guide with you if you want to go to the second waterfall nice place for a picnic and a couple of hours of rest and relaxation before climbing back up
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: after the sindang gila waterfall you reach after  minutes another breathtaking waterfall you have to cross a few rivers which is really slippery but a real adventure directly at the waterfall you can swim underneath in the pond take waterproof bags for the cameras and mobile phones as the water us spreading all over a must see
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: very impressive waterfalls definitely worth your time bring your waterproof camera and some swimming trunks  its time to swim in a waterfall pond
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: before trek on day before we did walking to explore the waterfall minutes walk we reach sendang gileand continue to the second water waterfall and took swim there quite longreally realnaturally i am likedhighly recommend
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we stayed in sengigi and the drive to the waterfall was long hilly with lots of bends so drive with caredespite the long drive the walk to the  waterfalls were amazingwe  pax engaged a local guide there  irp recommendedst fall is just min walk from the entrance nd walk took us about min and nd fall is beautiful and we had a great time theretrekking back was easy and the guide lead us back via a short cut it was a min walk through a pitch dark tunnel great experiencedefinitely recommend to visit for first timer
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i would go to the falls early in the morning to avoid the big crowd eventhough senaru is a sleepy tourist town and doesnt get too many visitors compared to the more popular beach towns and the gilis but the falls very well visited by locals and its one of the few attractions in senaru so everyone goes to itthe falls are very beautiful but again the place is small and hard to enjoy with too many people
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we met sendang gile with a bit of a shrug of the shoulders to be honest but dont lose faith  they saved the wow factor for tiu kelepafter an easy  min stroll to sg you definitely get more of a challenge on the way to tiu kelep you get more of a walk and then have to cross a fast moving stream a couple of times which i hear can cause some very astute travellers to almost lose their flipflops despite their obvious vigilance and awesomeness duck under a low hanging branch and navigate many slippery rocks honestly its not for people with mobility issues and some wet shoes or sandals would be the best choicetiu kelep is a stunner anyway its a beautiful half ring of falls with a spout over the top all going down into a central pool well worth the trek there oh yeah and now back
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we booked transport and a guide through our hotel in senggigi which cost idr  yes you can do it cheaper with a blue bird taxi without a guide but for comfort and safety we felt this was the best optionthe journey from senggigi was about  hours and our driver stopped at photo opportunities a few spots along the way with views of the gili islands and the rice fields we arrived and were met by our guide who said we should wear flip flops as well have to cross a river to get to tiu kelep flip flops were ok but not easy for this luckily i had some wet shoes with grip but my partner went barefoot in the end as it was very slipperysendang gile is a short walk down some stairs and is beautiful to see with waterfalls running through the trees at this point i was dubious about the neccessity of a guide as the path was clear and easytiu kelep is more impressive and more difficult to get to more trekking than stairs to this one this is where the guide was extremely helpful as he led us across the safest route in the river and kept our belonging safe whilst we went for a swim in the rock pool the water is freezing but very refreshing after the jungle trek very exhilarating experiencewell worth the trip and the cost is fair for the help and service we had we also tipped our guide for carrying our bags across the river and our wet shoes as we climbed the stairs to the exittheres a restaurant at the top where our driver waited whilst we ordered lunch with a great view of mount rinjani and the valley below
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you go here expect a little trek for the second waterfall and full on trek for the third onewe only did the two but it was well worth itfirst waterfall is easy and it rather lovely you can sit and have your lunch there the second one is a little bit more of an effort as you have to go over a fast flowing river a few times and it can be very slippy but once you get there it absolutely stunning if not a bit busy but you can see why people go you can swim and jump in really enjoyed itthey try all sorts to get you a guide and try to rip you with all sorts of unofficial things only buy for  at the gate with an official as best it can be personwe got taken to shops and various people but we read the reviews and said no are you official no you are not so we did not do that all all just please be careful you dont really need a guide we never you just tag onto everyone elsethats aside its well worth id and not to be missed
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: amazing waterfall sendang gile in the north of lombok bayan and to reaching the other waterfall will walk to the jungle
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: twohour drive from sengigi will bring you to the base camp of mt rinjaniexploring the two beautiful waterfalls took us about  hours it took about  minutes hike down an easy trail to the first waterfall sendeng gile it was a beautiful hike as you can enjoy the fresh air  gorgeous green scenery you cant swim at sendeng gile just enjoy the sound of the rushing water  snapping pictures of the beautiful scenerythe reach at the second waterfall tiu kelep took us around  minutes with minute rest we need to crossed the rivers and streams and it was really challenging for me however the view you get after going through all the challenges was really amazing here you can get wet the water was absolutely freezingafter spent almost half an hour at tiu kelep we hiked back to the base camp we crossed the irrigation water tunnel where we are required to use torchlight since we have not bring any there were  kids assisting us by showing the light under the tunnel we did give some token cash to the kids for helping usyou may also purchase drinks  snacks at the checkpoint along the trailnot an inch of any of us were left dry after trekking you may get your lunch at the cafe in any base camp the price for a meal of fried rice will costs you around rpkrpkit is recommended to bring an extra clothes as you may want to change it after you get wet wear a proper shoes  attire and bring some snacks if you plan to have a picnic there
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the trek in takes about an hour its not too difficult but i would recommend a local guide so you know you are on the right track bring waterproof bags to store your phones as you will get wet swimsuit extra pair of sandals there are a few small rivers to cross so best if you dont trek alone otherwise its really enjoyable water is crystal clear and the waterfalls are amazing definitely a highlight of our trip
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i went there in the morning around  am no people there yet so its very nice sendang gile was like  minutes walk on a concrete steps from the parking it was small waterfall but nice then i went to the second waterfall the tiu kelep it takes minutes easy hike the water is so clear big pool to swim stunning waterfall recommended but be early so you can enjoy the peace and view for yourself tips bring extra clothes for change even you dont plan for a swim because the strong force from the waterfall was like rain and wet your clothes
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we went to this place on thursday  march  with a tour guide ince we reached the place we had to hire a local guide to take us inside the journey to the first waterfall sendang gile took only  minutes it was mostly a downhill on concrete streps nothing dangerousthe view of sendang gile waterfall was breathtaking we see many tourist enjoying their time at the waterfall after a brief stop we continued to the second waterfall tiu kelep it took us about  minutes hike  of it was on a trail  is walking across and through the waterfall stream we had to be careful yo avoid injury the stones and rocks in the stream are sharp and slippery and it is best to wear proper footwearafter a challenging hike we reach the tiu kelep waterfall it was unbelievably beautiful and amazing standjng near the waterfall is like weathering a thunderstorm it was windy and wet the force of the  metre waterfall creates a strong wind and rain around the area the water was cold but it was fantastic we enjoyed every minute it was worth the entire onehour journeymy advice is whenever you are in lombok make sure to include this place in your itinerary
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: this waterfall ide very greath place for spend time the view wow so amazingwhen we coming in the water i fell so freshthen our mind so clearthe local people there believe that water come from rinjani mountain that way is healthy clear and cleanplease try and enjoy here
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the location of the waterfall tiu kelep is about  minutes walk down the path of the waterfall sindang gile this waterfall offers incredible views and the weather is very cool and fresh this trip is  minutes footpaths paid off when up at the site
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the walk and subtle hike through the lush greenery wlecomed by the majestic waterfalls at the end of the journey was truy a fulfilling and invigorating experience worth the time  effort highly recommended
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: love the waterfalls at sendang gile and tiu kelep waterfallls just amazingly beautiful it was worth the walk to see gods creation love the beautiful scenery our guide was quiet but very helpful throughout the journey he ensured our safety i enjoyed the trip
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: so my girlfriend and i came to indonesia on a girls trip and stopped in lombok to see some waterfalls we stayed in senggigi and easily rented a scooter for the day from our airbnb host it was about a  hour ride to the sindang gile falls but it was very simple you dont need to hire a car or tour guide to take you there we followed one road the entire way there only turning right once when the road directed us towards bryan a small village close to the falls we stopped for gas once and spent r once we arrived men directed us where to park and showed us a map of the falls location they told us it was the law that you have a guide to the second falls but we had heard thats not the case at all we told him we werent interested and that we were only going to the first set of falls anyways at the entrance gate you should pay no more than r per person so we paid  for the two of us and made our way in there are steep stairs down to the first waterfall so be careful not to slip as you are about to reach the first falls notice a bumpy stone trail off to the right that leads you to the second waterfall we stopped for photos at the first set of falls and headed on our way no one stopped us and there were a few other groups coming back that didnt have a guide the only thing i was glad about was that there was a group of guys ahead of us with a guide so we were able to watch the easiest place where they crossed the river and just follow them otherwise theres no need for a guide at all just follow the trail it was pouring rain by the time we reached the second falls but it was amazing definitely worth it when we came back the river was rushing a little quicker due to the downpour but we made it across fine and gave one of the guys r when we got back to the parking lot for watching our scooter we did the entire trip for r and ive read of people who spent over a million dont believe the scammers it can easily be done yourself great trip
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: this place is nice to chill out had an different experience i am planning to go next time again with my friends
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: its a long walk on hilly terrain but its all worth it its especially fantastic for nature lovers to enjoy flora and fauna and soak in the waterfall we even bring some pack food to enjoy by the waterfall my teenage kids love it despite challenging climb up and down
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: you dont need a guide to sendang gile but definitely need one to tiu kelep the route to tiu kelep is a bit tricky and its best if you have local to guide you to the place and dont forget to slide through the water before the tunnel on your way back good experience but beware of getting your pants ripped
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: easy to reachwhile our driver already call his friend at location to accompany uswith his capacity we are satisfied our visit
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: little bit difficult to find and the road is not that good  we were travelling on a motorbike but we found it  and stopped at a coffee shop on the hill there was a guy who was a guide and we paid him   to take us to the waterfalls he was a really nice guy and pointed out all the fruit trees along the way and he knew a lot of the area as well
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: sendang gile easy to reach but tiu kelep more far and half way we have to cross river but the view in tiu kelep is more beautiful
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: went with private car and driver and some guests was truely an amazing experience  you can swim there as well there is entry fee about rp which is so cheap to experience such a natural wonder truely beautiful experience
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i went there with my brother and sister actually my parents was there but i think its not suitable for elderly from the parking area we have to walk along in a certain distance which have saveral stairs and walk up and down to get the waterfall area thats why its not suit for elderly peopleits quite adventurous for young people me and my sibling enjoy it and it worth because when you meet the waterfall all your effort is rewarded
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you intend to visit tiu kelep waterfall pls engage a guide who will approach you at the entrance the going rate is idr  excluding tips which you are highly encouraged to give at the end of the trip if the guide has done a good job
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you are in senaru dont miss this waterfallits so refreshing to take a walk to tiu kelep fresh air a bit river water trekkingits about  mins walk to tiu kelepdont forget to slide on the natural waterslide at the drainage and hire the local child as your guide to play with they still build some changes room and or toilet near the waterfall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we when go to waterfallwe used sapar for our guideabout  minutes to first one from starting poinand still about one hour to the second onetiu kelep is nicer than sendang gilewe can swimbut the way its was not easy if you without the guide so i recommended take a guide for your safety
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: actually the walk to the waterfalls were not v tough but because of the sudden heavy rain things got v trickythe currents were v strong so made the river crossing quite a challenge every step became a mini waterfall and paths were rather slippery especially the pebbled ones an alternative route when going back was via the big underground drainage we tried this route and the water level came up to our knees which made walking not that easy esp in the darkhaving a torch at hand would certainly help
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: went as a family with a  yo and  yo it was an amazing adventure for all of us first time they had seen a waterfall so imagine seeing something as spectacular as tiu kelep and sendeng gile our guide was very good in making sure we were safe and went at a reasonable pace we arrived there early before the crowd came in and was very peaceful the waterfalls are stunning breathtaking to say the leastthe trek was doable for the kids i wouldnt consider it difficult for adults there are river crossings but our guide made sure we knew where to step and how to move alongnote the water is very very cold highly recommended a must go for nature lovers
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the first waterfall is kind of a double waterfall because one floats into anotherthe waterfall itself is really nice however it is the same as everywhere on lombok plastic waste everywhere locals that try to rip you off of course you have to pay for everything entrance fee and parking if you enter the waterfall at the wrong place then people tell you that you are only allowed to go to the second waterfall with a tour guide they show a piece of paper with where the law is written on of course its total nonsense you can go there on your own and no one will stop youpersonally i think its a waste of time to go there because you will need at least hmin to get there
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the first one from the entrance will take you roughly about  minutes to reach mostly descending towards the waterfall and some up but mostly paved all the way bigger ground area at sendang gile so you can sit around and relax as well as get some drinks as there are some vendors found here tiu kelep from here is about  minutes to get to depending again on fitness level but mostly a little ascending and descending with a portion crossing ankle deep fast flowing stream finally arrived at the waterfall and you will notice the water spray depending on the wind direction and velocity of the falls quite difficult to take photos as it will be packed with people i am pretty sure when you get there so be patient and you may get a chance to get a nice pic a much nicer waterfall and a must to get into the water here sadly i see garbage and litter left by visitors which is not something i would hope to see trekking back to senaru you can either head through a dark tunnel which more or less works like a shortcut in knee deep gushing water or take back the same route
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: wonderful afternoon visit to amazing waterfalls  you can swim at one of them the surrounding area is also beautiful and locals are friendly we did an afternoon trip from gili trawangan and then went on to stay the night at senggigi
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: this place was beautiful but we felt we were scammed a bit by our driver and whatever dodgy set up he has going on we paid k for him for the day which we were happy to do we asked to go somewhere for lunch and he took us to some run down tour office with a few mouldy chairs outside we were told it would be a hours walk and would cost k for a guide the same as our driver for the entire day we asked if we could do it without a guide and were told we would get lost we managed to negotiate k for the two of us but felt afterward that a guide was unnecessary the paths are really clear and there are lots of people doing the same track so its pretty hard to get lost the waterfall itself was stunning dont get a guide
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: my group of friends and i went to lombok to climb rinjani but we were turned back down at pos  so our trekking guide decided to bring us to see the waterfalls to try to lift our spirits upit was beautiful the trip there needs you to climb stairs and cross rivers but when you get to the waterfall it is all worth it definitely lifted our moods upon the way back our guide let us walk through the drains as a short cut instead of walking along the trail that was an odd experience but super funhighly recommended to visit
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: more like a virgin waterfall this place is pretty untouched with very few visitors as its tucked in away  minutes into the jungle u need to climb plenty of stairs and hurdle through streams of flowing water but when u reach it its worth every second
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: well to be honest im quite upset with the tourist information system in this placewhen i arrived my driver brought me to the first tourist information center and the guy there explain the contour and how many waterfall can we achieve how long we will walk and etc and then he offered us a package for  person which cost rp  yes you read it right almost a million rupiah just to see  waterfalls and because i was in a very bad mood i yelled and said no way lets get out of here its a scam right in front of the guyi just came back from rinjani and for that price i can get my own porter for maybe  days in rinjani no way ill pay for a guide that much only to go to the waterfallsi asked my driver to drive us back to senggigi even though its  hours ride from there lol and the other driver who heard me told my driver to take us to another tourist information centeri wanted to decline but my friends really want to see this waterfalls so we ended up going to another tourist center where i asked them directly how much theyll charge usand they answer with a list of price which in the end cost us more rp personand i answered with a firm no we explained to them we just got back from rinjani and will not accept the price they scared us with a story about a manwoman got possessed in the middle of track or something like that and i kept saying nomy friend bargain the price and ask for rp  for  persons take it or leave it and they take it i assume you can bargain more if you have time or just go straight to the waterfall like the local and pay rp fortunately our guide quite good he explained the name origin the path help us with slippery path and also take care of our possessions when we played in the waterfalls he even provide the flashlight to enter the tunnel oh you should definitely try the tunnel when you get back from tiu kelep its fantastic experience and kinda spooky if you afraidfor the waterfall itself i like the tiu kelep more and if you want to swim or relaxing choose the tiu kelep and pass the sendang giletips bring a sandal and wear shorts because youve to cross the river to go to tiu kelep
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: tiu kelep is stunning and the short hike there is also beautiful go straight to tiu kelep first skip sendang gile and go early to beat the crowds from town you dont need a guide when you hit the river and there doesnt seem to be a path just wade up through the river and youll see it on the left
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the best thing about sendang gila and tiu kelep waterfalls are that they have not constructed manmade structures around these which usually makes convenient for many visitors but then destroys the natural scenic beauty and the surrounding of an attraction such as waterfalls it is not required in this case the experience is exhausting as there are several stairs to walk up and down small streams to crossover and slippery rocks to climb and pass however when you see the beauty of these falls in pristine state and cool fresh water flowing as transparent as wind it just makes you forget the hardship of reaching this place plan properly take guide as preferable unless you are a prohiker i recommend agus a lean and young local with adventurous spirit while returning from the second waterfall he took us through water tunnel which was amazing and one of the best experiences we had he also took our bag to carry which was very helpful while crossing small streams too he took i and my wife one by one across which was very careful approach for nonregular visitors of such terrain a guide is always handy i could provide the number of agus the guide if you need else when you reach the parking lot before entering the waterfall area ask for agusthe trekking time for nontrekkers such as us took more than  hours as we were slow both the waterfalls have basic toilet but better use the one at parking lot each toilet has a usage charge of k rp at first waterfall they sell fried items such as pisang goreng but better you keep your own food in case your journey happens to be during midday and if you tend to get hungry during those hours and do try water tunnel
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: need to be physically fit between  step to climb before reaching the waterfall beautiful and virgin waterfall but public amenities was missing
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we booked through our hotel a day trip yes you could call it a day trip cause it takes about h to get there from senggigi for around idr  the way there is very nice the scenery is beautiful and with barely any traffic in the hotel they told us we should not pay more than  pax for the guide but recommended to take one as the second waterfall was hard to find without it once there the tourist information wanted to charge us  each but bargained for  in the end with no cookies and other goodies they were including although i think we could have got it for  use your bargain skillsthe first waterfall is nice easy path with people but not too bad you can go behind the big one which is the cool part the second waterfall was great extremely beautiful place cold refreshing water with a natural pool indeed harder to find not much of a path but with the amount of people you can just follow the crowd you have to cross river so would recommend for you to wear appropriate shoes the way is pretty and saw a few monkeys the way back you should take the tunnel its about  but pretty cool and differentworth time energy and money with rinjani closed for hiking good way to go into nature and escape senggigi
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: i went here with my husband and it took about  hours drive from the city i read the review regarding the entrance fee which includes the guide so the hint that i got from my driver its better that the driver pay the fee and inform them that it was a package that way the fee will not be that expensive i got rp  for each person in my opinion it is better to use a guide as he knows the track very well and he was very helpful our guide also good in taking a pictureso the attraction has two main waterfalls the first one can be reached about  minutes walk the path was easy and safe with many steps the second waterfall took about  minutes from the first one the path was more heavy but still easy it was a little bit slippery so just be careful the path will includes walking through small river with rocks the second waterfall was bigger than the first one the water was very cold and clear take a bath and feel refreshed going back our guide offer us to took the tunnel the tunnel was very dark but it has a hole every  m which can be a source of light from outside i felt adventurous going back through the tunnelbetter to visit this place in the morning as it can be crowded at noon and afternoon
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it is a nice walk inside the forest to reach  of the waterfalls with first one sendang not having option to swim in it second one tiu kelep though gives you a chance to breeze and have be careful of strength of the water splashing a dip into fresh cold wateryou dont need but can take a tour guide with you to see both sendang gile and tiu kelepin the way back you will see plenty of monkey aroundtrip time  approx hourscost   aud per head with the guide
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we visited the waterfalls this december  the waterfalls are ok  although i felt it has been overrated there are much better waterfalls the saddest part is those touts  that cheats the tourist our driver rented car cooked up a story about him able to get a good rate for guide initially the socalled government information center asked for  rupiah to guide  persons the driver than intervene and the price dropped to  rupiah we gave and agree to pay since we have driven  hours to reach that spot from singigi personally  its not worth the hassle and being cheated by those touts
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it was a great experience well worth it after the drive  approx  hours from senggigiwe organised a private car by asking our taxi driver from the night before the car cost idr  for the whole day and the driver waited whilst we walked to the waterfalls and backwhen you arrive at the tourist office you are greeted by the organiser who will walk you through the fees standard prices printed on a sheet for a group of  seeing the  out of  waterfalls the price was idr  each which included the guide and some snacks fruit water and biscuits the round trip to the waterfalls including the swim was roughly  hours with the first waterfall being only  mins away but not suitable for swimming and not very largewe didnt have enough time to go to the rd waterfall as we were told it would take another  or so hours but we were told the nd waterfall is possibly the best onein terms of attire we wore shoes expecting serious hiking but it wasnt too complex when choosing shoes either wear some shoes you can cross streams with or just wear flip flops very doable in flip flops there was no insects so shirts and shorts were fine and we took a light rain coat as it rained half way through a towel is a must if you intend to swim definitely worth a swim under the big waterfall and a backpack is recommended to free your hands for the trekthe guides were very friendly and helpful they carried your snacks and umbrella and helped you along the way in addition to providing all the useful factsthe nature walk wasnt the best i have seen however the whole experience was worth it the drive takes you through many villages and the swim at the end helps you escape the humid weather a definite must when visiting lombok
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: we booked this from gili air with our resort now im quite picky about which bodies of water i want to enter into my very early memories of kota tinggi are not very fond ones  crowded and you dont know what people have left in those waters the same goes for the hot springs and crystal pool tour in krabi  an intriguing sightexperience and a refreshing walk through the nature reserve but i dont think id like to share those waters with everyonewith the waterfalls sendang gile and tiu kelep this was different its got to be practically impossible to foul the chill crystal waters that plummet from several stories above you also it is a real experience to approach the crashing waters spray billows out forcefully blinding you and sending water droplets flying at impossible trajectories braving the cold one inches forward to stand under the waterfall for a massage but it is really something to feel how water can fall so fast and hard that it hurts like the blow of a baseball batthe waterfalls are both amazing sights and the trek you take to reach them both is fairly simple and interesting bring wet shoes or sandals for you will be splashing through the streams on your way there one more thing to note make sure you get the earliest trip possible to enjoy the waterfalls with relatively lesser people ours began at am at gili air this is important  the later you begin the more crowded the place will be
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: there are two waterfalls in this activity the first is a clear waterfall were water comes out of the side of the mountain it is about a min walk from the bus drop off you can walk under the waterfall but there is no swimming the next waterfall is about a  min walk with good tracks some ups and downs but very achievable the local guide explains the falls and the way some water is taken for irrigation for the rise fields we visited during heavy rain so the river crossing were difficult due the the fast running currents wear good trekking footwear as feet get wet and rocks sharp and slippery the second waterfall comes from the river approve as well as from the side of the mountain both brown and clear water flows normally you can swim under these falls but the currents were to strong during our visit lunch available at the bus drop off area at the end of the walk ok to tip the guide
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the waterfall is nice and worth visiting as far as i know a local guide is required by the time we visited the falls it was a little overcrowded may  combine this trip with visiting real traditional villages there are multiple in the neighborhood
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: the journey to the waterfalls is as enjoyable as when reaching the destinationthe trail is through a beautiful nature trailpart of the journey involves wading through streams and slippery stretch make sure you bring suitable shoesbring some snacks and drinking water as wellnot that taxing for the average person
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: it was a part of my rinjani trekking package i didnt expect it to be so breathtaking glad that i rushed to this island early to visit this waterfall
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: first fall  second fall are easy to walk and this place has many fun  enjoy things you can find monkey family and you can enjoy in to the beautiful fall very easily
Name: Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfall

Review: if you visit lombok island dont forget to visit selong belanak beach nice beach and i recomend you to stay at oyo  surya villa is best accomodation arround selong belanakceapes price and verry friendly staff alsothanks
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: it takes hm from airports the beach is crowded but it also very clean wow good for learn surfingthe local residents was so nice and they dont go up in price or charge too much for rent bench or surfboard but you can still bid would love to go back there
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: a fantastic place to spend the day quiet and relaxed atmosphere with nice warungs for cold drinks and good food very few if any pedlars fantastic swimming beach
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: our family spotted selong belanak on the map as a bay that seemed to be a quieter option than kuta but almost didnt come after we read the reviews about the scams and robberies we decided to be cautious and stay a week we wanted our kids to have surfing lessons through the week and i wanted to rent a board on arrival we were approached by a rep from each of the surf schools we asked what happens if a board breaks and were told no problem if board breaks in lessons we are  responsible  renting a board only is a different situation we eventually went with eva surf school as the rep seemed least sleazy we were still very concerned about the board breaking scam and horror stories we had read i drew up a contract in bahasa that we both signed saying that if a board broke it was their responsibility i checked the boards very carefully and ended up taking the board that my daughter had used for her lesson on inspecting the foam boards at most of the places along the beach they seemed okay but when you looked closely in certain light you could see that some had breaks through them that had been carefully concealed it seemed as though some of these boards had been rewrapped with new top skins to disguise a break and make the board look newselong belanak is a very impressive beach and worth a visit but be very careful renting a board
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: selong balanak is just a wonderful place beautiful beach few tourists  just a place to be relax and enjoy the sea
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: they give you broken boards and then charge you  million rupiah this is a scam and criminelwe dont come back for sure even if the beach is beautiful
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: never ever again  they give you a broken and slightly fixed board  which will break after  minutes in the water  then they charge you  mill  they even drive with you to kuta to get the money this are cheaters  all work together  we have been cheated by  nahwi surf spot the internet is full with this scams
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: as beautiful the beach is as ugly the people are working there renting surf boards nahwi surf bar guy told us we should better not break the board and we thought okay wow how should this be even possible went into the sea for a few tiny waves and the pre fixed well hidden surf board broke in  pieces we very really angry and the guy followed us to kuta to get around  we will never visit lombok again had not the best time there do not rent any surfboard there
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: horrible experience at selong belanak beach rented  surfboard at nahwi bar min later of really light surfing the board just broke in  pieces in the water it broke while not even standing on it so it was obvious something was wrong with the board the guy did not seem surprised when we showed him told us we have to pay million because we broke it we went to the coffee nearby checked the internet and read a lot about this scam beach also one creepy guy with a knife in his hands laughing at us at the parking spot in the end we had to drive min down to kuta with the stupid surf guy and payed million otherwise who knows what could have happened with those criminals we loved lombok but we definitely wont come back bali is just way nicer and more safe
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: the beach is really nice but stay away from renting surf boards therewe rented a board which broke after a couple of waves it was obviously broken before and just put together they charged us  million and even followed us back to kuta for the atm read about other storys where they even got aggressive this is a total tourist scamwe had a close look at the other boards and they where all fixed as well
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: my two daughters got private surf lessons and my son and i just hired boards for a couple of hoursdaughters were both standing and riding waves well by the end and we had a lovely timecheap food in the warungs was delicious and equal quality to that in towngreat place to go with a family
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: my two friends and i went to selong belanak for surfing because the waves were too small at the beach people from the surf shop shop didnt have any name but was closest to the entrance offered us the boat trip to beginner waves while we were choosing the boards people in the surf shop tried to steal twice my friends sunglasses that he left on the table while looking the boardswe paid k in advance for the boat drive and boards the captain of the boat didnt speak any english by the time we reached the waves we noticed that they were way too big for beginners plus we were the only ones there in addition to that right after we jumped of the boat the driver disappeared with the boat so far that we couldnt see the boat anymore and soon after realising that it wasnt wise to try to surf the waves we had to wave more than ten minutes before we finally saw our boat coming to pick us upso conclusion we felt that they just wanted our money and lied to us about the sizes of the waves because after we came back they didnt care when we said that the waves were too big
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: a beautiful beach around  min car drive from kuta we ended up to have our first surflessons here because the waves are perfect for starters the beach has all services needed and surfpersons are really kind
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: its nice beach on south of lombok getting more familiar from lokal and foreigners its not only to learn surf with lokal instructor but you can hunt for sunset with some of buffalo walk along the seashore
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: stunning white sandy beach with an easy beginner surf break cheap board rental and lots of warungs selling big portion food for hungry surfers
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: what an amazing white sand beach great for surfing beginners or just frolicking in the waves every now and again the villagers will also drive their buffalo through the beach and its quite a sight
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: the dudes here are scammy and aggressive witnessed the apparently well worn broken board scam to the tune of  million idr for a board that was clearly broken beforehand and glued back together the guys make scary threats if you dont pay youre better off going to tanjung aan cute warungs and honest people surfing costs half as much and a boat out to the waves is k rather than  million
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: beware the surfboard rental folks at selong belanak beach we had a really nasty experience we rented boards that were clearly used but seemed to be in ok condition one of them had a concealed crack in it and when my son took it out and it cracked neatly in half the owners of the shop  three young men preman really  put on a big show of being furious and insisted we pay million rupiah in compensation for the board even though we suspected there was a scam at work we offered them  million which is about the price of a used board they refused and began to threaten us things were starting to get really heated and even though we were increasingly convinced this was a scam penipuan we added another million and just walked away lessons learned if you must surf at selong belanak beach take a well inspected board that you have rented from kuta be careful about renting anything from the scammers on the beach
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: nice view and friendly beach for surfing beginner with not too high wave the rental for surfing including the coach was not so expensive
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: i have visited this beach in a few time sometimes with friends or my guests from gili trawangan i love this beach because its clean very amazing sunset and the hills among the sea are so wonderful i will not ever get boring to visit here this place is very high recommended
Name: Selong Belanak Beach

Review: good food and drinks selection part of sempiak villas excellent service we stayed at the villas and this was the hotel restaurantbar
Name: Selong Belanak Beach
