Review: located not far from mattaram we have been anxious to visit here after seeing the kings main palace in ubud it covers quite an area and there is a bit of climbing to do here but it is well worth the effort to visit the guide was multilingual and extremely knowledgeable by the sound of it the king was a bit of a ladies man the gardens an surrounds are quite pretty and the buildings have been tidied up one of the original pools is now open to public access as usual you have to exit via the markets but souvenirs are a must these days arent they
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: honestly the concept of the temple almost the same like the temple i find in bali this concept is extention of bali architecture i think so nice and beautiful places
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: i think the ads is a little bit over rated the garden is huge but the conditions isnt really good some of the part are under maintenance and isnt not much to see the entry ticket is idr person and once you got inside theres a person will persuade you to take a guide do not take it the garden is huge but you can walk without their guide and theres a pool but you have to pay another entry ticket to enter the pool
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: had trouble finding a taxi driver who could understand english and find this place once we got here we just walked around ourselves and had a swim in the pool water is freezing most probably worth getting a guide as all signs are in indonesian quite nicely maintained large lake could do with the rubbish removed we had been to other water palaces in bali  so thought we would go here as well
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: i take some prayers here its like lil bali in lombokthey said the holy water is flows from rinjani mountain to there and its nver stop flowingits nice place
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: very overwhelming experience the hindu priest even gives blessings for all religions for a small donationbyo picnic lunch and sit up under one of the bales that look out over the gardens
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: one of attraction options around the city of mataram the areas are well maintained try some rujak mixed fruits with sweet palmsugar sauce and chickengrilled sate on sunday and other nationallocal holidays the place may be crowded with locals
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: this place actually a good heritage site however the poor management will disappoint many visitors the lack of basic hygiene toilet really a deal breaker the large natural pools were not properly maintained
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: calming and beautiful placethis one of holy hinduism temples at lombok  keep in mind women in menstruation period are forbidden entering holy temple
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: i liked the gardens and the pools the icey swimming pool and the flying fox were very enjoyable the guide was helpful and reasonably priced you can buy sate lunch there quite cheaply
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: its a huge park with some temples peaceful and serene nice to have a walki particularly enjoyed spending some time with the locals who live in one of the side compound apparently they are the gardeners and keep the huge compound clean
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: i visit this place almost every weekend i love this place not only because its close from where i live but its mostly because taman narmada has everything that i need i can swim in a huge fresh waters swimming pool and theres a nice kids pool if youre with kids there also a nice lake made as a miniatur of segara anak lake  rinjani mountain on the lake you can rent a small boat or canoe for short trip around the lake this place is also a history icon of lombok
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: this temple has a sacred pool which the water can make you look younger and healthly once you can throw back a coin to makeawish but before that you should pay some money and the guide will buy some eggs and any others stuffyou should wear a yellow scarf to enter this temple
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: the narmada temple is located only a short ride fromdonwtown mataram you pay a small entrance feel and can either walk around the grounds independently or with a guide to explain the historyit is centered around a large lakepool making it a little cooler than the nearby area and is next to a full sized swimming pool if you need to get cooled offnice views and intersting history
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: great templetheres a sacred poolwill give us a good feelingmore relaxmore younger and always young by the story
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: access to the park is easy because the location is near mataram city this historical place is not been maintained properly by local government the entrance fee is cheap outside the temple there are local handicrafts you can buy pearl etc
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: yes it might not be properly maintained by the local government but the historical place is not something you want to miss on your trip it used to be the palace of pangeran suropati from mataram with the help of local guides you will learn the parts of the palace you will find where the prince had lived the training ground for mataram army and also the mythical fountain of youth  the priest would even let you drink from the fountain the surrounding give you a sense of tranquility however the best time to go is on weekdays especially on low seasonand if you are interested in local handicrafts you will find local pearl arts just outside the temple
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: very large site ruins of an old imperial palace great location loved the pools area but to be honest this place need a serious attention from government to be better maintain if not then this very valuable historic sites will be destroyed immediately swallowed by its age
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: the only tourist spot close to downtown mataram the entrance fee is cheap its best to hire tour guides so he may take you through all the interesting spots around the place and also tells you the story behind the water parkthe main attraction to this place is doing a ceremony to the local deity a goddess of beauty also by drinking the blessed water running inside the shrine then the guide will give you the option to take some of the blessed water inside a bottle the water is free but the bottle is not they insist on selling the bottle to you its not a problem to reject the offerone hour is enough to visit every part of this place including the ceremony overall experience was good
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: it is old it is a bit run down cheap entry price not much to do there except to walk around and read the explanation take some photos and back you can go up to the temple if you are dressed properly overall average experience and once should be enough
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: the view was great a lot of pond in the park also the poolthere was food stall near the pool sate bulayak which is local food and the taste was greatthe only things need to be improve is the cleanliness around the poolmany used bottleplasticfood does not throw in the garbage
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: its a big park theres a place where we can wash our face with its fountain and according to the story its water can make us ageless ahahaha but i didnt try it great panorama to take some pictures a good joint place for praying and to spend time with family swimming
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: like  the park is so grand and lush the maintenance still needs to be improved but it is enjoyable there is a fountain water believed to make forever young the temple is resemblance to mt rinjani symbolically and the pool as replica to segara anak
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: unfortunately this park has not been maintained at allthere are no swan pedal boats anymore as the are so old they are not safe to use nowthere were alot of locals enjoying themselves  swimming in the pool but i wouldnt really advise tourists to go there nowjules
Name: Pura Agung Narmada

Review: looks like a derelict building site nothing to see at all the guide will scam you for upwards of  for a so called sacred egg to feed some eel then hell want another  min as a tip thoroughly disappointing save your time and money
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: as part of our week long stay in lombok we took a trip here using the services of lombok friendly tour  travel interesting history and very nice atmosphere nice to see that multiple religions can coexist
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: nothing to do and nothing to see about this temple no building just a calm garden with nothing special
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: interesting temple of both hindu and islam faithsi paid k idr at entrance as donation was given yellow sash to wrap around my waistdid not buy egg for feeding eel that is when guide was not happyafter the tour i gave the guide k idr for his service he asked for additional k idr for rental of yellow sash he put it in his walletguides are spoiling this place
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: perang ketupat is a unique tradition that have been celebrated for generations anually at the month of prophet mohammade was borntthere is part of the temple which are used by moslem  hindust side by side both hindus  moslem celebrate in their own waybtw the temple care taker are moslemsafter the ceremony of moslem  hindust walked around the temple with offering then the war is begin they fight by throwing the rice cake ketupat rice cooked in woven coconut leaves at each other the gamelan played make the celebration merrieri have watched it so many times and this time my attention was the pretty ladies in exotic kebaya with their colorful boxes they carry to bring the offering the movement of prayer up and dowm the staircases daddys and daughter come if you are nearby or interested in tradition  cultureactually the village it self is a nice place to visit need a local friend to go around
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this temple is the symbol of pancasila unity in diversity what indonesian beileve in we visited this temple this month despite all the irrespinsible hoax on social media that made people of lombok so scarry about sunday earthquake we found cheap ticket and lew direct to lombok exactly to visit in this time of need we saw some locals still sleeping on tents on this temple yard and we felt a deep empathy as fellow human together with my guide who tried to explain the history of the temple i have the urge to say in this forum i believe they will soon fix some part nothing can destroy the beauty of this temple and the value from the history more people should come with a hand offering at least mental support for the people who lost their home when everything gets better this temple will be beautiful as it was again at least we could see rinjani right behind the shrine
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this temple is rich with history and legend to understand local culture and history is to enrich our knowledge more than justbtourist sightseeing it also tells some moral i can learn from the way people from different religion can live in harmony praying at the same place as indonrsian i really see our ideology unity in diversity a must visit place if you come to lombok
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: i would not make this a destination but if you are nearby stop by there is not much to see when the tour guides talk about three levels it is three tiers not a building that is three stories tall
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: the driver brought us to the temple there was a guide who seemed friendly but when we where in the temple he kept asking for money for every little building he also insulted muslims and when he saw us reaction he was like oh now i didnt meant that later he asked money again i gave em  and he acted insulted then after we left he asked for money again the whole time this man is terrible dont fall for this you can better avoid this place
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: we went there a few days ago they insisted a guide was necessary the information was interesting but it quickly turned into a scam  or at least it felt like one supposedly you dont have to pay an entrance fee but should consider a donation however the donation was mandatory and the guide insisted in being paid as well he became rude looked at our donation as if it wasnt enough  our driver couldnt believe we paid that much  and all the kindness was gone
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: a nice temple complex to have a short visit of about an hour when you are nearby not big en special enough to drive a long way to visit
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: one of the strangest things ever was feeding the holy eelno idea what the guide was speaking about so whole experience utterly fascinatingholy man breaks cooked egg and tries to lure eel outit came out for us and was really special
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: worth having a guide to explain some of the unique features good and evil multiple religions and the fountain of youth
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: lingsar temple complex includes two main temples and reflects three religions the first part is a large roofed hindu temple with four shrines one oriented to bali one to lombok and a double shrine for the two islands then you walk through another gate and go down stairs to reach the area dedicated to the local form of islam there is a pond with a sacred eel you can try to coax it out with eggs and a small roofed shrine where we saw moslem families leaving offerings identical to those being left in the hindu temple the altar in the shrine holds a number of robed stones reflecting the animistic beliefs of the native sasak people further down is a small pool for ritual cleansing the most impressive part of lingsar is having a sacred site shared peacefully by believers in different religions of all the indonesian temple we visited this is the one i will remember
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: it is a little bit outside of mataram and therefore not very easy accessible you can take a bemo there but you have to change several times depending where you are travelling from getting back to the city centre is a bit more difficult then getting there we didnt find any bemos that were travelling back to mataram but luckily a nice indonesian family took us along the temple itself is very beautiful we have only visited one other hindu temple pura meru in mataram so we do not have much of a comparison in front of the temple there are a lot of guides who can tell you something about the temple itself but we didnt hire one if you want you can buy an egg for  rp and then feed the holy eels with a holy man be aware though that the eels dont always come to eat entrance on donationwe visited on a sunday and there were a lot of people praying and practising rituals the shrines were very beautiful in our opinionworth a visit if you are in the neighbourhood
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: its quiet impressive how this place breaths serenityif you need a guide will depend on how much you wanna know about the place free donation
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: lombok is one of the island famous which known by a thousand mousqe island name but who knows that life there very full of tolerance between religious people for example between hindus people and moslem one of village in west lombok regency there is one village which located in lingsar village u will find praying area where that place used by two religious people for praying hindus and moslems this areas devide for two area northen side used by hindus which named pura gaduh and south side which named kemaliq used by moslems for praying although between them will never denounce each other and they always respect each other when they pray together in pura gaduh or kemalik for example when they do a program together which called perang ketupat they are very respect to do not bring something very inpolite and forbidden in their religion such as moslems forbiden to bring a food was made from beef cause in hindus traditon cow is one of holy animal so that moslems not be allowed making food from cow and opposite too for hindus is not be allowed to bring food was made from pig so uniqe isnt it and this place so recomended to visite for u all travellers who wants to see two relligious people living in harmony best regard ardi lombok
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: we really enjoyed our time here in pura lingsarwe were the only tourist when we arrived herepak gilang was our guide and he was so hillarious you should look for him when you reach herethe temple was divided by several section and it was used by both hindus and moslem in month of ocotber the usually had combined yearly eventthis temple also had fresh spring water that you could use to washdrink please becareful on slippery floorin this temple there was a small pond and inside the pond there were several rare fish you could buy boiled eggs from the guide  each and ask the guide to lure the fiah out from the denthe said if you were lucky the fish will come outyes we did see the fish but he said thw fish was still juvenille wish i can show you the videoin different section of this temple they also had several rare trees nagasariit was a great experience please dont forget to look for mrgilang
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: we went there by ourselves without any guide involved and that was a real wrong move there were no signs except one that tells you the rules for entry we had to google more information about the temple we got to see some prayers but not much else its quite secluded not much else nearby get a guide
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: basically site is quite run down and not particularly worth visiting usual donation for scarf and then would you like to buy eggs for the eels feeding them is supposed to be lucky however you dont get to do it you give them to a man who is supposed to attract them out and also needs paid none over the size of my pinkie made it out and the view of eels eating eggs was actually them crumbed into the water we threw coins in instead
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this the most unique temple in indonesia the only temple that belong to two different religions hindu and muslim this is probably one of the strongest symbols of a great relationship between islam and hindu in lombokbest time to visit this temple is during maulid where you can watch an interesting cultural event called perang ketupat ketupat war or locally known as perang topat not a real war tho it was just a fun fight yet it is actually a symbol of peace between the two religions islam and hindu in lombok in this war the attendances are grouped in to two based on their religion before the war started there will be first some ceremonies and praying leads by the head of each groups the highlight of this event is people from both groups will throw each others using ketupat  a diamondshaped rice cake made of young coconut leaves also youll find lots of cultural custome parade and a showcase of lomboks cultures
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: the oldest hindunese temple in lombok the unique is the eel that lives in the pond need some local guide to track the eel out from their cage
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: you get to visit and see two temples dating hundreds of years one is multi denominational and the other hindu unique combination on lombokmy recommendation is to use a local guide drink lots of water and take your timea natural spring has been tapped here that runs  from deep beneath mt rinjani these waters are used for cleansing what a great way to cool off as wellwe enjoyed the time spent here
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: find out a nice hindus tample arround of mataram there is also a nice spot to wash our face in cold fountain
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: lovely temple love the history of this templei love the part where the guide tried to call the big fish with duck egg
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this is a place where various religions practice their beliefs side by side if only the whole world could be as tolerant and respectful to their fellows that is the deep and important significance
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this was a very interesting temple a guide took us on a tour around the temple he was very informative but watch at the end as the hand goes out for a tip haha
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: interesting history to this temple there are actually two templates one for hindus from the s and another which is multifaith and from the s make sure you hire a guide to get the full picture
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: we went here by taxi but it was quite some drive definitely worth it though the location on tripadvisor is misleading though since the actual site is much further its a very nice temple although not very large
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: you need a car or scooter to get there but when you doa local guide directly forces to accompany you while walking through to the temple and around the temple but it is truly stunning moreover the right sight of the temple is open for all religions and this makes this temple a little more special then others also the old aggregation water channels are in good shapedont forget to have a look at the holy water according to our guide it brings you good health when pooring some on your head
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: one of hindu temple in west lombok in this place there is a pond with a holy eel you can feed them with hard boiled eggs its considered good luck if you feed them and they came out from the holeyou will be expected to rent a sash andor sarong or bring your own to enter the shrinesyou can also pray and make a wish with throwing the coins into the pond by facing back your body infront of the gate of the pond above the rockhere there is also a springs that can make you young if you drink it
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: like others we were taken around by the guide who insisted it was mandatory for us to have him there he then asked for a donation for the priest and then asked us to pay him otherwise the temple was very run down and there was not much to see
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: one of the few major hindu temples pura in lombok admission is free but a donation is standard being a holy place one is required to dress appropriately but they provide a sash to wrap around the waist not much signage or historical information provided for tourists takes less than an hour to complete the visit
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: pura lingsar may not be the grandest of temples but its significance is in the beauty of an active temple that is being used by all  main religions for worship muslims hindus christians all pray hereno regrets visiting this placewe had a tour guide sorted out by our driver for practical reasons of understanding what youre observing i would recommend you take one too we were asked to make a donation to the temple any small change will do
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: but od not plan a trip for it because it is not worth it in mataram is not so much to watch at all but trafic and people th lingsar temple does not change so much about it better copies are found at bali but if you did not see anything lik this it could be a nice taxi drive to it the admission is not free  rp but the money appears to be used for maintenance and so its worth it its a nice serenity in a busy town if the closely built mosk keeps silent too but thats not sure at all
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this is another temple keen to show a unity and cooperation with a muslim dominated lombok our guide told us of how th century muslim lombok was overrun by the hindu king of bali there is a facility in the temple complex where muslims cana leo pray however this is not a formal set for regular prayers or friday prayersagain a lot of the building has been replaced with new brickwork as the existing building has not survived much over the last  yearsagain this is not worth a passing visit unless you are really into hindu temples or simply want to tick something off a bucket list
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: it is a very relaxed place with not too much happening it was quiet and there was a nice pond generally good ambience and friendly people
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this is exceptionally disappointing the temple itself is not well cared for and is extremely run down and even dirtyrubbish is piled up and litter blows freely around the sitea  minute look should be more than enoughthe guide tried hard but didnt have a lot to talk about
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: pura lingsar is place where you can know about story of hindus and muslim religion becouse there you are can see pure and mosque close each other
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: the only thing i wanted to go there just taking pictures of the temple its an okay temple though i love the doors there the guide suddenly came to us and i didnt know that i can reject the service i guess you canthere were so many stairs i dont think this is a good temple to look around if you travel with old peopleif youre that kind of person who loves religious tour or cultural tour then this is good for you if youre the kind of person who loves beach or adventure then skip this temple go to the beaches or to the gili islandsalso  you dont have to buy any souvenirs there the temple is free but the guide is not just fyi
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: was done in a tour the bus guide gave us lot information on the site and the guide at the temple was very knowledgeable as well and made the experience very good
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: nothing special its small there is nothing to see just many sellers trying to earn some money do not bother and safe time for some nice temples
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: i was there on  august with my fiancee and had the same experience as frankieyongthe taxi guide who took us there said there was no need for a guide but immediately after we alighted a man in black quickly walked towards us and claimed to be a guide for the templewe had no choice but to have him tag along as he insisted it was mandatorythe temple was in ruins and was mildly interesting the guide did not offer much information and the tour was over in less than  minutes we were asked to donate  rp to the priest of the temple this was taken by the guide who left to pass it to the priest i suspect the guide pocketed the money he said the priest gave us  rp in return to donate to the box before we left the templeon our way back to the taxi the guide also asked for  rp from each of us for his services so thats  rp or  sgd for  minutes work this is equivalent to the entry level salary of a bachelor degree holder in singapore easiest  rp for any local compare this to the porter who helped carry over kg of supplies up and down our hike to senaru crater rim  they only got twice that amount for  times more workit is totally unethical and immoral for him to profit on this religious site and i hope the local authorities take action i would recommend tourists to stay away from this temple and not allow this unauthorised profiteering to continuethe guide also charged our taxi  rp for parking parking at epicentrum lombok costs only  rp per entrydo whats right and boycott this atrocity and may the  religions reward the guide accordingly
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: we went there by our taxi guide immediately came a guide and we told him that we do not required a guide since we do not have much time and just intend to have a quick look and snap few pictureshe insisted that we take him as he is the owner of the place we do not believe him otherwise he would better just collect the entrance fee like any other temple attractions we asked how much he would charge us and reply that up to us to give well we took him as our guide then he explained to us every structure and history about the temple and after  minutes with him we decided to end the visit and gave him a some token of appreciation  rp he said not enough and we asked how much he wants he quoted rpwe are reluctant to give that much and walked to our park taxi and he followed almost like going to have a fightwhen all of us in the taxi he blocked the car and spoke to our driver in their language our driver told us if we can give more which we still refused we asked our driver to drive and thats consider a safe for us but felt angryto those tourists i think you should insist for not taking a guide if you do not wish to however you should not miss pura lingsar as it is among the best temple in lombok
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: taking a cab to this temple from narmada temple and it was quite a short trip not taking really much time as soon as we arrived there a local guide directly approached us and we had no choice but to let him guide us it is actually okay because he told us a lot about stuff in this temple and also local history which fascinated me because i am a history buff he brought us to a wishing pool we wished for something and then threw a coin backwards it is said that the wish will come true if the coin directly went to the pool mine bounced a bit several times but once again it is a believeitornot so yeah do not expect too much overall this place is recommended for the religious and historical value but i just dont like it when we were forced to buy something at the end of the tour
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: well kept you will find some tourist as well as local outside looks quite rough and dirty but once you are in is better than the most commercial ones around it is a small object though and will take you max hr to walk around and listen to the guide
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: small compared to temples at bali private guides will approach to lead you around since i was with a toddler my attention was on her hence i was not keen to have a guide aroundhe said it is part of management and i have to engage him when queried on the management of which i did not see any signs or notices saying its a requirement he roped in another person saying he was the one incharge of managementi mumbled some stuff and walked away
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: pura lingsar is probably the only worthgoingtemple in lombokbut again you have to donate for admission which doesnt sound right for me i dont mind if i need to be charged for admission but could you please dont use the word donationi really like the concept of the harmonytemple i believe theyre not calling it temple sorry i forgot the word there are two parts of pura lingsar one is hindu temple another one is all other than hindu temple for example muslim buddhism christianity and many morebut i encountered one big bad experience when me and my girlfriend came down from the cartheres one guy approached us and very friendly wanted to introduce this and thatbut in the end when were leavingholy fxck he asked us for donation and he said usually people gave him k zzi really appreciate his friendly introduction of pura lingsar but its totally unnecessaryhaizpersonal advice be caution there are always bad people in good places that want to take advantage on you
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: very nice temple when i was here that time not very crowded location is very good very peaceful location easily get here by taxi from mataram
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: just an ok temple it is better to visit meru temple not much to see a temple for hindu  muslim praying side by side but only managed to visit the hindus temple a guy will asked you to fasten the yellow cloth on your waist  asked whether youd like to see the sacred eels lives in the pool by feeding them the price is rpk for  duck eggs we were asked to wait for the pawang talisman waited for almost minutes  a man came asked us to wait without introducing himself he started to tell us the history of the temple for nearly minutes  came the talisman but a womantalismanwe were ushered inside the pool area  the taliswoman started to break the boiled eggs throwing in the water  knocking the side of the pool hoping that the big long eels to come out  feed the eggs but none came out so they ushered us to another place with squirt water  started to call for the eels unfortunately only baby eels came after their unsuccessful attempt we have to give some donation to the taliswoman we paid each rpk for the taliswoman  the storyteller as you were about to return the yellow cloth you need to give donation again so we left the temple followed by the storyteller at the parking area he asked for rpk for his story telling after a little argument we only paid him another rpk beware of these people who took opportunity on tourists
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: if you have a photo with a priest you have to donate for their cigarettes  donate to the temple argus was a great tour guide knows the history of the temple well
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this temple is really big  its the largest temple you could find in lombok but its quite far either from the mataram town or senggigi beachthe local temple guides will follow you uninvitedly but they are really good at explaining all the things  stories about this big temple even though i dont really understand my guides indonesian english slang sometimes but its still a good place to visit if youre interested in balineselombok traditional cultureslastly the guide was asking for some temple donation fees and the amount was up to me so i just gave him rp by the time i leave
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: lingsar temple is a holy place for both hindus and moslem in lomboki praya here during galungan day and i pray together with moslem friendslingsar is one of the three source of hindus holy water in lombok along with narmada and suranadi so many hindus from bali and java come here to pray and ask for the holy water to bring homebut i think lingsar needs many improvement in the building but i believe it will cost muchyou should come here during perang ketupat ceremony happen days after lebaran or iedif fitri
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: this temple is a testament to religious tolerance it gives you an insight into religious traditions on lombok easily accessed and easy to walk through as there are no huge steps to climb its a shame it is an exception to the rule in indonesia a few more scattered throughout java would be a thought to ponder we have been meaning to visit here for many years so  long time local friends organised the trip and it made things easy for us the tour guide was informative and multilingual there is no entry fee but payment is expected for guides in indonesia as it could be their only source of income
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: when we arrived hadnt even got out of the taxi when a guide approached and said you have to go with a guide which out taxi driver said no entrance fee guide seemed pleasant and knowledgeable once we started the tour it became blatantly obvious this was a moneymaking process the prices we were told to pay for the different parts of the tour were ridiculous left a bitter taste in your mouth whilst we enjoyed the history aspect of the tour and information we received i would not recommend to go unless you get some prices before you enter once we had paid for the guide the sarongs the eggs for the eels and the man to call the eels the donation for all  religions it cost us over  rupiah and we didnt pay what was asked for whilst this is not a lot compared to other temples we have been to in indonesia it is exorbitant maybe we had a dodgy guide
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: great to see a place in this world weer different religions actually can come together in peace guide wa useful and told us some interesting facta about the temple maybe not the greatest or most impressive temple of indonesia but certainly worth a visit
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: if not visited yet on bali this one is worth visiting the interactions and relations between different religions is explained by the local guide
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: lingsar gets an extra star from me for the fact that it is a temple where both the balinese hindus or lombok and the islamic wektu telu pray together otherwise as a temple it is pretty average there are springs and ponds some pretty gardens and a pool with holy eels in buy a couple of boiled eggs and someone will call the eels out of their tunnels for you to feed the best time to visit is at full moon or during one of the balinese holidays galungan or kunningan when there will be lots of balinese in traditional temple wear and everything is a lot more colourfulcontrary to what one other reviewer said lingsar is not north of ampenan but is located off a small road that runs between narmada and sweta
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: then you may well find this interestingim not overly keen on them unless they are genuinely spectacular so found this ok but no morewould happily have done something else with my time
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: real testimony  religion in one holy place hindu and moslem so amazing and great story people believe in the power of holy water temple lingsar will provide life success in future
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: there are about  water spring near the pura fresh water with chrystal clear view but the spring hasnt manage in good manner and proper handling
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: pura lingsar is located at the north end of the beach at ampenan on the lombok island this temple was built in  and rebuilt in  and it represents a blending of the hindu tradition with wektu telu a religion practiced by the sasak people known as the only hindu shrine in the world where the hindus and muslims can worship togethernote visitors are expected to wear a sarong to enter the temple
Name: Lingsar Temple

Review: im from north america and i cant understand why one one charge parking to go to a mallthat being said this is the busiest and best of the malls in lombok the layout is awkward  designed to make you walk as far as possible to go from one level to the next
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: great shopping centre in mattaram  superb range of shops great range of eateries  coffee shops excellent food  highly recommended
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: typical indonesian shopping center of the higher price bracket clean air conditioning and nice to walk around a couple of coffee shops and restaurants nice for a day out but a little expensive
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: nice airconditioned shopping mall with a good variety of shops and restaurants all sorts of shops so good for a few hours wandering around looking for bargains to take home nice variety of restaurants and the quality of food we had was really good cinema also in the mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: fantastic shopping while reasonably high priced in epicentrum their are many a bargain more so at local supermarkets were you can find bargains everywhere
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i had the blessed opportunity to visit this beautiful mall with locals wow i was impressed it has so much to offer and really is a relief from the hot temperatures of lomboki also purchased a cell phone it was about  million rp and was a really good photo quality tooi didnt feel my teen could manage keeping her iphone out of the water so i simply purchased a new phone and placed my sim card insideenjoy
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: used to be nice mall still good shopping but no more beer at restaurants even hypermarket muslimised go if necessaryold mall has hero that still sells the good stuff
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: massive hyper market in basement and all the big brands  and food outletswas comfortable and spacious walking and shopping
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: well at least theres place to hang out in here you should try to go here to find stuff you will need for trip
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: a great shopping mall with heaps of brands polo billabong levis etc and a great selection of eateries starbucks burger king and tons of othersbeware that there isnt a money changer at the mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: wonderful oasis of familiarity well laid out and easy to navigate around helpful staff and love music entertainment in the afternoon some toilets were missing toilet paper and it the cleanest which is a shame but perhaps the janitor was off the day i was there
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: forget itseen  mall seen anotherlots of restaurants and food chainsclothing stores are so expensive we pay less in australiasizing is small  extra smallhas matahari  hypermartstarbucks  kfctried buying clothing to take back home for the kids but too expensive or too smallonly bonus was finding bintangs in hypermartspent  hours over  levelsnothing to buy
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the shops have a wide range of name brand and alternative clothing stores with two large timezone arcadesplay zones for kids also have great cheap food upstairs would recommend
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: if youre a tourist give this a miss its just a mall if you have global brands back home you can give this a miss its just a mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: very western style mall which sometimes is what you want the dentist inside was great and helped us for an emergency with our son  years old very happy after that we went for some shopping great selection
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: what can i say epicentrum mall is the biggest mall in mataram bit crowded during weekend because everybody going to the mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: easy to reach easy accomodation amazing architecture best mall than others in lombok has a lot of tenants good enough for hang out or looking for something modern
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: modern shopping mall in mataram offering culinary and fashion storeeasy to get there by car and motor bike
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: visited this mall for dinner and to look around the placelots of shops and food joint for a wide range of budgets
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: went to the toy store and bought some tomica cars since the price is cheaper compared to in malaysia and went to es teler for lunch love the es nangka
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is right in the heart of the city you can get almost everything for a small city like mataramstarbuck the easiest place to find for an appointmen or hang out ace  informa for houseware matahari dept store for you who like discounts hypermart also so many restaurants to stop if you are hungry need to pray they have a mosque spacious parking sometimes we have to walk quite far when there is an event it is a place where you are likely to meet your friend from ages ago  if you spend most of your life here
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: if you lost you wallet need extra cloth replace broken shoes or just want to hangouts at starbucks or just dont want to miss your favourite movie this place is the one where you could get all of themdont expect to get local traditional food here only western and chinese food around some cafes offer good food and indonesian well recognized food just like nasi goreng sate or rendang also can be found herethe newest modern shopping mall quite crowded during week end since many local resident bring their families around this mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: a must visit for modern culinary in lombokbest place for modern lifestylethe only cinema available
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i think the mall is one of the biggest mall in lombok island i went to the mall as i heard number of the local wellknown restaurant is also there it was really nice and clean mall but the pricing is above average almost the same mall anywhere you can find anything that you would like to buy  basically anything
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: im a kiwi and i love mataram mall i find it very pleasantadmittedly people there not overly helpful but neither are they at lombok epicentrum mallunless youre actually interested in something to buy they too extremely helpful and very friendlyepicentrum mall i like very muchrefreshingnice and coollots of places for eating and kopimy main shopping is at acesonce every few monthsdont mind the priceslove the new mall but my hearts with the old mataram mall where ive been shopping for yrs
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: everything you expect to find in a mall is here  western prices only downsidei came to buy a yoga mat easily found in one of the department stalls on the top floor
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: great place to visit on mataram city many food stall with local and international cuisines its a shopping mall so good place to shop in matahari storealso have a movie building it is one stop entertaiment
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: nice mallbiggest on the islandresort great food decnt shops also dentistbarber and telephoneshop worth visiting
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: best to get a taxi to this mall they will drop you off at the door and you can catch one return from the same spot you and your bag will be scanned by security upon entry by security as in an airport there is a large grocery store on the lowest level and the big department store is called matahari if you want to buy shoes look in matahari there are thousands of styles at very reasonable prices large clean modern restaurants including burger king
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: very convenient and not too crowded stop shopping international standardlocated in the city center about  minutes drive from senggigi
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: one of the shopping mall in lombok many national brand and food stores it has cinema xxi one of thr largest cinema chain in indonesia it gets crowded on weekend
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is a new mall for the people of mataram but the tenants are of the ussual varieties therefore nothing speciali enjoyed the archery game in the basement level however their equipment could do with an upgrade
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i went epicentrum mall and bought an emergency kit at the drug store the products here are various and in good qualities but the price range is a bit too high for the locals to enjoy shopping the atmosphere here is clean safe and nice and yes it has musholla
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: not like big citiesin java mataram the capitol of west nusa tenggara province is far away from the hustle life of big city its not common to find big mall in mataram so epicentrum mall definitely is really easy to find located in the heart of mataram this mall has bee the latest  biggest mall in all west nusa tenggarait consists of many well known indonesian popular shops of foodrestaurant house holds clothing bookstore amusement center movie theater barbershop  salonthis mall also provided with a vast parking ground this is the right mall for your familys needs in mataram
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the ambience is good the parking lot is big enough there are complete choices of store for various needs
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this place give me more choises for buy somethingand anything we get herefor shopping dining and great place for gather together with our friends and family
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: went with my wife due to the month of ramadan we found outside all the restaurants closed and no activities but luckily we went to the mall epicentrum and found restaurants open and lot of activities vin the mall such as games and movies and shopping coming to the mall it is the best in mataram cleanliness and sign boards everything is well placedwill visit again and again
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: great mall easily the best one here in lombok matarammodern fall with full amenities from cinema to shopping food court and hypermarket you can get almost everything here feels very safe and there is security at every entrance huge open air car park in front of mall for lots of people to visit parking is not free and if your taxi drops you off at the entrance of the mall youll have to pay a small amount to enter the mall compound this place is best to visit during the weekday hours weekends is packed because this is a true hot spot they have nice range of restaurants available as welllastly family fun and entertainment is filled to the brink archery and arcades and karaoke enjoy yourself here
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: perhaps this is the largest mall in this local area complete goods and easy to get the goods as needed during the lombok being in the middle of the city the road was easy to reach
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the mall is not that good most of it is about food and a bit overpriced at that the most striking thing is parking charges and you dont even get cover for your vehicle avoid better shopping all over town
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: visited this mall with friends good variety of shops very good airconditioning and movie theatres as well had lunch at quali which was great
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: a modern mall with a wide range of shops and restaurants  a movie theater no toilet seats in the toilets otherwise everything was modern clean and the place had good ac a great coffee shop on the ground floor with tasty donuts for rp do not go to the sushi place it was awful
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the epicentrum mall is new and incredibly modern it is a bit of a contrast to the rest of lombok especially the more rural locations but was very handy for the bigger supermarket and pharmacy as there was a wider range than local markets and less of a language barrierthere are recognisable brands  billabong starbucks ralph lauren etc as well as a food court with a lot of choice we didnt go for shopping purposes so i cant say how prices fared in comparison to the usuk marketsvisited on a weekday afternoon and the mall was incredibly quiet though it may get more popular with locals on a weekend staff were all incredibly friendly and helpful offering pointers and recommendations of where to visit on the island  if western you are recognisable as an outsider but met with welcomes rather than hostility it was very easy upon exiting the mall to find a bluebird taxioverall good for home comforts but very different vibes to the less developed parts of the island better to experience your local warung rather than a mall kfc
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: pros one stop for shopping mall a lot of choice for culinary friendly securitycons open air parking area so when its heavy rain it was not convenience parking area too small
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: epicentrum was the most complete mall in lomboka lot of choices spot for culinary and i was missing rollpin for hospitalitysee you lombok
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the biggest shopping center in matarammany branded shops  theres many choices for the restaurants from local to international the variable coffee shopalso they have a hypermarket hypermart
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: for mataram this was quite a surprise loads of choice of shops and the hero hyper market has great options
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: newest and freshest mall in neighbourhoodneed more tenant and activitieseg  gym amusement and book store
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: great cinema but take a jacket or something as it is quite cool security at the front may take bottled drinks away from you as you are supposed to only take in food and drinks you can buy at the counterrest of the mall has a array of restaurants large supermarket with many western luxuries and some householdelectronic shops nicely airconditioned too
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: we had few hours here to escape the burning sun in the noon time it was not crowded and some point of time there were live performance by music bands although it was not a big shopping mall they have many varieties of shop includes fashion shoes jewelry phone accessories toy shop electronic shop big supermarket at basement arcade movie theatre and plenty of choices for food
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: when i entered this mall i was quite amazed for this mall is much better than the malls in my hometown malang i didnt visit many of their shops but from the window i could see that have good goods some famous restaurants can also be found here trust me you need to visit it
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this shopping centre has a great selection of cafes restaurants clothes and accessory shops bakery coffee shops hardware homeware and fresh foodproduce stores recommend checking it out you wont be disappointed
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is the latest mall in mataram have famous vendors in the mall i ate in kopi o restaurant and they offer asian menu like old town coffee but i personally like otc better and we like the food
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is a good place for hang out culinary and shopping we always came here whenever we go to mataram city thank you
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: during my stay at mataram city at night time me and my husband decided to go for movies minutes drive from the hotel were arrived at lombok epicentrum mallmaybe the biggest shopping mall at here easy to find easy for park nice experience here
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: you can buy some fashion items and find some restaurants here the mall also has some entertainment centers for kids
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: on a rainy sunday nice place to walk around nice restaurants good clothes if you are average sised
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: its great to have so many good shops and eateries under one high quality roof there is no smoking allowed inside awesome the only one down side is often the events area in the center has no sound retrictions loud loud loud just hate that aspect
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is pretty much brand new and there are lot of eateries there the air conditioning system is perfect and there is a big grocery store at the basement of the building even though it is a brand new mall there are still very minimal shoppers visiting this mall you can get virtually everything here and there is a very impressive furniture shop akin to ikea a good place to spend your day if you are in downtown mataram
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i am not a big fan of malls good enough to buy some stuff you need or for shopping heard its just new they have big grocery store as well which is where i usually go to
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: a huge mall with a modern concept a variety of boutiques and restaurants to choose fromhigh security as you have to pass through an xray machine before coming in bags were screenedrecommended for high end shopping if you dont prefer cheaply made goods
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the epicentrum mall is pretty much brand new it has most of there western shops youd expect like ralph lauren and is easier than going to a local market for everything obviously the prices are more than in central maratam but still cheaper than youd pay in the uk there are loads of places to eat including a starbucks and kfc in terms of shops there mostly clothing a lot of surf shops and electronics as well as an opticians pharmacy and hardware on the lower ground floor is a supermarket which has a good selection perfect for buying things like coffee to take homewe visited at lunchtime on a weekday and it was dead there were more staff than shoppers although i hear at weekend its gets very busy the shoppers there are normally westerners or middleupper class locals that work for the government etc i wouldnt call it a tourist attraction but not a bad place to kill time probably really handy if you need a pharmacy or similar as everyone spoke perfect english and were well educatedi got the impression that whoever has built it is waiting for tourism in lombok to kick off like in bali and then they have somewhere already established for bigger brands to move in to bluebird taxis are easy to come by outside
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: you cant go wrong if you are looking for meals in this mall lots of international and famous national brand quite packed in weekend
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: probably the best mall in lombok we came here to pass time as our flight home got delayedthe shops were average but the cinema was great never seen such a posh cinema lobbythey have the usual restaurants you can find in a typical mallluggage check service available for a fee
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is certainly the most popular in mataram excellent restaurants great cinema showing movies in english supermarket is more expensive than the local market but it does smell good and is clean  worth coming for your western junk food and coffee
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: cool place to visit if you want to see another side of lombokindonesia modern  a lot of varying shops i needed new contact lenses and found them without effort  expensive in the mall though expect mostely westerneuropean prices especially for food
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: people that rate this place in terms of culture and nonmall expectations cant be trusted im rating this as it is a shopping mall scooter parking will set you back a meager rp paid on the way out there are shops snack stands a supermarket and a movie theater for lombok its a nice haven with really cold aircon thatll make even a canadian shiver so dress accordingly if you plan on spending some time here especially if youre planning on catching a movie which i highly suggest you dothe cineplex xxi is awesome youll get searched at the door on the way in but will be greeted with a smile from the staff you can see whats showing to the left apparently the website times were incorrect we opted to watch the new planet of the apes film and it was showing in the premier theater regular showings cost  rp but for premier its rp which was about  and totally worth it the seats are so luxe and so comfortable they recline so far back and sit x in the middle is a small table with a drawer that opens up with a clean sterile blanket for each wrapped in plastic waiters come around to take and deliver food and drinks the menu looks great including the mains like the fish and chips overall really great service the sound system is brand new and we had a flawless moviegoing experience we always look forward to watching movies here just make sure you buy your tickets a couple hours before the movie starts and youll have your choice of seats the second or third row from the top have the best viewsas far as shops go there arent many western shops just some surf shops which seem a bit seem pricey there is a hypermart supermarket where you could buy indonesian coffee and other specialties to bring home and share there are plenty of restaurants bubble tea stands bakery donut cafe starbucks coffee bean guardian pharmacy bookstore ace hardwares shoe stores etceteraoverall not a mustdo in lombok but rather an ifyouhavenothingelsetodoandhavesomesparetime kinda place or if there is a movie you really what to see kinda place we like to visit here once or twice on our annual visits to the island but mostly for its cineplex
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: very high contrast with the innercity life of mataram inside this beautifull and recent  mall youll find all kind of local and national brands like matahari starbucks wendys ralph lauren burger king body shop etc pay attention to the special scooter parking space cost irr
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: fantastic large mall with everything you need for a great day of shopping plenty of food stalls and fashion shops
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: ok it was nice to come somewhere clean where everything functioned well for once that said it is your typical sterile mall lots of brand stores but the clothing was cheap at quite a few o of the stores and at least we could get all our varied shopping done from toothpaste to groceries good starbucks on first level food court on the top level and a hypermarket on the bottom level weird detector you have to go through to come in which can be avoided by entering through starbucks wonder when they will figure that one out
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this place just a typical shopping center mall plenty of coffee shop and restaurants inside and they also have nice cinema this place maybe not really suitable for tourists
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: as malls are scarce in lombok this is one of a good one with movie theater lots of restaurants optics and a huge supermarket
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is good enough for ntbif compare with others at surabayathe tenants are complete enoughyou can by everything you wantand the full a c make us feel comfortableonly the size of this mall smaller than galaxy mall or tunjungan plaza at surabayathe minus of this mall dont have building parking lot
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: visited briefly on a one night stay in lomboki visited the cinema and was amazed at how cheap it was to watch a film and eat compared to the ukshopping mall is huge with lots of shops to chose from i would return to have a shop here
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: only went there cos it was raining cats and dogs and dint have any activities to do outside i wasnt expecting much and morever i was disappointed as there isnt much there apart from a movie theater star bucks and few stores which the tourists wouldnt like it so much would avoid it next time though
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is ok nothing really to do apart from the nice cinema not many chain shops but choice of food is good air con was nice after being hot outside
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: its a new shopping center with  or  levels but theres not an awful lot for westerners the only place we shopped was the guardian pharmacy the billabong and other surf stores were pretty much the same price as australia and the stock looked outdated the only thing we enjoyed here was the timezone and the cinema
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall tenants is same with other mall  better than mataram mall  this mall layout is good the malls is slightly better dan mall in bali
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: modern and bigest mall in lombok nice place to hang outxxi movie theaterace hardwareinforma furfashionfood etc
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: a trip to epicentrum mall is worth it do do a spot of shopping or just browse the shops in aircon matahari dept store lots of surf shops downstairs dept store has all your needs lots of eating places too
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: we spent about h on a thursday evening were amazed by the size of the mall which is  stories highproslots of stores with cheap prices and discountsall kinds of tasty restaurants and coffee shopsvery cleannice atmosphereconssellers were so annoying upon entering they would follow you through the store showing you clothes that you dont wantno toilet paper in the bathrooms only the water sprayer so you might want to practice this  still really worth the visit
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: mataram city it is a new shopping mall in matatam very similar to those in aussie we had nice lunch and found discount tables and the hypermarket downstairs note that discount tables show a from price as i was caught at the register querying the charged price worth a visit as they sell items we cannot get at home
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: just went there to catch a movie the cinema is nice not so many people if ure lucky u can have the screen all for yourself the stores not really attractive lots of eateries
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: we go there for dinner many representative restaurant here i think this mall is for middle up class
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: flat parking price for motor which is goodoffer quite good store for shopping and restaurants with many options
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the place is new and comfortable to dine in it has starbucks burger king breadtalk bakery and other local diners the place is clean and so is the toilet the place is suitable for foreigners the locals do not come here
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i like to visit here mall and also they have foods court cafe and you could by clothings hpymart mall foods and other thing and at the moment this mall one of little a bit more do thing this mall around lombok island so easy acces the location if you come from mataram mall you could take scand main street from main street of epicentrum mall name of main street is jl sriwijaya
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: just stop by to get some groceries and essentials typical mall in sub urban indonesian location fair number of eateries outlet that offered fast food chains ie kfc starbucksbreadtalkroti boy and etc lots of indonesian food outlets also few outlets for the kids to have their fun time spent few fashion houses available hypermarkets at lower grounds cinema at top floor for movie goers to hang around
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: went there in search of a coffee very difficult to find a western coffee in lombok the local coffee is very strong served with lots of sugar and no milk went to the mall for starbucks but ended up shopping and having a meal good air conditioning and lots of modern shops plenty of specials happening and good variety of eating places and yes coffee was good english in big shops not great but there are some staff better than others
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this is a kinda big mall with a lot of stores there are a lot of food stores and the prices are a lot cheaper than in touristy areas it would be good if this mall has good high end lombok craft store in the future
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is the biggest or probably the newest in mataram everything you can find in this place food courts cinema entertainment on weekends this mall is very crowded and the parking area is often full
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: filled with big chains and multinational companies eg breadtalk burger king wendys was hoping for more local craft shops but there was none if youre looking for something authentic this is not it
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall opened last year all the shops are new and shiney there are lots of excellent cafes id recommend ta wan omah cobek and the small pizza place on the top floor the cinema is excellent and cheap
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: such a big change in lombok this is a state of the art mall with a great selection of cafes and restuarants its got an air conditioned cinema upstairs which is really cheap during the week its very social place has some good and cheap electronic stores in the basement good for cameras tablets phones etc
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the biggest mall with a cinema in lombokall you need to find from eateries to branded shoppinggood security with guards all over the mallhave a good shopping all
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: on the plus side provided a much needed touch of western style shopping also lots of bargains and saleson the downside very new so still lots to come food courts were extensive and empty so staff a bit pushy and a lot of the shoes only come in small sizes  is max for female and  for malealso paying by card can be a bit haphazard as the machines dont always work
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is a new built mall so its good and clean and hype but every time i went there the merchants lack customer dont know where the crowds goi hope the malls last long and improve
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the shopping centre is big and everything there is affordable alot of shops to walk and there is a novie theatre and an arcade
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is huge has good ac features big brand stores and is ok to visit but i find it sterile there is hardly anything to distinguish it from any other mall food choices are soso and the hypermart has a good selection of basicallyeverythingi was pleasantly surprised however to find a perfume shop competitive prices and a selection of fragramces hard to find in oz the choice in clothing for my son was wider here than at mataram mall so a plus for usok to visit once or twice but we didnt come here for a generic mall holiday
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: i have been surprise this new mall in lombok was great they also have food courts etc the ticket for pprimier movies is cheap rather than any other cities in indonesia
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: it is quite different from the older mall it has variety shops some shops which didnt exist before in lombok exist here the parking area is quite large but since its outdoor parking lot its hot for the vehicle but overall this place is better than the older mall
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall offered a luxury setting that kinda projected for upper class although when i visited here the mall was still kinda quiet because there were many stores that hasnt been opened yet
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: we came here after visiting mataram mall and realising there was nothing for us thereepicentrum is a modern  clean  large shopping mallwe ate a local restaurant in the basement and the food  service and experience was very goodwe also shopped at matahari where we found childrens sports shoes from international brands were very good valuelots of choices for whatever you want eat or buy
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: now   of shops open good foodcourt on top floor even beer available place to cool of with a hypermarket
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: best place to chill especially the starbucks or coffee shop out there restaurants has internet free access with blazing speed theres a lot of surf brands inside the mall i find the supermarket big seems to be completethis mall should have been excellent if there is a money changer
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: we went to this mall for a few hours they have nice stores if is clean and people are nice the food court is not that special but there are nice restaurants there is also a nice supermarket only problem was that there was a special promotion sales booth in the center of the mall and the music there was loader than in a night club so was partly hard to hear my kids talk place has elevators so also good for baby strawlers
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: this mall is new and its better bigger more confort than the previous mall there are also many tenants and restaurants high class mall great
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the new epicentrum mall is a welcome addition to shopping options in mataram wide open spaces lots of light lots of marble lots of shops the is a hypermart for your daily needs and its food court offered tasty inexpensive food lots of clothing stores good place to spend an hour or two no undercover parking for motorcycles so drops one star from me
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: besides mataram mall if you want to epicentrum mall located just  km only  minutes to get to the mall epicentrum
Name: Lombok Epicentrum Mall

Review: the service of the hotel clerk is quite friendly  fast all processes are carried out without any constraints the atmosphere of the hotel is comfortable the rooms served are clean  comfortable the rooms offered immediately suit our needs
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: nice and comfort room very clean staff so friendly i was stayed for  nights the staff askingcall during your stay if you have any problem that is very rare and very helpful i loved try the pool but i was very lazy  overall is awesome thank you
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: in total i stayed  nights in aston over a periode of two weeks the last morning i asked for an extension of another  nights the reception confirmed on the evening of the following day i randomly passed the reception again and was told that the hotel is fully booked on the next days and that i have to check out sorry guys this is an absolute no go furthermore the stuff is using the same elevators as the guests so sometimes it takes you  minutes to get from the th floor to the lobby consider using the stairway the stuffs englisch ahead from the standard phrases is bad common guys its  and the numbers of western tourists on lombok are steadily increasing sponsor your employees some english lessons then you dont run into problems like that its a
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: if you travel on business trip for  or  nights aston inn can be your option as its location is in the central city of mataram everything is accessible however the cleanliness in the bathroom needs minor improvement
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: all the bells and whistles of a hotel at this price point with an amazing friendly staff clean rooms and great food  in case youre hungry very late at night however we almost skipped this booking because aston does not have not arrange scooter rentals because of this i had to take my chances with some questionable characters to rent my wife and i two scooters
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: the hotel is good for bussiness and family the location in the city we recomen for pleasere and business and not so long distance to senggigi and airport near from mall and traditional market for buy some souvenier and etc
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: rooms are really clean and modern and restaurant is very good too nice pool and bar area we originally booked two nights but decided to extend staff were very friendly and helpful would highly recommend
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: a very comfortable stay  aston have a fantastic restaurant and one of the best breakfast buffets ive had in indonesia coupled with a swimming pool live music a fitness centre and a fair price we will be staying here again
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: i stayed in the hotel twice for business in october and then for family vacation in december both times i am really satisfied the service is great the room is clean and very spacious the hotel even provided us with connecting rooms when i stayed with my family which i was very grateful for i did not request it as i know that it is usually very difficult to have connecting rooms during high season it only took us about  minutes for check in and check out they serve variety of food for breakfast for idr k for adult and idr k for child i would surely stay there again next time i go to lombok
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: we are in five members from japan we visited the state university for the research purposes the location of the hotel for our purpose is adequate we could stay confortably except the congestion at restraunt because of the travel season i guess
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: super clean super comfy super hospitality the breakfast was good with various meal the omelet was very good i loved it the staffs were nice and helpful i could leave my luggages at the hotel while i went to gili trawangan
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: stay on bussiness propose with the office team and chosen this hotel very satisfied service no need long time check in process we got room free upgrad by facing to the pool restaurant really good ambience in the morning and good point that all staff always smile every corner good clean enough for the room corridor and area public we happy spend our time on the rd floorvery recommended
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: nice place to stay good servicesgood foods clean and nice staff very well done in servicing location is average just put more dispenser in around door rooms check the dispenser whether water still available or not
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: room lighting need to addupon i stayed your room are too darkwater from dispenser are not clear enough and guarantee safe to drink im not happy with water supply as no guarantee confirmed by your team about safety of water
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: one of my favorite choice hotel to visit in mataram is aston inn the place is in the center of the city easy access from any places they offers variance of food promotion and very competitive price compare the other placesevery friday afternoon they offers free coffee promotion which is rare and on daily they have also coffee promotionthey have wide range of menu variety from western to local authentic cuisine and also very unique taste of croissant with salted egg  i personally recommend this whenever you visit a cozy place at their pool bar on the third floor also very welcome and friendly staff since we arrived you can also enjoy a live music on friday afternoon at pool side while enjoy the sunsetdefinitely recommended place to hang out with friends
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: it was a great stay in lombok i stayed there for  days  nights and lucky me i stayed at a room with pool view the room size is spacious the bath room is fine but  thing need to be evaluated again we called the reception at the night approx pm seeking for a help and the reception man sounds he does not want to help us no problem cz we already love with the room so other thing will not be a problem well done
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: this is my second stay here and it sure doesnt disappoint me they have taken steps to be green initiative like removing away the plastic bottles instead they have a water dispenser in every level as always the rooms were clean and tidy breakfast was excellent they have plenty of varieties special mention to ms nengah suryani for responding to my queries promptly thank you so much for making our stay a memorable one
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: this place is recommended for overnight staythis place has many various food for breakfastthis place has a strategic position in mataram citythis place has good service cleanliness and good rooms
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: only got  problem while staying here someone have a birthday party on the pool with a karaoke until above pm disturbing rest timeother than that it was nice to stay here excellent recepsionist service clean room good food strategic location
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: in central mataram  minute from airport and  hour from kayangan harbournear damri pool good food and clean room but the floor need more cleaneasy to find nimarket  hour and easy to find taxi or car rental
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: i just stay and celebrating surprise party for my wife birthday with small gathering in pool side a lot of fun and surprising almost all perfectly going with some note to highlight the party organisers seem to be bit not well organising the party benefits and arrangements is not match with agreements was made missing the mc in the party plastics flower bouquet was given sound system some off them not properly install just bit disappointing but all of the concerns is not makes my wife birthday party going so well thank you to the chef whos preparing us a lot of foods and all taste good thank you to pak indar was helping to make this party are truly memorable thank you aston inn mataram we will back again someday
Name: Aston Inn Mataram

Review: nice hotel in the city of mataram breakfast was great all staffs were very friendly special thanks for ms nengah reservation she was great she helped me to arrange surprise for my parents th wedding anniversary we will be back
Name: Aston Inn Mataram
