Review: we are now in hotel we come here at th of august we celebrated birthday here and felt strong earthquaked on lombok we have small child with almost  years we are traveling a lot and it is one of the most beautiful places wich we visited anywhere dont afraid come here help lombok now it is safety hotel is absolutely well and we are  persons here its like paradise absolute relax and rest all hotels are closed in this region staff is like a big family all knows our names and allall ask how are we how is the day sunset is super no more earthquakes during earthquake  or  men from staff come to us and after it change our room on bungalobecause its more safety thank you kila
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: located on the beach the rooms are nice and surroundings lovely buffet breakfast is served with a reasonable selection the restaurant next to the beach makes good pizzas and pastas the greatest asset of this hotel is the friendly and caring staff
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i stayed in a few places during end of july in senggigiit is worth paying more money and have peace and good management present the staff really take care of their guests and service was always spot on and with a smile i was impressed with the warmth of the staff and the care they take of their guests beautiful property and gardens blue bird taxi just a phone call away walking distance to the senggigi main beach with a few restaurants on the beachfront the food is very good at kila i ate most of my meals on the beachfront at kila the evenings are filled with beautiful band music on the beachfront and sunsetsthe best spot in senggigi for watching the sunset i jmust congratulate the band as i really liked them very much cannot fault this hotel just very windy in beginning of august it was a bit cool on the beach not really places to hide from the wind during the day atm on the premises
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: nice and very friendly staff rooms a bit outdated but overall ok what is really terrible is the poor and extremely loud live music at their beach bar that you cant escape in most rooms and that isnt just loud and awful but goes on nonstop from midday till pm
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: killed by the terrible kilauea sengiggi resort their soul destroying music at sunset and overpriced food and drink options  full of local fully clothed touristsxand a littered beach proone of the most dissapointing beaches on lombok
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: this hotel looks nice but everything is just not quite the way you expect from a hotel at this price levelthe beds are very hard we asked for a different mattress but that was not possible they brought us toppers to soften the mattress they were so stained ill spare you the details that we send some back and eventually settled for the least stained ones flipped them over and covered them with other beddingthe breakfast is mediocre at best one toaster for all guests creating long queuesthe beachtowels have to be returned before  and you have to pay a sort of bailwhen we had a drink and asked for no ice they just took them back and let them on the bar for a while so the ice melted partially then put all in a shaker and poored it in the same glass while the remaining ice was kept in the shakerthe wifi is very very slowall in all nothing really bad except for the bed and the stains but the entire experience is way below par for a place that charges this amount of money not recommended
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: staff are amazing always with a smile in their face and happy to truly help perhaps their english is not the best but really attitude is everything the facilities are great the rooms very comfortable although not that modern the beach is clean and the best spot en senggigi close to all restaurants and bars and  hour from the airport and from the bangsal port complimentary water was provided every day and flexibility with checkout timeto improve breakfast variety ie cheeses andor cold meats wouid be great and internet which is not the bestwould definitely recommend to my friends
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: kila senggigi beach lombok located at the west of lombok there are many cafes  restaurants shops hotels villas and resorts this is strategic place to stay before going to waterfall at north of lombok or the three gili island  gili trawagan gili air and gili menu
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i stayed here for one night for a business meeting the meeting facilities was good room was big and service was ok the meeting room surrounded by gardeni stayed at a cottage room was clean and comfort the swimming pool was also ok in the afternoon i spend time at the beach and the sunset was amazing
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the hotel is surrounded in a very beautiful tropical garden small houses with  rooms are in this beautiful area the beach around the hotel is very nice unfortunately the beach is a few meters away from the hotel very polluted by garbagethe restaurants are very nice with a good selection of foodthe best thing was the buffet on the beach in the evening that was amazing but sometimes you have to wait a long time for yours drinks because the staff was overwhelmedall in all a very good holiday at the kila sengiggi beach resort
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: great hotel very good location excelent breakfast great indonesian restaurant did not tried the italian we prefer local food everyone treated us so well allways with a big smile andi from the reception was a great help would return in a next time to indonesia
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: id like to thank my best brother marsandi for his gear hospitality and not forgetting all staff therethe are sooooo nice and welcome you with a smilesure id love to come back againi recommend to visit
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: actually me choosing the hotel was unplannable my fiance planned to choose another  star resort next door however things changed in the last minute and we booked kila instead through the agentand its not disappointing the beach was clean and beautiful we hang out in the basilico restaurant while waiting for our check in time sipping fresh juice while admiring the blue ocean was something that really cure our stress the spa also great as well the room was clean and spacious and they have outdoor shower rooms also nice and clean and have private balcony things that need a little more improvement is the staff as much as theyre very helpful and very polite some of them are quite robotic like you can immediately see and feel that theyre remembering sop in a very uptight way instead of trying to personalize it and matching them with each of gueststill its such a pleasure living here and hope i can return
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we had an eleven night stay at kila hotel in june  its a beautiful hotel right on a good swimming beach which is very clean the most beautiful gardens around the resort we stayed in a beach bungalow which was very nicebathroom was ok but could do with renovation bed was very large and comfortable staff were wonderful very helpful and so friendly breakfast was pretty good with plenty to choose from they had a band every night at the restaurant which was great but from our room we could hear the bass and drum up until late which was annoying if you just want a quiet night overall we really enjoyed our stay at kila resort
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we enjoyed our stay at this resort the beach is beautiful with great views of the volcano in bali perfect for swimming and safe for kids breakfast was full of choice and happy hour at the bar watching the sunset with a cocktail was perfectthe rooms are a little dated and small  we had a beach front bungalowit is in a perfect location you can walk to many great little restaurants in senggigi i would definitely return here
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i really enjoyed  nights stay here in kila senggigi beach lombok all is about great experiences warm welcome is seem like new big family that we found here in kila foods was great room is fantastic amazing treated gardens friendly staff and amazing hods who always greeted us warm every where we go the staff are very caring and helpful and will go out of their way to make us happy we havent an issue with facilities involved here and all is perfect well done to gm pak erik and hods zaini yayat aang widana bambang and others was successfully created memorable experience during we are stay cant wait to visit this place back with my little family kila is island of paradise that must be visited as lombok destiny recommended
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: excellentstaff are good especially fyan very good in servicingi will stay on this hotel againbeach front very relaxing and nice sunset that can see mtagunggood location convienience to find foods n massage parlour
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we loved kila resort the rooms were beautiful and clean and the view from our bungalow was amazing sunset drinks and food at the restaurant are good value there are lots of restaurants nearby if you dont want to eat at the hotel
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i visit kila many times i feel relax everytime i come here food is delicious they also have live band playing in the evening it is so nice sitting at their basilico restaurant listening the musing while watching the sunset thanks to stevi who always greet me and gave a lot of information about the hotel
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: exceptional beachfront hotel covering a very large area with the sea on  sides of the property quiet location but  minutes walk to town restaurantsvery well maintained gardens great for walking around good swimming poolrestaurant provided good choice of food also beachfrontrooms good size comfortable and cleanvery helpful reception staff who quickly resolved a booking problemi can easily recommend this hotel
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the kila has beautifully manicured gardens and seem to take pride in keeping their resort well maintained we booked a bungalow room with a beach view i admit we booked one of the last bungalows left but were given a bungalow with a view of the restaurant which blocked our view to the sea it also meant the live band that played there every night was literally like they were playing in your room as there is no sound proofing whatsoever disappointing but not a deal breaker for us plus we got really good at guessing their song lineup haha the room itself was good nice bed great patio area to hang out on but the bathroom left much to be desired while the bathroom was fine and did the job we did expect a little more for what we paid for its a bit run down and the shower head was literally just a stream of water like a tap sometimes the toilet didnt flush properlythe buffet breakfast was pretty standard with some nice indonesian food on offer fresh fruit and some delicious pancakes however you had to be careful not to go to the breakfast too late or they ran out of some of the food their pastries were pretty dry and bland so we didnt really bother but they made great omelettes and even had some nice bircher muesli the hotel restaurant was surprisingly italian which is a little disappointing because wed prefer to eat the local food the food was quite over priced considering how small the portions were nevertheless a nice spot to sit and enjoy the beach and people watchingotherwise the staff were always friendly and welcoming to us and overall we had a very enjoyable stay the pool area was nice and we also enjoyed lounging over near the beach as well the beach had some nice snorkelling that is worth doing if you have the time as the hotel hires out snorkelling gear by the hour the location was great too  right near the main strip of shops in sengiggi which allowed us to explore the local food and shops
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: resort with reasonable amount of facilities occupying large piece of land private beach is nice rooms are very well organized with decent facilities only setback is that the walking distance from rooms to the swimming pool is quite far and the shower water pressure can be further improved overall resort is good for family with childrens
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: well kept resort clean and tidy with friendly staff the food was pretty good for lunch in the beachfront restaurant with live music on evenings and happy hour  on cocktails  breakfast was good with lots of varietythe best beach for white sands and clear water of all of the north west coast is directly in front of kila senggigi we hired a scooter to explore as we like to find secluded beaches to snorkel from the only downside or feedback is that every time you go onto the beach or the sun loungers people are trying to sell you local products and tours they are a little too relentless even though they clearly know not to come onto the resort
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: second time staying at this resort and had yet another great and relaxing experience amazing friendly and attentive staff really make the whole experience better good size bungalow accommodation virtually on the beach with enough facilities that you need not leave the resort breakfast choice is somewhat limited but other good food options available at the beach bar  italian restaurant
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: kila senggigi beach lombok is totally your top choice if you are looking for  a beachfront hotel a huge luxury resort a super comfy private bungalow a beautiful postcolonial decoration a big recreational pool super good  strong cocktail at the hotels bar by the beach a super smiling  friendly staff quiet nights  daytime animationsyou can clearly feel that kila has been here for quite a long time and it is still standing strong  batrooms may need a little refurbish in the nearest future but beside that the stay at kila is a really good way to enjoy lombok  its good vibesrates are really correct given the quality of service you get family couple group of friends it suits all kind of travelers
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i would love to kila visit many times kila is the best resort in senggig in my opinioni located perfectly on the beach side it has a huge and beautiful garden which i used for my daily run the basilico restaurant always served a good meal and the staff is always smiling and friendly special shoutout to stevi who gave really useful information and did her best to make our stay unforgettable
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: jewel in the crown amazing holiday bali  years ago but with all the modern stuff you want  staff professional great friendly good snorkeling cleanthank you will be back a lot found my new heaven on earththanks for our special cake on our wedding anniversary
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: kila beautiful fresh and inviting definitely a return if management looks into upgrading the roomsthey only lose points for the condition of their rooms sheets were with stains leaky faucets wc seat had stains too and breakfast spread repeated every day for the days we stayed but balances out with the warm hospitality of the staff vast green gardens and beautiful sea facing propertymanagement should definitely look into spending some to upgrade such a lovely facility
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: it is a beautiful resort but the rooms are old and very dirty we asked for a new room cleaner one but they offered us the same quality we do not enjoy the time here there is no words to say about
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: with my wife we have been in this resort in june  we decided to spend  night here while visiting senggigi beachthe resort is inside a huge park with grass flowers and trees very well keptbasilico restaurant is very good with italian and indonesian dishesstaff warm gentle and nicebreakfast is so and so i would expect much more fruit and warm service breakfast is just a small buffetyes there are some mouses in the garden but guys you are in indonesiaas said it was just for one night so we took a simple room with garden view anyhow the room was clean and spacious enough for  personspool area is nice there is a child playground and the beach is small but you will enjoy incredible sunset from there
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we stayed for  nights and were not disappointed wonderful staff throughout the resort beautiful gardens amazing food nothing was too much trouble you only had to ask and everything was delivered with a smile fabulous spacious rooms extremely comfortable beds its honestly the staff that make this place you just cant get better
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: huge place the first night was not easy to find things on this huge territorybuffet breakfast with quite a lot of choice was good but you have to wait till personnel brings you coffeeteathe room was ok nice bathroom furniture very old and kind of dirtyterrible wififriendly and helpful staff most of the timethe beach is okdifferent shops restaurants massage places bars are just next to the hotel
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: if you are someone who enjoy hotel room with with beach front and like listening to the sound of crashing of waves kila is the one around senggigi areathe garden and pool are well maintainconvenient shops are wide available spa high end restaurant to local store warung are within km walking proximity
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: beautiful place to stay staff friendly and helpful been three times never disappointed will go again lovely beach  pool close to small town for shopping transport to bali short walk along beach mataram about  minutes in blue taxi approx  aud
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: everything was absolutely perfect amazing location at the end of the small peninsular ocean on both sides surf break in front on the reef with long  foot surf everyday fantastic food day and night in two restaurants free very filling breakfast with a wide variety of choice beachside restaurant amazing view of balis mt agung going off accommodation clean and tidy maybe just a little dated but the chalets are the pick large clean and comfortable everything secure small waking distance to town  meters away lots of restaurants few tourists little traffic makes it safe for motorbike rides the hotel pool is beautifully clean and large staff are very friendly even when an atm on site failed to deliver  cash but withdrew s from my account staff helped get the money back after  weeks attemptingwould stay here anytime in fact this was our rd visittaytay brilliantrichard
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: location great just a short walk to restaurants and bars grounds are well kept and all the staff are friendly the happy hour at the beach is great and there isn usually a band we had a joining room and the neighbour was very noisy until we banged on the door the food there at both restaurants was amazing
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we had wonderful and restful time in kila sengigi beach hotel after the tiring yet enjoyable two weeks trips to bali yogjakarta and gillis trawangan meno and air we needed to have a quiet comfortable and enjoyable place to stay to recharge our batteries the resort and facilities are excellent the room was spacious and i love the balcony the location is great direct access to the beach and just outside the resort are restaurants stores small market beauty parlour etcbuffet breakfast caters to different cultures and loads of choiceswe love watching sunset by the beach and we were lucky to have had witnessed a turtle laying eggs in the beach  so specialwe enjoyed the food in the restaurant by the beach such that we had dinner in that restaurant in all  nights we stayed in kilathe staffs are very polite always happy to help and i would like to personally commend stevie the lovely guest relation officer of kila who made us very welcome on our first day thank you so much stevieoverall kila is an excellent resort which i will recommend to friends and familyand if ever we will come back in lombok we will definitely stay in kila againemma and huw jonesuk
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: complete facilities clinic mini market souvenir shop bike rent and others available all the parks are neat and wellkept the beach view is greatly appreciated especially when the sun sets and everything is comfortable
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: nice location for destress and good local food prepared by resort is good if come with a bunch of friend or just couple bring ur own suit if wanted to smirking around and just have to be careful as there is no life guard for you
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: one of best hotel ive ever stayed in the staff were welcoming and helped us plan for trip around mataram and gilis the bungalow was beautiful and in front of clean beach fantastic panoramic views of beach and agung mountain bali the delicious breakfast especially for lomboks coffee
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: perfect place friendly staff beautiful garden we went on lombok all week and spend more trip around senggigi the kila was perfect ac perfect cleanliness of room was number one and breakfast fast was very tasty
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: stayed in a deluxe sea view room which was well appointed good balcony overlooking the ocean the units blocks are dotted around the resort in groups of  units storey all seem to have good viewsit was lovely just to walk around well manicured gardens which were constantly being maintainedbreakfast consisted of plenty of options however it does get very busy on weekendspool and beach areas were nice and offered plenty of sun lounges with umbrellassunsets on the beach where the bar has happy hour is a nice way to end the dayall staff were both friendly and professional rooms were cleaned to a high standardonly thing to be aware of is the walls between these units seemed to be quite thin for a few days were had a young family with two noisy children and we could hear everything not too pleasant at am we did have neighbours on the other side and didnt hear themthis a very good resort in a great location would stay again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: never mind in my life i ever been here  it so far away from my homeland to flight here  but air asia was giving me low price flight to bali  and from bali by speed boat  i going to kila senggigi beach  nice place  nice sunny  my boyfriend like sunny here no body here for bothering your holiday and relaxing  lovely  recomended comeback again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: loved our week at kila senggigi  lovely room bathroom and verandah good service good food at the restaurants with a happy hour happy and friendly staff  could not have had a better time also close to ferries to bali and gili
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: like the previous visits our  holidays in a seaview bungalow from te kila senggigi beach resort was an unforgettable experience the hartwarming welcome the friendly staff the beautiful garden the very good breakfast it makes us look forward to another stay in
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: this property is one of the most beautiful ive ever stayed the rooms are well appointed albeit a bit small the food at the restaurantswas very tasty and the price is reasonable the beach bar was a great place to watch the sunsets i did have a problem though when i used the atm by the gift shop as it double debited my account in canada i am still trying to get that sorted out
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we loved this hotel the photographs really do not do it justice the gardens are superb and are absolutely beautiful check in was very quick in the gorgeous reception area we booked two garden view bungalows which were very comfortable clean and spacious the outdoor shower was a real treat dont worry theres an indoor one also if you dont like the idea of showering in the open air breakfast was good pool was lovely lovely staff our only small criticism was that the service was sometimes slow at the beach bar and prices were a little more expensive than the bars further along the beach but the setting certainly made up for this a great place to stay
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: it was a beautiful property theres even a musollah in the property morning walk witnessing the beautiful sunrise warms your heart and soul preparing you for the day love the spa as well as the orchid horticulture area i took many photos of flower blooms indicating spring is here thank you for making it a beautiful stay oh ya on my room service club sandwich which i ordered it came with two big bones in the chicken meat quite dangerous if its to be consumed by a child pls let the chefs know that they should be more careful during food preparation nevertheless we enjoyed our short stay
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i really enjoyed my stay the people were really friendly and very helpful the food was to die for  the pool was sensational the breakfast had whatever you wanted especially the omeletteyou really do need water shoes when travelling in bali  there pieces of coral all along the shoreline but once you get passed that the water is so beautiful and crystal clear
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the resort was beatiful and well maintained and the personal was friendly and helpful we enjoyed our holiday there very much and we hope to be able to come back next year and stay there a longer period
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: lovely resort great friendly staff awesome breakfast  dinner menu but so so so bigwe were in a room furthest away from dining  pool areas taking a while to walk there but thats our problem as we are only use to small hotels
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: kila senggigi beach hotel is a breathtaking resort set right on the beach at senggigi in lombok with magnificent tropical gardens palm trees manicured green grass swimming pool tennis court two restaurants including a beachfront bar gorgeous rooms and friendly staff this hotel has it all
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we stayed here    march  great location with awesome scenery very near to outside food stall and tip top cheap massage area very clean hotel staff well trained and very warm  friendly sunset beach with excellent live band breakfast is very tasty awesome swimming pool every single thing is fantastic here in kila try to find bad comment here but i dont have anything to complaint here fully recommended and will definitely come and stay here again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: always come here every year since  years ago i love the place and the people here thanks to stevi juni ayu dayu johan and all the staffs that makes our stay always wonderful and make us feel like home good beach good food good location beautiful garden and room we will always come back here again and again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we stayed here for  night weve arrived earlier than they check in time but they let us to check in early thank you for thatthe staffs are very friendly and helpful the place is very clean peaceful and quieti spent  hours at the purnama spa and all i can say its amazing the service is top notch and i fell asleep during my massagethe beach is really amazing its really clean and the people are very nice you can get your cheap souvenirs from here toothe bed is really cosy i could sleep all day long weve been told that its one of the oldest hotel in lombok and yet it is still well maintainedwill definately come back again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: this is a nice resortlombok is very quiet at the momentfood prices are cheap but alcohol is expensive and incurs a taxthe food is okay nothing flashthe bathroom in our room was well overdue fo some tlcstaff are friendly however they are notfluent in englishhaving said that their english is far betterthan our indonesianthe warra just up the road from the resort can source decent takeaway wine and some spirits at reasonable prices just ask for ednanice to stay if you are after a quiet and relaxing location
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: friendly team always answer to everyone dengan senang hati my pleasure and do everything with heart great food good maintenance good room expert to handle your event i was stay in this hotel for  weeks and manage  events the leaders are very welcome and easy to contact the team very supportive
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i stay one night at sengigi after we spent the all day in gili trawangan hotel was nice has a beautiful beach view good breakfast dinner was good as well however we have to wait to get the double bed that we ordered before but not available finally twin bed magically become a double bed they make it one
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the resort and landscaping is really nice as well as the staff my room was standard and ok but if i stay here again i would probably consider the pool villas instead great location on the pier lots of loungers for sunsets and a great place to grab a drink
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: very nice bungalows garden view near beach  m with clean room and private bathroom garden is maintained and looks beautiful very nice and helpful staff we have been here for a couple of years now and always spended our time satisfied
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: nice resort direct at the beachmiss ayu was very attentfull during the breakfast and always found time for a chat with usoutside the resort limited restaurants or things to dothe restaurants were pricy and the food was of poor qualitythe staff was always helpfull
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: set in a beautiful location on the beach the rooms were excellent and the landscaping very tidy and impressive the hotel restaurant on the beech served very nice italian food at very reasonable prices and the staff were excellent overall we really enjoyed our time here and would definitely return
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: it was our family vacation again after a long time ago sokila was very nice and awsome for my family view from the beach to see sunset or sunrise was great toohope can go back with my whole family especeally my mom
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: my husband and i choose kila for our short getaway check in time is  but until  our room is not ready luckily they compensate us with late check out until pm we choose a deluxe sea view room if you choose to stay in this type of room i suggest you pick high floor fyi if you smoking youre allowed to smoke at the balcony onlyenjoy your sunset at sunset bar you will find a magnificent sunset with happy hour from breakfast start from  they have a lot of variety and quite tasty room service is  hoursno gym available but they have jogging track and swimming pool
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we arrived at the hotel a bit early from the check in time but the receptionist willing to help us to get our room immediately it was a very magnificent experience the food was very good and the scenery there so beautiful private beach and the staffs were very friendly we felt welcomed there
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: awesome location and facilities  we took the ocean view bungalow  adults and  kids and had a great stay really loved our stay only feedback i would give is that the price of drinks alcoholic is over the top  a beer more than  x more expensive than anywhere else that we ate during our stay easy fix just buy it down the road
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: beautiful hotel with beautiful staff everything about my stay was perfect the indonesian people are the nicest people i have ever met and the staff at this hotel were no exception everyone was so lovely and went out of their way to ensure our stay was perfect
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: it was a pleasure to stay kila price is good and service is the best spacious room outdoor and indoor showergreat location and food as well love kila so much i dont want to leavethank you kilaall the bestfahmi
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: stayed  nights here at bungalow   comfortable roomnice and cleangood servicefriendly staffnice foodnyum nyum nyumbeautiful scenerygood location for photographyhope to visit again next time
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: this year we booked for the second time at kila senggigi beach hotel from the moment we arrived we felt really at homethe crew is very polite always greeting and asking if you are all rightwhen we had breakfast we always saw the friendly stevi who asks how you are and if you have a problem she listens and tries to solve itour room was very nice had a beautiful view and was clean
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: excellent location and friendly staff we love the garden view so green and such a relaxing atmosphere the food was very nice as the fruits were very fresh and delicious we especially enjoyed the short walk to the beach from our rooms
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we had great days in kila the garden and the grounds are very nicethe staff are very friendly and always greets and the breakfast is extensive und something for everyonein the near of the resort are some good restaurants also the restaurants in the resort are good
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: big room nice view with beach but not too private beach very large area that suitable for jogging full of beautiful trees and flowers but it made us far from restaurant for breakfast especially when rain came
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: excellent hotel at senggigi area during our visit all services were excellent the hotel can access directly to the beach so we can see sunset in the afternoon good restaurant room was comfortable for us
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we were upgraded without request to the pool club villa no idea why   storey villa jacuzzi direct pool access from lavish front verandah lounge and dining area upstairs balcony exclusive breakfast  sec walk away ayu will attend to all your needs at breakfast and free afternoon tea at the pool she is fantastic sumiarta explained every feature of the resort i will definitely be back i usually hol in bali  x vietnam  x thailand x but this is  st time here cant recommend highly enough
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the hotel was very good it has a nice spot to enjoy the sunset and sunrise it is also good for business trip the class room is so comfortable and has a good service we were assisted by mr made dastra whom services us very helpful and informative
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i have never actually stayed here because we live quite close by but i have eaten here many times over the last  years and it remains my favourite hotel in lombok the grounds are extensive and beautifully kept half the pleasure of coming here is walking around the gorgeous gardens and there is plenty to do as it is surrounded by beach where watching the sunset is a well known attraction here there is the pool and giant chess and great live music the food is fine and the cocktails ok but the atmosphere is  star and for me thats worth it they also have live music which i love we spent christmas afternoonevening here and it was so pleasant sitting outside the bar at their tables on the sand under the big tree with giant lanterns sipping my cocktail watching the sunset and listening to the live jazz trio i will keep going back whenever we want a special evening out maybe one day i will stay overnight
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: again we had a very good time in kila sengiggi resort on the beach its such a lovely place with a beautyfull garden and beautyfull white sand beach we get a warm welcome back when we arriving in the one of the nice bungalows with garden view the staf is always helpfull and friendly we enjoyd the christmas dinner buffet really very good also the dayly breakfast is very good many choice we have had our dinner every night in the restaurant basilico very good with wonderfull staffwe stay there for  days again and i like to tell we will be back again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the hotel was very good the beach has a good spot for snorkling and enjoying the sunset the room was clean and comfort the food breakfast was delicious good service next time ill be back again
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: room request was not according booking asked for fitst floor but no reaction on my email upon arrival got room on ground floor but is okeroom was very noisy the whole night hum of machinery have called reception and it was oke with the hum at  oclock am start again from the  days i was  days ill and stay in the room pity that some of guest not taking into considaration with other guest shout and sliding with furniture sometimes till  am rest is it a nice hotel all staff are well educated and very polite nice garden indonesian culinair can be upgraded with more choices of foodif i am return to this hotel i will book a higher classroom like cottagethank you for your kind attentionwith kind regardshanri
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we were going on a roundtrip and happened to come to kila senggigi of our  hotels this and one more were on the top the minuses are primarily two or three it should be a non smoking hotel compound the minority of smokers destroy too much for the majority non smokers even the vendors outside the restaurant inside were smoking the other problem for us was that the cooking in the inside restaurang didnt seem to have professional staff even the italian seemed to need upgraded chef indonesia is a tragic dirt hole except kila senggigi and similar places but kila should have staff looking after the beach we gave them a hand but it is a never ending problem if not a movement like keep indonesia and the oceans clean
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: i must say kila senggigi is an affordable and nice place to stay there are many places to chill around the resort while looking out into the horizon it also has a very central location making the booking of tours really easywhat made us really impressed was their customer service my hubby and i carelessly left our jackets and track pants in the cupboard after we have sent it for laundry boy who was the receptionist during our stay took the initiative to look for me on facebook via my email address to tell me about it of coz on the other hand we have already realized it and were desperately trying to call the hotel he even offered options on the type of shipping we would likethanks boy and thanks kila senggigi
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: the kilahotel is located on a peninsula directly on the beach the place sengiggi with many restaurants and shops can be reached in a few minutes the complex with bungalows and rooms is located in avery wellkept garden on the beach is the basilico restaurant especiially at sunset very popular the staff of the hotel is competent and very friendly especially we would like to mention the staff of the basilico with the very friendly waitress partini we will definitely come back
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: they had excellent service they just give me extra baby crib when the receptionist saw me with lil baby and two kids clean room beautiful garden they have best beach area to swim and sunbath with mount agung as a view enjoying best sunset from the restaurant near the best is just so perfect the food is delicious we love to staying at kila senggigi
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: its really happy to stay in this hoteli will recommend to all my friend and familythe flower is nice staff is really friendly breakfast is very good  maknyus like papa bondan say definitely will return
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: we loved staying at kila senggigi beach very friendly and helpful staff beautiful garden and located next to the beach nice restaurant with live music at the beach we upgraded the room from a standard garden view room to a bungalow the first room was a bit dissappointing but the bungalow was very nice with openair shower
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: been to lombok a few times and we always stayed at the sheraton however we decided on kila this time round after we are unable to secure any rooms at the sheraton due to an unusual fullhouse bookings nevertheless we were surprised at how good kila is although it is incomparable to sheraton but at the less pricey price this resort actually delivered beyond our expectations upon arrival we were warmly received by the staff checkin was quite efficient and although there was an issue with our bookings the staff managed to resolve it promptly we had reserved a deluxe sea view room with a private balcony that faced a lovely lawn and the beach was just about  metres away i spent most of the nights in the balcony reading a book and sipping coffee at the balcony while enjoying the cool sea breeze the room was a bit dated but clean and rustic which we actually preferred while staying in a beach resort the room and the bathroom are spacious we were happy with the room size staff were overall very friendly and every one of them smiled and greeted us as we walked past them we had breakfast at the rinjani restaurant every morning it was a buffet spread although not as wide spread as sheraton the spread was actually just nice and the quality of food was surprisingly quite good we did had a bbq buffet dinner on one of the night at the basilico italian pavilion restaurant  bar but its a bit underwhelming so its advisable to have your dinner at the senggigi village which is just a  minutes walk and there are many options of good restaurants at the village the location of kila was actually more accessible to nearby convenience stores shops and restaurants than sheraton kila senggigi beach is highly recommended based on location pricing and the resort itself
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: egoist attitude when i first check in then we trying to ask for opinion about place of interest and etc their staffs attitude is like im troubling them egoist i would say until i try to please them by saying their hotel is very nice and lovely of course i didnt mean that then at least they help me a little
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: amazing resort with such friendly workers and great facilities breakfast buffet was spectacular and the on site restaurant was to die for special thank you to hamid who looked after us so well definitely will be returning as soon as possible
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: this beach is a very clean beach and you can also enjoy a view of the beach from the road travelling to lombok it provides a lovely view and has beautiful blue  green waters you can walk a long way on the beach or just sit and relax
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: nice resort just a short walk from the main street we enjoyed the piece and quiet presence of night guards doing regular rounds makes everyone feel safer very polite and professional staff always greeting us with a smile reception team keen to assist any time of day or night with any issues especially tutik went beyond her duties chasing up our missing luggage clean and spacious room although lacking more storage space for clothes beach area kept clean plenty of loungers available great choice of food for breakfast at rinjani restaurant the basilico restaurant was slightly disappointing we found it a bit too expensive for the quality of food and discovered better value for money restaurants in downtown senggigi both massages we treated ourselves to were brilliant overall we were very satisfied thank you
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: very nice hotel but a little disturbing from the nightclubs if you lived closer to the city restaurant barthe pool area was topthe room was nicethe breakfast was fantasticand the service was top
Name: Kila Senggigi Beach Lombok

Review: myself and my partner have just got back from an incredible  night stay herethe resort is gorgeous and had a really relaxed atmospherenot many downsides at all but it is a shame the hotel is not closer to any restaurants and bars unfortunately there really isnt anything within walking distanceanother negative is that the hotels restaurant is not nosmoking its very off putting when youre trying to enjoy a nice meal and the tables next to you are smoking one guy even had a pipe that said the food in the restaurant is varied and deliciouswe also used the spa while we were there and although the hotel got the time confused and we were a little rushed the massage was incredible and i wish we had gone sooner and more oftenthe rooms feel very authentically indonesian however could probably do with a lick of paint
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i reserved an after sun body massage wow cant believe the service i received tuna did an incredible masssge with aloe vera and finished with a really cold tomatoes and cucumber past on all over my skin after taking a shower my skin was super soft and she served me the most delicious ginger tea everything better and less expensive than bali highly recommend to take a few hours an indulge yourself at this fantastic spa
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we love this resort it is beautifully landscaped with individual duplex cabanas located around the grounds many with private pools the restaurant sits overlooking the beach and the food and service is wonderful they have their own pier for swimming snorkeling and boats for tours also a spa wonderful the area is not a general tourist area so dont expect to find tourist shopping in the area renting a motor scooter for exploring the area is wonderful the road over the mountains to other side of the island is gorgeous
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: beautiful bungalows lovely quiet pool area very beautiful views from pool and restaurant great trip to gili nangu from here good breakfast choice and clean water provided in the roomhighly recommend
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a beautiful boutique hotel looking towards gili kedis and entrance to lembar bungalow style accommodation with very well equipped rooms staff very helpful and enthusiastic lovely pool food good excellent breakfast buffet reasonably priced food for a hotel but the drinks  oh my idr for a coke theres a fridge in your room so bring your own
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is an amazing resort  quiet clean and very beautiful the staff were very polite friendly and courteous we were very well looked after by themi have enjoyed all the facilities provided by the resort  spa massages boat trip to the small nearby islands and trip to the marketlook forward to come back with some friends
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i am part of the group of divers with max i just want to feedback on the food standard and the restaurant serviceby my experience i ordered the same menu item tom yum soup over  days and each time i was served a different version of the soup only on the rd day was the tom yum soup of an acceptable tom yum standard and the rest of the food on the day were good as well of course we were happy and we highlighted our compliments to the chef to the restaurant staff then food standards drop again for the rest of the stay including indonesian food to my disappointment and im not the kind who like to waste food so i did try to finish my orders every time but really do try to maintain a consistent food standard pleaseon the restaurant service over the course of the stay very frequently the restaurant staff mixed up our orders or keep forgetting or did not follow up on our orders i first experienced this on my first night when i check in later than the main group it is frustrating when i am kept waiting for my order even when the main dining crowd has already left this i cannot comprehend however there is that one chap whose service compared to the rest is way exceptional he is the only one that keep checking with us if our food is ok keep topping up our water jug etc his service is genuine and thoughtful and we thank him for that
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is a off the beaten track but still close by it has therefore managed to keep authenticity and charm views across the ocean towards the gilis are breathtaking premises are spatious clean scenic and well kept even antimosquito measures once a weekthe resort and diving centre offer many excursions i recommend a diving or snorkling trip across the islands which are the main attraction on this side of lombok make sure you book quickly during high seasoni did not get a chance to test the spa but it seemed well kept and i wont expect it to dissapointthis is really an unique place and i recommend to visit it soon its has everything you want and still a bit undiscovered and the southern gilis are breathtaking paradise islandsroom tip we had  connecting rooms ultra handy with  young kids and an infant ask for a room or cottage towards the sea away from a bit if street noise in the morning
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: visit this resort for a dn for diving with a few friends and realise that it is quite similar with the one at manado room is reasonably size and well maintain although i will prefer some part of it to be a little more well lighted in order to fix up my diving equipment one down side of resort will be the service and restaurant food we arrive at the resort with no one in sight for a good  mins and wonder around the lobby with our luggage thinking what to do most of the restaurant service staff is very friendly and helpful but there is a few that pull down the overall service and the food that i wanted to comment most is that there is no consistency on it the same dish we order can have various version and some of it taste really horrible we really struggle with the meal we had each day and pray each day the right chef is at work hygiene is another issue at the restaurant one of my friend got a mild diarrhoea during the trip due to the food the water jug cover is serve to us with mould on it which i hope they will look into this matter attached photo dive center overall service is excellent with friendly and helpful crew
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my husband and i just stayed at cocotinos for  night in july  they have a dock and a diving center right at the hotel we chartered a boat to go snorkeling at gili layar gili nanggu and gili rengit and saw amazing fish beautiful coral and swam with sea turtles it was amazingthe hotel itself is awesome the rooms are clean comfortable and the ac works great the pool is very pretty we ate breakfast lunch and dinner at the onsite restaurant and it was deliciouswe left our bose headphones in the safe in our room and the hotel manager sent them to us at our next destination which was balistaying at cocotinos was a great experience all around we will definitely stay here again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we chose to stay here as it offered everything you would need from a resort not close too or in a town we were not disappointed at all amazing location comfortable bungalows fantastic staff food sensational views beautiful clean friendly and would go back again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hotel is located far away from everything in lombok but this was known when we booked and this was our plan hrs from airport by taxi  rupie hrs from mataran ferry boat port same price as abovethe structure is nice rooms are spacious and well cleanedresort is close by a road so you will hear during night and day the noise of bikes cars and trucksbeach is small but nicethe whole staff is very friendly and nicethe food is cheap and in small quantities and probably i was unlucky but i found a worm in my dish at dinner was not nice but im not picky so i didnt care so much hotel manager apologized for that but anyhow this is not acceptable in a  resortprices general price is higher compared to other even better structure in the islandfood price is very high compared to other nice restaurants in other part of the island but still cheaper compared to european reality
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stayed at cocotinos for a long weekend great seaview for a nice relaxing time by the beach the rooms are in bungalow type setup clean and comfortable the staff were very friendly and helpful the restaurant has typical hotelresort type food it was good though not exceptional the hotel has inhouse dive shop and can arrange your diving trip in the surrounding islands definitely recommend this hotel
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed here for a week with my wife and had an amazing time its a secluded resort with great facilities and impeccable service the food was also great and very well priced plenty of activities in the area all around a great place to stay
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: visited here in january really quiet but nice restaurant with lovely seaview staff friendly and attentive food good nice menu a little on expensive side had walked a distance from village to here but no problem getting security to give us ride back to accomodation for small price recommended
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: ive been here last mont for business trip and really enjoy the scenary of the place beatiful beach far fron crowdness but sorry for the food did not find the food that suitable with my taste hopefully serve more fruit
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we are repeat costomers who have come to cocotinos three times now we love the staff and the facilities  food is a great choice at ella ella restaurant the rooms are great with indoor and outdoor showers we love that its away from the crazy crowds of senggigi and kuta feel a lot more like we can call this place our home away from home
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: there was a small plunge pool in our villa which was right on the beach we took a  minute boat to gili nanggu where we went snorkeling there was hardly any place else to eat except for the restaurant in the hotel the food was ok and there is a lot of fish in gili nanggureview by asha  years old
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my wife and i stayed for  nights in december the room and facilities in the room were nice and well thought out our balcony was private and simplebesides the leaks in the roof and the dripping water in the room that got some of our things wet we quite enjoyed the roomthe public facilities though were weathered and tired sun chairs were not laid out on the beach dining was not available on the beach the towel bar and pool need serious maintenance bar tops were dirty and major parts need refinishing the pier gazebo is a wreck and the seatingchairs under it were falling apartthe staff were anything but welcoming hospitable or tentativewhen we checked in the staff just stared at us as we got out of the car to unload our baggage we were not assisted and there was no parking they did bring our bags to the room thoughat the restaurant the staff were not very welcoming or warm and they often messed up our orders by forgetting thingsthe food was horrible barely edible and to our surprise the staff found it perfectly normal that we barely ate our food not once asking if the food was okthey even messed up indonesian food and to my horror were able to serve an almost unedible nasi gorengoh and the pool boy empties out the pool filter backwash water into the ocean infront of the guests that bleech must be just great for the coral reefim surprised this place has such good ratings i for one will not be returningim surprised this place has such a good rating and i for once will not be returning
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hotels location is brilliant with a great view of the tiny islands and you can see mt rinjani on a clear day the rooms are clean and nice and all the staff are very pleasant and helpfulthe food is very good especially since there arent many places around the resort to eat if your looking for a holiday to unwind and relax this is just the perfect location to do so but if your looking to do some sightseeing near mataram and further north this is quite far off and you may not be able to cover all the places in a daythey do have guide to take you diving but there wasnt a dive instructor for us to learn diving  this could have been since there werent many people in the resort this decemberoverall the place worked for us just because of the location and food
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: breathtaking seaview nice cottage great service you can hire a boat for reasonably cheap price to visit the nearby islandsgilis you can arrange for diving trip from the hotel to top diving location in lombokbali region or option to stay here to just chill out daydreaming and read all day long this is a highly recommended r  r place for those comfortable without that  star silver service but still expect good international standard service
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: spent a few days here postrinjani a wonderful way to chill out after the climb great pool nice beach and clean spacious rooms staff were incredibly friendly as wellit is a bit removed from other places and activities  so be prepared to spend lots of time at the resort but with an attached restaurant pool and dive centre thats not too bad
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: relaxing place nice beach quiet location good restaurant and and very kind people offering a good service we stayed in a room without separate swimming pool but it was no problem the hotel area was almost like a private location quiet and well kept
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hotel is not so big and quite isolated a car or bike to reach the first important town is necessary the atmosphere at the hotel is lovely and warm the personnel is very very kind and efficient they know how to make you feel good the only restaurant is nice looking in front of the sea and dishes are good we really had a good time at this hotel there is a little swimming pool and it takes only  minutes to be at nanngu island in front of the cocotinos it is a good hotel if you want to make sub i have been here for my honeymoon everything was fantasitic but there are only to remarks to be done in my opinion at night a little entertainment should be offered something like soft music or a little show after dinner there is nothing to do at my arrival at the hotel i got the key of the room but after really few minutes i realised that it was really noisy because near to the road motorbikes and cars really bothered people staying in those rooms and especially if you are on honeymoon you need a little bit of peacein any case rooms are nice quite big with ac and tvfinally i can say that my experience at cocotinos has been nice
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we spent four nights at the cocotinos resort in augustit was a very relaxing stay the hotel is small well kept the rooms are very big and cleanthis is the perfect place to visit the nearby beautiful islands and do some amazing snorkeling there or diving the hotel is quite isolated and since we did not have our own mode of transportation we decided to have all the meals there the restaurant is ok but of course much more expensive than everywhere else on the island there is also a nice free teacoffeesnacks time every afternoonthe beach is clean although nothing special but it is nice that you can go snorkeling from the peer and see many fishes and corals the people from the snorkelingdiving center were very friendly and we loved the trips that they organized but again prices are quite high compared to the averagethey have free activities such as visit to the market and traditional villages we did not take them instead we wanted to visit a nearby beach and they were so nice to bring us there and come later to pick us up for freeall in all we enjoyed very much our stay there were only two problems with the hotel and thats way i do not give them  starsthe main problem was the poor understanding of english of most of the staff often it was really a problem to be communicatethe second problem was the limited number of sunbeds by the beachpool once everyone comes back from the boat trips they are definitively not enough
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stopped here for lunch with a group of people the food was really good i ended up needing a room for a night so i decided to stay here it was surprisingly close to american prices to stay and eat here the room was just what i needed wasnt too fancy even with the price tag but it was a safe clean place to lay my head i even got to checkout a little later than the normal time without any additional fee i had the complimentary breakfast which was great much better than most continental breakfasts id recommend staying here
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed in august for  days at the cocotinos resort and like last year we were fine the staff are nice and caring and you are like at homethe room is nice spacious clean and well cared as well as the bathroom we have done massages every day at spa mrs agung and mrs tias are very good and very professionalwe also did  dives with odyssea divers which has excellent wellequipped boats both underwater guides and onboard staff are very kind and cater to any needs in short we were too good many thanks to all you are in our heart
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed here for  nights this place was rather secluded and took one hour to get there from the airport they have around  rooms with a big and lush garden the room is spacious enough yet not very well noiseproofing as we could still hear the sounds from the rooms next to us as well as the noises of motorbikes on the main street the resort has their own big swimming pool beach and jetty and you can snorkel right there you will see some big school of fish giant blue starfish and some corals as we did the resort location is also convenient for daily snorkeling tour to nearby and faraway islands its best if you can avoid taking the tours on sunday as it will be pretty crowded on those islands making the snorkeling less enjoyable we didnt choose the service provider from the resort given their much higher price tag whilst the values were more less the same as offered by nearby fishermen and villagers despite our not using the resorts service staff was still helpful to organize the tours for usthe resorts food was decent we ate here all the time as there were not many options nearby id suggest its safe to stick to the chefs recommended menu except the balinese meal set they used too much chicken  which wasnt specified on the menu and the courses were not well cooked imho for other courses i found seafood much better cooked than chicken duck the latter was made very dry so that we couldnt taste the meat texture anymorestaff was friendly and helpful most of the time however when there were some needs for troubleshooting they were quite confused we needed to wake up quite early on the last  days for a diving trip and b checking out to go to bangsal port given the restaurant wouldnt open until  am we were offered breakfast boxes for both days the boxes included chicken sandwiches with some fruits we were disappointed as soon as we opened the box we found some ants crawling inside despite we immediately showed that to the receptionist on the first day it happened again on the second day we showed it to the receptionist again and gave up given we were checking out it then soon followed by another disappointment before going to lombok we booked the resort shuttle service certainly not cheap but we wanted to be sure to take us to bangsal port at  am on the checkout day but the driver was late for nearly  given we needed to show up there on time to catch a boat we doublechecked with a receptionist the night before the person ensured everything was arranged but then happened the incident when we came to the reception at  am the first thing he asked me to do was to pay for the shuttle service despite the driver wasnt there yet the receptionist made many calls and couldnt answer our question as to why the driver was late he kept moving between the desk and the back room without any explanation that made us even more nervous luckily we didnt miss our boat at bangsal but that gave us a heart attackoverall we had a decent stay however these incidents shouldnt have happened given the resort has operated for  years for the price tags quoted by the resort we expected a higher standard in service delivery
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the staff are lovely helpful and speak english our bedroom  bathroom was clean and good standard very peaceful resort yet literally nothing else nearby we were meant to stay  nights but moved to kuta on the second morning the food was bland tasteless which is where we struggled with the thought of staying the whole weekend the beach is actually about m long not m photos were very deceptive the sea was unswimmable due to coral reef the sand was not raked and therefore not pretty white but full of seaweed the lombok website states mins from airport it took us hours there is lots of potential here but the owners lacking focus on the finer details had a massage which was lovely i rarely write reviews and never had to switch places before therefore felt important to share our experience as the website is deceptive in our opinion
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: its location is in a superb area beachfront with blue waters  a pier there is also a center for your snorkeldiving needs sufficient deck beds  canopy for you relax  sun tan as for food you do not have any choice chefs skills are not fantastic my familys experience w their seafood is that fish meat are mushy  fishy tasting  my brother experience diarrhea after eating seafood basically if you are hoping to have a wonderful dinning experience with food  view complimenting each other the food is an utter disappointment there is no convenient store within walking distance to buy anything
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: its a really beautiful place very quiet in a lush palm garden the room is huge with a big bathroom and also an external shower air conditioning and fan  liter driking water in the room and you can ask for more if needed nice pool in front of the beach in front of the hotel there is a coral reef where you can snorkel you can go into the water directly near the coral reef thanks to a  m long piergood food in the restaurant and really nice and friendly staffgreat for a couple of relaxing days outside the touristic places
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the people at the hotel were wonderfully friendly and keen to help the food was excellent the beachfront villa made it very special maybe less so in a standard room the location is very remote so you have to be prepared to just chill out at the hotel and do boat trips  which was fine for us only negative the extremely expensive rates for diving  twice the cost of diving in menjanagn island in bali
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had dinner here and were very pleased with the variety on the menu and the service we had the staff were very friendly and made us welcome the food was very good i had the pork ribs and my wife grilled chicken we fully recommend to one and all
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: beautiful spacious clean villagreat bathroom with indoor and outdoor shower appreciated the unlimited water in the room food goodstaff great boat crew were excellent trips to gili gedegili ringgit and gili nanggu were good value massage at inhouse spa lovely
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we travelled across bali and the west and south coast of lombok we stayed in all sorts of places includig luxury and mid range places without a doubt this is one of the best because it balances style simplicity great service with oustandig functionthe roonms are lovely not over designed like many resorts but large and super comfortable with everything you need and more  tea coffee fridge safe lounge areas outdoor terrace inside  outdoor shower options quiet aircon and working fan so you can choose temeprtaure control while being able to sleep it has a lovely aid back open plan restaurant and while i cant decsribe the food as great thats fairly true of most of indonesia as the locals think tourists dont like spicey cuisine but it is good food the pool is great a real bonus as its made for proper swimming and not just as a plunge pool and its right beside the beach there is great snorkeling in the area and the staff bend over backwards to help the owner is malaysian and perhaps more sesitive to to the locale than western investors its really very good it made our joneymoon
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i love visiting the cocotinos it is worth the ride from the airport if you want to be at a great place not near more dynamic and noisy locations  this is the place for youwords to describe it quiet beautiful lovely rooms great food excellent staff
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the resort is located away from the city and suitable for tourists to be closer with the naturejourney was about hmins drive from lombok airportthe resorts garden is well kept and our room is well maintained big room with enough storage spacethe staffs provided excellent customer service to us they were always friendly and eager helping usstaffs were flexible to make minor changes in the menu to suit our preference
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: excellent place far away from the crowded tourist spotsclean and wonderful rooms very friendly staffbeautiful pool good foodif you climb over the rocks on the left you can also do some nice walks on the beachsnorkeling possible lots of fish diving possible by dive schoolwe stayed only  days after out lombok trip we should have stayed longerif we should come back on lombok we would visit this hotel againtrips to surrounding islands possiblewifi in reception area in rooms not always but you are there for relaxing not surfing
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we were a party of  pax   divers and  non divers the resort had all the creature comforts that catered to both the divers and the non divers in our groupwhat made the stay at the resort enjoyable was the patience and service level of the resort staff they always had a smile on their face and were always willing to accommodate our requeststhe team at the dive centre were superb as well while the dive season had already opened up in sekotong lombok when we were there  we were the only dive group during our  day stay we had the attention of the crew and the dive boat to ourselvesthe dive guides were well informed of the local dive sites and knew where to find the smallest creatures in the area
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: good view good food comfortable rooms quiet atmospherea large swimming pool there is also a pool for children direct access to the beach with a private dock and there is a rental of diving equipment and boats
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: really nice resort with an amazing staff that take great care of you this resort is very different to the rest of lombok as it is outside the touristic area you will get a much better connection to locals and paradise gillis with your own beach if you are looking for some place away from other tourists with peace and quiet this is the perfect choice we spent  weeks at the resort and had a great time thank you
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: drove out to escape the city and the drive was nice wonderful ocean vistas at the restaurant the place was reasonable with a very nice patio for lunch that opened right on the beach with a great view of the gili islands the wonderfulness stopped there service while friendly was exceptionally slow and the food bland and tasteless disappointing this was the only reasonable place we saw on the drive out there so you are sort of stuck at least the beer was cold
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hotel rooms and grounds are beautiful located right on the beach overlooking gili nangu the pool is warm and perfect the staff are all friendly and helpful the restaurant is open air and wonderfully decorated the food is expertly prepared and presented the tour of the market and surrounding area was educational and fun our driverguide ketok was knowledgeable fun and a great treat to have as our host we had a perfect vacation and highly recommend this lovely establishment
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: staff were friendly and tried their best to provide great serviceonly  rooms occupied at the resort and loved the quiet peaceful stayroom was very clean the ac was strong and the localwestern food were very nicemy gripes are that  hot water not working  shower head coming apart  mosquitoes and wasps in the vaulted ceiling room for the entire stay  mosquitoes at the restaurant  dive guide not following our requests or practicing underwater conservationdiving in warm water is always a plus but poor visibility still got some great macro photography done
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: really cute place with nicely decorated rooms that keep to the funky theme i was surprised that the food was actually really good wouldnt recommend their western main dishes but asian dishes and salads were great and breakfast was good the staff were really helpful and spoke perfect english there isnt much to do at the hotel so we just used it as a base and didnt spend anytime there in the day the beach infront of the resort is nothing spectacular but the islands are only mins away the only complaint advice i have is regarding the dive centre on site they charge usd million rupiah for a boat to the neighbouring  islands hours which is outrageous as i knew that the price should only be k the staff at reception were kind enough to call the local fishermen at the nearly tawun harbour and they came to pick us up and we got a private boat to the islands for k for the day including transfer back and all proceeds go the the locals rather than a company i have the contact of the guy now so can share if required
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i visited others cocotinos comparison the staff are shy n dare not to speak much except the dive crew they are fun n helpful may be the hotel staff need more advice or training food are standard since lombok is full of seafood i suggest that more flexible for seafood for example i would like to order more seafood from the fish market this has not been arranged general fish dishes in the restaurant are fresh even for us who are fussy in the freshness of the seafood
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we love our tangkong villa very much spacious and well decorated villa love the plunge pool and direct access and view to white sandy beach spacious bathroom with unique bath tub cocotinos has great white sandy beach and calm wave very nice for swimming with kids easy access to reach gili nanggu less than  minutes by boatthe only downside is the restaurant i know i read good review about their restaurant but sorry to say we did not satisfy with their food we stayed for  nights and we always take in room dining as no other restaurant nearby in walking distancethe thai beef salad is too salty hard burger bun for the burger menu but the beef patty is nice over cooked calamari the most weird margeritha pizza ive ever tasted inconsistent taste of bolognaise sauce between the first order and second order not to mention different taste each day in our mienasi goreng for breakfast its really a great resort but please please please improve your restaurant menu quality we love everything about your resort except the food sorry
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the stuff is very friendly but unfortunately they still dont understand english if people want some entertainment in the evening this hotel is the wrong chose because there is really nothing remarkable around for my friend and me it was quite fine because we wanted to relax we enjoyed our stay in cocotinos sekotong
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: beautiful resort pool area right on the ocean with a breathtaking view staff in the restaurant was very friendly and chatty we booked a rebate package online felt wierd because resort was relatively empty and they still put us in a bungalow in the very back close to the road seperated by a high wall but you could hear it well kept grounds very relaxing and enjoyable food was good reception and staff perfect just a very very beautiful secluded nice place only wierd thing was that the guy from the dive shop was rather keen on selling us a snorkeling trip even though we wanted to go diving in the end we did neither and just chilled at the pool yes i can recommend staying here
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if youre looking for a place to get away from the hustle and noise of the city cocotinos sekotong will offer you exactly that the dive center odyssea dive center that i dive with was simply awesomealthough my stay was pleasant overall i think that the resort can further improve their customer servicemy suggestion are improve your food service from kitchen to serving your food flavor  cooking needs to be improve i had food served to me way too bland or too salty i was even served with charred chicken taliwang the staff should not be defensive but rather take our complaint and improve thereoni will visit cocotinos again simply for the diving experience with odyssea
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa
