Review: really beautiful resort with comfy beds  to get a  star rating for the review the following needs to be improved better aircond  higher horse power  the one in our room  was not working the whole of the first day took one whole day for the maintenance to sort out the faulty aircond the same warm not cold aircond was also experienced in both the rooms in the spa better  consistent service at the restaurant  food was good but the service was way too slow especially during lunch time special consideration of ordering the meals earlier should be given especially for groups which are diving time is short for us during lunch break better communication between the front desk  spa to manage bookings especially those made at night my booking was made on  sep for  sessions   sep  pm   sep  pm both were written into the booking form in the spa my friend room mate also made similar bookings on the same dates  times her booking was not communicated from the front desk to the spa as she went to the spa  mins earlier than me this resulted in no therapist for my session on  sep despite my booking being made  confirmed more empowerment given to staff to offer compensation  giveaways to correct mistakes made by the resortin line with item  above i would like to congratulate the spa therapist tyas who took her own initiative to resolve the mistake made by the front desk mentioned in item  above her effort is commendable  she gave me a foc massage out of her own time  effort on  septo the general manager en jelantik  i hope the above improvements will be made to cocotinos sekotong resort  ms tyas is rewarded for her excellent customer service with her goodwill i ended my stay happy with the resorti will be back again in  or  and hope to see a much better serviced resort
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we are stay very well in cocotinos is a place very quiet and relaxing good cuisine with fresh and various dishes best service and very kindly staffthe diving is good organized i thanks so much all staff
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: not a very pleasant experience for me started with unfriendly respond from front desk i called whether a late check for any one of the  rooms that we booked since i was going to dive with their odyssea dive centre only to be answered we cant give promise you that because you only stay for one night and we have high occupancy you have to try during your check in i initially appreciated they gave a late check out in one of the room when i checked in considering the high occupancy rate as they claimed only to find more let down to find out they also put a sale on  rooms at idr  million when i booked for almost idr  million for  millionthe odyssea dive centre was also unorganized and close to rude i called a week before to book for  dives and they assured me to just drop by when i arrive there and they will have it arranged turned out they were fully booked when i came and blame it on me for not booking earlier they also made it as if i shouldnt dive as my flight is the next day and i have less than  hours after the dive which is contrary to the schedule they put on the table pretty unconsistent and rude i didnt have my padi card which eventually they use as an excuse which is fine if it was the reason i couldnt dive
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we enjoy our stay at cocotinos beautiful resort nice beach very comfortable room with good beds bathroom also very modern and good working nice a la carte breakfast friendly staff parking was good for the rental car
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: for our family it was good place as the location was remote and quite enjoyed the less crowed beach and good snorkeling food was good and reasonible price price i paid for the hotel was high for a remote location
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you search for the place that you can escape from crowd hear the waves smell the atmosphere of pure beach hear the crickets around the hotel thats perfect for rejuvenating mind tropic atmosphere for room and area that describe indonesian tropical island
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this place is better than senggigi xd perfect place to getaway from the crowd this remote area is really relaxing and peaceful dont forget to take a boat to gili nanggu and gili kedis for more beautiful beach scenerygreat resort with great staff makes everything greatfor me this place is recommended for peaceful getaway totally different from gili trawangan for party lovers xfxfxxxfxfxx
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is a lovely resort with a beach in lombok we had a swim at the beach and there was some leaves floating in the water but no rubbish the staff were friendly and considering it was ramadan we ate a couple of nice local simple treatsi was pleased that there were police stationed outside during our visit from a cruise ship as one of the cruise staff was mugged in lombok i would love to come back here to stay if we thought that our culture would be in some way respected
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a last minute decision turned out to be a glorious relaxing time everything about cocotinos was fabby  from the lovely rooms beautiful scenery and smiling happy staff we visited in the off season and pretty much had the place to ourselves  its been a true delight
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we love how this place was set up the room was beautiful and very comfortable five star for the resort itself the staff were polite we had no issue with anyone we got the dn diveandstay package but i must say we were not too happy about itfirst of all they did not brief us anything about diving when we arrived they pointed out where the dive shop was and it was up to us to talk to the dive people when we got there again very polite divemasters however nothing was explained no time was set and we had to ask everything and confirm everything they did not seem to be enthusiastic about the dive and didnt ask us what we wanted to see this is quite different from everywhere else weve dived so far but i must say that once we went diving it was good the dive masters were active and showed us a lot of nice creatures we do appreciate thatsecondly there is a lot of good reviews about the food here which we really do not agree with my partner got a stomach bug on the first night here the staffs were apologetic and tried to make it up by not charging us some soft drinks and juices and let us order from the normal menu we had a allinclusive package which consist of  or  mains on menu even in comparison to the street indonesian food we ate the restaurant is below average there were fishermen fishing off the beach everyday yet all of the seafood was frozen on the flip side the juices are greatthirdly the trash on the beach and in the water i understand this isnt really the fault of the resort as trash washes onto the beach and they do try to clean it every morning however they should clean it more often because by midday there are already more trash the worst thing for a beach resort is that the beach is trashy and no one wants to swim in it we went to the pier to look and there were hundreds of plastic bags of all sort floating around trash disrupts the beauty of nature i would advise to do clean up more often than what they are doing nowand lastly the internet it does not work in the room and we had to keep on changing the username and password because none of them worked it also goes in and out seems like they are very protective of their internet while everywhere else in lombok advertises free internet and we can get it without any problemi would recommend this place if you have a couple of days to relax but try to find somewhere else to eat
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: had a pleasant stay at coconinos food was very good and seafood was fresh fish caught at pm and served at dinner as according to our waiter service was prompt and staff was helpful however our quiet getaway was disturbed by kevin a lone monkey without a tribe kevin broke a glass i left outside on the balcony setting lose the hermit crabs i caught to show my kids tore up my beach pants i set out to dry tore through the insect screen in the pantry and took our milk bottle brush kevin sneered at the kids and i had a brief moment of eye contact with him when i set out for him from the commotion i could not bare being ridiculed and made fun of by this primate and i ambushed kevin in the dark i heard kevin rustling in the bushes however i never got the chance to alpha duel with kevinalso mattress need replacingi still see kevin when i close my eyes
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a great spot for peace and tranquility service was great and meals were fantastic suite decor was very comfortable loved the bathroom but the bed mattress needs replacing road access from lambok is quite a long drive but boat trip from lambar easy going
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: very nice place to stay when you want to get away for the hustle and bustle like most of indo the staff are friendly and helpful the food is good the rooms are very good and there is a boat service that will take you scuba diving or to a near by island for some snorkelling in beautiful clear and warm waters
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my visit to second time of the hotel cocotinos sekotong  two years ago i was with my partner stay  nights  this time we did stay  nights  this hotel was nice enough room enough clean white beaches and nature area look very traditional  good enough to eliminate from tired of work  snorklingnya area is very beautiful with a friendly fish
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: honestly dont know where to start as we enjoyed every second of our  days  night in cocotinosthe welcoming smiles the manager him self comes to great youthe welcoming drink is to die forthe atmosphere is stunning the room is perfect bed clean and perfectly firm the outdoor shower is to good to be true and wait to meet the staff they a full of joy and willing to do the best to helpnow the restaurant im highly intolerant to gluten within  minutes ill get the first reactions if ive been glutenizedimi the staff that you will remember if you meet him thats the guy who took such good care of my orders and made sure everything was safe for me to eat and really i eat with passion  thats how good the food wastake the boat to go to the island for snorkeling its at  minutes and it is wowand when you come back its time for the compulsory tea break that we lovedwe went to the beach makaki  it was amwayzing  a beach with powerful waves the sand is incredible like perlesthe only thing that i can say to improve would be for the staff to have their names written on their shirt as  they are all so great i just regret that i couldnt manage to remember their namesa deep thank you to the entire team we cant wait to come back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is an excellent place to stay we have stayed here before as a couple and werent disappointed to come back as a family of  we travelled with two very young children and the room worked very well the staff could not have been more helpful or friendly to the staff well done
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the beach was beautiful on the first day and the view from breakfast is amazing but once you get close to the water you can see lots of trash floating we enjoyed the boat to gili nangu but there was also trash in the water there the service was okay theres no where to go so you have to eat at the hotel the food was good but they were out of many dishes each night i asked for help finding a pharmacy nearby but the front desk clerk wasnt able to help i also asked about the free shuttle into the nearby villages written in the hotel information book in the room he had no idea what i was talking about wifi is difficult and slow
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we came to lombok to climb mount rinjani which was an excellent adventure this hotel was the best you can have after such trekking we spent few days relaxing in this great area hotel and staff really good but maybe the motor bike was a little overpriced
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we ended our tour around lombok with  nights in cocotinos from the moment we arrived until we went back the stay was perfect rooms are very big and luxurious the restaurant serves good food from breakfast to dinner and also snacks service at the restaurant reception and rooms is very good all of the staff members make your stay as comfortable as possible for guests who stay  nights or longer a free trip to the beach village and market is offered the trip is very nice two guides walk you along the local market and tell you all you want to know we also booked a snorkeling trip to gili layar and gili rengit this is like snorkeling in an aquarium the coral is not damaged and there are lots of fishes around as there is no restaurant market or village nearby it is good to know that it is not a place where you can make a walk yourself so you will have to use the transport of the hotel
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a very very good place to get lost with your couple the beach is so private and beautifull as well local people said the beach from heaven ask front desk to get one day trip snorkling around gili renggit and gili layar it will be more beautiful around idr boat include local guide
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: good snorkling options on nearby gilis but also not far from sightseeing points east of mataram very good large and clean rooms nice pool situaded at the beach  though no interesting snorkling at this beach restaurant offers a variety of tasty food
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we chose this resort for a secluded relaxing getaway the beach front villa was great clean and well appointed comfortable kind size bed great wifi beautiful large bathroom with both an indoor and outdoor shower and a huge stone bath we found the restaurant to be simple with tasty food i personally loved the banana pancakes for breakfast and classic nasi goreng for dinner we ordered room service to have on our deck and spent plenty of time floating in the private plunge pool or relaxing on the day bed we utilised the divingsnorkelling service available at the resort that took us over to one of the lesser known gilis and had a good experience visibility wasnt great on the day we also had a private yoga session under the jetty cabana at sunrise which was a fantastic experience the resort is definitely a small boutique resort but we loved that aspect and the peace and quiet we travelled in may
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: went to the restaurant to celebrate my birthday we were the only guests and the service was good food and drink comparatively expensive for the area but the food itself very variable whilst the soup was excellent the sirloin steak dezspite being classified as imported was extremely tough  fortunately a dog was nearby so he was lucky to get a fair share of it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i must admit the resort makes fantastic impression and the rooms are beautiful but we did not stay there i just took my wife for a romantic dinner on one of the evenings in december  so this opinion is just about the restaurantwe ordered two drinks they were ok nothing amazing two entrees very small yet good ceasar salad was very delicate lacked character but was good orange carrot soup could have used more spices  still ok the real disaster happened with the main course beef rendang was chewy to the extent we gave half of it to the stray dog yes in the resort that charges you  for a dinner you have a stray dog in the restaurantbut i am not yet finished another position in the menu we decided to take was gulai kambing a lamb stew that should be delicate we gave pieces my wife really couldnt chew to the dog i tried it and it was almost as bad as my beefand i would never write this review if not for the bill they added  tax and surcharges it is not mentioned in the menu or of it is it is hidden which was  sorry but just for that i can eat better meal in a local warungbeware  card terminal does not work bring cash so very disappointed i do not recommend this place
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed for our honeymoon trip and it was awesomethe staffs were really kind and helpful foods and bevs are mouthwatering alsoour no  garden ocean view room is such a jackpot where i woke up to morningbeachbreeze everyday flip my hairthe odyssea diving operators are also very friendly and helpful in bringing us to gili nanggu for snorkelingfor those who live in the midst of the hustlebustle of the big city like jakarta it is highly recommended to stay hereoh but somewhat i was disturbed by one thing while trying spa at laleina spa the staffs who was there to serve us i dunno what theyre talking about but they giggle quietly so that got me thinking whether they laughing at me or my husband
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had stay for one week here love it nice and beautiful quiet beach resort  room are clean  spacious and the staff are friendly and warm  we love this place will be back for another trip love you guys
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed at cocotinos for  nightsits in the middle of nowhere so if you want to get away from it all this is the place for you no distractions beach pool spa  restaurant and diving activities nothing elsewe went specifically to dive the magnet dive site the hotels dive center set me up with another center to take me everybody was really helpfulthe food was awful we were constantly ill my wife has allergies to gluten lactose and egg and they really struggled with this staff did not speak very good english so we had to go to google translate last day she got a rice floor banana pancake which was nice of themspa was amazing great views too showers were very powerful good for relaxing but would not go back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my wife and i have just recently spent a week here and loved it from start to finish the room was very tidy and cleanedmade dailythe food was fresh and delicious even a special dinner on the beach surrounded by candles was arranged without request when we had ordered the rice table for dinner one nightthe grounds and pool were well maintained and the staff were all very friendly and approachable to fulfill requestswe had a couple of trips to the local market and tour of the gold mines with a very knowledgeable member of staff who introduced us to some of the workers at the gold mines and answered our questions about the areathe massage at the resort spa was excellent and left us feeling refresheda really wonderful relaxing week
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: great place to find nice and clean sandy beach the island hopping is great the room is nice and has a natural feel but some of the guests seemed annoyed at our kids acting like kids maybe the hotel is targeted more towards singles or couples instead of families the food at the restaurant taste quite good but it does get a bit boring if you stay here for more than  nights
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed in this hotelpositive staffs and managers are super super nice and friendly not many bugalows or villas  perfect place for family and tranquillity diving is just a boat away so wife was very happy there foods are great and hotel rooms are uique with jacuzi in the middle fun as we saw a monkey hanguing around outside window hotel car and transportation and the driver was awesomenegativenot really but it is far from everywhere but thats ok
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this has been an unforgettable experience at the cocotinos beautiful place surrounded by palms a beautiful bay in which you can do snorkeling the services are wonderful from the cleaning to the towels at the swimming pool to the dive center the rooms more apartments id say with the veranda are delightfulbut the top of the class is the personnel  star treatment from young nice funny people real friends that welcome you in a special special way cannot remember all the names im sorrybut widi wadi jimmy ucep and all the others were a real friendly company and i miss them very much the food is absolutely superb try the tuna i will certainly remember this week forthe rest of my life thank you guys for making my holiday so special
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos sekotong is a wonderful place to spend time in lombok its off the beaten tourist track but has everything you might want  an amazing pool lovely rooms beautiful surrounding environment and friendly staff a highlight was our snorkelling day trip the only thing that isnt star is the food which was ok but not to the high standard of the rest of cocotinos and there arent many other options around
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the resort is very nice but the service is scarce and breakfast is very poor around the resort there is nothing you cant go out in the evening and after dinner the only thing to do is going to bed
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed as a family of  with  year children and our balinese au pair and had a very enjoyable stay with mostly pros and just a few cons which i am mentioning so that other travellers know what to expect the location is beautiful and the resort is very well maintained rooms are very nice clean and well equipped the pool is excellent and was very popular with the kids the beach is clean and we enjoyed the beachcombing seeing fish and sea life my kids unfortunately didnt really yet manage to enjoy the snorkelling but i am sure that if yours do then it would be paradise  my husband reported that the snorkelling was really good the staff were very friendly and always tried to be helpful but some patience is required because the service can tend to be a little too relaxed at times and my children are not so patient the food is reasonable the breakfast is fine but not exciting there is a good choice of both asian and western foods and certainly enough kidfriendly options pasta pizza burgers fish and chips i did think that the cooking of the meat and fish tended towards being overdone which may be because of the climate i did spend a day in bed with diarrhoea swallowing immodium after i asked for the tuna to be less cooked but the vegetables were always nice and crunchy we tried the rijstafel on the last night and it was very disappointing  terrible tough and stringy meat and boring sauces but they did refund  which was much appreciatedoverall i would only recommend a stay of  days max with younger children it is isolated  peaceful and serene but the downside is that it takes about    hours to get there from the airport there is not so much for younger children to do if yours do not want to snorkel all the time you have to eat every meal in the hotel and after a few days you start to feel like you are getting to know the menu rather well it is probably even better for couples seeking to chill out for days and do nothinggenerally where our stay fell done most for me personally was the value for money which was somewhat disappointing in comparison to bali where we stayed the week before  the food was slightly more expensive and not such good quality the  service charge on top of everything was pretty hefty and i am not sure it all went to the staff and for a family of  you need to rent  rooms and at  euros a night a stay really starts to add up plus the prices of the soft drinks are  times the price in local supermarkets and the hotel makes a  profit in organising local transport  i saw that another reviewer was given a free airport shuttle but we had to pay for our own transport to and from the airport at the end you do start to feel that they are extracting every penny that they can but i guess that this is the price for staying in high season with guaranteed sunshine every day
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a perfect hide out for nature lovers the location is so serene and completely relaxing staffs were very attentive and friendly and i love the welcome drink served by the resort room is excellent spacious with day bed i am impressed by their spa service and i truly adore the outdoor spa room concept which is located by the seashore trekked through the hill located right opposite the resort and i am amazed by the magnificent views of sekotong bay one of the best dish i had here was called rijsttafel it is a selection of local dishes which includes curry tofu rendang beef gulai mutton opor chicken and sweet  sour prawn the portion served is really hugei totally enjoyed my stay here enjoyed the tranquility of mother natures work around this place
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had a pleasant stay for  days in cocotinos but for the rate we paid about  a night you would expect more in other  hotels like mariott and radisson in the indonesian region you pay less but get much more and more professional service staff here dont really understand what service means they have been trained to say sorry and good morningafternoonevening numerous times a day though trained politeness nobody to welcome you when you arrive by car and take your luggage the checking in took too long and reception desk wasnt always manned not to talk about the restaurant theres not much in the surrounding area so youll probably eat in the restaurant the only decent meal we had in  lunches   dinners  dishes in total was the tuna steak every meal the staff managed to make an average of  mistakes variing from wrong drinks to forget to leave out specific ingredients on request part of the dish was often cold the fact that service charge is included in the bill doesnt make the staff eager to improve after complains at check out we were assisted by a very helpful lady who did understand and after apologies deducted the  service charge of our bill if all staff were like herrooms are nice bit too much detail for me im more of a minimalist but thats taste i think most ppl will regard them as warm and cosypool is great beach location also good for swimming beach is clean with nice soft sand in the morning you have to hurry if you want a sunbed which for this rate everyone should be entitled to have one because there is a shortage of them and some guests have the tendency to block sunbeds with their towels to use them only a fraction of the day the staff could also do something about it when the policy would be set up to avoid this from happeningthe breakfast could be categorized as fantastic with plenty of choice unlimited pancakes egg yoghurt fruits toast cheese sausage and local dishes to make it perfect i would like to see some fresh bread but you cant please all
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my  year old son and i stayed a week for scuba diving absolutely great place to unwind and do some good but unchallenging diving beautiful reefs around rengat islandtruthfully i have never slept so soundly in many yearsthe staff of cocotinos are its great strength cheerful helpful and eager to establish this very good boutique resort as the best in sokotong well done jelantik and team
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i took my wife and two kids here for the school holiday boy what a resort to recap what you can do here diving many gilis to explore in front of the resort with cheap price snorkeling island hopping fine dining sand castle building etc this is what living in the secret paradise is like special mention goes to the excellent dive shop at the end of a week here nobody wants to go home we will surely come back or try your resort at manado
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you are looking for powder snow white sandy beach turquoise sea and amazing snorkelling at your doorstep whilst staying in a beautifully maintained and designed hotel than this is the placeabsolute quietness and relaxation on a deserted beachi could not find one negative comment or experience during our staybeside the perfect location the great design and the lovely service ms ingrid was the most amazing host who daily and personally followed up with us to make sure that our every single need was metthanks cocotinos and most of all thanks ms ingrid we surely will be back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we spent three days at cocotinos with a group of friends and have mixed feelings about the place the staff was friendly as most indonesians are but the service overall was horrible the rooms were nice nothing special but no complaintswhile we like that it was remote and secluded the food was inconsistent average to below average as were the drinks more below average than average there are really no other options for fooddrinks around the hotel which makes the secluded nature of the resort less of a benefitthey will also try and charge you twice as much as a taxi for pick up and drop off at the airport which is somewhat standard with other hotels but given it is much harder to find taxis you are almost forced to use their drop off service when you want to return to the airportwe tried to work with the hotel on arranging a snorkeling day trip we talked to them three different times both before arrival and upon arrival the morning we got up to snorkel and went to find our boat they informed us there were no available this was pretty frustrating given we had talked to them several times about it luckily they were able to call someone who had a boat and was willing to take us out for the day it took another hour or so for the boat to show up but it was worth itthe snorkel around the secret gilis is nice but its the lack of tourists on the islands that make the trip to them worth it there are a few restaurants which offer grilled fish beer and sideswell worth itoverall i would probably opt to stay in kuta or senggigi if the service improved to include the quality of food and drinks it might be worth the trip back but until then i dont plan on returning
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is second time we had a stay with this hotel i believe this hotel is still the only one hotel with proper  star facility in this area and it was still awesome we had no complaint for the room also breakfast was as good as usual though the variety was not much the room service was great the food quality was okay i keen to have stay here again for our next trip
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this was the first stop on our lombok honeymoon trip and we were not disappointedwe arrived just as the sun was going down and the tide was out but even still the view and the beach looked wonderful its about a  hour drive from the airportthe check in process was friendly and easy and we were shown to our room which had its own plunge pool overlooking the sea this part of our journey had been booked for us by our travel agent and i had paid extra for the upgrade to the pool room which was well worth it the room was large and had an indoor bathroom with a huge bath in it and an outside shower room double doors led from the bedroom to an outside seating area with a day bed and then onto a small deck with the pool next to itthe restaurant at the hotel is very good and offers a range of meals but the lobster was probably the best breakfast is served in the same area and offers a good choice including freshly baked bread and pancakes to name but a fewduring our stay we didnt do very much other than to relax as it was quite hot so the plunge pool was used often in order to cool offthere is a pier located just off the beach and the hotel has a dive centre which we didnt us sunrise is more dramatic than sunset and a walk up the beach should not be missed as there are no other hotels in this vicinity and therefore its very privateall in all a lovely we had a lovely time and we would certainly visit the hotel again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed there  times  with cocotino lombok i have never find a drop in their service standard all the staffs is so attentive to make my stay comfortable the place is quiet and well maintained a wonderful pool and beautiful beach front to relaxin addition i also want to specially praise the splendid crews from oddessey theyall deserve the  star thumbs up best crews compare to many  star dive resort ive been to i would strongly recommend cocotino lombok a holiday destination
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos is a small resort tucked away in sw lombok we thoroughly enjoyed our  night stay there we would like to compliment cocotinos on their outstanding service and friendliness of the staff we were made to feel welcome from the minute we were picked up from desert point lodge by their driver the restaurant cleaning gardening and administration staff were all amazing our room was spotless and while we reported the bathroom door was a bit sticky and couldnt be shut easily the staff were straight onto it to try and fix it for us food at the restaurant was very good although we believed the chefs over cooked all the protein  fish chicken and beef we ate not badly so but certainly could have had less time being heated the  trips we took out with the onsite diving company to snorkel around the gillis were excellent value especially when compared to the spa treatments which we thought were overpriced compared to other resorts on lombok we did receive a free massage of  minutes from the spa as part of our staythis resort is really for people who want to do very little or do a lot of diving if you are not a diver its a perfect place to eat drink swim and lie in the sun on your own private beach sounds relaxing doesnt it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: very good place for holidays n hneymnthe pool are very cleansstaff are too friendly especially the cafe staff and the gardeners also xfxfxxxfxfxxwe will back for another trip we miss cocotinos sekotong resort and spa xfxfxxxfxfxx
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: enjoying our stay at this lovely and beautiful resort the staff are too friendly the pool very clean and also for resort environment suitable for privacy we will back for another trip thanks so much for wonderful vacation see ya again hopely xfxfxxa
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos is a lovely place to stay for a few nights and enjoy the sun the pool the beach the spa with great massages a secluded spot you can take a boat to the islands in front of it to go snorkling
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: our first time to sekotong west lombok and totally in love with cocotinos boutique beach resort we stayed for two wonderful nights far from crowd wonderful snorkelling trip to islandsgili near by the food was super delicious every staff always greeted us with a big smilewed like to go back to spend time there almost perfect just like in a paradise thanks cocotinos and staff who have given unforgettable honeymoon for us
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: our forth time to lombok and loved this resort we stayed five days macro dives and wonderful snorkelling trip to islandsgili near by to relax after a tiring day of divingsnorkelling the pool side or beach is perfect the ambience at the jetty in the evening is rustic yet superb
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: just returned from a  night stay with the wife and  small children after having lived and traveled around se asia for a number of years this is easily one of the best asian holidays weve had this corner of lombok is still very traditional and unspoilt pace of life is very slow one sees abundant rice padis maize fields water buffalos and horse drawn carts on the way to the resort the resort itself is relatively small and certainly has a very relaxed feel about it the cottages are tucked away in beautiful garden setting with some rooms facing the sea rooms have very high ceilings and are well appointed with both indoor and outdoor shower which the kids loved restaurant had a good variety of both western and asian food but the highlight for me was the extremely fresh seafood at tengirri tuna red snapper at very very fair prices not by any means a complaint however i still dont understand how a seared tuna steak costs the same as fried rice another huge highlight and the raison detre for the trip was the incredible snorkeling in the nearby lower gili islands the gili island closest the the resort is gili nanggu  minutes away by boat has great fish watching however the coral is largely destroyed i guess by the many boats that have anchored or plyed by there off to the edges of the island away from the boats and main beach the coral is much better the other  local gilis we went to gili rengit and gili layar had  intact and hugely impressive coral blooms both my  and  year old happily snorkelled there diving in direct from off the boat also very good pricequality ratio it seems somewhat better than what the same money will get you in krabi or phuket dont stay at this resort if you want nightlife andor shopping there is not much nearby and finally im scared to recommend this resort too highly as i dont want to spoil it for my next visit
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed for three wonderful nights and it was like being in paradise the food was delicious and they had a nice and varied menu to suit all palatestheir seafood salad was simply fantastic and one could tell that the chef put love into her food preparation one night the chef even made a special dessert for us and it was super delicious everyone from the checkin staff hosts and hostesses in the restaurtant grounds workmen and women spa ladies cleaning crew scuba diving staff and managers were so friendly and always greeted us with a smilethe beach and pool were clean and nice one day we were able to arrange with the resort a short excursion to another beach where there were surfers and scenic views we are not divers but the resort has a dive shop and will take you to diving spot we cant wait to return one day
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: its perfect for honeymoon and couples who want to relax and run away from your daily activitiesbut make sure you order your food before pm because after that the room service also closed till  am in the morningsee you soon cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is a wonderful resort for families with kids which we have now visited twice in a year as it makes so much sense for us as a familythe hotel is located about an hour from the airport on the southe west coast of lombok via good and scenic roads the hotel provides a free shuttle car with the ever friendly driverif your kids love the seas catching crabs snorkling collecting shells making sandcastles and looking at blue starfish then they will love the place the view across to the volcano is fantastic  especially if you are here escaping the pollution of jakarta once in the hotel there is little reason to leave we stayed in a beach front room with our own little pool just off the beach the room has a huge bathroom with outdoors shower we have a hueg king size bed and another fitted in easily the plunge pool was ideal for our two small boys  and  to play in and the beach is littlerally a step awaythe hotel restaurant serves a great breakfast and a good range of local and western food which is good as there are no other options in the area this is actually a bonus for a family with small kids thoughthe highlight of our trips to cocotinos is definitely the snorkling trips we have been both on the  minute trip across the gilli nangu where there are fantastic fish to see even with litlle kids the water is clear the fish are huge and the sand is white is all cost a little less than  for the four of us including snorkle hire we also took a half day trip on the dive boat to the secreet garden  a fastastic coral bed where we saw even more sealife again a steal at  for the whole familyall in all we spent  days here in blissfull peace and would wholheartedly recommend the place the staff are friendly and helpful the standard of acccomodation is very high and the value for money is excellent
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stayed in cocotinos for  night room was nice and spacious also the bathroom was very nice and big the swimming pool is nice and on the beach the beach is also ok the place is located in a good area for island hopping food was normal nothing special but ok all staff very nice and available in case of need they helped us to reach next destination finding two motorbikes price of transportation boat rental etc are a litter over the average
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this place is far from crowd everything you need is inside the hotel the view is excellent you can get sunrise and relax in the afternoon without being over exposed from the sunthe food is really good and also they have outdoor facilities like hopping island snorkling and diving the price is a little bit expensive but its worth with the facilities
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i read about cocotinos on travelfishorg since i was on a  km cycling trip through the lesser sunda islands from time to time i granted myself a few days off in a comfortable hotel for a rest of all the lovely places i stayed in during my day trip cocotinos definitely ranks nr  its location is perfect on a beautiful beach facing a string of tropical islets far from urban centers its  km to lembar the ferry terminal  from mataram over  to senggigi the staff are helpful polite and very friendly i was certainly able to achieve my aims of resting and relaxing given the choice between senggigi and cocotinos youll have to decide if you prefer remote or crowds i chose remote and loved it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i came here for a weekend getaway while i was having business trip to mataram city i took a taxi that took about an hour to get here the atmosphere was really relaxing quite and peaceful far away from the crowd and all the staff were friendly the next morning i got up early to capture sunrise shot and it was such a sight for sore eyes i took a boat to gili nanggu which took only few minutes from cocotinos for snorkeling great experience i definitely recommend this hotel to all my friends
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we spent  days at cocotinos the rooms and grounds are beautiful and the snokeling and diving was reasonably priced and a very comfortable boat however there is no where to really go outside of the resort we hired a bike and went for a ride to a surf beach which was much cleaner then the bay but the only place to eat is the resort and that can get a little boring so lovely place to stay but dont book for too long the beach also collects alot of rubbish from sengiggi but the hotle staff clean the beach every morning
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the room is too old and dirty the lighting is too dark to my liking could not see things clearly when turning on all lights the bathroom floor is made by cement and tiny stones so the cement color goes into my feet or they never brush the floor coming out of the shower the feet became very black and the white cloth we wiped our feet became black too old towels rusty water pipe of the face basin i was so unhappy that i started to search for another hotelbut after i went to the their beach i decided to stick to the original plan of staying  nights the beach is so good sands are cream in color almost white sea water is so clean in other beaches i remember i feel sticky after sea bathing but here i feel very comfortable and didnt feel the need to wash with regular water we were the only guests there at the beach i just love that we walked to the nearest little island about  meters away water is just around my waist my husband walked the other route water did not wet his short pants saw some blue star fish and rarely seen other creatures just lovely it rained that late afternoon and the beach was very warm to swim the room service menu cost about  rp per dish foods taste good theres a hill near the resort on the other side of the street if we had stayed longer i would have tried to walk uptheres a table and  chairs in front of the room and a bamboo bench good to eat dinner and rest sitting there we can hear vehicles running on the street the small bed in the room looks so old and dirty the king bed is ok if this were a brand new room i would be happy to stay as the room is this old i will never return breakfast was a limited set not buffet we just left the beautiful living asia resort so this cocotinos feels so old and dirtythe pool is made from dark blue tiles the light blue tiles looks like shining stars and so photogenic but i did not want to swim in the pool feeling scared because of the dark blue color probably their beach is so great that i dont want to swim in the poolthe rate from agoda was  usd  booked directly with them which cost  usd  but they charged in rp and because of the poor exchange rate hotels everywhere does the same i regret i didnt book with agoda got a welcome fruit basket not sure if guests have it if booking with a booking company
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: came here  years ago and they still commit to and deliver great service from the meals service and dive facilities very glad i could come back for another wonderful staythe dive crew and the dive guides are top notch too
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you are seeking a really away from it all experience then this is the place delightfully positioned on its own quiet beach it was absolutely perfect no hassles no noise apart from the gentle lapping of the waves enjoy the massage on the health spa on the beach a pretty decent pina colado and a day in this beautiful spot should take away any stressthe staff were really wonderful the food was perfect nothing fake or glitzy here just warm hearted hospitality and great value rooms were very comfortable everything worked and was just right quick boat ride to the islands for snorkelling rounds off a perfect day
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: lovely place really lovely beach with beautiful shells and soft white sand snorkelling at nearby nanggu was excellent rooms were lovely and well looked afteri did find the price was not really reflective of the service it was very well run but the price was too high for what it wasstill recommend going there though for location and beauty
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: thank you so much for a lovely perfect break at this paradise so peaceful and staff were wonderful friendly and attentive and seemed to anticipate what i would require eg i was staying on my own and they knew i wanted to go snorkelling so they asked me if id like to join the dive boat saw two turtlescant praise the hotel enough thank you
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this resort was a very pleasant surprise indeed if you want to get away from the crowds and see a part of lombok that is still free of tourists then you should consider cocotinosaccommodation was good with well spaced and decent sized bungalows set in very well maintained grounds sat tv and wifi available in room if required our room did have a minor leak when it rained hard however it was not an issue for usthe pool area is well designed and well maintained with the restaurant conveniently close the restaurant serves decent food with a mix of western and indonesian standards service is friendly and slowrelaxed definitely worth taking the free tour of the surrounding area to see mekaki beachplenty to see and do nearby unfortunately there was only a single bicycle which meant we could not go out as a family the area around the hotel is completely untouristed and this means that you will be eating all your meals in the hotel it also means that away from the hotel the beaches esp elaela beach can be a bit dirtyfull of rubbish which is a real pitythere is a scuba shop on premise however due to the poor visibility due to rain i was unable to use their services however i gather that there are some amazing dives in the region and we will be back to check it out it would also be worth bringing a road bike over if you are into your cycling as the main road is in great condition and has some great viewsoverall we enjoyed our break and will be back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we just spent  nights at this lovely little place if you want night life then do not come but if you want a relaxing place right on the beach with snorkeling on your doorstep then look no further the staff were all without exception friendly competent and with reasonable english the food is reasonably priced  not street vendor prices but a lot cheaper than melbourne breakfast and afternoon tea is included and the menu features asian and western dishes the highlight for us were the watersports there is a nice reef right there no more than  meters off the beach we organised a boat at their centre and had  dives whilst our partners snorkeled the dive master is very friendly experienced and with excellent english another day we hired the boat with  crew and island hopped we visited  small islands all within a few kms from the resort and snorkeled on  and at a great lunch ikan bakr on anotherwe traveled with another couple and rented the  story  br villa that has its own plunge pool rooms were spacious with ceiling fans and ac we could have stayed longer
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: lovely place that is off the beaten path dont come for the night life but instead for the snorkelling and diving and relaxation you can rent snorkel gear and swim out to the reef that is just a few meters offshore we also went for  dives one day which was fantastic the fellow that runs the dive shop is knowledgeable and friendly another day we rented a boat with crew and island hopped where we snorkelled and had some amazing ikan bakr grilled fish on a tiny little island within sight of the resortthe resort is a  min drive from the airport but they can arrange transport for you we had  nights booked but thanks to airasia were only able to stay for  but they were great the staff without exception are all friendly and with reasonable to good english skills far better than my indonesian food was good and reasonably priced  not cheap but certainly not melbourne prices we could have easily stayed longer and can see a return trip in our future
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i had visited lombok a few times but never visited sekotongi booked into cocotinos for  nights and apart from scuba diving everyday i did not leave the resort all my meals were had in the restaurant and each meal was greatgreat food really friendly staff comforatable rooms and some of the best scuba diving at the various dive sites just a short boat ride from cocotinosi will definitely stay at cocotinos again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my husband and i have just spent a week in this delightful hotel last year we stayed in the busy tourist area of sengiggi in the north west of lombok and whilst taking a day trip round the island we discovered cocotinos sekotong which is situated on the southern peninsula of the island well away from the crowds we decided it was the sort of place we would prefer to stay in and we were right the hotel is a perfect little gem tucked away amidst a coconut grove and right on its own white sand beach there is a beautiful swimming pool set in a lovely setting right by the beach which was handy as it was too shallow to swim in the sea when the tide was out an open air restaurant small shop a spa and a water sports centre  the latter mainly dealing with trips to some of the numerous dive and snorkelling sites nearby as with the tourist areas in the north there are several gilis islands offshore but unlike those in the north which are packed with people these are virtually deserted they are small enough to walk round and a few have some basic restaurants but the snorkelling is good and the beaches are lovelythe rooms in the hotel vary from garden view ones to private villas with plunge pools situated right by the beach we had one of these rooms and it was great  huge comfortable bed with good bedlinen a massive stone bath indoor and outdoor showers twin wash basins outdoor daybed and sunloungers overlooking the beach and sea it was extremely clean and well maintained and had its own tea and coffee making facilities and a  litre drinking water tank the washing water in the hotel is slightly brackish hence they supply drinking water but that was no problem and there was loads of hot waterthe restaurant served a good selection of asian and western food we found the asian food to be better and a buffet breakfast which could be slightly more imaginative as far as breads and fruit juices are concernedif you are looking for an activity holiday with bright lights shopping nightlife etc then this hotel is definitely not for you there are no other hotels in the vicinity so this place is ideal for those wanting peace and quiet good diving and snorkelling relaxing massages in the spa and restful days there are also no annoying hawkers plying their trade on the beach  one of the most irritating things about staying in the tourist area up north in fact you hardly see anyone except the odd hotel guest on the beach incidentally i noticed that someone in a previous review said they couldnt walk anywhere  well we enjoyed several walks for miles along the beaches  it just required a bit of scrambling over rocks from time to timei would highly recommend this hotel all the staff were so friendly and willing to help that they made the stay very personal many of them speak little english but that was no problem and some especially in the restaurant are obviously fairly new to the hospitality business so things occasionally took a little longer to arrive but again with the laidback feeling to the place that wasnt a problem i would just like to make a couple of suggestions   it would be good if a jug of water or just a couple of glasses could be served on every table as a routine rather than have to ask for one at each meal  it would be a good idea to provide a bucket or container of water outside each room as a footbath to rinse the sand off your feet before going indoors we actually filled the big flowerpot that was by our plunge pool to use for that purposeincidentally we had to spend one night in bali on the way home due to flight times and although we stayed in a  star hotel one night was definitely enough  surly staff poor food and room in need of some maintenance attention  wished we were back in cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a very rustic feeling nice little resortnice little resort with excellent staff had a pleasant stay here its not luxury but it is comfortable nice big rooms lovely chill out areas and your own small beach also very good dive and watersports centreone thing though you are away from everything if you stay at this resort dont expect to go anywhere else as its not close to any other places of interest we stayed for  nights and for us was probably a bit too long i think  nights would have been perfect however others may enjoy the fact that you are away from it allfood wise was ok but again as you have nowhere really to go you are limited to the restaurant at the hotel menu would get a bit same after a whilei would however recommend going there again but more as a short break rather than staying for a week
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed at cocotinos hotel for  nights in early octoberthe location of the hotel is very secluded which works best if your goal is to have a quiet and relaxing holiday without much sightseeing or doing lots of shopping or night life activitiesthe hotel rooms are beautifully appointed villas some are facing the sea and others  the hill behind the rooms feel very comfortable and i liked the open air shower area i also liked that the staff or the hotel manager thought about little useful things like leaving mosquito coil for the outdoor sitting area at the veranda a rack for drying swimming attire etcthe dining area felt very airy and offered splendid sea views theres plenty of power points around to make charging of multiple gadgetsthe full board menu is always the same and the selection can become quite boring if you are staying there for a several days nevertheless some dishes were quite tasty and theres always ala cart menu for some variety on several days there were some liveaboard divers coming over for meals so i guess they liked the food toothe highlight for us was the diving we found the marine life very abundant and dive sites were relatively close at most  min boat ride away and diving conditions were easy it is mainly macro stuff that one sees on the dives so the place is great for photographers and whoever else finds small critters fascinating there were very few other divers and we sometimes found ourselves being the only two people on the dive because of that it was easy to ask the dive guide to bring us to the places we wanted to go to dive guides were familiar with the dive sites and very helpful and friendly the small boats were quite simple but functional and given that the dive sites are nearby are great for the taskin general we had very positive experience at cocotinos and would recommend it for both divers and nondivers who look for a slow and relaxing holiday
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed for our last few nights of a  week trip to indonesia thinking we would splurge at the end the rooms were nice grounds were pretty and restaurant staff were friendly tea and snacks at  was a nice touch snorkelling off the pierbut the beach is very small and isolated could not walk anywhere else to eat coffe tea and juice were double the price of anywhere else there were only  lounge chairs and they were very uncomfortable most irritating was how they ripped us off for transport to the airport they charged us double what they should have then offered to stop enroute to visit two places but were going to charge us another  each for this when i said no they tried to bargain i did not expect this of a nice hotelwould not stay here again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this place was a great find lovely villas  simply but tastefully furnished we had a family one right on the beach you can snorkel from the beach and see huge corals around the jetty the beach is small but clean we had a boat trip out to visit nearby islands for a day the staff were very friendly and we enjoyed plenty of snorkelling again seeing loads of coral although some bleached and turtles there are a couple of kayaks which are nice to use at sunset to spot the turtles from the food was good  the indonesian options better than the western as could be expected thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: it was a pleasant experience from bookings to the stay itself rahman from sales replied my email  messages fast he even help to arrange a birthday surprise for my friend we stayed in garden view double room room is big  comfortable water from tap taste salty but they had a big jar of fresh water in the toilet that helps as i use it for a final rinse during shower and also for rinsing my underwater casing for the camera drinking water was provided in a l container which is a great idea we took the full board package with dives the portion is big after a few meals in the restaurant i do get a bit bored with the menu i like the dessert  especially the pisang goreng even though on the nd day of our dives  of us are the only divers but they still sent out  guides   boat crews that was great it would have been a perfect holiday for us shall the weather is betterit is wet season now
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: loved  the beach here is awesome clear water white sand and not a lot of people when we were there we almost had the whole beach to ourselves really appreciated the peace and quietcan be improved  the food is good but can be a bit better since we heard that the owner is an expat overall still ok maybe we are just picky with our food
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had an extremely relaxing stay at cocotinos we also went scuba diving having just completed out open water padi elsewhere so we were just beginners the boat crew and the guides were fantastic top quality equipment and the boat was great we are hoping to visit their sister resort in sulawesi
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my second time staying hereit amaze me with the consistency of cleanliness staff services and friendlinessnice and serene beach and view a free refill everyday mineral water a galon in the room make the stay perfect love this resort always
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we only stayed here for one night because it is a lot more expensive than what we are used to costing around rupiah for  room for  people however the room was excellent it was extremely clean with a huge bathroom with both an indoor and outdoor shower the surroundings here our beautiful set on its own private beach by the crystal clear sea the restaurant served a variety of great food which was reasonably priced about  per meal considering the standard of the hotel snorkelling off the jetty you can see all sorts including brightly coloured fish and star fish
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the best birthday gateway place with my familythe beach is clear  clean with beautiful white sanddefinitely worth it to spent my quality time with my familytruly for serene seekerslove the placegreat food and super friendly staff with excellent serviceshighly recommendxfxfxxdxfxfxxd
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: highly recommend for serene seekersthe beach is so clear  clean with beautiful white sandtotally worth it to have a wonderful birthday gatewayi have a special  quality moment with my family herelove the place love the food and they serve with lovereally great servicesawesomexfxfxxdxfxfxxd
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: good stay in this hotel for  weekend very peacefull nice room even if the soundproofing is not perfect and we faced one water interuption  nightvery nice snorkeling trip also with good stafffood is correct but one advice  avoid the cocktailsthe staff is friendly even if looks bit unexperimented however i recommand this place
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i spent  nights having a solo break and had a really lovely time the accommodation was clean and very well serviced daily there were a couple of glitchesno water one evening and power outages but in such a secluded venue this is quite normal the food was great such a wide variety i also spent a couple of mornings diving and was extremely impressed with the quality of the equipment and the staff it was a wonderful break in a divine location i hope it doesnt get too discovered
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i found cocotinos experience to be kept in mind for all life all there is calm and kind specially from the young staff at restaurant and i enjoyed too the spaso relaxing in front the resort a wonderful island lies downgili nanggu easily toget there by resort boatvery good food at the restaurant and reasonable prices for alli do suggest this resort
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i went to the hotel to dive with them actually so cant comment on the rooms as i didnt stay at the hotel im more of a backpacker but i can say the hotel looked beautiful right on its own private beach very friendly attentive staff the manager helped me to organise the diving and everyone did everything they could to help in every waythe diving with their dive centre was amazing mamang was my dive guide i have been diving for  years and am a dive instructor but mamang showed me so many amazing little creatures i have never seen before he has amazing eyes he even helped me to get the photos i wanted and was very patient we saw hairy shrimp orangutan crab many pygmy seahorses including a pregnant one frog fish lots of pretty nudibranchs  robust ghost pipefish also a pregnant one harlequin shrimp and a bamboo shark   back up to the boat the staff set up and change over your equipment for you and provide you with a hot towel after the dive  very nice touch mamang also went the extra mile and took me back to my accommodation on his bike both days very great service from all staff lovely boat the snorkelers on board were all very happy also i have nothing bad to say thank you mamang rahman and everyone there d
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we just spent four nights here it was outstanding the staff was very friendly and worked very hard to meet all of our needs and wants the room was very large and clean the internet was fast in our room the food was very good and the alcoholic drinks were very good each time i ordered a long island ice tea i only needed one as they did not short change me on the alcohol and it was a very good price for indonesia do not come here if you need a fast paced resort this is a place to read a book swim snorkel and scuba we will be back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: beautiful resort with nice rooms direct access to the beach oceanside restaurant very good restaurant pool and spa very friendly and supportive staff attractive dive spots and a great diving school
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed at this secluded hotel for  nights the room we took was excellent clean and the staff were very friendly however there were a few things that we wish would have been better first off the water taps mostly treated salt water and it was a shock to the system when you brush your teeth before bed or while showeringfood at the restaurant was edible at best especially the local food which was mostly horrible we tried most of the dishes on the menu and we would recommend eating the western food its marginally betterthe beach and view of the ocean was a delight but we found ourselves wondering why none of the other guests were frolicking until we stepped food onto the beach and quickly realised the beach was full of dead corals it was a tad disappointingthe pool was a nice size and warm which was very nice and transport to and from the airport was quick and efficientall in all i would come back to stay here again but hopefully they have a new chef in the kitchen
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed for  night i was really satisfied hotel staff room and beautiful clean beachnext time i want to stay some more daysthe staff was very friendly and helpfulthe food was nice and healthythe day time was peaceful night time was very quiet and it was not like kuta area in bali you can see tons of starsthe staff smile left an impression thanks
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed a total of  nights at the resort and had a wonderful time there the staff were friendly and cheerful and very forthcoming to provide information that i need the restaurant served a good mix of local and western food most of the time i was happy with the local food served what i looked forward to everyday was the spread served at tea time between  pm the chef has some real interesting local cakes and desertsthe room is spacious and very comfortable my favorite is the outdoor shower and there is a huge container of mineral water for the guest so you dont have to worry about replenishing your drinking water every dayin general the beach the pool area the garden were well kept by the staffi was also impressed with the cleanliness of the pool the pool attendant knew his job well and was very proud of the responsibility given to himthis is my second time at the resort and i will not hesitate to go back again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had a toddler with us during our stay of  nights the resort is child friendly it was a very relaxing holiday very private location and serene staff were helpful and obliging the dive centre is well equipped with some good macro diving and knowledgeable team during our stay i happened to be the only guest diving save for the st day where another couple were present on the nd day being the only guest i had to pay a surcharge for the boat this was communicated during registrationas the location is quite secluded all meals are within the hotel compound which was quite acceptable for us as the ala carte menu had some good selections to satisfy western and asian palates since its almost  hours drive from the airport it is recommended to arrange for transport by the hotel the driver was very careful during the drive and punctualoverall the experience was very good and we will return to the resort when we visit lombok again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: located in remote area in southwest of lombok this boutique hotel is great to relax and escape a good professional and professional dive center is located in the hotel ensure to organize a diving or snorkeling trip during your stay for all meals you will have to stay in the hotel as there is about nothing in the surrounding i would have expect more fresh fish from fisher man of the surrounding villages food display could have been better
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we were  friends that want to spent a relaxing and amazing time at the end of our travel around indonesia we decided to stay in cocotinos for  nights and we found not easy to book  rooms from the hotel website the system only leaves you to book one room at the same time so we were not sure if we did it thought the website if we will be able to find another free room it should be easier for guests to book as many rooms as they want at least  or  rooms and not need to call  times to the hotel to be sure the reservation is donewhen we arrived to cocotinos we thought the place was the paradise the location is great and the beautiful views you see from the reception desk makes you think you will enjoy so much your time there the rooms are really beautiful cleaned with the details which you expect to find in a hotel of this category but while our stay we are getting disappointed with the service of the hotel for all of us was amazing and relaxing time because you were in a nice place but we really think that could have been an unforgivable time and a unique experience for all of usthe staff seems to be there like spending their time they do not come to the pool and offer you a fruit juice for example or trying to make you easy to have a diving daytrip etc the kind of plates you can eat in the restaurant are not the expected in a boutique resort and some of them are empty like the tuna steak which finally at the rd day we had the opportunity to tastei manage a hotel too and all the time i had the sensation that the big problem of this hotel is the management and the nomotivation and notraining of their staff if i were the owner of this hotel i will try to find a professional manager who would run this amazing paradise resort and try to do his best to make the stay of their guests the unique experience that i think people expected to have when decide to go to a place like this
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this hotel is well locatedthough not a lot of facilities nearbyand alright a few quiet days the rooms are very nicebut this place is overpriced food quality very ordinary and cooked breakfast buffet not kept warm the place has good potential if better managedstaff very friendlybut lack proper training would have to do a lot better to deserve its rating
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we booked  nights in this hotel and while the isolation wasnt a problem for us the standards of the rooms food and service were as previous reviewers have mentioned the staff are all very nice and well intentioned but need some basic training lost reservations room service and lunch plates sitting around for hours after wed eaten and food standards that would be ok in a hotel about one third of this price were some of the annoyances we encountered it is a very beautiful location and a great place to stay if you plan to go out on lots of diving and boat trips as theyve got their own jetty and dive centre
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed there celebrating our anniversary and they gave us complimentary spa massage which was the best massage weve ever encounter and we are spa addict couplethe room is comfortable spacious have  area to shower indoor and semi outdoor it was facing both the pool and beach there were only  rooms that occupied during the time us and the other couple so it was pretty quiet maybe because the resort is not nearby the main attraction in lombok it was almost  hours dricing from senggigibreakfast was ala carte so they cook it after you order more personalized and fresher aside from free spa and breakfast room package was also including afternoon teawe were so pleased that we chose to stay at this resort we even recomend some of our friends to stay there and they share mutual satisfaction
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the resort is located in an amazing setting if you are looking for a totally relaxing break this is the place for you we were fortunate to be upgraded to a water front villa with its own plunge pool it is one of the best rooms we have stayed in in all our travelsthe staff could not be faulted all very helpful and attentivethe only criticism is the breakfast is very basic and nothing is kept warm so if you prefer hot dishes i suggest going to breakfast earlyhighly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a total getawaywe caught a taxi from the airport which cost us about au and the trip took about  hours due to all the roadwork
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we loved the drive from the airport to cocotinos which took us through some really interesting parts of the island allowing us to see the local people going about their daily lives mostly untouched by tourism the resort is set in an ideal location with amazing views its a little bigger than most we stayed at and as such the facilities seemed a little stretched not quite enough sunloungers or room around the pool having said that it did not distract from our enjoyment but probably impacts on our feeling of valueformoney we took the boat out to the island for snorkelling and the staff were friendly and informative the rooms were set in lovely gardens but lacked privacy in terms of noise some rooms are interconnecting and you can hear everything next door our neighbors had a toddler who thankfully slept silently but that could have been an issue our room was not serviced during the  nights we stayed which we understand was an oversight rather than the norm and again didnt bother us but with the price of the rooms you might expect more attentive service however we had a lovely stay and it was great to be away from the main tourist areas in such a beautiful setting
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: me and my boyfriend spent in this resort a couple of days during our tour in indonesia the location is very nice far from anything so any guest should be aware of the choice to spend a very quiet and relaxing vacation the travel from the airport is quite long and the status of the street is not the best accomodations are nice cleaness can be improved but still decent the bathroom is huge and has a wonderfull outdoor shower the hotel offers  lt water available daily in the room breakfast is ok dinner choice a la carte is very good much better then buffet one generally the structure of the resort is really pleasant most of the rooms offer sea view they are all very close to beach restaurant and swimming pool we visited also the gili islands around but both for snorkling and diving they are less interesting than gili trawangan area recommended
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my husband and i stay here in august  we found the staff helpful and our room was very pleasant a very laid back life style and prefect for relaxing it was great to find out that most of the staff were from the surrounding villages which help their families and their local communities having said that their english is mostly fine but some things did get lost in translation at times and they are learning as they work and service may not be what we may expect because of the remote location most things food massages tourist items were more expensive loved the outdoor shower in our room
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i booked a room for my family stay during the ramadhan holiday from the th of july until nd of august through our corporate travel agent the reason why we picked this place is because its secluded area private beach and it has its own pier we wanted to stay undisturbed and away from the hustle and bustle of the city or other tourist destination areas also we would like to sail on our boat during the last days of our holiday changed of plans the kids wanted to sail earlier so we had our boat pick us up on the st my husband came to the reception in the morning to pay our meals and informed them that we are going sailing and our family friend is coming to occupy the room for the remaining two days that we already paid for they said no problemwe left from the pier telling the staff how wonderful our stay was and thank them for their hospitality we liked our bedroom our meals and the beach was beautifullater in the evening i received message from our friend that says him
