and his family cant check in because the travel agent hasnt paid for our bedroom so they charged him for the remaining two nights how does that makes any sense then i had our assistant called and try to resolve whatever problem they were havingthe next day our assistant said there were miscommunication inside the management and mr rahman the marketing told her that my friend wont be charged for the room since we paid for it but on the check out day they still got charged the manager who refused to give us his name or talk to any of us he had the reception to talk to us does not agree that my friend stayed without paying he tried to feed us lies saying that my husband checked out before tour time and we got an early check out fee he said that cocotinos will refund my friends money after the payment has been cleared from the agent which i just got informed few moments ago is on process and will take approximately two weeksi mean seriously my family and i are lucky enough to be able to stay in resorts around the world and this is by far the most disappointing and shameless we paid the travel agent already and its not our problem if they havent paid the hotel we are staying at and if that was the true reason why when we checked in we didnt have the problemi talked to the travel agent personally and they admit they havent paid based on personal work agreement with the hotel which the customer has nothing to do with i talked to the reception and the marketing manager and the reservation asking about the hotel policy and they assured us that we shouldnt encounter problem like this in the first placeour conclusion is the manager tried to rip off customer because it is high seasonwe told our friends family work partners and they all astonished of what happened our corporate agent is reluctant to work with this place after what happened we have been using them for family travel or work travel all over the world and never had a single problemat the end of the day what makes an accommodation live up to their names is their service thats why we called it accommodation to accommodate to cater and by all means this so called resort has failed to do their purpose what this place did was unacceptable and i would never recommend it to anybody which is a shame because the place itself has potential
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: after a long drive from kuta coconitos was a welcomed short stopover on our way to mount rinjaniour rooms were beautiful and clean the beach and pool equally beautiful having stayed in five different lombok hotels so far cocotinos was the only one to charge a high season surcharge it is also very isolated and so has a captive audience when it comes to dining
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed here for  nights end of june and it was delightfulthe resort itself is lovely nice clean private rooms spacious bathroom good service attentive staff and the grounds are very well keptwe mostly ate the indonesian food which was of a high standard and very good valuewent out on the dive boat for  mornings as snorkelers staff on dive boat were amazing and looked after us well they were happy to accommodate snorkelers although there were only a few divers on the boatvery pretty coral reefs in good condition and many smaller reef fish secret garden on gili laya was particularly impressivealso did a trip to gili nanggu and surrounding islands unfortunately visibility wasnt good on that day but still really enjoyed snorkel at gn and had a fun day out once again the staff on the boat couldnt do enough for usits a very quiet spot which suited us well and if you want a lovely place to relax and be spoilt whilst on lombok away from busier spots highly recommended
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed here with  friends for  nights to spent our last  nights holiday when i found this place from internet i already like this place they have very nice room clean quite and comfy bathroom we have  kind of bathroom indoor and outdoor they have private beach include private pier we were snorkeling closed to the pier not the best spot but nice enough we had very beautiful view during breakfast and tea time there enjoy the beach in the day time and can see nice sunset the staff are very friendly their room rate is included breakfast and afternoon tea and snack last time we also had dinner in their restaurant the food was delicious really lovely place to enjoy our last few nights holiday before we back to our routine
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: looked after from pick up at airport to drop off at departure fantasticexcellent diving great staff at hotel and dive shopperfect th wedding anniversarycant wait to get back and go diving again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we were very happy to discover this place randomly on internet the place is beautifulnice villa attentive staffs and wonderful view of west lombok oceanit was not too crowded it was rather quiet which is goodwe extended our stay so that we could enjoy more of this place and its surroundingsfood was ok not impressive because the place is far from the main city hence rather difficult to have sufficient ingredients for good food or drinksoverall this place is recommended for you who dives and seeks for a notpartying mood
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: damn i went there for dn for my leisure diving trip fudge when i reached the airport there were already people fetching us and helping us carry our luggage and the customer service doesnt stop right there mother fudge packers at hot towel greeting us when we reached the resort bend me over man while i was smoking and settling some insurance stuffs fruit cakes they gave me fudge packing juice and a ash tray dude i tell you man i dont know what the hell i can do to improve the place the only flaw was that most staffs werent fluent in english but its alright money talks recommended for honeymoons and stuff but not for diving a little to expensive
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: just got back from honeymoon trip to lombok my husband and i stayed at this resort to be honest we didnt put high expectation to this resort since we booked the package from our travel agent in a very last minute before our trip and you know how online photos are sometimes different with the reality so yeah we really didnt expect much but we did book a full board package includes meals and return transport from and to airport we didnt regret this since the resort is very secluded the resorts driver mr ramli picked us up in the airport and it took us approximately  hours from the praya airport and  hours to mataram city once we arrived we fell in love straight away with this place small front office but with a very great hospitality from the staff beautiful scenery of sekotong beach with white sandy beach and blue water and oh not to mention the beach chairs our room was  with king size bed a spacious bathroom and a balebale next to our window nice also they included a liter drinking water since the water here is brackish aaannnddd an electric mosquito repellant genius guys thank you our full board package for dn includes  lunch  dinners breakfast massage voucher and trip to gili nanggu i have no complaint about the food but may be because im not too picky about food the breakfast was served in ala carte style of either american eastern indonesian or continental and a buffet of juices coffeetea and fresh fruits we went to gili nanggu for snorkeling the next day with a small speed boat provided by the resort we also tried the spa in the afternoon i decided to have a mnts back and foot massage while my husband tried mnts foot massage only and how was it it was so gooooddd both of us agreed that the lady masseurs in this resort spa are the best in short we had a really great time here in this resort the staffs hello pak komang and pak heru are very helpful we are local tourist we often feel treated like second class tourist in a resort like this just because we are not bule foreigners but we didnt experience this at all the staffs are very nice and friendly overall i really recommend this resort if you are looking for a place to relax away from all the hustle bustle this is the place
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: first off  sorry everyone at cocotinos for writing this review so late from our arrival in lombok we were treated to some of the best hospitality that ive experienced anywhere the team  cocotinos are all friendly accommodating and warm even when we made requests they were quick to come up with solutions and deliverthe property itself is very unassuming and its only when you take the time to explore that you appreciate how much thought and care goes into the making of this gem of a resort the grounds are well kept and some of the flowers are beautiful everything is kept very clean and they even have the beach cleaned every daythe rooms are comfortable and well appointed special note here they process their own water for use in the bathrooms so the water is very clean and a little salty but we really didnt spend much time in our room given that we had fantastic weather and some of the best snorkelling to be had only a short boat ride away another thank you to the team  the dive shop for taking such good care of us while we were therewe also spent quite a few evenings at the small but very good spa the therapists were very good and our first visit was enough to convince us to go back every eveningfinally but by no means the least important is the food we were blown away by the quality of the food that is served at the coffee house the waiters and waitresses are all super and special kudos must be given to the chef  we are dying to come back for more of your mee goreng and rendangall in all  a most satisfying trip that was made all the more special by the fantastic team at the cocotinos sekotongthank you all and we hope to see you again in the near future
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stayed for three nights in a beach front room with plunge pool as part of our honeymoon in lombok mid june the resort is close to a road but no big deal there are no shops or anything really apart from small villages close by its at least  hour to the nearest port and hrs from the airport you are a captured audience for breakfast lunch and dinner but we had done our research so was not a problem and didnt expect to be venturing out to eat the room was great pool area great staff friendly if a little undertrained even by lombok standards we had stayed in mangsit near sengigi  quinci villas before cocotinos so had had  days of the best service and food and resort available but this wont tarnish my review of cocotinos if you like swimming photography fishing from the pier i caught several barracuda kg and various opportunities for other fishing if you bring your own gear we hired a fishing boat from neighbouring resort and went out to banko banko furthest point south west from the resort  hour trip amazing scenery etc then this is a good place to chill out in the south of lombokthere was one big disappointment at cocotinos the food we like eating local food on our travels and expect local seafood when on the coastal areas i appreciate the resort is remote and they have to cater for mixed nationalities but the foodmenu needs some serious attention the menu is too big offering burgers pasta lots of eu recipes with a small amount of indonesian options the dont have fresh seafood on the menu as i was told all is frozen i even tried to preorder from the market but they were unable to source its a real shame the food is a big let down my suggestion would be to retrain the chefs half the menu and focus on better quality ingredients and do some bbqs in the evening to keep the guests entertained my only other gripe is that a small bintang from the minibar is kidr  which is way over the top compared to other hotels and a large bintang from the bar is also overpriced wine was also  more than more upmarket places in lombok you can bring your own wine which we did and they will charge you kidr corkage which is fairive been honest about the poor quality of food and overkill on the menu as we really enjoyed our time here but would only come back if these issues got resolved it would be great to see a small fresh looking menu that changes and based on local fish from the local boats that deliver this must be the easiest option as i saw many locals catching fish and am sure a deal could be done to deliver every other day direct to the hotel
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: nice quite location with well maintained grounds and poolour accomadation was luxurious and spotlessthe staff and management went out of their way to ensure we had a good staythe snorkelling at the nearby islands was amazing its definitely a must as they have the most beautiful coral and tropical fish in clear calm warm waterswe enjoyed the cocktails and meals at the restauranti will be returningthanks to all staff for making our stay memorable we were sad to leave
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i had a nice stay at cocotinos and found all the staff to be very professional especially ewik she was friendly and efficient in the restaurant section the food was great and the only place in the area that has wifiif you stay here get a boat over to the island for nice snorkling etc very scenic and stunninganyways the boss of cocotinos should give ewik a promotion she deserves a pay rise she is a good workercheers
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hotel ist located at a nice beach quiet and outside of any village about min from the airport by car staff is very friendly and helpful modern with a touch of luxury very nice food with selected ingredients for a good price the room is ok big bathroom with a covered and a open air showeri would go there again for surethe best are the incredible lonely and withe beaches nearby in direction of desert point
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: enjoyed diving the nearby gilis beautiful corals sponges n little creatures nice shallow snorkelling reef too my first time here n i feel i know all of u guys  pak teddy martinus owner meng zainal n our dive master reef tourleader mamang  nice sincerely friendly guys nicolas n i would like to say thanks for the wonderful experience good break great dive wonderful place n people
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: it was a great experience in cocotinos sekotong very generous and friendly service from staffs and stunning roomalmost  hours exhausted driving from aiport praya to sekotong due to heavy rain that time but it was paid off for all the strugglei love the bathroom in separated semi outdoor area with non slippery tile floor so children can play along by jumping with no worriesits just around  minutes to gili nanggu where offers stunning beach with almost tamed fishes and calm beach very ideal with children
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my daughter and i came here on a whim wanting somewhere to chill out after the tourists in gili trawangan what a great choice beautifully kept grounds and rooms a private beach relaxed but attentive service and above all delightful staff the snorkelling is also brilliant  much better than at the gilis in my opinion  and according to my daughter the diving is good too especially if youre into the smaller species the food is good too although if youre vegetarian like me the choice is a little limited but if youre not  all in all had a great timeanna l
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: one week stay in cocotinos was a new experience  nice beach and a lot of things to do in here even far away from the center city the place is so quite and we like that total relax prawn and pina colada was amazing will back again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had a wonderful time at cocotinos the staff took such good care of us the facitlities and spa were great the rooms were well equipped private and comfortable and the view from the beach was breath taking if youre looking for a relaxing tropical getaway then look no further then cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stayed here over the easter break  took a relaxation package in a wart edge villa fantastic service from check in to checkout staff were very attentive and professional all aspects of our package were organised and confirmed room was very nice size and comfortable  restaurant was good typical mix of local and western foodthe place is quite isolated so unless your going to relax and enjoy the beach a massage some snorkelling and chilling out choose another location but it is very peaceful and nice
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we thoroughly enjoyed our recent stay in cocotinos after two weeks we left completely relaxed as it was offseason the resort was rather quiet most of the stay which suited us fine we had a waterfront villa with plunge pool and lovely view the villa which is tastefully decorated comfortably accommodated the five of usthe staff took great care of us we enjoyed evening walks in the hills with staff members the children had private cooking lessons we often rented the kayak which the children could safely use in the cove snorkeling off the jetty and at beach front was really great  better even than at some of the gillis  we spotted at least  variety of starfish just in the beachjetty area we enjoyed spa treatments to the sounds of the breeze and the ocean my husband and i had a romantic dinner for two on the beach the kitchen staff offered us items not on the menu all in all it was one of the most relaxing holidays weve hadwhat appealed to us was that cocotinos is set far away from busier parts of the island but be aware of that if youre the type looking for more action there is no gym so during a longer stay you have to get creative to get some exercise aside of course from endless hours of swimming i jogged through the kampongs and felt safe the kids appreciated the evening walks with madi to stretch their legswadi is an excellent driver  far better than any taxi driver here in singapore he brought us around on a day tour and a couple of visits to local villages great visit to  local schools skip the monkey forest  its the same monkeys we have here in sgthe rubbish in the water distracts from the snorkeling experience but this is not the fault of cocotinos unfortunately garbage disposal in this part of the world is not yet the priority it is elsewherea tip for housekeeping clean bed linens during our  week stay would have been appreciated but aside from that our room was clean and comfortableheru does an excellent job in managing he wasnt around the first couple of days when we arrived but after he arrived we noticed a different level of activity of the staff and more personal attention keep up the good work heru you have a wonderful opportunity with a job like yours thank you and your team for creating this paradise and thank you to the general manager whos name escapes me a kind gentleman whom i enjoyed speaking withkind regards to the teamnoelle fred lucas emily and sarah
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed  days mainly for scuba diving but also found its a good place for relax and holiday their service from front restaurant room spa were so great we had a wonderful time underwater and enjoyed very much stay in this beautiful place clear water tidy rooms experience dive masters and crews nice food great place for diving and holiday love to come back again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stopped in for a change of scene from our villa at pelanganmust have passed many times as visit twice a year but not really noticed as hidden from road lovely spot to enjoy restaurant snack friendly staff as always in lombok beach and pool area looked clean and inviting this coast is unspoilt still which means few locations to enjoy western style accommodation and catering
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: spent an extended weekend with our son and the staff were incredible with him taking care of him at every meal area is nice with spa overlooking the ocean and clean beach and pool only drawback is that the restaurant is rather pricy would go back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: had a wonderful few days escaping from everything stayed in waters edge and terrace rooms just great especially waters edge where you are  meters from the water the hotel was not fully booked  not quite peak season staff were extremely nice and helpful always smiling great snorkling just a few meters from the beach we will go diving next time as other guests commented how good it was the food was tasty ranging from indonesian to international cuisine they passed our breakfast poached egg test perfectly and have tasty home made bread and jams every day with great quality decor and service the one area they need to improve is the spa good light to medium massages but recommend management provide enhanced training for the staff as more variety and stronger massages will bring these services to the high level of the rest of this great boutique place super place completely relax and recharge
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i booked the cocotinos because of a friends recommendation and when i came to the small resort it really looked nice the rooms are nice and clean and the place is pretty and well laid out the central pool is nice and resort well kept the location is stunning so why only  stars well the food is dull at best and priced like a star restaurant now that wouldnt have been so bad if there had been any alternatives nearby but in a place where theres nothing to do other than swimming diving dining and whatever fun that one can have on the room theres no dvd either those things have to be great now the diving swimming and snorkelling in sekotong is worldclass but cocotinos can hardly take the credit for that theres simply no excuse for the uninspired stuff we had for every meal  and learn to brew a decent coffee guys i hope the ownermanager reads this review i would love to come back here  its a great place in a fabulous that has a lot of promise now its time to deliver on that promise
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the hospitality is superb from the day we arrive until the day we departrooms very clean and well maintainedstaff well train and always ready with a smile u can feel that they take pride in their worklocation great place away frm hustle and bustlefood the chefs fed us well and the serving size is hugedive centre wonderful and fun loving crew who are also observant and always thoughtfulspa good ambience and great relaxation
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a perfect get away in an all exclusive serene sanctuary my st contact with cocotinos dates back to  at manadothat exclusive experience at manado was the trigger for this tripfrom the time we arrived the warmth and hospitality given by the staff and management of cocotinos sekotong was beyond description we were thoroughly pampered and there wasnt a moment that we felt we were in a foreign landim sure anyone whos been to cocotinos sekotong would agree with me youve got to personally experience it and for those macro photographers and nudibranch lovers this is paradise the experience dive guides were really eager to show you some of their underwater troves of treasureslast but not least we were treated to an all exclusive dance performance by the staff its in their tradition of making your stay a very memorable onecocotinos is your perfect getaway for all traveller types its family oriented suitable for family with young kids or teenagers perfect for honeymooners solo traveller or even a company retreat
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i cannot forget these wonderful people and beautiful location a lot of unexpected things happened we all the time recieved the best solutions and service from working staffi love each of the individual and everyone smiles with us with a truly simple and beautiful mind and heart
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: what a great place this isif youre looking for a nice relaxing resort style holiday you cant go past cocotinos everything about it is just perfectwe stayed  nights in a water edge villa which met our needs perfectly well appointed with a larger than king size bed free standing stone bath indoor and outdoor showers the outdoor shower was just superb so never used the indoor one air conditioning worked really well and the ceiling fan at night was just right for a perfect nights sleepall linen perfectly clean clean towels everyday full toiletriesgreat service the outdoor deck with day bed and private plunge pool topped it off stay in the water edge villa you wont regret itthe food was fabulous the semi open restaurant was a great place to dine and the extensive menu had a great selection the prices were really reasonable too the chef was only too happy to cater to our special requeststhe snorkelling was pretty good and a short boat ride gets you to three other islands which make for a good day trip the complimentary village tour is worth doing too the morning yoga and the massagespa is highly recommendedthe staff here are fantastic all are so friendly and helpful the front office manager heru went above and beyond and made our stay wonderful whatever i asked of him he provided a special mention to imi too for being a wonderful guide to me on a couple of special tours he took me onbut all the staff are just great we even had the pleasure of meeting the owner who made the time to sit and chat with us and went out of his way to make us traditional indonesian drinksmuch appreciatedive done a lot of travelling and stayed at many many places but this one will always be memorable and i will return i cant recommend this place enough if i could give it  stars i wouldthe only down sidei only stayed  nights i wish i could had have stayed longerthanks to all management  staff at cocotinos mr m
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: good service and friendly staff at the hotel good breakfast included with the room dive and snorkel trips are a bit pricey because there are no other dive shops in the area however the service is excellent on those trips the diving in this area is good too we were very pleased at the relaxing effect our stay had
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: a quiet place to relax and enjoy the sun cocotinos is the place to gothe service was excellent throughout the resortthe pool was clean and refreshing trips to the nearby gili island for snorkelling were an excellent way to spend a morning or afternoon the coral was colourful and many varieties of fishwe stayed in a pool view villa and then moved to an oceanside villa with private plunge pool both were excellent but the oceanside villa was just that little bit more the oval stone tub and outdoor showers were superb we never used the indoor showercocotinos was a great place to unwind and relax we would definitely return when in lombok
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this was our second time staying at this resort and as with our first visit we had a great stay our group consisted of  adults one toddler and one infant and we were all well catered for we stayed in the beautiful story  bedroom tangkong villa the villa is well appointed and decorated with a spa in the upstairs master bedroom and a private plunge pool on the first floorwhat sets cocotinos above the rest of other resorts is the level of service being a smaller resort your needs are much better provided for all our requests were met with happy smiles and a noproblem attitude appreciated when travelling with small kids we were not disappoinited in a single waythe resort is quiet and removed from any towns other resorts or tourist traps if you like swimming fun in the ocean and relaxing then this place is for you
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i dont know where to start but i can tell you this place is worth every single penny not one thing i can think about that disappointed us from the beginning on we felt like home the staff is very very attentive friendly and helpful with their friendly attitude they will cheer up even the grumpiest person the location is breath taking  far away from other bigger villages just next to the beach if you want to relax and have some time away from the hustle and bustle of city life  cocotinos is the place to be for even more relaxation you can have a massage near the beach or take a yoga lesson on the jetty if you are more adventurous you can explore the nearby villages or go diving or snorkelling another thing i have to mention is the food  breakfast lunch afternoon tea or dinner  its just delicious local delicacies all day long i could go on and on and on and on just go there and find out yourself
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you look for a quiet and peaceful spot off the beaten places of sengigi then this place will work for you sitting on the pier with glass of wine or simple looking from the restaurant into the sunsetgreat good and excellent rooms and an awesome staff always ready to assist can not ask for more
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: its on the outskirts and you should be wary of coming when it rains as the approach roads can get very flooded however the resort is beautiful the waters clear the staff super friendly and food excellent
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: discover real lombok and return to the comfort of your wonderful hotel in a paradise locationthe views are stunning turquoise waters  little islands local colourful fisherboats enough water activities are offered divng expeditions snorkeling island visits all organized by very friendly staffnot always professional as one sometimes expect from a high standard hotel but saying that it had certainly charm as the staff is very friendly we are a mature professional aged couple and have embraced the ambiance location goodwill and foodwe did have some organisational hick ups maybe with language sometimes lost in translationwe will certainly recommend this lovely hotel to our best friends as of course we do not want the secret to be out to tell it to the world
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: diving is wonderful hotel staff are fantastic as they are super friendly shower pressure is a very low pressure so keep that in mind s food is super tasty sometimes takes a while but it is very lovely the beach huts and chairs are comfortable with a nice view in restaurant music is a good choice rooms are very cozy and welcoming with clean towels everyday and bed made seperately every night location is very very selected and far away from everything
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: everything about this hotel was perfect the staff the views the room all had us feeling completely comfortable and relaxed instantly this place really caters to those who just need a break from the daily grind it is very isolated so if you want to be close to nightlife etc then sekotong is definitely not for you  but its isolation means you can find yourself completely alone on a beautiful stretch of coast  i know what i would choose trips to the surrounding islands for exploring snorkeling and diving are easily arranged and at this time of year you might be diving with a couple of divemasters to yourself the staff lead by the magic heru made our stay extra special we expected the lack of food options to be a problem but once we commented on our love of spicy food the staff were keen to prepare local food for us  i hope heru keeps trying out new ideas for the restaurant to keep the kitchen and customers excited we will definitely be back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you want to get away from life for a few days and rest and relax this is the spot for youwe spent  days and came back home feeling completely refreshed and rejuvenated the setting is fabulous for those wanting to get away from it all  the only local small shops are a  km or so walk away and there is pretty much nothing to buy  so if you want to shop you will need to go to sengigi or bali this place is for chillaxingthe pool is clean and perfectly located this is the first time i have ever hung around the pool on deck chairs with a drink playing cards and scrabble and being pampered  not the last now eitherthe breakfast is delicious and generous and there is an afternoon teahigh tea as well as there isnt anywhere else to eat the restaurant is your only option  the food is good and the staff open to ideas  we like our food hot and this wasnt a problem we didnt try the western food but those with us said it was fine we suggested that we would have liked more local food options  so on our last night the manager hero sorted us an amazing local meal  what a lovely surprise that was as mangoes my favourite fruit was in season he also got me a big bag of delicious mangoes during the stay and the restaurant staff were always happy to cut me up some more at breakfast time when we were ill the manager even went out of his way to organise medicine from the apothekthere is a dive shop and boat trips to the closeby gilis are a good option we also hired a car through the hotel and went on a day trip to kuta we ascertained that we had made the right decision to stay at cocotinos as it met all our needs other options included boat trips for diving and snorkeling and fishing a walk up the hill behind and trip to the local village etcoh and a free  min massage at the local spa with a view of the ocean from the outdoor massage beds agung the masseuse provides a great relaxing massage too the beach is perfect  lots of shells to collect crabs to watch etcthere is a fair bit of seaweed in the ocean but you can swim over it and there are lots of fish to see just off the jetty we saw a school of angelfish in the same spot for  hoursthe rooms were perfect  who wouldnt want an outside shower the bed is huge and so comfortable and the staff happy to help by providing whatever we needed there is a bar fridge some snacks in the room would also be a good idea and robes and all that stufflots of little touches that really make it extra comfortable take your own coffee if you want a decent coffee before breakfast  its fine if you are ok with nescafe and indocoffee mix or tea with powdered milk the local coffee at breakfast is delicious howeveroverall if you want to get away from it all this is the place staff make the place and they get a  especially hero the manager  we will definitely go back and stay in a double room with a private pool and i will even take my highly allergic son with me as i trust that hero will work with me to ensure the food is safe for himterimah kasih hero pak teddi agung opie jo imam and all the others whose names i cant remember  we hope to see you again soon
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we have just returned from a long weekend at cocotinos and were very impressed with the resort the staff service room and all aspects of the resort were more than we expected from accommodation in a fairly remote location the rooms were very neat and clean staff were friendly and helpful restaurant was good and the resort beach and house reef were great too the resort dive centre was excellent very professional and well organised its a great get away location and well worth the trip to get there
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the setting is perfect so relaxing and romantic the view is just breathtaking the staff were very friendly and obliging the food is excellect i would recommend this place to anyone who just wants to relax and chill out
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we booked our stay here after a very enjoyable stay at their sister resort in manado and almost everything was just as good except the foodwe booked a pool villa by the beach which was fantastic and worth the extra money since the beach was not ideal for swimming the only downside was if people decided to use the lounge chairs right outside the villa so there was no privacy as they could look straight onto your pool and into the roomunfortunately we were a little disappointed with the food  it was hit and miss  some dishes like the seafood were good when others were not the western food was surprising better than the local cuisine which was lacking flavour and spice perhaps it was diluted for tourists and despite asking for extra heat the local dishes like the curry noodles and others were still bland since it is a la carte and with only one restaurant it is important to have consistently good foodif they improved the quality of the food we would consider returning if we visiting lombok again but we would be definitely returning to their sister resort in manado
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos sekotong is perfect for people who are looking for quiet serenity the resort is rather small but the view from the pool deck and restaurant is simply breathtaking  white sandy beach turquoise waters the three tiny islands and silhouette of mountains looming in the background the staff was very friendly and attentive other than a snorkeling trip that can be booked through the resort cocotinos also offered freeofcharge drive through neighboring villages and guided short hike to a small hill behind the resort for sunset viewing the food is good the pools water is always warm and inviting at any time of the day and we really enjoy the quiet relaxation the resort offers my partner and i stayed in the smallest room the garden room yet it comes with indoor and outdoor showers a day bed by the window a very comfortable bed and tall ceiling for extra airiness we love our stay here one suggestion for cocotinos your resort is definitely better than the official pictures you post here so an update of better quality photos will do cocotinos more justice
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: it was well worth the drive we arrived for two nights from the upper gilli island our transport did not work out so we ended up with a driver who was non english speaking this was interesting it was a  hour drive and we had to stop for directions at least  times but what an amazing place the staff was great the on site scuba was top notch we had an amazing snorkel trip the turtlesfish coral and sponges were something we have never seen we had just been on an over crowded trip on the upper gillis what a difference wish we had skipped the upper gilli islands
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: as usual we booked this pretty last minute as my wife wants to see hammerheads this time round so we only booked it one week earlier the only thing we did right was to speak to martinus  gmdirector of cocotinos manado as we are regulars divers with odyssea divers and had stay with martinus we got a good rate with him so it pays to be regulars and using one brand membership has its privilegesnow our other problem was due to the last minute we could not use our redemption miles on economy class so we ended on using more miles on business class not that i am complaining but business class on mi silkair is different from sq singapore airlines as the services just isnt there in fact throughout the flight we had economy class passengers walking up and down the aisle using the toilets as we are frequent flyers we do not even dare use the business class toilet but i guess it just boils down to the flight attendants so thumbs down for miback to cocotinos sekotong we were greeted at the airport by a pleasant airport rep and driver and was driven to the resort which is minutes away as we arrived on mi in the night we didnt see much of the sceneryas a regular to its sister resort in manado we were greeted like regulars to this resort and ushered to our room we booked a terrace room but was upgraded to a garden room which had an outdoor shower and the room is much bigger we totally enjoyed the upgrade the room is spacious and very nice it is similar in style to its sister in manado in fact the whole layout is same as mando from the reception to restaurant to room only different is  location which is great as the dive sites are all nearby  food is really very good as compare to its sister we love the food here we were wondering if we can request for the lombok chef to be at manado when we visit them next year  sleep was good as we didnt have the villagers next to us but there is a road and is quiet most of the them  a beach which we can hang out and snorkel too  dive centre operations is similar to its sister but different as zainal runs the operations differently and efficiently we were happy to have mamang as our dive guide and as i am a photographer with his keen eyes he spotted a lot of creatures for us by the way his master is james from its sister property in manado another good spotter of creatures in fact mamang was given a subject list of creatures that i will be shooting this time and there were only two that we didnt find  leaf fish and a pink frog fishas we traveled in october we plan to dive at belongas to see the hammerheads and had booked for a one day dive there it is consider offseason we changed our minds and stay through for our  dives daynights of diving with zainal and his team on our first two days of diving it was virtually private diving but on the third day we had another two couples with us for diving as we were using nitrox we did our own diving with mamang as it was simply wonderful for usso if you plan to stay in lombok  stay with lombok boutique resort  cocotinos sekotong where you find good food wonderful accommodation great hospitality and for divers an excellent diving experience
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i have been to many resorts in asia and many are nice but cocotinos is special the room rate is also very reasonable for the type of room and level of luxury offered i am not much of a beach person but i really enjoyed the boat trips to the lovely island and the snorkeling was great this place feels special because the staff are so friendly and will go out of their way to meet your requests here you do not have the usual  pools and heaps of food during breakfast like in a big resort in bali but there is enough variety every morning and there is the plus point that you are not having breakfast with  other people every morning here the staff remember your name with only little english they try their bestthe hours spent on the patio reading relaxing and overlooking the sea was the best part of my trip the food was tasty without being fancy grilled fish is best the setting up of the daily complimentary afternoon tea at pool side remind me to go for a break after a few hours reading beach is clean most days but occasionally heaps of corals being washed up and you would have to walk with a good pair of beach slippersi took a trip south with others and saw two or three wonderful rugged beaches lombok is great if you like what nature has to offer cocotinos is quiet and feels like a part of nature great place to get away from stress and simply relax if you like busybusy place go elsewhere
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had a great time at the resort they made my th special staff is super friendly rooms are clean and neat food is great most dive trips are  tanks with hot lunch served on board crew takes great care of you and your gear
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed there for  nights with my girlfriend the rooms were very good as was the restaurantworth noting the water sports centre good selection of windsurfing boards very helpful staff and a good dive schoolthere is also an island across the bay gbp  for a return boat ride there with great snorklingfor  a night couldnt fault it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: staff was so friendly always view from resort was just great right next to the beach also very nice place for diving can see big turtle stingray frog fish sea horse and othersvery relaxing absolutely amazing place dont forget cocotinos lombok location is far from the airport but it could be good for you to avoid any noisyit takes around hr or so so i rate the location as  startsif i can go to lombok again will definitely stay there again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the room are bigs and very comfortable and cleanthe staffs are all friendlyi didnt expect much for diving but it actually has a very good macro life and good visibilitylove to spend more time there
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i decide to do a bali lombok combination trip this year for bali i stayed in ubud for the cool and the craft and art for lombok i came back to cocotinos sekotong my second trip here and wow what a beautiful experience again i stayed in a garden room again it was just as comfortable as before and suits my budget not so expensive for the quality and luxury much better than my hotel in ubudthe fried banana dessert was just as good as before the complimentary afternoon tea was really great there is also wifi now in the whole lobby and it is free i was told they have a new provider i did some work on my covered patio outside my room and the wifi was good and stableon the last morning i did my sun salute at the end of the jetty i was almost overwhelmed with tears knowing i had to leave thank you cocotinos for another wonderful stay
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: it was my very first trip to lombok with friends and i am glad i choose cocotinos i took my friends advice and chose a quite place for a break after the haze in kl the fresh air in the resort was simply great my first impression of the resort was that it was so clean and well kept the swimming pool was crystal clear i could see the stone tile at the bottom of the deep end which could not be said of many resorts i have been to my room was spotless and the flowers on my bed made me feel very welcome the amount of food for breakfast was more than enough and the spread was quite good with lots of fruits including local mangoes and star fruit not just the usual boring pineapple and watermelon you get in most hotels around here the homemade jam and bread were also yummyfor me the best thing about cocotinos was that there were no lifesize mysterious statues everywhere like those you can find in many bali resorts the place felt spiritually bright without the feeling of eyes staring at me whereever i went especially at night i felt completely relaxed and undisturbed in the beautiful flower garden beneath tall coconut trees strolling on the beach or simply resting in my room it was incredible to shower outside with bananas hanging flowers around me and coconut trees above  total freedom and privacy the staffs were warm and friendly they remembered my name i went to the spa twice and would have gone more but it was quite packed and they had only two therapists the sofa bed in the room and the covered patio were great for reading or taking a napnow for a few minor complaints   the resort has a number of ugly land crabs and one night i got a fright outside my room when a big one crossed my path and scrabbled up a coconut tree being a city girl i never imagined it was possible for crabs to climb up trees so quickly and the geckos were also noisy but lucky for me i soon got used to their sharp cries the staff told me the gecko is a special animal like a mascot for lombok i could hear them but i could not see one they were so well camouflaged some days a fair bit of rubbish do wash up on the beach but the gardeners did a great job sweeping it up every morning so the beach was always clean during the day the beach has broken corals though which is a bit hard on the bare feet so it is advisable to wear beach sandals i found the food portions a bit too big for me but i suppose it suited others who had huge appetites i would have preferred smaller portions with more tasty bits on the side and i had to ask for more chili dips always with the complimentary crisps during dinner hey some of us can eat hot food but to be fair the staff always tried their best and on the last night i got more than my share of different types of fiery dipsi went on a tour of the countryside and got some nice pottery at banyumulek  recommended the rice fields were green and soothing to the eyes if you like quiet and nature come to cocotinos i really enjoyed my relaxing holiday in lombok terima kasih to all the staff at the resortbagus this is one place i will consider returning to for sure whenever i get tired of shopping and eating in big cities
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos sekotong is off the beaten  way off that only makes it more charming  but expect little besides relaxing snorkeling and diving the rooms are large and very comfortable in the middle of a lovely garden staff is very friendly and helpful and the hotel prides itself on recruiting locally nice food although catering to an international crowd the hotel could usefully introduce local tastes to its menu the pool and beach are private and peaceful finally the hotel has its own diving centre offering the possibility of visiting the south gilli islands worth visiting for some amazing snorkeling or diving thanks cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: our family of  stayed for  nights at cocotinos sekotong in june  overall we would say that the hotel is well designed and the staff do try to provide good service the place is fairly quiet and very accessible if you are looking to visit the southern gili islands nanggu gede rengit they even have a private jetty that make boarding and unboarding from the boats much more convenient the beach is a great place to walk in the late afternoon during the low tide as you can find all kinds of sea creatures in the shallow water the only real problem we have is the lack of attention to cleanliness in our rooms and also in the spa treatment we took a massage and scrub at the spa whilst the massage was good the therapist did not bother to wash our feet or cover our hair so she struggled with pulling away our hair each time it got in the way of the massage neither did she bother to ask if the massage pressure was suitable or if she should turn down the aircon in case we felt cold without our clothes after applying the scrub we struggled to the shower room with bits of scrub falling all over the floor to take a shower we stayed at the rinjani suite and for the first two nights there were mozzies and we had to put down the mosquito net the cabinet and sink in the bathroom were dusty and so was the bed see photos attached we were told that the resort was fairly new  less than  years old but it sure didnt seem like it the final straw came on our final night at the hotel my husband was woken up in the middle of the night by a large rat a little less than cm that was scurrying around on our bed and accidentally bumped his face and we did not bring any food to our bedroom at all except for bottles of mineral water we reported this to the staff at checkout the next morning but they seemed pretty nonchalant about it not sure if this was because they couldnt understand english that well or didnt find it surprising to be woken up by a rat the counter staff was not at all apologetic for the disturbance we also spoke with the owner who happened to be there and he said he had not encountered such rat incident before overall a good location for water activities but unless the level of cleanliness improves we wont be going back anytime soon the room rates are not cheap so we would have expected much better quality than what we got
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos is a small hotel in a great peaceful and scenic location from the moment we arrived until the moment we left we had a thoroughly relaxing and enjoyable stayour room was spacious and spotlessly clean as was the bathroom and the showerwe enjoyed the swimming pool and the beach and our excursions to neighbouring villages and beacheseveryone at cocotinos was friendly courteous and helpful and made our stay very enjoyable
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i visited cocotinos a few years agothis year we went to revisit malaysia and baliwe stayed in some high profile resorts in bali what a mistake that we didnt visit again cocotinosthe resort is the perfect place to relax with great service pool villas views very well run hoteli am still angry with myself that we didnt come to cocotinos again and instead we wasted some time staying in bali in ugly big hotelskeep doing great job cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if youre looking for a quieter alternative to the rigors and crowds of bali this hotel on lombok is an excellent choice dont expect wild nightlife and endless shopping but do expect a small friendly comfortable hotel in a lovely beach setting with a beautiful swimming pool the rooms are well appointed and roomy the restaurant has enough variety and quality to keep you interested and the day excursions for snorkeling and exploring to nearby gili nanggu give you plenty to do car hire and day trips around lombok can also be arranged and the resort has its own dive centre and dive trips check if theyre expecting a group from a cruise ship to drop in for a swim as you might want to make that the day you go on an excursion while the group may only be there for a few hours it did feel like an invasion and it would have been good to know in advance it will take you hrs to get there from the airport i suggest you arrange transport with the hotel even though its a little more expensive as the drivers know exactly where theyre going and the journey will be much quicker the cost of hiring a car and driver for excursions from the hotel is expensive compared to bali but then its so nice to be there you wont want to do too much of that oh and dont forget to indulge in a treatment at the spa perched above the beach in the gentle breeze
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos resort locate far away from the main citytowngood peaceful and quiet great for a getaway from the city lifestyle a swimming pool with m depth for swimmer lover it has its own jetty you can take stroll during sunrise or sunset it provide diving or snorkeling tea break provided at pmpm free wifi at dining area big and comfortable bed and room space people are friendly a homestay feeling with a resort facilitiesis a recommended place to go for all diversnot so good inconvenience to do shopping for clothes food and drink as it take more than min to travel to main city area
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos sekotong is a place where you should stay for your holiday runaway from the busyness in your life unfortunately i stayed for a couple of days to work nevertheless the place made work seemed easier and funhaving breakfast lunch and dinner with a great view will overcome any tirednessthe room is fantastic and very cozy and also you can have the option of indoor or outdoor showeryes the place is far from everywhere  hours from airport but if you wanted a peaceful and beautiful place with a great view of rinjani the sunrise and sunset this is the placewould love one day to go there again for holiday ps since its far from the city you might wanted to bring some midnight snacks just incase youre hungry in the middle of the night
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we first made a tour for two weeks around the island and this hotel was the ideal stay to relax for the last week very quiet and comfortablewe stayed here for  days and had a lovely time very friendly en helpfull staff a beautiful seavieuw and delicieus indonesian food the appartment was spacious and had all the things you want in a good hotel there is a nice swimmingpool which we used a lota boat from the hotel can bring you to gili nanggu this is the most marvelous place to snorkel beautiful coral en many many different fisheswe had a great time here at cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: everything is simple but valuable in its pricehere is very far from airport and city it means you may hate it or you may love it i am the later one who escape from the daily and stressed life so i fly here for nothing but just relaxingxexbxaxexxaexexbxdxexaaxxexbcxb 
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: while everyone was very polite we got no sense of friendliness from the staff the food was quite bland  a pity as there was nowhere else to eat the hotel is in a lovely location with a great view of mt rinjani a great variety of fish to be seen snorkelling off their pier however it is not easy to get out of the water back on to the pier rooms are nice
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed here for days and  nights we found this place very nice friendly and relaxing the food was excellent the beach was very nice and was cleaned every morning the snorkeling outside the resort was ok we stayed over new year and the resort arranged a very nice party for the guest with barbecue live band and fireworks we stayed in a garden view villa which was very nice good value for money
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my wife and i decided to stay  nights at cocotinos in lombok as we have been to bali a few times  we thought wed give lombok a shotwe were picked up from the airport as i had arranged a return transfer through the hotel  the drive was about  mins and we also stopped at a convenience store along the way as noted in the homepage of cocotinos the resort is rather isolated which for us was fine but it may not suit those looking for some actioncheckin was smooth and staff most friendly our room was number  which is the waters edge villa the room itself was very comfy with a small plunge pool and decent sized verandah with day bed and  chairs and table overlooking the ocean staff brought welcome drinks and cold towels to the room  a lovely touch a welcome amenity of fresh fruit was ready and waiting too as it is a relatively newish hotel everything is in good condition no complaints room wiseswimming in the ocean we were stung by perhaps jelly fish  i cant be sure they were jelly fish but nonetheless my wife and i had to retreat from the water needless to say we didnt venture back in be aware if you do go swimming thereas cocotinos is a small resort there is only  restaurant which is fine breakfast was usually a la carte and reasonably good however many items on the menu for dinner were average at best which i think is not acceptable given the remoteness of the resort and the fact that guests must dine in the hotel  there are no other dining options my wife i and a friend who stayed at the resort all came to the same conclusion  the food was a bit dissapointing i hope the owners andor management will address this as other reviews here on tripadvisor have also noted even though occupancy was low instead of the usual menu why not offer a bbq for the guests something a little more rousingall staff at the resort were keen and eager at all times no complaints with the staffi do recommend cocotinos for anyone who would like to escape the ratrace and enjoy an idyllic boutique resort located on the beach i just hope some improvements are made regarding the dining experience for the guest
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we only stayed for one night as we were continuing our journey the next day looking back we should have just stayed at cocotinos the hotel is beautifullydesigned on a small relaxed beach in southwest lombok after an hours drive from the airport we were thrilled to see our wellequipped room with gorgeous wooden furniture and accents the cute patio area and the outdoor shower the bed was very comfortable and all of the linens were of good quality the beach is small and pebbly but there are chairs provided and the pool looked quite nice we only ate breakfast during our stay but we were really pleased with the large servings and good quality the prices for other food items seemed a bit high as were the prices for excursions and spa services but if you are looking to relax in an undeveloped part of lombok cocotinos is an excellent choice
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: me  my friends were driving by the sekotong area when we found this hotel the area is nice and clean the rooms are beautiful and comfortable but my favorite is the tranquility perfect to let go of your stress and relax the whole day the beach is nice and clean the food is so so but the staffs are very friendly and the beach is very beautiful the biggest let down is that theres no fresh water availablethis place is far away from the city but im okay with that since its exactly what we were looking for however if you are planning to go to places like sade sukarare village senggigi or pearl farm you might need to consider to stay in other areas
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: just departed from cocotinos two days agoand only complaint that i have was too short a stay if i would known how nice and how beautiful the resort was i would have extended for few more days if you are looking for a relaxing stay with wonderful staff that cannot do enough for you then you must book cocotinos get away from the noise and the crowds of the gilis up north and sit back and relax at cocotinos i dont usually post on trip advisor coz i think the very few negative comments disturb me maybe these guests are not happy with themselves i only met happy guests at this resort and the excellent management and friendly staff made me feel right at home i cant wait to return later in the year and book with mosley at dive shop these guys do a excellent job thanks everyone at cocotinos for a truly relaxing experience in lombokfrank l vogt iiiusa
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: just couldnt get any sleep with noise breakfast selecction ran out early pretty expensive for what it is the location seems pretty far from anything touristy front office seemed understandign of our problems but couldnt solve anything i wish i had booked a place thats bit more established or part of chain but some boutiquey things just dont work out i guess
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: stayed there one night last week and checked out next morning no fresh water very bad food extreeeemely slow service though staffs were genuinely friendly aircon in room did not work properly when asked to talk to manager was told he was not present when in fact the man was sitting in the restaurant when we found out and complaint he was defensive argued and walked away total lack of professionalism as we drove out we saw some illegal gold mining activities and suspected they were the reason why this resort could not get fresh water
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i booked this resort with relaxation in mind and it played out in spades the rooms are beautiful spotless and well decorated the high ceilings fan and ac all make for a very comfortable stay my wife especially like the indooroutdoor shower and the turndown service with fresh towels is very important at a beach resort the grounds of the cocotinos are perfectly manicured and gorgeous the pool is very nice and close to the restaurant which is right on the beach the restaurant prices are a little high but overall decent value the staff are not as quick to smile as you might find other staff to be ion other islands but this is part of the culture on lombok and you will find that the entire staff go out of their way to make the guests feel happy they even arranged a beautiful surprise for my father on his birthday by giving us a cake and the whole staff came out to sing happy birthday they even presented him with a bintang beer mug i imagine it was an easy choice after seeing him drink a few for the last couple of days  overall i would say that this is a great relaxed resort with so much natural beauty and such helpful staff you will not want to leave
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed in one of the beachside villas definitely worthwhile splurging because the other rooms dont offer the same views the villa was huge with lovely indoor and outdoor bathrooms and the deck with plunge pool was gorgeous having a big drinking water container in the room is a great extra and the hotel information provided in the room is very detailed and usefulalthough beachfront villa  is beautiful its right next to the pool and while we were there there were a lot of kids playing  and screaming   at the pool which was not quite the relaxing ambience we were hoping for i recommend requesting either of the other two villas if you want more privacy and peace in contrast to the villas we found the pool and restaurant areas a little functionalmost of the staff were friendly and attentivewifi is only available at the restaurant  reception area it was a bit flaky and we were sometimes unable to connect though the hotel has a couple of computers you can use would be good if wifi could be provided reliably throughout the hotel
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: to start off with the goodthe grounds are well kept and the entry way from the road is pretty impressivethe rooms were cleaned wellthe breakfast buffet was not the best ive had but it is good at the pricethe views from the restaurant are goodthe price is theoretically pretty goodfree premium channels on the tv were a good touchnow the badour city tour promised us four stops the driver only wanted to take us to a pretty dismal mall and when pushed to take us to one further destination left us alone to be swindled by some local guides he spoke very little english and was clearly not interested in guiding usthis tour cost  and i thought i should get back at least half the cost but the hotel was only interested in discounting this by  the money isnt a big issue but i thought the right gesture would have been to take the whole amount offno compensation for not having the twin beds as we booked and they promised us to bring a cot which never materialised the room was number  with the septic smellthey never gave us keys we didnt realise until the morning as we stayed put from coming back from the city tour until checking outit is impossible to alter or amend the booking without cancelling the booking by which time they may have taken the nonrefundable deposit so i was stuck with two nights when i really only wanted one nightthere were some workmencraftsmen working near the poolside early morning banging away on branches and playing audible radio music not a problem for me as i was awake but i imagine those who were sleeping could have been disturbedfront desk staff seemed a bit disinterested the restaurant staff were very engaged on the other hand and were sometimes noncommunicativedespite being a resort hotel by the beach none of the boats were available for hire due to cleaning perfectly understandable to maintain your boats but it seems pretty odd to take them all out of commission on a single dayall in all not bad value for the cost if you never have to shorten your stay that is if you want to stay fewer nights than you originally booked tough luck but the decent value for money is hugely marred by pretty bad service on many many fronts it could be quite good if they tightened up on service standards
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: downsides  restaurant food is about average breakfast is pretty poor in comparison to some of the others we stayed at stayed at jeeva klui parents stayed at room  dont recommend it as its by the septic tank and therefore smells also you have to eat at the hotels restaurants as its so far away from anythingupside  staff are very nice pool and location right on the beach was lovely sea was very clear they take you on their speed boat to gilli nannggu for idr this island i thoroughly recommend as its really idyllic plus the water is so clear and good for snorkelling i have heard the beach here is much better than gilli t etc but i cant comment as i have not been to those islands our villa which has two room s and plunge pool was lovely so was the spa the lady there did me a good deal on the treatments and she was really good too
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: the rooms very nice everything worked fine and very importantly the bathrooms very clean the restaurant and loby good service and good food great location and beautiful beaches so little tourist not crowded very quiet and peacefulwe loved the place we highly recommend it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my job takes me to many busy cities londonsydney ho chi minh city etc for the past two year i have been thinking of a break away from all this hustle and bustle i needed time out to recuperate the air asia promotion to lombok was most opportune the journey in from the airport already set the mood to relax with the slow pace of the countryside and the rustic scenery i did not bother to unpack on arrival it was so nice to feel the breeze and soak in the sun and feel the sand under my bare feet under a leafy tree was i dreaming no it was real  this is it total rest and relaxation i could expect for the next few days i really liked the room this is real cottage living with natural materials used creatively to blend in with brickwork giving the cottages a solid quality feel surrounded by a lush garden which is well maintained space is more than ample in the room with modern facilities for comfort the bed is huge and offers a good nights rest the outdoor bath takes the top prize for taking you close to the elements everyday i used it more than once the resort staff kept the room clean and fresh with a change of towels etcthe food  wow the highlight of my trip i love food and the resort did not disappoint the breakfast was generous and came with a selection of homemade jam and homemade bread in semibuffet style hot selections were also freshly prepared on order the menu offered a good mix of western and asian choices the is good but i would have preferred some of the local dishes to be more spicy they obviously had to tone down the spices to cater to european and american tastesi loved the jetty that jutted out into the sea the end of which gave a good view of the resort bay and the surrounding islands the boat trip to the islands was a real treat to the senses what incredible hues of blue and greens against the white sand walking barefoot on one island was exhilarating and calming at the same time i had the chance to ponder on the wonders of the sea there was absolutely no need to go shopping or sight seeing away from the resort i could fully relax in the resort and surrender myself to the spa what more could i ask for
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: although i am from japan i was lucky to be on project stationed in kl and because air asia now flying to lombok direct  so convenient access also new airport in lombok very good facility on arrival hotel guy display my name pick up very friendly journey to hotel a bit long but scenery interesting and you forget the distance the soft landscape in the resort is very beautiful and hotel supply own bananas for guests service very warm and welcoming indonesian styleonce i step into the resort whole person feel very relaxed from the restaurant i can see the ocean with little islands in front and in the horizon big ferries from bali to lombok back and forth it is a great and relaxing scene and it give me nice feeling of being in quiet place but still close to bali with all attractions design of buildings is contemporary vernacular tropical style i like use of local available material  local technology to achieve the mood in the rooms the place is very clean and this is very important to methe food is good but i suggest should use more fresh seafood and cook in front of the guests of course if can do sashimi and sushi even better because have fresh fish but i know this not easy skill to have maybe resort should employ japanese chef to train them for a few months to use local fish but cook japanese style then more japanese will come to resort white sand beach is pleasant and i like the jetty a lot because can see fish and corals at end of jetty i stayed only three nights not enough time to enjoy the island of lombok will come again with friends and stay longer
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i have been very busy and stressed with months of overtime in the office and so i thought why not choose a quiet place to chill out the resort was a very pleasant surprise so nice and peaceful in its own private beach away from the usual busy tourist traps that nowadays you find in so many popular places such as bali and phuket ok i love bali also but if you have been there recently you will know how bad the traffic is what a relief then it was to find lombok so unspoiled by comparison  no traffic jams the rooms are beautiful and well decorated and spacious with high ceilings with aircon and fan the bathrooms have very nice details and provisions for us the staff was fantastic so friendly and warm i was surprised they planted banana trees among the old coconut trees but it works together with the flowering plants the place feels so cosy and looks so charming like someones lovinglycaredfor private garden the food was tasty and a good mix of asian and western i complimented the chef who would try to make any special request that we had the prices were not cheap but reasonable and comparable to hotels and resorts on the island and elsewhere i suppose i cannot expect to pay warung price in a nice resort i was told the bananas we ate came from the trees in the resort i went on a boat ride and the islands were like little jewels floating in the blue sea still looking pristine and untainted the snorkelling is excellent and highly recommendedthe resort is basically by itself without any bars or discos or restaurants nearby the resort is also located away from the villages which means less noise except for the occasional wayward motorbike with the big exhaust so it was ideal for me as i was tired of the hustle and bustle of the big city and really needed a good rest and i got it especially after a couple of visits to the spa on the beach although i stayed in a garden room i was shown the villas on the beach front and they looked really inviting especially the rinjani villa which has an upper deck with a newly added loft sitting area next to the bed and whirl pool  wow really cool i will definitely be backed and next time i would like to try out one of those villas with private pool
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: made our booking based on reviews and photos of the resort we we not disapointed the gardens around the vilas were beautiful and very well maintained they had the best beach of any that we visited to collect sea shells and im guessing that the snorling and scuba diving would also be incredable if your looking for a nice place to totaly get away from everything this would be the place one dissapointment was that there was only wifi free though in the restaraunt the food here was very good and in our short stay of  night we were unable to find a dish that we did not like i saw a few single people her and i sincerly hope they were looking for solitude as this was all i think they would of found so i am saying this is not the place to come if your looking to go out and meet people if i were staying here for an extended period i would suggest one of the ocean view rooms all the tap water is a slightly salty brine but there was always an ampel supply of fresh water mineral avalible in our room for washing face brushing teeth making tea or coffee ect
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we arrived in cocotinos without having booked it was low season and we got a great deal from the manager we stayed in one of the superior rooms with beach view for only half of the normal walkin price during our stay the staff did everything to make us happy and with success cocotinos is located on a beautiful white sand beach ocean is lovely but we had an encounter with some jellyfish and the rooms are very well decorated and comfortable with indoor and outdoor showers a veranda with big chairs and lots of little extras incent sticks on balcony and chocolate on pillow at night the breakfast is good too the only negative point is the food at night we were not impressed with the quality of the fish and the way it was prepared the spa is recommended one of the best massages during my holidays in bali and lombok with a soothing ocean breeze
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: cocotinos is in the south west of lombok an area with very little development in which you will see few tourists we stayed in a garden room which was spacious and beautifully designed the water front villas looked amazing the whole place is spotlessly clean and the scenery stunning a major draw and the main reason we chose to stay there is gili nanggu just  minutes away by boat ride which the hotel provide for a fee this is among the most beautiful places we have ever been and the snorkelling is something else  you almost dont need a snorkel especially if you take some bread with to attract the fish the hotel will also rent you a snorkel though this seemed a bit stingy compared with other resorts where they will lend them for free eg jeeva kluigili nanggu should not be missed  we went several times it is a beautiful and quiet island just to wonder around as well as for the snorkelling on one of the three days we went a few tour boats were there on other days there was hardly anyone therea word of warning  the management of gili nanggu do not want food from outside the island to be taken in understandably since they have their own hotel and restaurant though cocotinos will make a sandwich packed lunch for you if you are out for the day it hasntbeen very well thought through and is basically just the lunchtime sandwich option including a dressed salad and chips put into a boxyou can also walk round several beaches to the left from the hotel where you will not see a soul wear sandals in the sea as there are black spiky urchinsthe hotel is quite new and
