the extremely friendly staff still do not provide quite the level of service you would expect at a luxury resort we were among a very small number of guests staying during our visit and sometimes food in the restaurant on the whole very goodtook a long time to arrive one cocktail we ordered was definitely not up to scratch but to the hotels credit they replaced it breakfast was slightly underwhelming  they were not running the buffet due to low occupancy and inexplicably there was no fresh juice only squash thebreakfast menu also looks a bit limited in which options you are allowed to select but after the first day we queried this and they let us order what we liked complementary afternoon tea was a nice touchthere was some road noise because a road goes right by the resort but it is not a very busy road so it didnt bother us too much though i probably wouldnt stay in the back row of rooms for this reasonthe spa  i had a massage that was disappointing  the spa area is very nice but the masseuse lacked abilityoverall we had a really great time and would definitely recommend this hotel and this area to anyone visiting lombok
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we spent  beautiful days in this hotel the hotel is new was opened two years ago everything was perfect very nice and attentive staff speaking good english tasty food in the restaurant clean and spacious rooms children were enjoying the beach and swimming pool we had also a lot of pleasure to find every evening in our room some sweets and wishes from the manager of cocotinos thanks to everybody we will be back again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: if you are looking for a quiet hotel to relax and potentially do some diving and snorkeling this is the place to gothe hotel opened only  years ago and is beautiful nice contemporary design away from everything  rooms are bungalo style or private villas with poolif you look for excitement dont come here but if you want to avoid the heavy tourists place north of mataram and at the gili island this is a perfect spotvery friendly staff and i guess with the time restaurant menu can still be enhanced but is at very good standardswill certainly come back
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i have been there in july i recommendwarm welcome by the staffwonderful surroundings environmentroom are very comfortable and cleannice pool just just in front of the beachspa restaurant very tasty and scuba diving center at disposal nice spot for snorkelling as wellhiking session planned by hotel staff at end of the day through surroundings hills points of views and beautiful sunset before a drink at hotel bar
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we had a wonderfull time in cocotinos we stayed  nights en enjoyed it very muchthe hotel is relaxed the view from the garden and the beach is beautifull and quiet the rooms are comfortable and the food was deliciousthe staff is very friendly and makes an effort to give you the ultimate holidayfeelingthe hotel is placed in a non touristic area of lombok which means you have no options to eat outside the hotel or take a stroll for shops etc we saw that as a positive part of the visit
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: far away from every kind of civilized word this resort is a real paradise for people that would like to get away from the everyday life living like a deluxe robinson crusoe if you dont have a car it will be difficult to join either the first supermarketthe rooms are minichalets with a little terrace a nice bedroom and a big bathroom with a open air shower the resort has direct access to a sandy beach full of shelles and coralsthe restaurant has got a various menu and sometimes organizes barbecues on the beach
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we managed to secure this for xcxa a night lovely rooms with ensuite indoor and outdoor bathrooms very helpful staff and outstanding attached dive centre best dive boatequipment andstaff i have seen in asia
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: as a couple that enjoys scuba diving were always on the look out for holiday destinations that offer dive packages we found one in cocotinos sekotong boutique beach resort  spa lombok we opted to book a dive vacation package of  days   nightsthe new lombok international airport was a pleasant surprise along with the well paved roads a welcomed change since my last visit to this island  years agoupon arrival at the resort we opted to upgrade to one of its water edge villas that meant having a  degrees magnificent view of the ocean  all the luxurious amenities that included a bright spacious bedroom a plunge pool a well thought of toilet  bathroom layout with  showers indoor  outdoor a bathtub  wash basins and most importantlya lot of privacythe sheer joy of experiencing lombok islands spectacular sunrise within the confines of our villa is pricelesscocotinos sekotong also offers next to the comfort and pampering amenities a wellequipped diving facility operated by odyssea divers  dive guide is assigned per couple all our gears are arranged and efficiently setup for our divesaday scheduleservices include hot and dry towels with name tags handed us every after each dive biscuits and fresh fruits are served with our choice of hot beverage  bottled water making it all the more memorable were lunches spent along the reefs of a smalluninhabited islandthe only downside is discovering dive sites that sustained considerable damage due to dynamite fishing in the past surprisingly however some dive sites that were spared offer a rich marine life that included an array of colorful gigantic table corals visible at  meters and bright red giant brain corals at a depth of  metersall these in combination with quality comfort delicious local and international menu selection good service level  a serene surrounding make cocotinos sekotong lombok experience one of its kind we will no doubt go back to relive the memories in this romantic piece of heaven in lombok over againour hatsoff to the gm and the friendly and efficient staff for a wonderful and rewarding experience to last a lifetime definitely one of our best holidays and dive adventures ever
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: to give myself a break after a frenzied week i decided to go to lombok and visit the cocotinos sekotong boutique beach resort for a restful weekend i was there last year and had good memories from that new resort and was wondering how it was doing now arriving on a garuda flight i was impressed with the new airport using sky bridges docking at the terminal because it is not used to capacity yet with many empty spaces the interior could have a bit more color and sparkle as a welcome after all you arrive at a beautiful exotic tropical island which deserves better than a dreary monotonous lookarriving at the resort i was pleasantly surprised with the changes since my last visit a matured landscaping and a delightful semi permanent extension of the restaurant giving the feeling of sitting right on the beach enjoying the sound of the surf there were also more items on the menu now and i was delighted to see the cooks daring to move out to the restaurant to cook for your breakfast besides the buffet as a notorious bread eater i enjoyed the wholewheat varieties oh yes i was flattered that the staff that recognized me from the last visit and recalled my angriness of getting my fresh juice with sugar although it was my fault not telling them so now they were asking to make sure it was right as i just wanted a rest i did not go snorkeling although the weather was perfect nor did i venture out on a biking tour on the brand new bikes or trying out the new kayaks the room and spacious bathroom were spotless and i enjoyed the little touches especially the local delicacies brought to your room as an afternoonsnack yes great resort commendable for couples and families who look for a quiet place away from the crowds of the
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed at cocotinos for just one night whilst i was on a business trip in the area its an excellently presented hotel but i did find some aspects of my room a little unclean cobwebs built up in areas etc all in all though it is really very pleasant the restaurant is excellent with a great selection of western and indonesian food and exceptionally good service all round will definitely come back but next time with my family
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i spent  fantastic days at cocotinos  weather was not great rainy season but the staff did everything to make it special this resort is a great quiet place for couples or families who love the real lombok and for people who dont mind to reside a bit further away from the more crowded touristy spots in the north west part of the island the resort is located at a nice beach with some islands in front the architecture is village style with passion for details  well built with local materialsthe bungalows are spacious and the view from the terrace is beautiful a perfect place to stay and a good base to explore the beauty of the island
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: this is definitely a couples or family resort its quite out of the way about  hours from the airport i managed to get a cab from the airport for  idraround aud its a very quiet resort and the staff are very accommodating there is not much around the resort and you will tire of the menu at the restaurant very quickly the prices for food and drinks are quite high for indonesia the setting is beautiful but unfortunately due to ocean currents a lot of rubbish ends up in the water surrounding the resort so we stuck mostly to the pool also i didnt get g reception on my indonesian sim while there and the internet was down a the resort the entire time which was quite inconvenient as i had work to do that being said its a lovely place to spend a few days just relaxing
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed here for  nights and got the whole resort to ourselves it was wonderful the stafff could not do more to help us  they were lovely we chose cocotinos as it was close to famous surfing spot  desert point we ate in the restaurant throughout our stay and i have to say the food was fantastic some of the best meals we had while travelling in balilombok and the prices were reasonable toothe rooms were new and clean with huge comfty beds and an indoor and outdoor shower the view was spectacular we were lucky enough to watch the full moon rise one night so prettyif we come back to sekotong we will definitely stay here again
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: it takes a lot for me to rate this as a five star experience both cocotinos manado and sekotong were superbi dont need to go on and on in this reviewread the others for details youll not see many places with as pristine coral as thisthe food staff and service were great
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: we stayed here for a couple of nights and loved the friendly staffs nicely decorated room and quiet location it was a perfect getaway place and a place to get yourself pampered we missed this place so much especially the moment we got to bali at the end of our stay before returning to our home countrywe would suggest the water edge villa as it comes with private beach and pool you may have to give in on the quality of food but the service quality is almost perfect the staffs are very helpful although the resort operated on a bigger scale compared to the same one in manado you will still get your attention from friendly staffs including the crew from the diving schooli would highly recommend this place for honeymooners and leisure diversthe odyssea divers did a great job too the service provided was good and personalized but at the same time highly professional
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: i stayed here for four nights after completing the mt rinjani trek and it was exactly what i was after and needed its located in a very quiet part of lombok away from the crowds and set right on a private beach the resort itself is quite small with not many villasrooms the rooms are excellent  spacious comfortable and clean in a lush garden setting the pavillion restaurant overlooking the water is a great spot for a meal iwan the general manager and all the staff were very friendly helpful and welcoming i took iwans advice and watched sunrise one morning  spectacular dont miss it the diving centre staff are also very friendly and helpful and happy to arrange an activity to suit you i went snorkeling off gili nangu island which is spectacular im keen to go back i highly recommend it
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: went on honeymoon to bali and lombok last monthchoose cocotinos for our rest time away from everything and from the crowds and we got exactly what we expectedcocotinos is located in sekotong area south lombok away from everythingthere is nothing around dont expect to see restaurants shops or other hotels nearbyyou wont get a motorbike here so dont expect to explore it by yourselfwe went for the top suite as we were in honeymoon we choosed the water edge villa beach front suite with private poolits amazing the suite is really awesome check my photos belowthe staff tries to help always but we can notice were not in bali anymorethe resort needs some small improvements its not acceptable not having fresh fruit juices only concentrated as told earlier by other guests prices for food and meals are not cheap comparing other places but not overpriced except drinks which i found overpriced   for a beer is crazy in indonesiathey provide transfer service to gili canggu island just in front of the resort but for the price we paid for our staying they should provide for free this transfer they charge it at  and we were paying  per nightheard a lot about the diving lessons and equipment rental but found it overpriced alsothough we enjoyed a lot staying at cocotinos very good if you enjoy a peaceful and quiet place to rest the rooms are also always cleanask for airport transfer in the hotel the road is not very good and found taxi service not safe and also will avoid seasicknesspm if you need extra info about cocotinos
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa

Review: my sister and i stayed at this resort for  nights in september  and absolutely loved it the rooms are beautifully decorated had a room with garden view and the outdoor garden shower corner is just perfect the beach is private very clean has white sand lots of beautifully shaped shells and perfect sun beds and umbrellas just next door from the restaurant is odysseas diving centre and they arrange diving or snorkeling for you we took  snorkeling trips to gili nanngu island which is just  minutes away by a boat and which you see from the beach and it is an absolute snorkeling paradise  the fish and the entire underwater world there will take your breath away the gili nanngu island is tiny but its water and beach is the real tropical paradise all the stuff of cocotinos resort is extremely kind friendly helpful and funny ready to assist you with whatever you may need and they literally lighten your daywe highly recommend to have the fresh funa fish steak and fish and chips the resort also serves high afternoon tea with local cakes every single day we hired a private car with a driver and went around the island the resort will arrange this for you and we also visited a local market which was one of the highlights of our stay itxcxbs the perfect place for those who search serenity and privacy and for those who are prepared to stay at the resort as it is not possible to get anywhere near by feet
Name: Cocotinos Sekotong, Boutique Beach Resort & Spa
